key.name: $MyPCName$, what is it?
...And this knucklehead, where in the world is he?
What is it?
My son is a bit... no, he's very hard-headed. I lost my patience with him, and well... He stormed out of the house and hasn't returned yet.
Sigh... People are right when they say parenting is the world's hardest job.
It's a beautiful day today. Hopefully it'll stay that way...

As the elder of this village, I'm doing my best to keep its residents safe. But there's little I could do about the seal of the Land of Darkness breaking, and now something terrible seems to happen every day.
The only wish I have now is for peace. $MyPCName$, I'm relying on you for that.
Another day, another incident...
What's the matter, dear?
Now that the court's been canceled, everyone has been clearing out of here. I used to pray for this day to come, but now the city feels so empty.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. I was just about done with this batch of cookies. Would you like to wait for them? My fresh-baked cookies are famous here in $map:02000001$, you know.
That $npc:11000055[gender:0]$, where did he go this time?
What should I make for dinner tonight?
What?
Did you really think you could hide that? Hmph!
Nothing is going my way.
I don't care why the court was canceled anymore. I've heard every rumor under the sun, and now they're saying it was an earthquake? Ridiculous! All I want now is to kick back.
Bah, everyone acts like they're the busiest person in the world. Everyone here in $map:02000001$ spends their day rushing around like fools. Seriously!
What do you want?
Have you heard the rumors going around?
For the last time, I'm not adopted! Mom says its normal for babies to come out giant and furry sometimes. If you want a real rumor, you should hear about the giant demons zipping around the sky.
Giant demons?
You didn't know? It's all anyone's talking about lately. I've heard talk that they've been kidnapping people.
Do you actually know of any victims?
Yeah, the appear like a flash of lightning. In the blink of an eye, the person next to you is gone. Just like that!
Err... No. I'm just telling you what I heard!
Let's see... So, this book goes...
Ahh, it's going to take forever to organize these books!
What a mess!
Please, try not to step on the books on the floor.
$npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ has a bad habit of returning books late.
Learning isn't limited to school. It's something you'll do your whole life. We should all strive to become true intellectuals.
Tell me about the origin of lumistones.
How do I use lumistones?
How did you become the head librarian?
Lumistones are called the last gift of the light. What do you want to know?
When were lumistones discovered?
When were shiny hallowstones discovered?
I have no more questions.
Lumistones date back to the early history of Maple World. Their tale comes to us from a time when the goddesses of light and darkness coexisted.
These goddesses created the myriad worlds and the creatures that dwelled within. Maple World was their final creation. That's wonderful in its own way, isn't it?

Anyway, the goddess of light wanted to create a perfect world, and so created the Sages to act as guides. Each one received a portion of the goddess's power so they could maintain peace in Maple World.

But the more light the Sages brought into Maple World, the less happy the Goddess of Darkness became. Seeing that Maple World had become unbalanced, she sought to destroy it. Of course, the Goddess of Light was not too happy about this arrangement.

Their disagreement soon led to war. They were equally powerful, but the Goddess of Light had the Sages to call upon. After a long, bloody battle, the Goddess of Darkness was shattered to pieces and dispersed across the land.
Even in victory, the Goddess of Light could not prevent the darkness from tainting Maple World. Wherever the shards of darkness landed, once-peaceful creatures became vicious monsters.
Feeling remorse over the war, the Goddess of Light made the ultimate sacrifice and became shards of light to breathe life back into Maple World.
But first, the Goddess of Light created one last servant: a guardian for Maple World. Empress $npcName:11001969[gender:1]$.
Some of the dust left behind by the Goddess of Light's sacrifice crystallized. The early people of Maple World didn't know what to do with this crystal dust.
Even so, they recognized the crystals' power. When mishandled, these crystals often led to disaster. The general population began to fear them.

Time passed. Finally, the great scholar Amil and his associates took interest in these crystals. They formed a union of researchers called Arkell and took the time to study the remnants of the Goddess of Light.

In his research, Amil found a way to stabilize the energy of the crystals by cutting them into precise shapes. Archmage $npcName:11001573[gender:0]$ helped Amil helped this research along. He even gave lectures about the crystals at $map:52000101$.

With $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$'s support, Amil managed to create a gemstone in the shape of a bead, which he named a lumistone. He's the scholar responsible for all the lumistones we have today. And the rest, as they say, is history.
What an interesting story.
I'm glad you think so! Let me know if you have any more questions.
I have another question.
$itemPlural:20300828$ are used to enchant lumistones, but we don't know much about them. They were left behind by the Sages, and the Sages vanished long ago.

In the early days, nobody knew what to do with $itemPlural:20300828$. Any mage could tell that they contained power, but the power to do what? It was pure happenstance that some scholar mistakenly applied some $itemPlural:20300828$ to a lumistone and found it greatly improved.

It was through this scholar's further experiments that we learned $itemPlural:20300828$ could be used to enchant lumistones to incredible levels. Some people go so far as to call these a gift from the goddesses.
Is it possible to make new ones?

There are a few people who know how. My teacher, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, is one such person and he has happily shared his knowledge with the rest of the world. It's a good thing, too, because demand has only grown.

Interestingly enough, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ knows how to create them from ancient techniques passed down between mages, but knows nothing of the underlying nature or powers involved. Perhaps, one day, someone will find other uses for them. Just the thought of it makes me yearn for the future!
I have another question.
Keep your eyes open. I don't like this.
I'm something of an expert on lumistones, so feel free to ask me anything.
Can lumistones be improved?
How do you dismantle a lumistone?
Where can I find lumistone materials?
I have no more questions.

You can upgrade a lumistone up to 5 times. Just open your inventory and press the gemstone button. Of course, you'll need $itemPlural:40500001$, $itemPlural:40500002$, and $itemPlural:40100027$ to do so. The higher tier your lumistone, the more materials you'll need.
To bring a lumistone up to tier 5, you'll need $itemPlural:20300828$ instead of $itemPlural:40100027$. Nobody is quite sure why, but it seems to be a hard rule.

Just so you know, some $itemPlural:40500001$, $itemPlural:40500002$, and $itemPlural:40100027$ will bind to you when you pick them up, while others can be traded between adventurers. You can use either type to improve your lumistones, but the ones that are bound to you will always be used first.
I have another question.

You can dismantle lumistones at the dismantlers here and there in town. Of course, you can also just use the dismantle button in your inventory. Dismantling lumistones is a good way to get $itemPlural:40500001$ and $itemPlural:40500002$.

The dust you get from dismantling lumistones has the same properties as the lumistones themselves. For instance, if a lumistone was bound to you, then the dust you get from dismantling it will also be bound to you.

Am I forgetting anything...? Oh, of course! The higher a lumistone's tier, the more $itemPlural:40500001$ and $itemPlural:40500002$ you will get from dismantling it. Pretty straightforward, don't you think?
I have another question.
Lumistone materials can be found from all sorts of different sources throughout Maple World. Now, this is a lot to take in, so listen carefully.

Lumistones can be found in $itemPlural:20300849$ and $itemPlural:20300850$, which you get as rewards for navigator activities. If you're a good smith, you can also craft $itemPlural:20300846$ at mastery level 5.
You can get $itemPlural:40500001$ and $itemPlural:40500002$ from Adventure/Raid Bonus Boxes, as well as other places. And you know that you can get dust by dismantling lumistones, right?
$itemPlural:40100027$ can be found by dismantling outfits found from hunting, events, or in the premium shop.

You'll get a different number of $itemPlural:40100027$ from the outfit depending on its quality and source. Never just throw away an old expired outfit—throw it in the dismantler and see what you get!

When you reach mastery level 12 in your smithing skill, you'll get 120 $itemPlural:20300828$ as a bonus. You can also get $itemPlural:20300828$ from Adventure/Raid Bonus Boxes and through alchemy crafting.
Just so you know, it takes 9,000 $itemPlural:20300828$ to enchant a lumistone up to tier 5. That's a lot, sure, but the effects of a tier 5 lumistone make it well worth the trouble.
That's too much to take in all at once!
Are you kidding? This is only a fraction of the knowledge you need to become a lumistone expert! Well, if it's too much, just keep studying. You'll get it eventually.
I have another question.
Hmm... I adore history almost as much as I enjoy studying magic. I miss my friends and teachers back in Ellinel, but I'm happy here, surrounded by hundreds of ancient tomes.
What's your favorite subject?
Lumistones, of course! Just saying the name makes my heart flutter. Ah, if only I could roll around in a room full of lumi— Never mind! Forget I said anything!
What makes lumistones different from other gemstones?
Are you serious?! Surely you aren't so ignorant! If you don't understand how precious lumistones are, then allow me to illuminate you. Ask your questions.
Is there anything that you can't learn in a book?
Here's a familiar face. Have you finally decided to focus on higher education? I knew you'd come around eventually.
Actually, I'm here to do some research on Orbis.
Ah, the floating city. It was world-famous for its astonishing vistas. Unfortunately, it was destroyed in the war.
Even though the city is in ruins, the city center still burns to this day. Not a very pleasant place to live these days.
What else can you tell me about it?
That depends. What, specifically, do you want to know?
If Orbis is still on fire, where is the heat coming from?
Ah, now that is a curious question! I think I read something about that once...
In Orbis, the floating city, a very special cave exists. A cave where magma flows endlessly.
Do you know where the cave is?
No, but it shouldn't be too hard for me to find out. Actually getting to Orbis, however, is a fool's errand. I doubt anybody could survive there for long.
It's a good thing I'm not just anybody.
Hopelessly reckless, as usual. I'll tell you where to go, but that's it. I'll have nothing more to do with this.
Thank you for your time.
Don't mention it. Please. You'll forgive me for not seeing you off...
Is there nothing you can't learn from a book?
What's wrong?
I hope everything's okay in $map:02000076$.
I wonder how Captain $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is doing...
Platoon leader of the Green Hoods, at your service. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ sent me here to watch over $map:02000146$.
There's one person whom I admire more than $npc:11000015[gender:1]$, and it's my father. He died of illness when I was young, but the bow he carved for me was my inspiration to join this militia.
I'll do my best to become a good militia member, so I can believe my father would be proud of me.
What's wrong?
We'll follow Captain $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ to the end!
For our hometown!
We must train harder in trying times.
If you want to join the Green Hoods, then head to $npc:11000045[gender:0]$.
Welcome to $map:02000076$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000076$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000076$ used to be the home of archers and craftsmen, all living in a collective. They produced many great works and great hunters, generation after generation.
The Green Hoods formed to protect the village from outside threats to their peace. Their current leader is their fifth, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$.

Is $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ the chief of this village? Ha ha, no. Henesys's chief is $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s father and $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ have been best friends since they were young.

That's why $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ takes care of $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ like his own. You know, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ doesn't like people talking about her. So, maybe don't tell her about this conversation?

I've heard a great earthquake occurred near $map:02000001$, and the empress's court was canceled as a result. I hope the damage isn't too serious. That disaster might also keep $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ from returning anytime soon.
$npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ won't tolerate anyone trying to take advantage of a chaotic situation. I hope he'll be back soon. We need him more than ever.

You've probably noticed that the Green Hoods are all archers. We're renowned throughout Victoria Island for our marksmanship, and even $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$, the master archer of $map:02000001$, is a Green Hood.
In fact, she taught me everything I know about loosing a bow. If you're interested in archery yourself, I'd suggest paying her a visit next time you're in the capital.
Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a house of their own. $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ is doing what he can to manage the housing lots around the village, but there's only so much land.

If you don't have a house yet, you could settle down in $map:02000076$. $map:02000105$ is also quite nice, and is famous for its beautiful maple trees. There might be some empty lots still available in $map:02000104$ or $map:02000143$ as well. If you're looking for more affordable options, then you can check out the apartments in $map:02000105$ or $map:02000104$.

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling the ant tunnels.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, hiring a maid is a good next step. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in $map:02000001$ is an expert on assistants and can definitely help you out. Maybe you should look for a house around $map:02000076$ first.
What brings you here?
So, the time has come for me to intervene.
So intense...
Have you heard of $map:02000051$? The cliffs there are so treacherous that most people wouldn't dare climb it.
If you have the chance, you should visit $map:02000051$ and visit my dad. Tell him you're $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$'s friend and you'll be like one of the family.
Who is your father?
Oh, don't worry. You'll know him when you see him.
What seems to be the problem?
The open court is canceled, but I'm still as busy as ever.
I deliver every package that comes to $map:02000001$.
I'm busy, so busy!

If I keep working like this, exhaustion's going to get me. And what's worse is that $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$ still won't appreciate all my hard work! You know, it's so hard to take care of $map:02000001$ by myself.
Give me a moment, I'll open up a portal for you to take.
What is it?
Maybe I'll find something valuable if I search hard enough...
W-who are you? You better not be here to steal anything. This is my spot!
That's right.
No.
Hey, no! Get out! If we take too much stuff, they'll notice for sure!
Oh, okay. Good. You'd better get out of here then, before someone sees you. And don't tell anyone you saw me in here!
How may I help you?
Don't let your guard down, even for a second.
I'm worried about the elder's health.
What brings you to this place?
I came to see you.
I came to $map:02000076$ to see the elder.
I have business here.
That's none of your business.
Do you have a reason for coming to see me?
I just thought I'd say hi.
Nope.
Oh. Well. Hi.
Well, you're just being ridiculous. I've no time for that. Excuse me.
$npcName:11000001[gender:0]$'s house is on the hill behind the clock tower in the center of the village. He's always there, keeping an eye on everyone.
I see. All I'll say then is that if you need help, the militia is always here.
I hope I didn't upset you. You certainly don't have to explain yourself. But if you do, the rest of the militia and I may be able to help.
Let me open up a portal so you can get there quickly.
Hm hm hmmm, hm! Those marching songs always get stuck in my head.
If there isn't a path, I'll carve one out myself!
If only there were a safer way to $map:02000001$...
Hey there. First time in $map:02000062$?
Yep!
Well, if you're trying to get to $map:02000001$, I've got some bad news for you.. We just had a big earthquake that split the road there in half. No one can make the journey now.
As if that weren't bad enough, rough seas are preventing ships from entering or leaving the harbor. We're all stuck here!
Is there no other way to get to $map:02000001$?
What about by air?
I've heard there's a wilderness path that connects $map:02000115$ and $map:02000116$, but no one's been taking it. Supposedly it's a bit... dangerous.
Where's the path?
Uhh... Lith isn't that kind of port, buddy.
It's through a mountain path northwest of $map:02000062$. The path's been closed for ages, though. Too treacherous for most folks. I'd forget about it if I were you.
How may I help you?
The road has been cut off. I wonder if the porters are safe.
By the way, what caused that earthquake all of a sudden?
I still can't believe that the road to $map:02000001$ is out. All the supplies for the empress's court have been sent along that road. Do you think anyone fell in when the ground opened up? Yeesh.

The open court of the empress is just around the corner, and yet bad things are happening constantly around here. First the supply carriage was robbed, and then the earthquake happened. All I wanted was for all this to go smoothly.
How may I help you?
My grandson is so rebellious that he's going to give me a heart attack. I miss the days when he would just listen.
The whole world is excited about the empress finally holding court again.
I don't know what to do to get through to $npcName:11000054[gender:0]$.
$npcName:11000054[gender:0]$ is as stubborn as a mule. Please find him before he leaves $map:63000001$.
What is it?
Argh, this is too much!
Why do people keep coming to the harbor? Don't they know the routes are blocked?
Are you heading to $map:02000001$. You know that the way is blocked, right?
Yeah, I heard.
No, I didn't. Really?
Good, I don't have to explain it to you. So... if you can't get to $map:02000001$, what are you going to do?
I'll find another way!
Beats me.
What are you gonna do, fly? The road is gone! It has ceased to be! You need to be realistic about this.
Seriously, have a look at $map:02000115$. Let me know what you think of the terrible, yawning chasm of doom in your way. I'll wait.
That's understandable. $map:02000001$ has it all, and all we've got is... fish. Might as well head home once you've got your fill of fish, huh?
It sure is. The Royal Road is the main route from this harbor to $map:02000001$, and it was cracked open by the earthquake that happened the other day. Now no one can get to $map:02000001$.
If you don't believe me, go to $map:02000115$ and see for yourself.
What's up?

Are you also trying to attend the court? I was on my way there... stopping to sample some delicious food along the way, of course... and had my plans dashed by this wretched rift! I suppose I could try the forest, but it's fairly frightening.
Wait, can you get around the rift through the forest?
That's what I heard! Follow the path between the trees over there to $map:02000116$, and then keep on until you get to $map:02000001$.
I wouldn't try it if I were you, though. A few folks have faced the forest... but none have returned from $map:02000116$.
Welp, so much for my plans!
I bet the food at the court festival is so good...
Ah, it's time to eat! Mom must be looking for me.
How may I help you?
Now we're having earthquakes out of the blue?
I can't believe we're reopening this road...
Have you seen the Royal Road? Or rather, what's left of it? A huge earthquake tore right through it! Everyone who wants to get to $map:02000001$ is stuck here now.

$map:02000001$ is so close, and yet so far. Those who came by ship to attend the court are beyond disappointed. That's why we've decided to open the mountain path. To those who are authorized to use it, of course.
Hm? How may I help you?
What can you tell me about trading airships?
Oh! Well, there was some kind of new-old technological development that recently opened the skies to trade. Flying boats, what a concept!
But, from what I've heard, only a fraction of the airships going out ever come back...
What do you mean by that?
The airships vanish into... well, thin air! Once they set off for the skies, they just don't come back.
Does anyone know what happens to them?
I haven't the faintest idea. Anyway, that's all I know.
What brings you here?
You don't look like you're from around here. Did you come to see the court?
Yep!
That's none of your business.
Oh, cool! I was planning on attending myself.

I asked my brother to see the court with me, but he was more interested in catching some kind of fish while they were in season. I suppose it's good that he didn't come, now that the road to $map:02000001$ is out.
What happened to the road?
How could you not have heard? The Royal Road leading to $map:02000001$ was torn up by the earthquake the other day. Can't be good for holding court, y'know?
Hey, now. No need to be like that. I was just making conversation.
That $npc:11000023[gender:0]$, where in the world is he?
Why is this happening when the court is set to open in just a few days?
I've got fresh fish!
I've got halibut, rockfish, turbot, mackerel, stingray, you name it!
Fresh fish! We catch 'em, you buy 'em!
I have something to ask you.
Oh, all right. How can I help you, dear?
What can you tell me about trading airships?
You mean those new-fangled boats with wings? They show up in $map:02000062$ from time to time. I've gotta tell you, that's not a sight you'll soon forget.
Have you heard anything about them... disappearing?
Disappearing? Hm... The ones passing through $map:02000062$ never seem to have any trouble...
Have you seen them fly?
Well no, I've never actually seen one in flight. But I can't imagine why they'd have wings if they didn't fly!
Thanks for the information.
Let me know if you ever see one fly.
It seems like the airships traveling by sea are fine...
Uhh. Good? Now are you sure you don't want any fish?
What's wrong?
We'll follow Captain $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ to the end!
I hope this peace will last forever.
I'll protect the citizens of $map:02000076$.
We must preserve the order of Maple World.
Welcome to $map:02000076$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000076$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000076$ used to be the home of archers and craftsmen, all living in a collective. They produced many great works and great hunters, generation after generation.
The Green Hoods formed to protect the village from outside threats to their peace. Their current leader is their fifth, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$.

Is $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ the chief of this village? Ha ha, no. The chief of $map:02000076$ is $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s father and $npc:11000001[gender:0]$ have been best friends since they were young.

That's why $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ takes care of $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ like his own. You know, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ doesn't like people talking about her. So, maybe don't tell her about this conversation?

I've heard a great earthquake occurred near $map:02000001$, and the empress's court was canceled as a result. I hope the damage isn't too serious. That disaster might also keep $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ from returning anytime soon.
$npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ won't tolerate anyone trying to take advantage of a chaotic situation. I hope he'll be back soon. We need him more than ever.

You've probably noticed that the Green Hoods are all archers. We're renowned throughout Victoria Island for our marksmanship, and even $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$, the master archer of $map:02000001$, is a Green Hood.
In fact, she taught me everything I know about loosing a bow. If you're interested in archery yourself, I'd suggest paying her a visit next time you're in the capital.
Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a house of their own. $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ is doing what he can to manage the housing lots around the village, but there's only so much land.

If you don't have a house yet, you could settle down in $map:02000076$. $map:02000105$ is also quite nice, and is famous for its beautiful maple trees. There might be some empty lots still available in $map:02000104$ or $map:02000143$ as well. If you're looking for more affordable options, then you can check out the apartments in $map:02000105$ or $map:02000104$.

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling the ant tunnels.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, hiring a maid is a good next step. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in $map:02000001$ is an expert on assistants and can definitely help you out. Maybe you should look for a house around $map:02000076$ first.
I hope I'll make lots of new allies.
Yes? Yes? What do you need? How can I help?
This is my fault. All my fault!
I messed up. I messed it all up. Woe is meee!
Can I help you?
There's no package the teeth can't carry!
Bullies are the worst. How can anyone pick on someone weaker than themselves?
How may I help you?
The power of the Green Lapenta is especially strong here in $map:02000023$. That vital force protects this place from darkness.
Your pure energy is forming a new portal!
How may I help you?
We should let $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ know his identity and ask for advice. Meet me in $map:02000035$.
What brings you here?
I've got plenty of books I want to read, but not enough time to do it.
I'll never get tired of this book, no matter how many times I read it.
Ancient tomes containing stories of this world must be handled with care. They can teach us many important lessons.
Are you lost? Why are you bothering me?
Take me to $map:52000133$.
Just thought I'd pay you a social visit.
$npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ says you're all right, so fine. Off you go.
All right, then. I hope you're enjoying $map:02000023$.
The ancient records of our history must be handled with care. They teach us many important lessons.
Can I help you?
I want to go home.
Nothing's more important than peace of mind. I find mine snuggled up safe in bed.
How may I help you?
What kind of fun should I have today?
I can't wait to see Mom!
The world is so scary sometimes. Be careful, $MyPCName$!
What is it?
Don't forget to appreciate the little things.
The flowers and trees seem so lively today!
Love the flowers and trees as you love yourself. Without them, you wouldn't exist.
Can I help you?
Why are humans so kind?
Ahh, I'm so lonely...
One day, I'm going to go out and explore the world! You'll join me when I do, right $MyPCName$?
I see you've brought me some $itemPlural:30000435$.
Can you purify them?

Well... You see, that needs some special purging magic... $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ and the fairies think I'm too young to learn that kind of magic. They won't even let me gather $itemPlural:30000435$.

Even if I can't cast neat purifying spells, at least I can collect $itemPlural:30000435$ from adventurers like you. If I get enough flowers, maybe $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ will finally let me do the fun stuff. When he does, bring me more flowers, okay?
Who will protect $map:02000051$?
Nothing in this world lasts forever.
May the ancestors keep you safe.
Everything changes.
Sometimes you get what you want. Sometimes you must settle.
Let's get to business.
I've gotten a little too lenient...
It's time to restore discipline.

I'll admit, not everyone in Dark Wind was happy when I took over. Many were loyal to Captain Winn, not the organization. After he passed away, $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ took some of our best agents and left.
But I have my own principles to follow and I intend to lead Dark Wind in my own way. Winn Stilton was a great man, but we won't live in his shadow.
The others may not be on board yet, but they'll come around. Eventually.
Give me a moment for me to open a portal for you.
Can I help you?
Another lovely day.
Hm... What should I cook for dinner tonight?
I used to love hearing the sound of bow craftsmen carving wood. The most talented of them all was Freeman.
He was $npcName:11000007[gender:1]$'s father. It's a shame an illness took him so early, but he would surely approve of the woman his daughter grew to be.
How may I help you?
I'm going to let the rest of the world know what a great place $map:63000001$ is!
$MyPCName$, do you know what the pride of $map:63000001$ is?
The lovely scenery?
The good-natured people?

That's right. The air is clean, the water is pure, and there are plenty of unique plants and animals to see. It's a wonderful place to live, and I want the rest of the world to know that. That's why I'm sending a special envoy to $map:02000001$ for the court.

That's right. The people of this place take care of each other like their own family. It's a wonderful place to live, and I want the rest of the world to know that. That's why I'm sending a special envoy to $map:02000001$ for the court.
What is it?
There's much more delicious food to be had on the mainland, right?
$item:20000013$ looks delicious...
$MyPCName$! Are you here to make some money? The court festival must be great for business. Everywhere I look, folks are out doing something for it.
The priciest thing to come out of all this is $itemPlural:20000013$, and you can only get them from Turtle Hill, where $npcName:22300149$ is.
What?
Hmph. I hate my gramps.
I want to go see the court too!
Bah! $npcName:11000062[gender:1]$ said she would go attend the court with her dad. Why isn't my gramps saying anything? I want to go to see the empress too!
$npcName:11000056[gender:0]$ knows about a lot of things. If you have questions, you should ask him!
How may I help you?
Mm, something smells delicious...
$MyPCName$, if you're hungry you should come inside. This is my house right here, and my mom is baking cookies.
I wonder if Mom finished baking the cookies...
What is it?
$npcName:11000441[gender:0]$, wake up! Let's play!
Treasure chests are hidden all over the place.
Hmph, the oarsman at $map:63000002$ is so greedy. He charges a huge fee just to take you to $map:02000062$. Isn't that crazy?
It really is.
I don't know.
Seriously! Some people stay in $map:63000002$ for ages just to make enough money to get on his boat!
What do people do to make money?
Really? Well, I guess the fare would be nothing if I could win $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$'s prize money.
Wait, what's this about $npc:11000441[gender:0]$'s prize money?
Oh, they hunt monsters or pick up junk that washes up on the shore. Some of it is pretty valuable.
But I'll never go there. I don't want to be trampled by $npcName:22300149$ before I get to the mainland.
I told you. Enter $map:61000005$ behind me and survive until the end, and $npc:11000441[gender:0]$ will shower you with money.
What brings you here?
What is it?
Bella... You...
If I could turn back time...
If I had stayed with Bella that day...
I used to live here with my family, but... I'm the only one living in this house now. I miss them so much...
Sometimes I sit by the window, watching the stars fade away one by one, reminiscing about the good old days. I try not to recall the sad memories, but only the good, happy ones.
I'll help you get there quick.
How may I help you?
Good grief! Are all cities this big?
This place is so crowded.
Do you live here?
Yep!
Nope!
I knew it! I can tell you're from the city by your looks. How much money do you have to make to live in a neighborhood like this?

Oh, no. You look so pale, I-I thought you lived here. I've never been to such a big place before, and everything is so amazing here. And I think I've seen more people today than I've ever seen in my hometown.
What is it?
The island hasn't been this crowded for a long time.
The mainland must be busy preparing for the empress's court right now.
$MyPCName$, are you also going to the mainland?
That's right.
I don't know.
You've made a good decision. I've stayed on this small island my whole life, but I want you to go see more of the this world.
While you're there at the court, you might as well explore the rest of the mainland. I'd love for you to come back with tales of the things you saw.
Cross the sea to the mainland to experience more of what this world can offer.Go on, don't be afraid.
What is it?
Oh geez, why is this place so dirty?
It'll take forever to clean this place up.
If you came to see $npcName:11000016[gender:0]$, you can find him in $map:63000003$. The chief called him to talk about the ship for the court.
How may I help you?
Yippee! I'm going to $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s court!
I can finally meet $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ in person... Oh, I'm so nervous!
$MyPCName$, did you hear that? Ordinary people can attend the empress's court this time! I'll be able to meet the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ in person. Oh, I'm so nervous!
$MyPCName$, you're also coming to the court, right? Come on, come with us! Dad said he'd take me with him.
Where will the court be held?
Why are you so interested in the court?
In $map:02000001$! It's the biggest city on the mainland, far across the ocean. We'll have to take a ship to $map:02000062$ first, though.
Where can I board the ship?
Because it's a once-in-a-lifetime chance to see $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$! Oarsman $npcName:11000016[gender:0]$ said that just seeing her would bring honor to my family.
Go to the dock and talk to the oarsman. Come to think of it, I haven't seen him lately. I wonder where he is...
How may I help you?
I wanna be a great Heavy Gunner like $npc:11000046[gender:1]$ when I grow up!
What was that big gun she's carrying called?
I want to become a great Heavy Gunner like $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ when I grow up! Pew pew!
Why's that?
Well, yesterday I was out playing by the castle and I tripped on a stone. It really hurt and I cried a whole lot! Then $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ saw me crying and asked why, because she's a HERO.
I told her all about tripping over the stone, and how I hate stones now! So $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ took her giant gun... and BLEW UP the stone! Ka-BOOOOSH!
$npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ said that if something hurts her, she'll hurt it ten times worse! Now those are words to live by, right? Right?
Yes.
No.
Hooray, you get it! You know, $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ and I have a secret now.
What's the secret?
Well, it's a secret... Can you keep it secret?
Of course.
I'll decide after you tell me.
This really is a secret... Alright, I'll tell you because you're $MyPCName$.
When $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ blew up the stone, she also blew up a bunch of hay and firewood that was lying around.
No one knows she did it except me. And her. And now you! So $MyPCName$, you'll keep this a secret, right? $npc:11000046[gender:1]$ made me pinky-swear not to tell, so you have to pinky-swear to me.
No! Then I'm not going to tell you! Hmph!
Oh $MyPCName$, you don't understand me.
KABOOM! KRAKA-BOOM!
It's good to see you.
$npcName:11000069[gender:1]$... Being with you like this...
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$... That rat!
I couldn't have returned to my old life if it weren't for the people who believed in me.
$MyPCName$, you've helped me so much. Thank you.
When I was a fugitive, you gave me a run for my money a few times.
Really? That's not how I remember it.
You have no idea. There were a few times that you were only a few feet away from me. If you'd looked around the wrong corner...
Luckily, in the end, you decided to trust $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$ instead of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. If you'd gone the other way, who knows how things would have turned out?
You were doing pretty well on your own.
Maybe it looked like that from the outside, but I was backed into a corner. Bella forced my hand at Katramus. Without you and Blackeye, I'd probably be dead now.
In those early days, I didn't think much of you. But no matter how many false leads I planted, you were always back on my tail within a matter of hours.
I was sure you'd give up after our fight in that abandoned townhouse. But you kept on growing stronger after that. If I had to fight you now...
Let's just say that I'm glad we're on the same side.
We used to be best friends, Katvan, Eve, and I. We got into all kinds of mischief when we were kids...
But that just makes me hate him more. We had bonds that were thicker than blood, and he betrayed us. For what? A fancy title and a little bit of power?
Eve thinks that he might come around again. But I know better. I know Katvan's true colors.
Surely there's more to the story.
Of course there's more to the story. There's the part that's still coming up. The part where I put Katvan in the ground once and for all.
He killed my mentor–Eve's father! There's nothing left to talk about.
He had me on the ropes before, but things are different now. And I know I can count on you to help me take him out.
How may I help you?
I've devoted myself to the betterment of my city!
As the mayor, I have a serious dilemma. Should I make the city great again, or is it already great?
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
Yes? How may I help you?
Dad...
I'd like to be alone.
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
Ever since I was appointed minister, the most important person in my life has become $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$. I live to protect her and assist her in all her affairs.
Your eyes tell me what kind of person you are, $MyPCName$, and so I believe I can trust you. Please continue to protect the peace of this world.
The Land of Darkness is but a stop on the way to the Shadow World. The only way to lock that terrible place away again is to restore the Blue Lapenta.
Do you need something?
I've heard some unsettling rumors about $map:02000001$ lately.
Bah, you don't listen to rumor and hearsay, do you?
Well, I also have a photo...
Oh. Hm... Curious...
What can you tell me about the photo?
Hard to say, with the photograph being as blurry as it is. But I think I've seen a similar creature depicted in a tome from my family's library.
Go on...
Long ago, the goddess of light did battle with a dark being, but she was unable to destroy him. The shapes in this picture are similar to its minions.
But that's impossible. That evil was banished from this world long ago.
What else can you tell me about this "being?"
I've told you all I know. Hopefully I've answered your question. Now, if you don't mind, I have matters of state to attend to.
$MyPCName$, what brings you to me?
We must gather the $itemPlural:30000181$ as soon as possible. They are all that stand between our world and utter darkness.
I've asked much of you, but there is still so much more left to do.
I owe a debt of gratitude to the minister. I hope he returns soon.
It was $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ who suggested I hold an open court for the people. I suppose it was part of his plan all along...
Let me open up a portal you can take if you want.
How may I help you?
They're getting stronger...
I must go back to the empress... Hm...
$npcName:11000119[gender:0]$... It's been too long.
I command the Royal Knights of Empress $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$. Our sacred duty is to keep her safe.
But after that shadow gate to the Land of Darkness appeared, the empress sent us here to guard the border between worlds.
The minister is with the empress, but that doesn't reassure me much. I've been here for too long. I want this battle done and over with so I can go back to her.
I lead the Lumiknights, the defenders of the empress, and yet I was completely oblivious of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s true nature. It's disgraceful.
You must move quickly. I shall open a portal for you.
What seems to be the problem?
This place is so peaceful.
I wonder when I'll be called back to HQ...
How are your journeys treating you? Deployments can be exciting, but I get homesick if I'm away for too long.
How may I help you?
The wolves of the Vayar Mountains protect the tribes that worship the wolf god. We gray wolves are the guardians of the Murpagoths. The red wolves are the guardians of the Yamarchas.
How may I help you?
I hope we can get to $map:02000001$ quickly.
What's taking Dad so long? Is the bathroom crowded?
This place is connected to $map:02000001$ by the great Royal Road. Just stay on it, and you'll be there in no time.
What brings you here?
Don't bully fairies!
I like making shoes for my friends. Be my friend, and I'll give you a pair of shoes.
What is it?
$npcName:11000151[gender:1]$ got off first. Did she leave me here...?
Hm hm! Even the air smells different on the mainland!
I sailed here with my girlfriend, $npc:11000151[gender:1]$. We're going to check out the Empress's court.
So where is she?
I'm sure she's around here somewhere. She got off before I did. Man, she was so excited, she pushed through the crowd and ran ashore. Guess she didn't notice she left me behind! Ha, ha...
We finally made it to $map:02000062$! My lady and I are gonna have so much fun!
We finally made it to $map:02000062$! My lady and I are gonna have so much fun!
What seems to be the problem?
The Barrota Trading Company is Maple World's biggest mercantile organization. Its hawkers go everywhere in the world, no matter how steep or dangerous.
Do you know how the hawkers could move so quickly? It's because of this!
What is it?
Ugh... I must be exhausted. My arms feel like jelly.
It's not easy to make money.
I'm finding way more $itemPlural:30000011$ here than I did in town. I've almost reached my goal!
When I have enough money, $npc:11000151[gender:1]$ and I will go attend the court, hand in hand. It'll be great if we can meet again there, won't it?
I'm finding way more $itemPlural:30000011$ here than I did in town. I've almost reached my goal!
What is it?
My bag is getting heavy. It's time to seel some of this stuff!
Men should hunt!
Hey, $MyPCName$! Have you heard about the hero who collected over 1,000 mesos just by hunting monsters? That's me!
I think I was born to be a hunter. You should find something that you can be good at and have fun doing.
What is it?
Yo, man! Put your hands up! Say hey-yo!
Can't touch this! Na na na... Um, is that one still popular?
Yo, man! Wassup!
Stop! Collaborate and listen...
Hey yo, do you know what hip-hop represents?
How may I help you?
Oh, hello! How do you like $map:02000064$ so far?
What are you doing?
What events does the palace sponsor?
How can I participate in mini-games?
What do I get for winning mini-games?
What am I doing? Can't you see? I'm dancing for everyone who came to $map:02000064$. Some folks have said I should stop because of the earthquake, but I don't get it.
Come on, don't be so serious. Don't wallow in disappointment. We should cheer up and stay optimistic. Even $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ said so!

And don't push yourself too hard. Sometimes you need to take a break and collect yourself. Maple World has all kinds of fun and exciting events to keep you busy. You can meet new people and win fabulous prizes, too!
Oh man, I thought everybody knew about those! The palace advertises them everywhere. Okay, well, I can still tell you about it.

The palace sponsors many events all across Maple World. A decade ago, when Maple World faced one of the greatest challenges in its history, $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ decided to do something to help distract the people from their worries.
She said that Maple World needs something to bring people together. Since then, we've held all sorts of games on a regular basis for the benefit of the people.

Of course, Maple World is still not completely safe. The recent earthquake, for instance... Oops, I shouldn't have mentioned that. A-anyway, these events are important just in how much they help the morale of the populace.
Participating in mini-games is easy! $npcName:11001899$ will make an announcement anytime a game goes live. All you have to do is play!

And even if you're feeling lazy and not up for traveling, there's no need to worry! You can teleport to mini-games from anywhere in the universe! When the Event Notification window appears, just press Enter next to the event you want to join!
Well, what are you standing around here for? Go play some mini-games!
Win palace-sponsored events to receive the blessing of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$. It's a great honor, you know!
And that's not all! You'll earn mesos, nice skins, and useful potions, too. A lot of people come to this place, dreaming of wealth and fame.
Oh, right. When you join $map:61000001$ or $map:61000002$ games, keep an eye out for the merchants who sell interesting items! That should make your time in $map:02000064$ even more worthwhile!
What is it?
Hey there!
I can't believe this is happening to me...
I should never have left home...
Well aren't you a sight for sore eyes. It's been a while since I've seen anybody that wasn't a skeleton or an angry octo-thing looking to bludgeon me to death.
What is it?
Well, I thought this place would be a lot bigger than my island. It's not.
I'd better get to $map:02000001$ before the court festival begins.
Honey, if you're looking to make a splash in $map:02000001$'s social scene, you're gonna need to do something about that outfit.
What?
Hm... Is this Victoria Island?
Don't talk to me.
Eww. Stranger danger!
What?
Don't talk to me.
What can you tell me about trading airships?
Airships? I don't know anything about that.
Are you sure you haven't heard ANYTHING?
Ugh, how annoying. That weird guy from earlier was asking the same questions.
I'm going to keep bothering you until you talk to me...
Ugh! Fine! There are some rumors flying around about airships going missing, but I don't remember any of the details because they were boring.
I don't even know if they're the same airships you're talking about, just that some have supposedly gone missing. There, are you happy?
Thanks. You've been a biiig help.
Don't act like we're friends now.
What is it?
Sigh... What do I do?
Should I just go back?
The Royal Road is blocked, and the forest path is too dangerous. I can't even go back home since the sea routes are messed up now too. I don't know what to do.
What is it?
I didn't come all the way here for this!
Where are all the merchants? I heard there would be merchants!
I heard $map:02000001$ is filled with beautiful ladies, so I came here, all decked out. What a waste of time. And now I'm stuck here!
What is it?
I want to go see the court too...
Aren't you scared to be here? It's too high up for my liking...
What is it?
I trust $npcName:11000113[gender:0]$ will look after the storage in my stead.
I really want to get to the court before it begins.
At least it's good to be on this big lump of land instead of that small island. I felt so trapped there.
Hey, did you see that $npcName:22300149$ over there? I thought they only had those in my hometown. I had no idea!
Anything that reminds me of my hometown makes me happy. Like that $npcName:22300149$... I guess this is what it's like to be homesick.
I never expected to see $npcName:22300149$ here too.
What's up?
Aww, I really don't think I can enter $map:02000116$.
Why?

A while back, I followed my uncle who works as a royal porter to the entrance of the forest. I couldn't see more than a few feet in front of me, the underbrush was so thick. Plus it was raining... I never want to go through that again.
Things are really crazy right now.
I wonder if the porters arrived safely...
You'd have to be suicidal to enter that abominable forest.
What's up?
Look at this. Terrible, isn't it? Geez, I've never seen such a big fissure.
Ahh, I feel dizzy...
If I fall... Yeesh...
What is it?
How can I make some quick money?
I would love to go to $map:02000062$...
$MyPCName$, are you here to make a buck too?
Why would I want to make money?
How can I make money here?
Oh, you didn't hear? The empress has called for an open court. If you want to get to the mainland to see it, you'll need a lot of money.
Well, I usually check the boxes and jars laying around the village. You can find all kinds of cash or stuff to sell in 'em.
If you want to make money quickly, you can always gather clams at $map:63000002$ over there. I've heard some of them hide expensive pearls and starfish.
Be careful, though. Monsters are milling about the beach. I'd rather make money slowly than be beaten up by those things.
How may I help you?
What if $map:02000062$ and $map:02000001$ and everything else in the world collapses?
Don't worry.
Really, $MyPCName$? Looking into this giant pit of doom doesn't fill you with the least little bit of doubt?
Aww, I'm so scared...
There have to be some scary monsters down there!
What is it?
Feh. Good riddance!
Stay with the empress and don't come back! Hmph!
Why did $npcName:11000116[gender:0]$ go down there?
Hmph! Just as well. I hope the road stays destroyed forever.
Why's that?
Smith left for $map:02000001$ to see the court instead of staying with me for my birthday. I don't need a boyfriend who cares more about the empress than me. I hope he'll never come back. Hmph!
What is it?
Something doesn't add up.
A rift must have opened up somewhere.
$MyPCName$, do you think this is just a simple earthquake?
Yep!
Seems unlikely.
All right. Fine. Just keep thinking that way.
I don't have proof yet, but I'm certain this wasn't a simple earthquake. I suspect a massive shadow gate has opened somewhere, causing this upheaval.
What is a shadow gate?
You've never seen a shadow gate? Lucky you. They're doorways to the Land of Darkness. The empress herself has forbidden anyone from using such gates.

Our forces have the Shadow Gate blockaded and guarded to ensure nothing escapes. There are rumored to be unguarded passages hidden around Maple World, and some shady types use those to pass through to the Land of Darkness.

I was told that those who dare enter the Land of Darkness would have both their bodies and souls devoured by demons. However, that sounds like something made up to keep people from exploring. My plan is to find a shadow gate and travel to the Land of Darkness myself, so don't tell anyone.
Can I help you?
I had no idea there were so many people on this island.
The news of the empress's court has brightened the whole island.
Usually this place is not so crowded. I didn't expect so many people to be so eager to make money.
$MyPCName$, you looking to scare up some cash too? It's not as dangerous as I expected. Give it a try!
What brings you here?
Hm... I don't know if we'll be okay...
I'd better order the guards to tighten security.
$npcName:11000076[gender:0]$... Now that he's gone, I might actually start to miss him.
The Royal Guard protects $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and all of $map:02000001$. So long as there are threats to peace in this world, we will not rest.

Maybe it's time I told you the truth about why the court was canceled. Just before it was scheduled to start, the leadership met to discuss the details of the proceedings. Suddenly, a bloodied guard stumbled into the meeting and said that the court must be canceled.
We were shocked, as you might imagine. And before we could question him further, a dagger flew in from a nearby window and took his life. There, before our very eyes...

Everyone rushed to find the assailant, but we could find nothing. Our conclusion was that there must be a spy in the palace. The servants of the demon king were plotting something in time for the court. We had to cancel it.
Why didn't you tell anyone what happened?

You expect us to tell the public that someone was murdered, right in the middle of a meeting like that? People have only just started to calm down after the loss of the Blue Lapenta, we don't need to be riling them back up so soon.
Hold on, I'll open up a portal for you.
$MyPCName$, what brings you here?
$npcName:11003534$ sent me.
After all this time as the Guard Captain, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$ still treats me like a child.
You go and tell $npcName:11003534$ that I'll do whatever's necessary to protect $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$. I swore an oath, and on my life I intend to keep it.
Uh, I'm actually here to ask about the rumors going around $map:02000001$.
Ugh, not you too. These rumors are giving me a headache. I've upped security and tripled patrols to reassure the public, yet the rumors continue to spread.
And what about the truth behind the rumors?

I'll tell you the same thing I told the former captain of the Knights when he stopped by. I don't know anything! If we had any insight into the circumstances behind the rumors, the alliance would be the first to know.
The former captain?
Ah, it's nothing. Don't worry about it.
Okay.
I'm sorry I couldn't be of more help.
Some people are curious about my relationship with $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$. It's... quite complicated. I'd rather not get into it.
Select a thread.

This road is fraught with danger. You will need to make a detour.
- Voice of experience
What is it?
Ah... The monsters represent a growing threat.
There must be a solution.
Hm...
I must identify the fundamental cause.

Each of the monsters from the Land of Darkness has unique genetic material. By analyzing a wide range of material, I'm hoping to determine the rules that differentiate them from Maple World's monsters.
How may I help you?
I'm running out of antidotes faster than I expected.
I see you're curious about $itemPlural:20000016$. Well... After the Blue Lapenta was destroyed, hundreds of Defenders fell to the shadow toxin that spread from the Land of Darkness.

I tried everything reagent I could get my hands on to cure it, and the one that did it was the $item:20000045$, growing right here at the $map:02000146$. It took time to perfect the compounding process, but now my $itemPlural:20000016$ are key to the struggle against the darkness.
Watch out for the shadow toxin.
The shadow forces are growing strong...
What is it?
What brings you here?
Ugh... The drug... I must find the drug...
I didn't know this would happen. I thought I would be set once I created the new drug... Then they came after me... Ugh...
Ugh... Is anyone there?
Anyone, please...
Ah... Is this the end for me?
How did it come to this?
Ugh... How did this happen?
I've got to determine whether the mutated DNA strand was an outside contaminant, or was somehow mistakenly synthesized inside our test subjects...
They must be stopped...
Science must be used responsibly...
Um... Hi. What is it?
I ventured outside the village, but... I'm too scared to go any further.
Do you think I could hunt monsters?
I mustered up the courage to come here, but now I'm too scared to move. I have to hunt monsters, or get the treasure from the cliff. I need the money...
What seems to be the problem?
What do we do now?
I heard this path was dangerous. I didn't know it was this bad. You'd better be careful.
What seems to be the problem?
What's taking them so long?
Argh, I'm never coming this way again!
I took the Royal Road for granted. I've never been on a path so dangerous before.
And even if you get through this awful forest, there's a treacherous valley to cross. The cliffs of $map:02000051$ are nothing compared to what's ahead! Ahh, I'm never getting out of here alive...
How may I help you?
Once a year, the Murpagoth warriors go on a pilgrimage through the Vayar Mountains. By the time they return, they've grown much stronger than they were before.
I'll open up a portal so you can head right over.
What brings you here?
That's certainly an ominous sky.
Shush! Lower your voice.
Can I help you?
This wolf's name is Buka. He's my friend.
Can I help you?
Bah, what now?
Yaahh!
What's that?
Bah...
Hmph, this used to be a really nice place to live before that gigantic hotel dropped from the sky. It's been attracting all kinds of things and making our lives miserable.
Well, I'm not fighting those monsters. It's not that they're too scary... I just don't want to be bothered.
Can I help you?
Argh, I don't know what to do. What do I do?
I can't do this alone... Argh, I don't know what to do!
Whoever you are, please help me! My... My boss was taken by them. Please save him!
Don't worry, I'll save him.
Thank you so much! I'm here alone and I didn't know what to do until you came along. I've been watching them, and there's a few things you need to know.
First, don't step on the floor sensors marked red. They'll trip the alarm and you'll be in a world of hurt. I think if I hack into their security system, I should be able to turn off the alarm. Hm...
If you beat up a Blackdrake gang foot soldier, they're sure to call a superior for help. I suggest tossing an Energy Bomb at them, and then finishing them off quickly while they're stunned.
Please, save my boss!
W-who... are you?
Hello.
Mm... This place used to be peaceful...
Why can't anything be normal?
Sigh... See that big hotel on the cliff? It dropped from the sky one day, literally out of the blue. Since then, monsters have been swarming the area. It's getting impossible to do anything.
Huh? You think my name is funny. I disagree.
Boen is easy to remember and rolls off the tongue beautifully. Go to the top of that cliff and shout my name. It'll echo for a long time.
What brings you here?
...Finally, the time has come.
How did you make it this far?
I walked.
I ran.
I flew.
It just happened.
You know that's not the answer I wanted. You think this is all a big joke, don't you? Well, let me give you some advice.
Go back to where you came from. You're too young to die like a rat out here.
Then turn around and leave. It's too dangerous for you to hang around here.
Somewhere in this dark, damp place... He lurks.
Mm? Are you here to find the $map:02000037$ where $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ is sealed?
Yep!
Nope!
What is your purpose? Is there someone that you want to protect? Or do you covet $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s treasure?
I'm here to protect all of Maple World.
I want treasure!
The whole world, eh? What a ridiculous goal...
But goals like that keep a $male:man,female:woman$ going against impossible odds. I can respect that. Don't you dare fail!
I'm jealous, actually. Jealous that you can still have a bold dream like that. I've seen too many battles to even comprehend a dream like that...
Ah, to be young and foolish again.
Not that it's my place to judge, mind. Your life is yours to throw away as you please.
Another treasure seeker, then...
The treasure is great, to be certain. But is it worth risking your life over?
If $item:30000419$ is what you're after, you should talk to $npcName:11001210[gender:0]$ in $map:02000023$. I'm sure he can help you.
What brings you here?
I must find a way to go back...
Ugh... I feel dizzy...
Who are you?
Name's $npcName:11000145[gender:0]$. You?
I'm $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$? That sounds familiar... Was that when I lost my pocket watch?
Do you know me?
Oh, no. Your name just sounds familiar to me. I've been to so many places that sometimes I get names mixed up. Being here in the past is really...
Ahh, never mind. I'm talking nonsense now. Sigh... If you'll excuse me, I have things to do...
I'm sorry, but there's nothing more I can tell you about $npcName:22000322[gender:0]$ or the strange man wearing a $item:11300119$. Or, wait, have you asked yet?
Oh, no...
This is ridiculous!
Nothing seems to be going my way.
I'm getting tired of ending up in unfamiliar places!
I want out of this jungle the first chance I get. I can't wait to go back home.
Sigh, I'm tired of traveling through time. I always end up in places that I don't want to be
What is it?
I'd love to buy passage on the next ship to the mainland!
When will I ever have another chance to see the empress in person? I really want to go see the court!
What is it?
Ugh... My back...
Managing $map:63000004$ isn't easy.
If I wasn't charged with $map:63000004$, I could've joined the delegation. I hate that no one else can fill in for me!
What is it?
Where is he?
Have you seen a puppy around here?
Nope.
Ahhh... Whitey, where are you? I should never have taken him outside.
What is it?
Does Chaw even sleep?
Aren't they tired?
People spend their days scrambling around, trying to have it all. That's no way to live. Just enjoy the moment.
Unless this is extremely important, I'm in no mood to chat.
Did you see a guard get dragged away?
Now that you mention it, there was an especially pitiful-looking soldier... He was dragged off in the direction of $map:52000119$, to the northeast.
What?
Out of my way.
Go ask yourself.
What is it?
I've heard $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ is heartbreakingly beautiful.
Everyone's in a festive mood because of the court, and they're not even on the mainland where the court is being held. I wonder how excited the mainlanders must be!
What is it?
Diet... Diet...
I've heard walking is the best way to lose weight.
Not right now, I'm power-walking.
I can't get rid of these chubby cheeks, no matter how hard I try.
Mm... I haven't been looking good lately, no matter what I wear.
$npcName:11000173[gender:0]$ hasn't brought me anything nice lately. Is he not interested in me anymore?
Goodness, just LOOK at those clothes! Did you dig them out of some ancient ruins? Might be nice to wear something made in the last decade.
Can I help you?
How do I get these packages to $map:02000001$? Maybe catapult...
What do I do? I've got piles of packages, and the Royal Road to $map:02000001$ is all busted up.
What seems to be the problem?
Ergh, this is bad...
I don't know what caused the recent earthquake. It was so strong, it tore the Royal Road in half. This could be a serious problem.
It's really you! $MyPCName$, in the flesh!
It's an honor to meet you!
You know me?
You're the hero of the Siege of $map:02000001$. Of course I know you! You're a hero to all of us here.
I was just doing my duty.
You're so humble. Wow! Listen, if there's anything I can do to help you, just say the word.
I'm looking into rumors about hot places. Like, super hot.
Hot places, huh? Like unseasonably hot places?
That's one example.
Now that you mention it, I did hear a rumor from one of the merchants with the Barrota Trading Company. You heard about their new air trade routes, didn't you?
I may have heard a thing or two.
Well, a few of their routes pass over the ruins of Orbis. They say that the airships passing through the area get so hot, you can fry an egg on their decks.
Interesting, right?
Fascinating.
That's all I know.
It was a big help.
I can't believe I am getting to talk to you about real important official business! Don't worry, $male:sir,female:ma'am$, I'll do my best to keep $map:02000001$ safe, too!
What seems to be the problem?
My energy reserves are being depleted...
This is bad. The monsters are growing stronger by the day.
If you're looking for $itemPlural:20000014$, the monsters around here are running around with them.
What brings you here, $MyPCName$?
Are you really working with $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$? Do you think you could put in a good word?
Uhh... About what?
Becoming his apprentice! He says that I'm still a rookie, but in just ten years under his tutelage, I could become one of the greatest guards of all time!
Ten years?!
Anyway, why are you here?
I'm looking into rumors about places affected by extreme heat.
Extreme heat. I see...
I don't know anything about that!
They say $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ knows just about everything. You could head to $map:02000031$ and ask her.
Thank you for your time.
It was my pleasure! Please tell $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$ I said hello.
What seems to be the problem?
What if a shadow gate really has opened up nearby?
This place is extremely dangerous. Be careful not to fall.
The others must be quite anxious, since they don't know what's going on.
Yes? How may I help you?
Welcome to $map:02000001$.
You can ask me anything you want.
How may I help you, $MyPCName$?
How can I increase my job rank?
I don't know where I am.
You can talk to the Job Instructors for assistance. They've gathered in $map:02000188$, which you can reach through the entrance right behind me.
Oh! Well, that's an easy fix. Just press M to see all of Maple World at a glance in your World Map.
Adventurers, I hope today will bring you all great fortune!
If you have questions, you can also ask the nearest Royal Guard.
How may I help you, $MyPCName$?
I don't know where I am.
I'm bored.
Oh! Well, that's an easy fix. Just press M to see all of Maple World at a glance in your World Map.

Oh, I'm sorry. Hmm... how'd you like to make some friends? I know it can be awkward, but you'll never know what kind of cool people you can meet until you try it. You can also visit houses and leave a message in their Guestbook.
You can invite your friends over to your house for a party, explore dungeons, fish, and play music with them. Everything's more fun when you do it with friends!
Oh my, $MyPCName$! What brings you here?
Do you know anything about the rumors going around?
Funny, that knight earlier asked me about the same thing. Well, I guess these days that rumor is all anyone wants to talk about.
Details, please!
It's like a giant shadow that darkens the skies. It looked like... a giant winged airship. Something about it gives me the heebie jeebies.
How come?
I don't know. It just feels ominous, like something horrible is about to happen. Disaster seems to follow anywhere that shadow is spotted!
I'm frightened.
Don't worry. I'll protect you.
Really? Thanks, $MyPCName$.
Can I help you?
Over here! Please untie me!
Help!
Please help me!
What seems to be the problem?
For the safety of $map:02000001$!
There's no end to training.
What seems to be the problem?
For peace in our world!
Eee-yap!
What seems to be the problem?
What if we get eaten by monsters here?
Maybe following them wasn't a good idea.

Sigh... I knew this was a dangerous job, but I volunteered anyway because it pays twice as much as other jobs I've had. Maybe I shouldn't have taken it, though. I would've been safer hauling fish at the harbor.

If not for the earthquake, the Royal Road wouldn't have been destroyed and I could've been in $map:02000001$ by now. I'd be done with my delivery, and kicking back while waiting for the court to open.
Actually, if the supplies for the court weren't stolen to begin with, the palace wouldn't have needed the replacements in such a hurry. This is a mess.
Welcome to the Maple OX Quiz!
Your chances are 50:50. Not bad, right?
Either you get it right, or you get it wrong! Test your knowledge today!
How'd you like the quiz? Pretty tricky, right? Come back next time, because there's more where that came from!
I lost. I lost. I never lose!
So... what are the questions for the next quiz?
Congratulations on being the host.
Don't lose heart. You can always come back and try again next time. I'll be rooting for you, $MyPCName$!
You want me to help you cheat? No. No way. I can't believe you'd ask me that...
Thank you! It's a dream come true, to be honest. A dream come true... <font color="#909090">(He starts weeping.)</font>
Don't cry, little raccoon guy.
I-I won't! Sorry. I just wasn't expecting anyone to congratulate me. I'll do my best not to let you down as a host, $MyPCName$!
What seems to be the problem?
Whew, everything's messed up.
If only the court wasn't canceled...
$npcName:11000160[gender:1]$... If only I could win her love...
$MyPCName$, do I look timid to you?
Maybe... a little?
Not at all.
I do, huh? Ahh, no wonder! Miss $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ said she doesn't like timid men. What should I do?
Are you sure? I do hope Miss $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ thinks the same of me, $MyPCName$. If that's the case, I might actually have a shot.
It's not easy to stand in one spot all day guarding the arsenal, but someone has to do it. I'm proud of my job, too.
What seems to be the problem?
Will I ever win $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$'s love?

$npcName:11000174[gender:1]$ and I grew up together in the same neighborhood. I started to notice my heart racing and my mood brightening whenever I thought about $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$. I've honestly never felt like this about anyone else before.

$npcName:11000174[gender:1]$ and I grew up together in the same neighborhood. I started to notice my heart racing and my mood brightening whenever I thought about $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$. I've honestly never felt like this about anyone else before.
How may I help you?
Have you seen anyone in a mask go through here?
I sure did! Hard not to notice someone that odd. He ran off toward the Kerning Interchange.
What brings you here?
This isn't junk! It's treasure!
Even junk can have some value, you know.
I told you, I sent all the remaining iron ore on a Goldus Express truck to $map:02000001$. Go there!
There's junk, and then there's trash. Some people are so shameless that they think they can get money for their trash. I can't stand deluded fools like that.
Why are you still bothering me? Here, take this portal and go!
If you've got scrap metal, we can do business. Otherwise, I got too much on my mind to waste talking to you. Those scoundrels are ruining the neighborhood...
How's business?
Well, let's see. Ralph's goons moved in, took over the yard, and ran off my best workers. What do you think?
My business is in sorry shape thanks to them.
What seems to be the problem?
These monkeys are driving me crazy!
It's my duty to keep $map:02000064$ safe.
This is my first job. That might not seem like a big deal, but I'm proud to be a $map:02000064$ guard. I take my responsibility to the people of $map:02000064$ very seriously.
What brings you here?
Trust no one.
How dare they try to fool me!

Everyone acts as if they're the purest, noblest people in the world, but on the inside, we're all equally rotten. Hey, $MyPCName$! Live your life the way you want. Don't let anyone tell you what to do!
Your youthful recklessness will be your undoing. Search $map:02000141$ if you can. I very much doubt you'll return alive.
Can I help you?
Why does he keep bothering me?
Excuse me, but could you take $npcName:11000170[gender:0]$ with you? I've got things to do, and he keeps bothering me with some nonsense about love. I'm fine being friends, but that's it!
Check the ledger.
Check $npcName:11000176$.
Check $npcName:11000177$.
What is it?
My son... I hope he's doing well.
If only I could see...
My son is doing very important work at $map:02000001$ Palace. I couldn't provide for him when he was young, but he still grew into such a great man. I'm so proud of him.
How may I help you?
$npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ certainly has a way with people.
Mm... I don't know if I have enough time...
$MyPCName$, huh? You have a very... fitting name.
Ah, we meet again. Thank you for taking care of things last time. I was able to score the contract thanks to you!
What?
I've been churning rusty water all day. My skin looks terrible...
Who threw away all these brand new weapons?
That stuff you're carrying don't look like junk. Are you going to toss it? People nowadays throw out just any old thing. New, old, doesn't matter. I found boxes of stuff like that.
What kinds of things did you find?
Ha! Everything, my friend. Sometimes little baubles, sometimes official palace weapons. Found a lot of those lately, ever since the empress's court was canceled.
A lot of time and effort went into making those weapons. Why not stockpile them? They'd be more useful than melting them down, surely.
What?
Geez, he sure has a lot of guts.
I can't believe he sold off what he stole from the palace.
Why would the palace sell off items like this to a junkyard?
I've been working at this junkyard for over a decade, and this must be the strangest thing that has ever happened.
What is it?

A while back, a carriage full of junk came in with some Royal Guard weapons. I figured it must have been a mistake, so I checked with $npcName:11000171[gender:0]$. He said they were to be melted down, now that the court was canceled.
If that were the case, the palace should've sent them to the forge instead of a junkyard. Right?
Yeah.
Nah.
Right on. And I even saw $npcName:11000171[gender:0]$ sell the iron from the palace weapons to some dealer. How crazy do you have to be to steal from the palace?
Really? Huh. Maybe it's just me.
What?
One man sows and another reaps. Bah!
Do fences trade junk these days?
Why are there so many things to melt? The furnace can't keep up.
Are all the royal weapons melted yet?
Scram, I got work to do.
What izzz it?
Curze that bear! Bzz bzz!
It took uzz forever to collect all that honey! Bzz!
Honey izz very preciouz to uzz honeybeezz! We won't let anyone take it away!
<font color="#909090">(She's already dead.)</font>
Can I help you?
It's not nice to ask a lady her age.
This is a good market to trade up in.
Be extra careful when you're signing real estate contracts.
I don't take questions that have nothing to do with my work.
$map:2000123$. How may I help you?
What's been happening lately?
I was wondering how you're doing.
You mean the news? If I had good information, do you think I'd share it with you?
Well, I would. Instead of seeking immediate gains, I invest for the future. That's my philosophy.
Money or trust... which do you think is better for me in the long run? Heh, I'm still weighing my options.
What is this? Are you hitting on me? I'm sorry, but I don't answer questions that have nothing to do with my work.
I'm aware of the rumors about me. One of them says I'm divorced. Another says I'm a widow.
Some even say I'm the only daughter of Chairman Goldus. Ha, geez...
I refuse to be gossip fodder. Don't these people have anything better to do with their lives?
I'm sorry... I got carried away for a moment. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have developments to inspect.
How may I help you?
I wonder what my parents are like...
I wish I could live with my parents.

I live with my grandma. She said that when I was young, my parents were taken away by demons. Also, my sister was frozen solid alongside the rest of the villagers. You could say my family's had a rough go of it.
She also said the empire's forces are no better than those demons. They brought ice elementals to fight the demons, but tons of innocent people were frozen during the fight.
See those red maple trees there? When Grandma planted them, they were seeds as big as your thumbnail. She says they grew twice as fast as I did.
I've heard only the warmth of $itemPlural:30000028$ can thaw the people frozen below.
That's because red maple trees are born from the energy of the fire elementals that fell in that terrible battle. I don't know if that's true.
What is it?
I wonder where my son and his wife are...
I want nothing to do with the empress or her army. They were supposed to protect us! Instead everyone was frozen by ice elementals.
My granddaughter was one of the victims. If... if the empire had just done something about the shadow gate the moment it opened, my son and his wife would still be here, safe and happy with me.
What's the story with the shadow gate?
The Shadow Gate is the entrance to a world of demons who serve the darkness. The empire is trying to keep their evil contained.
But I don't know... Closing the Shadow Gate at the cost of innocent lives... Is that really the right way to protect the world?
My son and his wife could be still alive somewhere on the other side of the Shadow Gate. If it is closed, I'll never see them again.
Cough, cough... Yes?
Cough, cough...
I'm still cold... But I have to get better soon. My grandma is worried about me... Cough, cough...
I wonder what happened to my parents... Cough... I hope they're still out there...
Can I help you?
Are you growing well, my little friends?
Please grow strong and healthy.
I was sickly and weak as a child. Moving to $map:02000076$ improved my health tremendously.
Where did you live before?
Oh, near $map:02000100$. Have you been there? It's always kinda... overcast. Not sure why.
$MyPCName$, if you haven't bought a house, you should consider one in $map:02000076$.
What brings you here?
It seems like there are more $itemPlural:30000233$ here than anywhere the world.
Honestly, I like this place better than my own house.
Do you know what's good about these black pine mushrooms?
Nope.
I don't really care.
Of course you don't. I'm sure you haven't seen them before, either. They're that rare. They're good for... Good for...
Ah... Mm... I can't remember all of a sudden. I've been so forgetful lately. I don't know what's wrong with me.
Is... that so? Well, I guess young folks like you usually don't take much interest in herbs, but... This is embarrassing. Ha ha ha.
Do you have a house?
Yes.
No.
Are you comfortable in your home?
Yeah.
No.
I see. Good for you. I've got a house, too. And a wife and children. But I'm not comfortable in my own home.
My sons never listen. They run wild all the time, screaming and fighting. And my wife nags at me all day long. At home, I can't rest for even a moment.
I see. You're just like me then. I'm not comfortable in my own home either.
My sons never listen. They run wild all the time, screaming and fighting. And my wife nags at me all day long. At home, I can't rest for even a moment.
I see. I've got a house. And a wife and children. But I'm not comfortable in my own home.
My sons never listen. They run wild all the time, screaming and fighting. And my wife nags at me all day long. At home, I can't rest for even a moment.
What is it?
Is he ever going to come home?
I think my husband should've married his job instead of me. He's never home.
I used to love the aroma of herbs that followed my husband, but that was before we married. He's so obsessed with them now that he never has time to help around the house.
