Sometimes I wonder... I wonder if I should take the kids to $map:02000002$ for a fresh start. There's more to being a good husband than just putting food on the table.
Boys, don't go too far.
How may I help you?
There used to be so many trees around here.
When I was young this place was a lush forest, but now it's nothing more than a sea of stumps and cabins.
Thus, "$map:02000059$." Just look around and you'll see all the empty cabins that were once occupied by loggers.
Let's check the secret book.
What is it?
What would be fun to do today?
I took care of $npcName:11000202[gender:0]$. What now?
$npcName:11000202[gender:0]$ is really dumb. Did you see him standing there? He's punishing himself!
$npcName:11000201[gender:0]$ is my friend from $map:02000023$. He's an elf. Isn't that awesome?
Hello.
What's your favorite thing to do?
This place is really huge!
Hey $male:mister,female:lady$, do you want to play with us too? I have to play while I can. My mom will be here soon to pick me up.
I can't believe how big this field is! The sunlight stings a little bit, but Mom said a little sun is good for you.
$map:02000023$ is nice and shady. Neal's going to come over to my house later. $male:Mister,female:Lady$, do you want to come?
What is it?
Sheesh...
Aww... My arms...
My arms are killing me! Why is it always me who gets punished?
What is it?
People are right when they say "One man sows and another reaps."

Why do I even bother cutting down trees and chopping firewood? Those sneaky $npcPlural:21090023$ come crawling out of the $map:02000082$ and steal it all, leaving me with nothing to show for my work but sore arms.
This place used to be a dense forest, and many lumberjacks lived in the cabins here. But then the darkness seeped into Maple World through the shadow gate, rotting the trees from their roots.

The loggers left, one after another, and this place became a wasteland. After the closing of the Shadow Gate, the last remaining loggers dug out the rotting tree roots and planted new saplings. Now this land is recovering, all thanks to them.
What is it?
It figures I'd hurt myself carrying so many crates.
Big cargo ships come through here all the time. Sometimes I think the Barrota Trading Company is more successful than Goldus.
What is it?
The law must be obeyed.

There's been plenty of talk about Captain $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s leadership in Dark Wind, but I like his style. He said he'd evaluate every member based on their skill and performance. That's fair and reasonable.
Those who have problems with it clearly just aren't good enough.
Follow this road southward to find the Barrota Trading Company's warehouse at the end. Start your search there, and you should find $item:20000046$.
Give me a moment. I'll open up a portal so you can be on your way.
What do you want?
Maybe it's time I move out of this neighborhood.
What? Stop bothering me. Don't you have anything better to do?
What is it?
Why is business so bad lately? Where did all my customers go?
You look like you're still wet behind the ears. Stay out of trouble until you learn the ropes.

When you get out of here, move ten cells southeast, and then ten more cells northeast. You'll arrive at a small iron gate. That gate leads to $map:02000156$, where the godfather of Blackstar, $npcName:11000251[gender:0]$, resides.
Wh-what? What do you want?
Have you got any spare change?
Leave me alone! I-I don't know anything!
Uh, what?
O-oh, you... I thought you were going to ask me something. Nevermind, then.
Begging isn't as easy as it looks.
Check $npcName:11000214$.
What seems to be the problem?
I'm the best agent Dark Wind's got. Or I will be. Someday.
Mm? What is it? Are you having a problem posting $item:30000038$?
Actually, I kinda lost my $item:30000038$...
Where am I supposed to post $item:30000038$ again?
Oh, I see. Here's another one. Try not to lose it this time.
I remember giving you one, though. Why don't you check your bag one more time?
Your bag looks really heavy. Why don't you lighten it first?
There's a Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board in $map:02000138$. Take it there.
Mm? What is it? Are you having a problem posting $item:30000038$?
Actually, I kinda lost my $item:30000038$...
Where am I supposed to post $item:30000038$ again?
Oh, I see. Here's another one. Try not to lose it this time.
I remember giving you one, though. Why don't you check your bag one more time?
Your bag looks really heavy. Why don't you lighten it first?
There's a Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board in $map:02000137$. Take it there.
Mm? What is it? Are you having a problem posting $item:30000038$?
Actually, I kinda lost my $item:30000038$...
Where am I supposed to post $item:30000038$ again?
Oh, I see. Here's another one. Try not to lose it this time.
I remember giving you one, though. Why don't you check your bag one more time?
Your bag looks really heavy. Why don't you lighten it first?
There's a Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board in $map:02000135$. Take it there.
Mm? What is it? Are you having a problem posting $item:30000038$?
Actually, I kinda lost my $item:30000038$...
Where am I supposed to post $item:30000038$ again?
Oh, I see. Here's another one. Try not to lose it this time.
I remember giving you one, though. Why don't you check your bag one more time?
Your bag looks really heavy. Why don't you lighten it first?
There's a Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board in $map:02000146$. Take it there.

There's been a rift within Dark Wind ever since $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ became captain. The members are split between supporting the former captain, Winn Stilton, and supporting the new captain, $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
I haven't decided which side I'm on, but honestly, supporting $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ makes the most sense at this point.
Captain $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ was behind all of this! I can't believe I trusted him.
Checking up on me again, are you?
Don't worry. I'm not here to interrogate you.
Then why are you here, exactly?
I'm just dropping by. I'll be back later.
And will you bring the $npcName:11001912[gender:0]$ with you next time?
No, just me. I want another look at the secret room upstairs.
The secret room? Again? That place must be something else...
You're not going to walk all the way there, are you?
Dark Wind gradually grows more stable, but the world is in chaos, as always.
What is it?
Shame on $npcName:11000065[gender:0]$!

Money, money, money! That's always the problem. $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$ is obsessed with money, and $npcName:11000065[gender:0]$ only cares about development. If they really got together to fool the citizens, we'll make them pay for it!
What is it?
Sigh... I thought this job would be easy...
I grew up in $map:02000084$, that's where my family lives. I heard about a job that paid well, so I moved all the way here.
All I had to do was look after some rich guy's son. Man was that a mistake. This kid I'm looking after treats me worse than his cat.
What is it?
What goes around, comes around.
You reap what you sow.
I hope he's learned his lesson.
People should be good to each other. You reap what you sow, as they say...
Ah, let me do something nice for you. I'll open a portal.
Wah! Geez!
Ugh... My arms...
How long do we have to do this?
Argh, what?
What are you doing?
Sheesh, I don't know. I can't talk. Doing this is tough as it is. My limbs are so numb I can't feel them anymore.
How may I help you?
I'm going to complete Fellowstone Tower, no matter the cost!
Fellowstone Tower will be the greatest building in all of Maple World when it's finished. The blueprints alone took years to perfect.
When it's complete, people will flock from all over to see Fellowstone Tower. It'll be the crown jewel of Victoria Island!
I'll help you get around quick!
How may I help you?
Dad... He must be hungry...
I think I'll make rabbit-shaped rice balls today.
I love my dad more than anything else in the world. I just want to stay with him.
May I help you?
$npcName:11000221[gender:1]$ must be waiting for me...
I've got a daughter. She's the apple of my eye. Her name is $npcName:11000221[gender:1]$. She was the last gift my wife gave me before she passed away.
Are you here to talk to me? But why?
Argh, I'll never understand women.
I don't understand women. It feels like they're always changing their minds.
What is it?
Hmph, all men are the same.
My boyfriend and I came here for a picnic, and we ended up fighting because he kept looking at other girls. The nerve!
How may I help you?
I miss her...
It was somewhere over there...
Love isn't just about being with someone. Sometimes it's about their memory, too...
How may I help you?
Not even Dark Wind can be trusted now.
Dark Wind has changed since $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ took charge. Now its members are more interested in getting ahead than protecting $map:02000100$ like they used to.
And the people of $map:02000100$ are walking on eggshells around them.
Can I help you?
Ah, will I ever be able to escape this neighborhood?
Excuse me, what did you say?
Have you seen $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?
I don't know. I don't think so. This place is small enough that newcomers should be easy to spot, and the last person who settled here was $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$.
As you can see, $map:02000100$ suffers from a huge gap between the rich and the poor. It's all because of $npcName:11000065[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$.
I saw some other people open up a portal... like this. I hope this works!
How may I help you?
I wish I could go to the rich neighborhood too...
Did you come from the rich neighborhood? What are you doing here?
Do you know $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$? Who's that? Is he famous?
The people living in the rich neighborhood think we're smelly and dirty. But Mr. $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ said they're smellier and dirtier on the inside for thinking that.
Mr. $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ said he'd change the world, so everyone could be equal and happy together.
Sigh...
Didn't those men leave yet?
Can we take a break?
My arms are really hurting...
Mm? You're not the person I saw.
What are you doing?
I don't know. I don't know why I'm doing this, so please stop talking to me.
What?
What if they come back?
I'm exhausted...
Don't say anything. Just go.
What are you doing?
I said go. Geez, this is such a mess!
Argh, this is awful!
We messed up.
I don't know...
Hm? Why did you call me?
What are you doing?
I don't know. Don't ask!
Welcome.
Have you been on a cable car before?

Are you heading to $map:02000135$? It's famous for its beautiful scenery. At the very top you'll find the Cloud Cafe, famous among young couples. You can take the cable car all the way up to the top if you want to see it.
Our cable cars are made to last. They won't break, no matter how hard you jump! Please note that we won't be liable for injuries if you jump yourself right out of the car.
Welcome! Ho, ho, ho.
Take a seat wherever you want.
There are plenty of seats upstairs and out on the patio.
Did you come alone? Our guests usually arrive as couples. Ho, ho, ho.
Have a seat. I hope you don't feel out of place. We do get singles up here once in awhile. Sometimes they even find someone to leave with!
Oh, can I help you?
Is he interested in me?
Oh, what do I do?
I don't know what to do... I think he's interested in me!
I'm not really interested in you, sorry.
Who are you talking about?
Well... good! I'm not interested in you either, $MyPCName$.
That guy over there, the tired one... Do you know that feeling you get when you make eye contact with someone special?
Eeeee! What do I do?
Can I help you?
Oh, what a weirdo!
What are you looking at?
Go bother someone else.
Why are you talking to me? What do you want?
People say that the richer you get, the pickier you get. Makes sense, since you can have whatever you want with enough money.
How may I help you?
Hmm...
Safety is the primary concern for folks who work in places like this.
I'll open up a portal so you can get going.
What is it?
I want to move somewhere new...
My dream is to live in a bigger and nicer house with $npcName:11000401[gender:0]$.
What brings you here?
Betrayal is the quickest path to death.
My organization is using $map:02000216$ as a foothold to expand its business to other areas. You didn't think we'd stay in the shadows forever, did you? Don't be ridiculous.
...Get lost.
What do you want?
Successful leaders always look to the future.
Goldus never stops moving toward the future. There's nothing we can't make or sell.
How may I help you?
Is there a specific hairstyle you want?
When in doubt, let $npcName:11000255[gender:1]$ take care of you! She's the salon director.
$npcName:11000255[gender:1]$ is the boss for a reason! She's the best!
Hey, there! If you've got a style in mind, we can make it happen. If you don't, maybe a magazine will inspire you. Want one?
Yep.
I'd like some advice.
Sure thing. This has all the latest styles. Have a seat and check them out.
Err... I'm afraid you already have the only magazine we have. Sorry about that.
Oh, friend... I'm afraid your bag is too heavy. Why don't you lighten it first?
Sure! I love nothing more than helping match people with the hair of their dreams. Let's chat and find something that's totally you!
What seems to be the problem?
Please keep your voice down. I'm not supposed to be talking with anyone right now.
What seems to be the problem?
I'd keep a low profile if I were you.
It's going to be tough, but we have to comb through the records for clues. We can't let them catch us off guard again.
What seems to be the problem?
Is this war ever going to end?
I hope we nab $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. He's caused so many people so much pain.
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Need something?
What's on your mind?
Some of us are trying to work.

After the Blue Lapenta broke, top scholars from across the world descended on the $map:02000026$. Ultimately, I am confident that it will be an alchemist to uncover the secrets of the Land of Darkness and the Shadow World.
Can't you see I'm trying to focus?
What brings you here?
I think I know this... Er, maybe not. Hmm...
The secrets of the Land of Darkness and Shadow Word cannot be explained by logic. Nature was not created by mathematics or science. They have a life all their own, which must be understood.
What brings you here?
If only Captain Stilton were still alive...

Captain $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ commands Dark Wind now, but before the Blue Lapenta broke we were led by Winn Stilton. Every member of Dark Wind, myself included, considered Captain Stilton a true hero.
That's why we can never forgive $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$! He not only destroyed the Blue Lapenta, but he also killed Captain Stilton!
I can't believe $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ ended Captain Stilton's life. That brazen coward fooled us all!
What seems to be the problem?
Sigh... You and your stupid books!
What in the world is going on?
A castle once stood on this very spot, the ancestral home of the Andreas. They were a noble family with close ties to the royals dating back generations. Then one day... the castle simply vanished.
That guy does nothing but read books all day. He's supposed to be investigating the scene.
How may I help you?
I must find a solution...
You see that guard over there? I'm telling you, no respect for scholars or history. He keeps harassing me for researching instead of sticking to his own tasks. He has no idea...
What brings you here?
Nothing in this world is free.
There's a key for every lock.
If you want something, then you'll have to pay the price.That's the way of the world.
What are you curious about now?
Don't you know it's foolish to fight your own destiny? Tsk, tsk...
See if you're lucky today! I can read your fortune!
Let me introduce myself. I am a great prophet. I can tell you of future events with unerring accuracy. Ignorant people call me a mere fortune teller or a con artist. It's their loss, really.
Why, you ask? Because even people like them need something to believe in. When everything else fails them, they'll come to me. They always do. Now, how'd you like to know your fortune?
Want to know your destiny? Want to see your future? Then ask me! I can tell you anything you want. For a price, of course.
No one can tell the future as accurately as I can!
How may I help you?
There are so many humans in $map:02000023$ now...
$npcName:11000031[gender:0]$... He's not a bad person, but...
Getting along with humans is difficult. They're just so different!
I know there are many good humans out there... but it's not easy to find them.
What brings you here?
Is anyone there?
Please... cherish the flowers.
Is there someone you love?
Yes.
No.
Good for you. Cherish them while you can. Have you ever lost someone you love?
Yes.
No.
I see. Sometimes love begets tragedy, but it's worth more than the pain.
I see. I daresay I understand your pain.
I see. Let me give you some advice. Never take the ones you love for granted.
Check the bulletin board.
Check the altar.
This altar is covered in layers of dust, the result of ages of neglect.
Lu, lu, lu, lu!
What is it?
Toh! Hah!
Only training can make one strong.
Hey, hey! I'm in the middle of practice. Get out of the way!
What are you doing?
Sell me on this $map:2000217$ business.
How can I join the Maple Arena?
How can I crush my opponents?
Do you not see? I'm practicing my art. I cannot lose to $npcName:11000018[gender:0]$ again... He beat me once in the $map:65000001$ and he never shuts up about it!
I'm never going to lose again! I'll show him what a mighty Murpagoth can do, and earn the praise of the Great Chief!
Are you interested in competing against others? Er, that means you're a competitor! I have to practice. Please don't interrupt!
Hah! Toh! Huh? You look lost. This is an old arena that has existed for generations.

Since ancient times, this $map:2000051$ has been home to us Murpagoths and the other tribes... Pigming, Kaka, Kolopupu, and T'oomba. The tribes were always at odds over their different beliefs and habits.

Every time a conflict arose, the tribes would settle it at $map:2000217$. Fight it out fair and square, that was the rule of the day. But as time passed, a lot of things happened, and... Anyway, now the arena is open to all who wish to test their might.
There are two types of arenas: Maple Arena and Event PvP. To access the Maple Arena, open the Arena menu and register. Event PvP is accessed through the Event Notifications menu when it's available.

You want to join the Maple Arena? No problem. See the Arena menu at the bottom right side of the screen? Open the menu and select Register. The arena managers will let you know when they find an opponent for you, and they search every 5 minutes.
When you select an opponent, you will get a notification asking if you're ready to enter the Arena. Press Enter Now to move instantly to the Arena. Easy, isn't it?
Keep this in mind, though... If you get matched up but refuse to enter, you'll get a loss and be locked out of the arena for a short time.
That means that if you register for the arena, you must enter it when you find an opponent. Cowards are not welcome in the arena!
To ensure everyone's safety $npc:11000134[gender:0]$ has decreed that only those <font color="#ffd200">Level 50 or above</font> be allowed to enter the Arena. The Chief's word is law.

Looking to make a name for yourself in the arena? Hmmm... I had a feeling about you. If you can score some victories, perhaps you'll get the attention of $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$. It's the greatest honor the warriors of my tribe can strive for.

That's not all, either. $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ has ordered that warriors who prove their skill and valor be rewarded with $itemPlural:90000006$. With $itemPlural:90000006$, you can buy a variety of items at the Arena Shop.

The Arena Shop sells equipment that will make you more powerful in the arena. If you're trying the arena for the first time, then the arena equipment sold for mesos is pretty useful, too. If you want the good stuff, though, you'll need $itemPlural:90000006$.
What?
$itemPlural:30000157$! Leave them to me!
$itemPlural:13200026$ are useful, too.
I need more practice.
I'll do it for you, free of charge.
What?
I've learned something today!
I've got an idea!
$item:13200026$ is pretty useful, too.
Of course, I fail and get nothing more times than I succeed...
What seems to be the problem?
Sigh...
I wonder what she's doing by now...
If only she loved me... I would do anything for her...
What brings you to me?
Dirt. Yuck!
Look at my sleek, lustrous hair!
Want to know how I keep my fur so shiny?
May I help you?
Croak, croak.
Croak.
Croak croak croak.
Croak, croak, croak. Croaaaaakkk...
May I help you?
What is it?
Ah! The air smells fresh!
I can't catch $item:30000072$...
Oh! I's so happy to see another human being here!
How may I help you?
It's getting late.
When is my brother going to come back?
I like $map:02000023$. All the trees and fairies are so pretty.
What brings you here?
Aww...
What are you doing here? Traveling? I wish I could go on adventures too.
What is it?
I never suspected farming would be so hard...
Things around here have never been THIS bad. Maybe it's time for a change of career.
What brings you here?
Aww... I'm scared...
Do you know what's living down below? $npcNamePlural:22000005$! They're so big and dreadful... Just looking at them leaves me petrified. How could I possibly get one of their tails?
What brings you?
We have to finish building this quickly.
This place is dangerous. Be careful, especially if you want to use skills while on the Bone Bridge. Things can get scary there pretty quickly.
What brings you here?
Shush! Lower your voice.
How did you find this secluded place?
$MyPCName$, it must be an act of the divine that you and I met. My name is $npcName:11000302[gender:1]$, and I'm currently studying under $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$.
Who was looking for me?
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
What is it?
I want to go exploring!
I want to see the world!
Make way, adventurer coming through!
Ah, are you an adventurer? So am I!
Don't you lie to me!
What is an adventurer to you?
I-I'm not lying! I mean it!
What do you think an adventurer is?
An adventurer is someone who embarks on adventures around the world! I've even been to $map:02000023$, you know. My next destination is $map:02000051$!
What is it?
It's slow today...
Gosh, I need some action.
Why are you looking at me? Do you have business with me?
How should I enjoy today?
Hey, you! I've never seen you before.
I don't recognize you. What do you want?
I need directions.
Nothing in particular.
You must be new to $map:02000001$, huh? Boy, I'd love to prank you, but you look like you're here to shop. Okay, I'll let you off... THIS time!
Follow that big road straight ahead.
What's along the road?
Oh, I ran out of patience for you a while ago. Stop bothering me and move on.
Is that so? Strange... You really don't look familiar to me, and there's no way I can forget someone so ugly. Ha ha ha!
Yeah, well... you're uglier!
Uhh, pot to kettle...
Heh. You've never seen a handsome man before, have you?
This is ridiculous. I'm just going to leave.
I can't hear you.
Takes one to know one, Buddy!
I said, I can't hear you.
Right, that's about enough. Time to leave.
Oh, come on, are you just going to leave?
Can I help you?
Ah, it's such a beautiful day today!
This world is full of beautiful things!
Look at those fishes! Aren't they cute?
Can't you feel the energy in the air?
Nice to meet you. I'm $npcName:11000319[gender:1]$. What's your name?
I'm $MyPCName$.
It's a secret.
$MyPCName$? Ah, what a beautiful name!
You don't have to tell me. It's $MyPCName$, right?
How do you know that?
It's a secret. Ho, ho!
What is it?
Sigh...
Life is meaningless...
Ashes to ashes...
Everyone thinks they're special, but the world keeps turning without them.
What's wrong?
Nothing. I just understand the way of the world.
Dust thou art, and to dust shalt thou return. Come empty, return empty. In the end, there's nothing in this world that is truly yours.
What is it?
No, no. There's nothing wrong with me.
Maybe I should get cosmetic surgery.
$npcName:11000318[gender:0]$ keeps making fun of my face.
I want to look pretty for him.
Can I talk to you about something?
Sure.
One of the guys in my neighborhood keeps making fun of my face. He says I'm ugly. Am I... really that ugly? Please be honest with me.
Nope!
Yep!
Really? You really don't think I'm ugly? Then... do you think he'll think I'm pretty?
Well, I didn't say you're pretty, either.
Who is he?
Oh, I see... Then maybe I should really think about getting cosmetic surgery. Thank you... for depressing me further...
Then do you think I'll look pretty if I get cosmetic surgery? I really want to look pretty for him.
Who is he?
Yeah, I mean... maybe that'll work.
I don't know his name. He's one of the travelers who came to $map:02000001$ because of the court.
Big blue eyes. Beautiful golden hair. He looks so dashing with the sword on his belt! And his polka-dot scarf... it's so cute! Have you ever seen anyone so amazing before?
No.
Yes.
You know, sometimes he looks around as if he's waiting for someone. Do you think he has a girlfriend? What if he has a girlfriend?
I don't know.
I don't think he has a girlfriend.

So, you don't know. Three times a day, in the morning, at noon, and in the evening, I go out to the main road. I pretend to take a stroll, just to steal a few glances at him. Ah, I want to see him again! Do you think I'm in love?
Do you think so? Okay, then I really need to go to $map:02000107$...
Am I really that ugly?
How may I help you?
What does a rainbow look like?
Have you seen a rainbow?
It's pretty, isn't it?
$MyPCName$, are you an adventurer? Have you ever seen a rainbow?
Yep.
Nope.
Whoa! What does it look like? $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$ says there's always a big rainbow over the dam!
Who is $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$?
Where is the dam?
Hmm, really? $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$ wrote to me in a letter that there's always a rainbow over the dam!
Who is $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$?
Where is the dam?
$npcName:11000174[gender:1]$ is my cousin living near the dam. She used to live here until her father had to move there for work. I wish I had to move out there too...
Mm, I don't know exactly. $MyPCName$, do you think you could find it? I'd give anything to see it!
How may I help you?
Mom's going to give me an earful if I go home.
Ah, I hate homework!
I hate history the most. There are too many things to remember, heroes and names and... What was the name of that big-shot warrior?
I hate history the most. There are too many things to remember, heroes and names and... What was the name of that big-shot mage?
I hate history the most. There are too many things to remember, heroes and names and... What was the name of that big-shot archer?
I hate history the most. There are too many things to remember, heroes and names and... What was the name of that big-shot thief?
Can someone just do my homework for me?
Hey, man! What's happening?
When you're happy and you know it, shake it out!
Don't bottle up your anger!
It's not difficult to express your feelings in a tasteful way. Do it like the cool person you are!
I have questions about emotes.
Sure, fire away!
What are emotes?
Where can I get emotes?
How can I use emotes?
How do you express yourself when you're happy or sad? Just typing in chat? No, no, that's not how we do it here. That's why you've got emotes, yo.
When you're happy, laugh! Excited? Dance! Sad? Cry! There are tons of actions you can perform to express yourself to those around you, even without words. Make good use of them!
I need to ask something else.
Some emotes are placed on your F1 - F12 keys by default. When you meet your friends, press F1 or F2 to greet them. If your friends are as sensible as you are, they'd greet you back in the same way!
Aside from the 12 default actions, you can buy more actions at the Meret Market. Take a look at the Expression tab in the Premium Shop for all the available actions you can buy!
I need to ask something else.

Take a look at the right side of the Chat window for the smiley face icon. Click it to open the emote window. If you buy emotes from the Meret Market, don't forget to learn the Emotes from the Inventory window.

Got so many emotes that it's difficult to remember the hotkeys? Don't worry, I'll fill you in! You can use them by typing their commands into the Chat window. For example, if you want to use the Hello action, you can type /hello in the Chat window instead of pressing F1.
Each emote has multiple commands, so check them in the emote window and use the ones you can remember easily.
I need to ask something else.
Is there anything else you want to ask about emotes?
What are emotes?
Where can I get emotes?
How can I use emotes?
I need to be going.
Don't think too hard, dawg. Just express yourself!
Hello.
Feel free to take a look around.
Are you interested in cars?
Welcome to the Tuning Motors Showroom! Are you looking for something in particular?
I want to know about mounts.
I came to see the cars.
I'm here to help you find the perfect car for your style and needs. What kind of car do you like?
Rugged 4-wheel-drives.
Luxurious sports cars.
No cage for me! I want a bike.
Ooh, you've got excellent taste! 4-wheel-drive vehicles are designed to handle a wider variety of terrain, including fields, swamps, sand, slopes, and so on.
Lucky for you, I've got one 4-wheel-drive model brochure left. Would you like to take a look?

Ooh, you've got excellent taste! 4-wheel-drive vehicles are designed to handle a wider variety of terrain, including fields, swamps, sand, slopes, and so on. Lucky for you, I've got one 4-wheel-drive model brochure left.
Oh dear, you don't seem to have enough room in your bag for this brochure. It must be completely stuffed! Make some room if you'd like it, please.
I knew it! You had that look that says "I've got a need... for speed".

The Tuning Motors Enpilar series features a high-performance engine slotted into a low-riding, stable chassis to minimize air resistance and give more power to the speed-sensitive steering and brakes. $MyPCName$, it won't disappoint you!
Ooh, we're kindred spirits! With a bike, you can fly through narrow alleyways and congested freeways at high speed. And don't forget the sense of freedom that you don't get in a car!

The Tuning Motors Chopper series is the king of Maple World touring bikes, and it's been the most popular bike on the market for years. It has a much larger displacement than street bikes, and its engine makes a throaty roar that you can't help but love!
Ooh, you've got excellent taste! 4-wheel-drive vehicles are designed to handle a wider variety of terrain, including fields, swamps, sand, slopes, and so on.
Good, you already have our 4-wheel-drive model brochure. Read through it, and let me know if you have any questions. And it wouldn't hurt to have a look at our other models, too.
Mounts? I'll tell you anything you want to know. What'll it be?
What exactly are mounts?
Where can I get mounts?
How do I use my mounts?

Mounts are very convenient modes of transportation. Riding a mount is faster than running, and much more convenient too! Plus, there's a wide variety of mounts to choose from. So... which one looks good to you?
I need to ask something else.

You can buy cute animal mounts from the Mount Merchant in town. I've heard some animal mounts can even swim. There's also some pretty awesome cars and bikes available for purchase on the Meret Market.
You can buy mounts with all kinds of currencies, including mesos, treva, valor tokens, and merets. But to get an extremely fast rare mount, you'll need to earn certain Trophies.
I need to ask something else.

You can use a mount by double-clicking it in your inventory, or by adding it to a quickslot. Mounts perform a special action when you press the Basic Attack key while riding them. You'll have a lot of fun just checking out all the different special actions.
But there's a catch... the special actions activated by the Basic Attack key consume stamina every time they're used. But it won't be a problem as long as you use them in moderation.
I need to ask something else.
Is there anything else you want to know about mounts?
What exactly are mounts?
Where can I get mounts?
How do I use my mounts?
I need to be going.
While you're here, why don't you peruse the vehicles on display?
How may I help you?
The past holds so many secrets that we have yet to unravel.
Everything in this world has a purpose and a story to tell.
How can I help you?
How may I help you?
Some things get better with age.
People nowadays tend to throw their things away the moment they're done with them. It's a shame, really.
Antique items are precious relics of the past. You can trade antiques, but you can't bring the past back.
What is it?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Where in the world is she?
Hm... Have you ever felt like you're being watched? You get this itchy feeling on the back of your neck when that happens. I've been feeling it a lot lately. Why do you think that is?
Excuse me, have you seen a girl around here who looks like me? She has blond hair and blue eyes, just like I do. I don't remember what she was wearing, though.
She's my sister. She went to do her hair and never came back. Does it take women a long time to do their hair? Huh... maybe she was getting it dyed.
Can I help you?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
Help me... Shut down the power...
Please... Nnghh... Pull the lever... Turn off the power..
My robots... have been corrupted by shadow energy... Ugh...
What is it?
Help me... Shut down the power...
Please... pull all the levers and turn off the power...
My robots... have been corrupted by shadow energy... Ugh...
What is it?
How can I help you?
How do you think the hotel was built on this cliff? Aren't you curious?
Can I help you?
Ah, I want to be a great hotelier someday!
What can I do for you?
Uh-oh, I see dust. Tsk, tsk.
Being a hotelier is all about making sure the guests are happy.
I've been by $npcName:11000341[gender:1]$'s side since she was born. It's the least I could do to repay her grandfather, who took me under his wing when I had no place to go.
If the Andreas hadn't fallen so easily, this $map:02000178$ would not be here today.
What happened to the Andreas?
T-that's... Ah, let's not stir up old, painful memories.
Did you come to see me?
Is there no good solution?
I'm a little tired...

After my family fell, the only thing I had left was the mansion. I decided to forget my former glory as the heiress of House Andrea, and turned the mansion into $map:02000178$. People started to call me $npcName:11000341[gender:1]$ not long after.

$npcName:11000340[gender:0]$ had been the butler for my family as long as I could remember. When my family fell, he stayed behind when everyone else left. Now he's the hotelier of my hotel. I owe him so much.
May I... help you?
I can't believe I'm homeless now.
I can't believe this is happening to me...
What is it?
For years, I saved as much money as I could so that I could one day build a house of my own. And the day my dream finally becomes a reality, a giant mushroom comes and chases me away!
Curse that $npcName:22000321$... What does a mushroom need with a house, anyway?
I paid for that house and the land under it, it belongs to me! This is completely unfair!
It's the Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board.
It's the Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board.
This fire can purge evil and reveal the true nature of something.
It's the Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board.
It's the Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board.
How may I help you?
Welcome to $map:02000001$.
Feel free to ask me anything.
May Ereve bless you!
All hail the empress!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.
$map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.
Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

$map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.
Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.
Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$... And $map:02000064$...

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!
Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.
You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing...
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.
If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.
They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough... How did you manage to master both?

Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though... I thought you'd be taller.
You've mistaken me for someone else.
R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life...
How may I help you?
Welcome to $map:02000001$.
Feel free to ask me anything.
May Ereve bless you!
All hail the empress!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.
$map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.
Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

$map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.
Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.
Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$... And $map:02000064$...

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.
