Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.
You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing...
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.
If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.
They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough... How did you manage to master both?

Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though... I thought you'd be taller.
You've mistaken me for someone else.
R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life...
How may I help you?
How much longer will it take to finish my house?
I've been traveling all my life, and the greatest lesson I've learned is to never waste anything. $npcName:21000029$, for example, has hundreds of practical uses. It's amazing stuff!
Can I help you?
Please, don't destroy the park!
Nature is precious!
You can't step on flowers like that! Don't lie to me, I saw you!
How may I help you?
Being able to work is a blessing.
People shouldn't waste their lives being idle. Work is its own reward.
Our fuel needs are growing by the day. I think more excavation sites will be needed soon.
We're pumping oil every day. It's still kind of surprising how much we need to get by.
Grr...
Grr... Those villains!
If only I could get out of here...!
Ah, I'm finally safe! You're my savior.
I thought I was going to die. I used to think I was untouchable. But after they took me so easily...
I can't believe you came to save me... Thank you. I'll live an honest life from now on. I'll donate to charities, pay all my taxes, and volunteer at the soup kitchens.
What is it?
Woof! Something's happening here!
Woof! One day, a meteor fell from the sky. Be careful, it might have friends.
What is it?
Get me out of here, woof!
I'm hurt, woof...
Help, woof...
What is it?
Can I help you?
I'm tired of doing bad things.
I'm a new man. From now on, I'm going to live an honest life. I'm leaving my days of being a thug behind.
May I help you?
I hope my son is doing well.
Are you traveling? You look like you're about my son's age.
$npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is my only child. He left home recently, wanting to strike out on his own. If only he knew how much that hurt his mother.
The day before yesterday I got a letter from $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$. He must've written it somewhere around here... even the edges are singed. So I bought an ice pack to keep him cool.
My son, $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is on the other side of all that lava. I wanted to visit him, but I'm just too scared to cross it myself.
My son, $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is on the other side of all that lava. I wanted to visit him, but I'm just too scared to cross it myself.
What's wrong?
It seems even the heat can't faze the twins.
Whew, it sure is hot here! I told my mom that I could make it on my own. Maybe I should've taken $npcName:11000420[gender:1]$'s advice and settled down in $map:02000111$ instead...
How may I help you today?
Welcome to $map:02000157$!
$npc:11000065[gender:0]$ is really amazing. When he sets his mind on something, nothing can stop him!
Can I help you?
Fresh ingredients are the best ingredients!
People don't know how delicious $npcName:21000059$ can be.
Not many people know this, but cooked $npcName:21000059$ can be incredible. I'm getting ready to sell $npcName:21000059$ dishes made from my own secret recipe.
Look around.
Read the journal.
Shush! What is it?
Shush! Please leave quietly. I'm done for if they find out I'm here.
How may I help you?
$npcName:11000367$! $npcName:11000367$! Where are you?
Do you know what makes cats so appealing? It's how independent they are! Though... it's possible for them to be too independent. Like $npcName:11000367$, for example.
What is it, meow?
There's nothing like love, meow!
Do you believe in love at first sight, meow? I do! Look at the cat next to me. Isn't she beautiful? Me-ow!
What is it?
Humans, leave the forest be!
$MyPCName$, you of all people should help protect the forest!
Beep!
Beep! Unauthorized access.
Beep!
Beep! Unauthorized access.
Beep!
Beep! Unauthorized access.
How may I help you?
This is the power of science!
All research serves a vital purpose!

As scientists, we must always look toward the future. We must not abandon our research because we aren't happy with the immediate results, or out of fear of perceived consequences. Science requires persistence and dedication!
What is it?
Why are you looking at me like that? Ha ha ha!
I saw you watching me earlier. You're barking up the wrong tree.
Don't you believe me? I have nothing to hide. Have you always been this nosey?
Today's such a beautiful day! Wouldn't you agree, friend?
Um, "friend?"
We made eye contact just now, you can't deny it. That makes us pals! Nice to meet you, friend.
Uh, hey buddy. Have you heard the rumors going around?
I sure have. Look, I wouldn't go around blabbing this to just anybody, but we're friends, right?
Best friends.
So a while back, I was taking a walk. I like going on walks to clear my head. Of course it only works if I go alone. Anyway—
Can you fast-forward to the part where stuff happens?
Right, so I was taking a nice leisurely stroll through Middleton when a giant shadow appeared in the sky!
I still can't get the image out of my head... giant wings, and these terrible muscly bodies... It was a whole flock of demons! I was terrified.
Wait, then you're the one who started the rumor!
They're not rumors! It's all true! Would I lie to my best friend?! Besides, I took a picture. Look.
Could I keep this photo? Since we're such good friends.
Sure, if it means you believe me! Take it. I don't know what I'd do if my own friend didn't believe me.
What?
I don't think I can hunt in peace anymore.
Not everyone can be a wolf handler.
What?
So uh... are you a dude or a lady?
Think what you like!
There are treasure chests hidden all over the world. How did they get there? Who knows and who cares! Just remember the golden rule: finders keepers!
What seems to be the problem?
When will I ever pass through this valley again?
Enoki mushrooms grow here. They require clean, undisturbed areas to flourish. I suppose no one ever comes to this valley, then.
How may I help you?
Ohm... Ohm... Dear aliens...
One day, I'm going to soar!
Do you believe in aliens? I do! There has to be loads of intelligent creatures out there, the universe is huge! You should stop by some night and watch the stars with me.
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
What's up?
Ahh, such a nice breeze! And the scenery is beautiful!

Heya! I'm $npcName:11000379[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.
What's up?
I feel like a king surveying my domain!

Well hey. My name's $npcName:11000380[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.
What's up?
There's nothing I can't climb!

Hey there! My name is $npcName:11000381[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.
What's up?
There's nothing I can't climb!

Hello. My name is $npcName:11000382[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.
How may I help you?
Tsk, tsk. You're quite foolish, child.
You're lucky I found you and that I'm a doctor. You could've been in big trouble. Stop being stupid, and listen to your parents!
Aw, it hurts...
Ugh... It hurts...
S-stop talking to me... Ughhh...
Ugh... I'm feeling awful but still I have to work...
Can I help you?
So dirty! I'd better clean!
If you see trash on the street, by all means pick it up! Everyone has to do their part to keep their homes clean.
What is it?
Hello. I am $npcName:11000386$. You seem surprised that I can talk. Don't be. Maple World is full of surprises after all.
How may I help you?
Eee! He's so handsome!
Have you seen $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$? He's right over there... and he's sooooooo handsome. Ah, I wish I could get close to him...
Can I help you?
Hey, don't get too close!
Hey, you're too close!
The crowd's already whipped themselves into a frenzy. It's like this wherever we go. Hey you! Back up, buddy.
How may I help you?
Balloons!
Cheap, no-pop balloons!
Since the big split, $map:2000115$ has been attracting all kinds of lookie-loos. And a true businessman never wastes a good opportunity like this!
How may I help you?
Welcome to $map:02000033$.
We've been busy. People are still checking in, with no idea the empress's gathering has been canceled.
The empress is no longer holding court, but we're still booked up. I don't think most people have heard the news yet.
What?
Did you hear the court was canceled?
Have you just arrived in $map:02000001$? I came here three days ago and I'm already sick of this city. What a waste.
Huh?
How could this happen? Argh!
Did you hear the court was canceled? I thought it would be a big to-do, so I arrived two weeks ago.
And now it's canceled! Argh, I stayed at the hotel for two weeks for nothing!
What seems to be the problem?
Should I just give up and go back?
Hoo-haa... Hoo-haa...
When my manager is angry, he screams at the top of his lungs and throws anything he can get his hands on. No one can stop him. All you can do is avoid him.
How may I help you?
This city is going to the dogs...
They say that old miser, $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$, is the worst... but they haven't met $npcName:11000491[gender:1]$!
Can I help you?
Life is tough...
Everyone here works hard, including me, but we can't ever seem to get ahead. It's sad, and I've heard $map:02000100$'s mayor is responsible for keeping us all poor.
Why me? What did I do?
Can't... keep... eyes... open...
Keep those thugs away from me...
So hungry...
May I help you?
Ah! The air is so much fresher up here!

It may not look it, but my house is the most expensive in the neighborhood. There's nothing quite like living up so high. I hope my daughter appreciates how hard it was for me to get this place for us.
Why did you call me?
Cough, cough... This smell is killing me!
Cough, cough... I'm tired of living in this cesspit. I'm going to make it out of here one day! *Cough Cough*
What is it?
Oh geez, this is disgusting! I wish I could cut off my nose.
The more I think about it, the angrier I get! How could they stop me from going on vacation, and one that I've had planned for months? Maybe I should just leave and let them deal with the water.
How can I help you?
I have no idea what is happening... Sigh...
Dark Wind told me to take some time off, so I thought I'd take a vacation to the dam. Then I noticed that... thing... under the water. How am I supposed to rest now?
Dark Wind told me to take some time off, so I thought I'd take a vacation to the dam. Then I noticed that... thing... under the water. How am I supposed to rest now?
How may I help you?
I should pack this. And this. Ooh, and that...
Please be very careful with this. It's one of my all-time favorite comic books.
$male:Mister,female:Lady$, do you like comic books? They're my favorite thing in the world. I want to be an illustrator when I grow up.
Uuugh...
Ugh... Ugh...
I need $item:20000060$ from $npcName:21000078$... to cleanse myself...
This toxin... stronger than I thought...
Uuugh...
Ugh... Ugh...
I-I can't... speak...
May I help you?
I'll get my revenge no matter what!
I miss my family...
I'm not a merchant.
$npcName:23000024[gender:1]$ carries a dark power. Try not to get poisoned.
Some folks think I must be a blacksmith. But not all yetis are smiths, you know! So stop trying to buy my stuff.
This is the Dark Wind Bulletin Board.

Eliminate $npcName:29000023$ and bring me proof for your reward.
- Captain $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$
What is it?
You don't have to look twice. I'm who you think I am.
Sometimes I'm afraid to look in the mirror.
Why?
I might fall in love with myself!
But I'm already in love with you!
I'm just gonna pretend I didn't hear that.
I know how difficult it is to resist my incredible charms. Don't hate me because I can't love you in return.
Hey, hey! What are you looking at? Look at me! Hello! Hey, can't you hear me?
What do you want to know?
You're being very attentive. I'm glad I'm not boring you. Is there anything else you want to hear?
Actually, I'd better be on my way.
Tell me another old story.
Tell me about what's going on now.
I didn't know it was getting so late. The forest trail has been fraught with mushrooms and pigs. Please be safe.
Another old story? What kind of story?
Tell me about the sages and the Lapenta.
Tell me about $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the heroes.
Tell me about the Demon King and the power of darkness.
I'm not that interested in old stories, honestly.
About the present, eh? All right, what do you want to know?
Tell me all about Maple World.
Tell me of the Shadow World.
I don't feel like stories about the present right now.
This world wouldn't have existed if it weren't for the sages and the Lapenta. Which story do you want to hear first?
Let's hear about the sages.
I'm interested in the Lapenta.
How about a different old story?
Originally, each of the three sages was responsible for one aspect of the world. They governed life, space, and time to ensure the world remained in balance. Then one day...

The Demon King emerged, intent on destroying the balance between the three fundamental powers. He wanted to overtake the world with his own dark powers, turning it to a realm of endless chaos and despair.

The Demon King was strong enough to match the combined powers of the sages. To defeat him, the sages were forced to sacrifice themselves to banish the Demon King. Their legacy lives on in the Lapentas which contain what's left of their powers. Now do you understand why the sages were so important?
Yep!
The Lapentas were created by the sages to protect this world from the Demon King. They gave their lives to grant us these powerful gifts.
The Green Lapenta keeps the balance of life, the Blue Lapenta governs space, and the Red Lapenta maintains time.
These three Lapentas have formed a protective ward around this world, keeping the formidable Demon King and his dark power at bay. Hopefully that explains why the Lapentas are so important.
Yep!
$npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the Four Heroes helped the sages protect this world against the Demon King. Whose story do you want to hear first?
Let's start with $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$.
The Four Heroes sound important.
How about a different old story?
There has been an empress born to each generation of humans, destined to deliver the will of the divine as their messenger.
The empresses are selected by the will of the divine. The $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ was chosen a long time ago and inherited the title from her predecessor.

After the three sages perished and left behind the Lapentas, the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ became the spiritual leader of Maple World. She was instrumental in rebuilding society after the Demon King nearly destroyed everything.
In the early stages of Maple World's reconstruction, the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ would hold open courts to allow the people to speak to her. In time, however, she ceased this practice.
There has been much speculation over why she stopped holding court. Some said the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ was struck down by illness. Others said she was abducted by the reawakened Demon King.

Whatever the case may be, the empress never lost the love and respect of her people. These rumors only show how concerned they are for her well-being. Do you understand the importance of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ now?
Yep!
The Four Heroes are gone now, but their legend will live on. It is rare to find someone who does not know their names.

There was the mysterious mage Lewit from Ellin Forest, hot-headed warrior Ten from the holy Vayar Mountains, righteous archer Haster from the Green Meadows, and carefree thief Catarva from Kerningdom.
The warrior Ten fell in battle against the Demon King himself. The other three heroes were asked by the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ to protect the Lapentas, rather than sacrifice themselves.
The mage Lewit was entrusted with the Green Lapenta of Life. He hid it in the depths of the Ellin Forest for safekeeping.
Archer Haster was entrusted with the Red Lapenta of Time. He hid it somewhere in the Green Meadows.
Thief Catarva was entrusted with the Blue Lapenta of Space. He hid it in a secret alcove within Kerningdom.
The three surviving heroes became the first guardians of the Lapentas and dedicated themselves to the task for the rest of their lives. And now you know the story of the Four Heroes, yes?
Yep!
Not much is known about the Demon King. He was powerful enough to bring Maple World to its knees, and no one who challenged him lived to tell about it.
No one knows where he came from, how he came to be, or what made him so powerful.
What everyone DOES know is that the Demon King hails from a world of death, despair, and fear, permeated by the power of darkness that he wields so brutally.
People named this dark world the Shadow World, and despaired when they found that even the Lapentas themselves could not purge the darkness.
So long as the protective ward of the Lapentas lasts, Maple World will be safe. But there is always the fear that the Shadow World will find new ways into our world, and destroy it.
So, somewhere beyond the reaches of our peaceful, idyllic Maple World lies a realm of pure darkness and terror that seeks to destroy us all. Does that answer your question?
Yep!
Maple World is a collection of continents floating in a vast, endless ocean. The biggest continent of all is Victoria Island.

Victoria Island consists of the capital city of $map:02000001$, where $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$</font>'s palace stands, $map:02000076$, $map:02000023$, $map:02000051$, and $map:02000100$. Each of these areas has developed its own unique culture.

Among them, $map:02000001$ is a metropolis built around the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s palace and protected by massive castle walls. It's the political, economic, and cultural center of Maple World.

$map:02000076$ was once a quiet hamlet on an empty prairie. Then a group of bow craftsmen joined it and made it thrive among hunters and adventurers. Its elder is called... $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$, I think. I've heard he's a respectable fellow.
$map:02000023$ started out as a village of fairies in the depths of the Ellin Forest. After ages of hiding from the greater world, they have consented to allowing humans to visit them.

$map:02000051$ is situated on the far side of the treacherous Vayar Mountains. Rugged descendants of powerful tribes live on those rocky cliffs, and only the hardiest travelers can make it up there to pay them a visit.

$map:02000100$ was created by the Kerning workers who stay cooped up inside their bunkers, inventing things and studying crafting skills. Even I haven't been down there yet, but I've heard their technology is astonishing.

In my time, a great many young people left their homes on Maple Island and traveled across the vast oceans, dreaming of adventures and new challenges that awaited them on Victoria Island. I don't know if that's still the popular thing to do... Come to think of it, I haven't left this cabin for a long time.
Perhaps, instead of listening to this old man prattle on, you should venture forth and learn about this world for yourself. But for now, is there another story you want to hear?
Yep!

The Shadow World is a world of death, despair, and fear, created by the Demon King. The only thing keeping him and his darkness from spilling into Maple World is the Lapentas, the legacy of the sages.
After the sages perished, their Lapentas formed a protective ward around this world which keeps the Shadow World at bay.
However, some ten years ago, the Blue Lapenta of Space broke. That lifted the seal on the Land of Darkness, and allowed a gateway to the Shadow World to open.
It is believe that this tragedy occurred because a servant of the Demon King tricked a protector of the Lapenta.
Fortunately, we still have the other two Lapentas hidden away somewhere in Maple World. So long as they persist, the ward will keep us safe from evil.
The army is doing everything they can to prevent the darkness infecting the Land of Darkness and Shadow World from spreading, but...
Perhaps what the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ needs are great heroes who can preserve what peace we have.

I don't know if there are people strong enough to protect the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$, the Lapentas, and this world against the Demon King and his darkness, though. Anyway, is there another story do you want to hear?
Yep!
Ah-choo! Aww. What is it?
Ah-choo! I hate... pollen... ah-choo! It's terrib... ah-choo!
Please... I need to stop... ah-choo! I need to stop sneezing... Bring me $item:30000125$... ah-choo! The wildflowers over there. Sniff... You can pick up $item:30000125$ with the Z key.
Ah-choo! I hate pollen... ah-choo!
You can pick up honey from the ground with the Z key... ah-choo!
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
The forest trail is too dangerous. We have to make it safe again, as soon as possible.
$npcName:99000041$ are making this trail too dangerous to travel.
$MyPCName$, nice to meet you!
I hope we can clean up this forest trail once more...
This forest trail is the only path connecting us to $npcName:11000407[gender:0]$, and the monsters are making it unusable. $npcName:11000409[gender:0]$ and I are working to clear them out.
Yo!
These spray cans are how I express myself.
You ask me, tagging is just as much art as sick beats and hot moves. Some people say I'm just some punk, but they don't know what they're talking about.
Wassup?
Chick-chicka boom, chick-chicka boom!
Sup, man? You wanna talk art? What do you think is the soul of art?
I don't... know?
Heart
Talent
Swag
Then lemme educate you, man! A real artist uses their tools to show the world their heart. That's the whole point, yo!
That's right! You're on point today!
Talent? Man, anyone can train up talent. That's not what's important.
Seriously? Man, I don't want to talk to you anymore.
You got something to say?
Eat a lot of fish.
Do you want to know my beauty secret?
$MyPCName$, I wasn't talking to you.
Someone, please make these turtles go away.
$MyPCName$, I wasn't talking to you.
Are you sightseeing? Head north to the condominium complex. The staff is nice, and it's really pretty around there. Just sayin'.
$MyPCName$, do you like fish?
Yep.
Nope.
Well $MyPCName$, you're more health-conscious than I thought. Fish is an excellent source of protein and other essential nutrients.
Oh, you should eat fish regularly. I thought you knew that, $MyPCName$. Do you only eat red meat? It's too fatty. Eating fish helps you lose weight.
May I help you?
Sigh... I haven't had any customers lately.
I came here with my daughter $npcName:11000420[gender:1]$ to start a new life. But if those turtles don't stop showing up, we'll have to move again.
<font color="#909090">(The headstone is old and worn, and there is an epitaph inscribed upon it.)</font>
Here lies Roanna Levematri. She leaves behind her lover Alberto, whose heart will never heal.
Here lies Roanna Levematri. She leaves behind her lover Alberto, whose heart will never heal.
Catch me if you can!
What is it?
Have you seen a lost girl on the street?
Oh, my poor baby!
She's so pretty! She looks like a doll.
Have you seen a lost, crying girl on the street? She's carrying a doll in her arms like it's a real baby.
What brings you here?
I'd love to ride a $npcName:11000423$, but...
These vultures are not tamed. What if they fly me to some unfamiliar place or drop me in midair?
What is it?
Ahh, I want to go home.
I shouldn't have followed him.
What have I gotten myself into? I should never have followed $npcName:11000425[gender:0]$ here. What's going on? And why's it snowing?
I'll let you head wherever you want right away. Just give me a moment.
What're you doing here?
I shall train these vultures well.

Mature $npcName:11000423$s are almost impossible to train. The best time to train them is right after they're born. If only $npcName:23000019[gender:0]$ didn't keep interfering, I could train up a new group of chicks...
Why are you bothering me?
To us adventurers, pain means we're alive!
A true adventurer dives head-first into trouble! He's not afraid of jumping off a cliff into a sea of lava or fighting giant, rampaging monsters!
Ah, the smell of the sea!
I haven't had time to myself like this for a long time!
I just ate lunch, and I'm already hungry.
Mm? Do I know you?
Come try $npcName:11000362[gender:0]$'s $itemPlural:30000140$!
$itemPlural:30000140$? That sounds delicious! I'll be back for those.
I'm so glad I decided to come to the beach.
Ah, I love the sound of the crashing waves.
$map:02000111$ is such a beautiful place to be! Except for the turtles. They're awful.
Mm?
$npcName:11000362[gender:0]$'s special...
Not interested.
I'd better rest while I can!
The beach is the best place to get away from it all!
I've heard stories of treasure chests under the sea, but I've never seen one. How about you, $MyPCName$?
Yes?
$npcName:11000362[gender:0]$'s special...
Go away.
I came here to rest. Stop bothering me.
$npcName:11000362[gender:0]$'s special...
Baa.
What's wrong?
It's beautiful here, isn't it? Welcome to $map:02000076$!
I've been ordered not to let any shady types in.
I want to protect the peace of $map:02000076$ and all of Maple World.
I hope I'll make lots of new allies.
Welcome to $map:02000076$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000076$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000076$ used to be the home of archers and craftsmen, all living in a collective. They produced many great works and great hunters, generation after generation.
The Green Hoods formed to protect the village from outside threats to their peace. Their current leader is their fifth, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$.

Is $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ the chief of this village? Ha ha, no. The chief of $map:02000076$ is $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s father and $npc:11000001[gender:0]$ have been best friends since they were young.

That's why $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ takes care of $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ like his own. You know, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ doesn't like people talking about her. So, maybe don't tell her about this conversation?

I've heard a great earthquake occurred near $map:02000001$, and the empress's court was canceled as a result. I hope the damage isn't too serious. That disaster might also keep $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ from returning anytime soon.
$npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ won't tolerate anyone trying to take advantage of a chaotic situation. I hope he'll be back soon. We need him more than ever.

You've probably noticed that the Green Hoods are all archers. We're renowned throughout Victoria Island for our marksmanship, and even $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$, the master archer of $map:02000001$, is a Green Hood.
In fact, she taught me everything I know about loosing a bow. If you're interested in archery yourself, I'd suggest paying her a visit next time you're in the capital.
Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a house of their own. $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ is doing what he can to manage the housing lots around the village, but there's only so much land.

If you don't have a house yet, you could settle down in $map:02000076$. $map:02000105$ is also quite nice, and is famous for its beautiful maple trees. There might be some empty lots still available in $map:02000104$ or $map:02000143$ as well. If you're looking for more affordable options, then you can check out the apartments in $map:02000105$ or $map:02000104$.

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling the ant tunnels.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, hiring a maid is a good next step. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in $map:02000001$ is an expert on assistants and can definitely help you out. Maybe you should look for a house around $map:02000076$ first.
What brings you here?
Do you need help?
You'd better not cause any trouble here, or you'll be sorry.
Don't write us off as government goons.
Protestors sure are noisy today...
What brings you here?
Tell me about Kerning City.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000100$ used to be a village of inventors and engineers who worked out of bunkers. It was a center of research and discovery.
Their achievements gave rise to the modern, high-tech metropolis that is $map:02000100$. But where are those engineers and inventors now? That question keeps me up at night.

Anyway, security in $map:02000100$ is handled by us Dark Wind scouts. Losing Winn Stilton was a big blow to the group, but we were able to reunite under the great leadership of our current captain, $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.

The current mayor of $map:02000100$ is Mr. $npcName:11000065[gender:0]$. Word is that $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$, the wealthiest man in the city, has the mayor in his pocket. Of course, there are always going to be rumors like that floating around.

I've heard the court was canceled because of the great earthquake that hit $map:02000001$. It might be a good thing, honestly. The poor people in $map:02000100$ have been upset about the widening gap between them and the rich. Not having the money to attend the court was like salting the wound.

But it also worries me. What if the people decide to rise in rebellion, now that the highly-anticipated court was canceled and their beloved $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ is nowhere to be seen? As part of Dark Wind, I feel more responsible for this city now than ever.

You ever visit $map:02000001$? Major players from the backstreets of $map:02000100$ have decided to meet there and recruit new members. Assassin Master $npcName:11000051[gender:1]$ should be there too.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be there. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of a house of their own. There are many houses in this city, and plenty of people who want them. If you don't have a house yet, how'd you like to settle down in $map:02000100$?

North of $map:02000100$ is $map:02000166$, the site of some booming new developments. Recently renovated, $map:02000165$ and $map:02000167$ are often mentioned as hot properties. There are also low-priced apartment complexes in $map:02000164$, west of $map:02000100$.

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000146$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, hiring a maid is a good next step. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in $map:02000001$ is an expert on assistants and can definitely help you out. Maybe you should look for a house around $map:02000100$ first.
Captain $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$... No, he's not my captain anymore. This is all too much. What's going to happen to Dark Wind now?
Please help me.
Welcome.
The game will begin shortly. Places, people!
Can I help you?
Yikes. I could've died!
I don't want to talk. I got ripped off by my boss, and then I almost got killed by robbers. My life sucks!
Do you want to know what the owner of Cathy Mart is like? The worst, that's what!
Can I help you?
Oh no. I left the cash in the registers!
If we don't get that money back, it's coming out of my paycheck...
I don't know who's worse, the boss or the robbers.
Ah... I want to get better soon, so I can go on adventures again.
I want to get better soon, so I can go on adventures again.
Cough, cough! Aww, my legs...
When can I sail again? Cough, cough! My leg had better heal quickly so I can get back to finding that pirate island.
The sea may look calm from here, but it can destroy you in an instant.
Ugh...
Ugh...
The pain...
H-help me...
Empress... I've failed...
Ugh...
What is it?
Aww, my love...
He's so handsome!
Get out of the way, I can't see $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$!
How may I help you?
Let peace reign in $map:02000001$!
May Ereve bless you!
All hail the empress!
Never let your guard down!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.
$map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.
Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

$map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.
Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.
Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$... And $map:02000064$...

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!
Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.
You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing...
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.
If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.
They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough... How did you manage to master both?

Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though... I thought you'd be taller.
You've mistaken me for someone else.
R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life...
How may I help you?
May Ereve bless you!
Let peace reign in $map:02000001$!
Never let your guard down!
All hail the empress!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.
$map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.
Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

$map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.

Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!
Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.
You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing...
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.
If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.
They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough... How did you manage to master both?

Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though... I thought you'd be taller.
You've mistaken me for someone else.
R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life...
Can I help you?
Never let your guard down!
Let peace reign in $map:02000001$!
All hail the empress!
May Ereve bless you!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.
$map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.

Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts. If you have $itemPlural:90000006$ from guild battles, you should speak to $npcName:11000620[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000626[gender:1]$.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

$map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.
Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.
Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$... And $map:02000064$...

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!
Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.
You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing...
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.
If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.
They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough... How did you manage to master both?

Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though... I thought you'd be taller.
You've mistaken me for someone else.
R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life...
Welcome!
When will the ships return?
Sailors are rugged on the outside, but soft on the inside.
Can't believe the storms blew my customers away...
You're not from around here, are you?
Why is the harbor so empty?
What's on the menu?

Ugh, don't let me get started. Not too long ago, there was a big storm that rolled in with a tsunami, and all the regular ships we used to get here stopped coming in. Let me tell you, before the storm this place was packed with ships.
If it's seafood you want, I'm your woman. Sushi plates, crab cakes, calamari, I make it all! Freshest catches you'll find anywhere without catching 'em yourself!
...And if you can wait an hour or three, I can make some for you. The storms have fouled up the fishermen, so I'm still waiting on today's catch. What a life, huh?
I'm a seasoned sailor!
Maybe tomorrow, I'll find that whale...
I haven't shaved for months, and my chin is itching something fierce!
Ahoy there! Have you ever seen a whale?
Yes.
Nope.
Bah, nonsense! I've been a fisherman my whole life, and only seen a whale once. And it was a teeny one at that! Me dream is to see the great blue whale just once before the sea takes me.
Aye, they're an elusive catch. I've always wanted to see a blue whale myself.
How may I help you?
Why's everyone so spooked? It was just an earthquake.
Ahhhh, I'm so bored. Aren't you?
Everyone's all freaked out about the storm and the earthquake, but so what? We need some excitement around here!
I love staying around the house.
There's nothing like rolling around in bed all day.
I don't want to go outside. I don't want a tan!
My girlfriend keeps bugging me to go out, even though it's a great day to relax inside. You get that, right? Make her see reason. If she always insists on doing... things, I worry about our future.
What? Is there something you want to ask me?
It's so beautiful today. Come on, let's go outside.
Stop being such a troll and let's go out, please? Honey...

It's such a nice day to go for a walk or get some juice, but my dumb lump of a boyfriend wants to stay inside. Look at him, he's not even doing anything! Can you convince him to do something with his life?
Ugh...
Ugh...
The pain...
H-help me...
Empress... I've failed...
Ugh...
What is it?
Uh-oh. Please don't say you're in love with me.
I look incredible, don't I?

Hey, I know what you're thinking, and that's not why I'm here at $map:02000107$. I'm all natural! No cosmetic surgery here! I just came to get some fresh air, and check out the latest beauty... trends. While I'm at it.
Can I help you?
I want to become beautiful...
Will I look better if I change my style?
Others say Chief Hairdresser $npcName:11000255[gender:1]$ is the best, but I like $npcName:11000253[gender:0]$'s style.
How may I help you?
Who doesn't want to look pretty?
Oh wow, look at her!
Should I put on some cosmetics? Or should I try a new skin tone?
What brings you to $map:02000107$? Since you're here, I was thinking about changing up my skin tone again. Do you think I should do it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
Ah, what is it?
Why am I not growing?
I know height isn't everything, but I really don't like being shorter than most people...
Hmph. WHAT?
I'm not afraid of spiders!
Real men aren't scared of spiders! They squash them flat as soon as they see them!
This place behind me is loaded with spiders. If you're in a hurry, you can squash them yourself.
What is it?
Yoo-hoo! Come play with me!
Good luck!
I hope you hit the jackpot!
I don't recognize you. Is this your first time here?
You've been staring at me. Interested?
May I help you?
Welcome to Goldus!
$map:02000100$ would never have been developed without the help of $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$!
There's a name on it: $npcName:11000477$.
The Goldus way! Put your back into it! Pinch a penny, make a penny!
Can I help you?
My friend, I miss you...
How are you?
$MyPCName$, do you have a friend that you miss? Someone you always think of?
I love how high this place is. The view is so beautiful.
I have a friend not far from here, but being away from him is agony. I wonder how he's doing...
Who is he?
I'm sure he's fine.
That's... Um... Sheesh, $MyPCName$! You wouldn't know even if I told you! Don't you miss someone like that?
Do you think so? I think so, too...
I know he's doing well. He's strong enough to get through anything.
But sometimes bad things happen, and that's why I'm worried about him. $MyPCName$, could you pray for his well-being?
Of course.
It's not my business.
You're very kind! I consider you a good friend, $MyPCName$. I'll be praying for you, too.
Oh, $MyPCName$... You must not have many friends...
Do, mi, so, do! How may I help you?
Hm, this is not the sound I want...
Music imitates nature.
As a musician, I want to make music from the most beautiful tones of nature. That's my dream.
How may I help you?
Remember people, put any Vayar stone fragments you find on the work cart.
$npcName:11000328[gender:0]$ has asked us to gather $itemPlural:30000055$ from the quarry in this work cart. I have no idea why he wants useless junk like this.
I'm busy. Why are you bothering me?
Argh, I'm so busy!
I really could use some help.
I can't get anything done because of those monsters!
If only those monsters weren't here...
I'm busy. If you're not going to help, then at least don't get in my way.
Judging by the rough handwriting, I think $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$ wrote this note.
Judging by the rough handwriting, I think $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$ wrote this note.
Check the note about the starting time.
Check the note about how to play the game.
Check the note about earning rewards.
I know these folks aren't just here to see $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$. Don't worry, I'll start the game when we've got enough people.
Step on the red tile to jump to the center of the cave. Once there, you can step on the blue tile there when you want to leave.
When the game begins, the tiles you're standing on will start disappearing. Last as long as you can without falling, and if you're the last one standing, you win! Easy, right?
In addition to mesos, the winners will get a special reward: $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$'s Blessing, which increases their Movement Speed for 15 seconds.
Do you want a reward? Then join up and complete the game!
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
Yoo-hoo! Congrats!
You're the best!
You're so awesome!
I was rooting for you, $MyPCName$!
You're amazing!
You did it! Good job!
What's wrong?
This place is still packed.
Yeesh, I don't know if they'll have room for me. I've been out all day. I really need to put my feet up.
What's up?
Tee hee! I want to become $npcName:22000321$ as soon as I can!
My house! Your house! $map:2000202$! Mm?
Down below, $npcName:22000321$ has claimed all of the $map:2000202$ for herself!
She's bad, but... so cool! I want to be a monster mushroom like her!
What is it?
Kyaaahh!
Marry me!
Ah... Doesn't $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ look handsome? As for you? Not so much.
What is it?
Notice me!
$npcName:11000406[gender:0]$!
Rumor has it $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ likes bad girls. I'd better become one, and quick!
Can I help you?
Oof... I think I'm going to faint...
I wish he would hold me in his arms, just once...
He's so hot, and his voice is amaaazing. When I hear him sing, I can hardly control myself!
What is it?
$npcName:11000406[gender:0]$! I'm here! Right here!
Over here! Look at me!
Eww, you're ugly! Get out of the way!
Can I help you?
I don't care what others say.
Heh! Just watch me. This is only the beginning.
Right now, Goldus Group is the biggest company in $map:02000100$, but that'll soon change. I'll be crushing $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$ under my heel before you know it.
What? You want to know if I'm single?
Hah! I don't need a man. All men are narcissistic, chauvinist pigs. I hate them!
Can't you see I'm busy? If it's not urgent, then scram.
I don't sell anything on credit. I trust money more than I trust people.
Hold on, you can't just walk there. Time is valuable, you know.
Can I help you?
Man, I never seem to have time to rest.
I wonder how Mother is doing. I haven't seen her for a while.
I've spoken with many people who are frustrated that the court will not be held.
It must be difficult to explain it to every single person.
It certainly is, but I understand their frustration. They came all the way here to attend the court, only to have their plans ruined. They're upset and disappointed.
Whatever the reason, I still feel personally responsible since I was the one charged with the preparations.

My job is to make sure $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the other members of the royal family have everything they need for their day. I'm always busy, but I take pride in my position and my service to $map:02000025$.
Have you been to $map:02000076$? My mother lives there. I really should visit her, but I've been so busy that I haven't had the time since preparations began.
Once my work here is done and I've sorted out all the issues, I'll go and visit her first thing! I've been sending her letters, it's just... she can't see. A disease took her eyesight. Sigh...
Here, use this portal to go where you want.
Meow.
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Did... Did you come to see me?
My best facial feature is... my philtrum...
I want to live in peace, like I used to...
I thought that if we went deeper into the forest, we could keep $npcName:11000751[gender:1]$ safer...
Others pointed their fingers and called us cowards, but we didn't care. We just wanted to keep our charge safe...
Not just anyone can sit on me.
You kick me, and I'm not going to be the one in pain.
You better leave while I'm still in a good mood. I'm no ordinary rock.
How may I help you?
Even time can't help it...
As long as you know who you are and what you believe, what others think of you doesn't matter. That's the way we Boroboros live.
Why did you call me?
I want to go home...
What is it?
Ah, $MyPCName$! Good to see you again. I made it home safely, all thanks to you. I thought Dad would be mad, but he let me in without saying a word.
I've decided to stay out of trouble and be good. Come back and visit, will you?
Can I help you?
Hm... Is this... baroque?
This baroque design is so... baroqueish.

This place is... How do I say? Full of contradictions. A rich, gorgeous facade that hides a lingering melancholy. This hotel is luxurious, but it's not for the regular people who live around it. Those people belong to a different world.
What brings you here?
Scram, punk.
Who are you? Stop bothering me.
What brings you here?
Who are you? I don't recognize you.
What brings you here?
What seems to be the problem?
What brings you here?
You must pay for what you did!
If you do something you shouldn't, then you must pay the price.
Pull some weeds and show me how sorry you are. I'll consider reducing your sentence.
Maybe you don't realize this, but I'm the warden of this prison. I don't take walk-ins.
I'm here to make amends for my deeds.
I'm just a tourist!
All misdeeds must be punished. The punishment must fit the crime, or else we risk the criminal committing their crimes again.
How can I reduce my sentence?
See the prisoners in here? Remember that you can always end up the same if you fail to heed the law.
And that's the reason I have a tourist program here. You could learn a thing or two.
How bold! You realize I don't issue pardons...
I'll do anything. ANYTHING.

Will you, now? Hmm... I like the sound of that. In some cases, hard labor can substitute for time served. How about you pull the weeds in the prison yard? Do a good job, and I'll consider reducing your sentence.
Maybe you don't realize this, but I'm the warden of this prison. I don't take walk-ins.
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
Who? You can't expect me to remember every rodent who comes in and out of $map:2000124$.
Trust me, you'd remember this guy.
<font color="#909090">(She listens begrudgingly as you describe $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$.)</font> As a matter of fact, I do remember him. There was something mysterious about the man.
Do you know why he was here?
Only two kinds of people come to $map:2000124$: tourists and convicts. Since he's not rotting in one of our cells, I suppose he must have been a tourist.
Can I help you?
If you're looking for the $map:2000216$, you came to the right place.
What's the $map:02000216$?
I'm curious about Blackstar.
I'm not surprised you haven't heard of it. This is a place that services people with extraordinary taste.
Looking for items to invest in? Have rare items to sell? This is the place to do it.
Whatever your business, you'll find that the goods we broker here are a far cry from those you find in $map:2000100$.
Talk to one of my brokers below to browse or sell items.
Note that epic and above items can only be brokered through the $map:2000216$. We'll know if you try to move them without us, and trust me, we will not be pleased.
Now, if you'll excuse me...
Well, aren't you the joker. If you're smart, you won't repeat that question to anyone else.
For the record, we aren't doing anything illegal here.
The $map:2000216$ attracts adventurers and tourists from all over Maple World, and that's advantageous to $map:2000100$.
In fact, the majority of $map:2000100$'s residents support us. The polls all say so.
Ah, Gray Wolf. You have business with me? If you're looking for the $map:2000216$, you've come to the right place.
What's the $map:02000216$?
I'm curious about Blackstar.
I'm not surprised you haven't heard of it. This is a place that services people with extraordinary taste. Our clientèle does not typically mix with rough-and-tumble fighter types.
I'll have to check what items I have that are suitable for your skills. Are you looking for something in particular? Or do you have a rare item that you'd like to sell?
I don't care either way. The products here are incomparable to those available in $map:2000100$. Heh.
Simply talk to the traders here to browse their wares or sell your items on the $map:2000216$. They'll do their best to help you. Probably.

Keep in mind that the only place to trade epic and better items is the $map:2000216$. And if you try to secretly trade such items without us, we'll know. You may be the famous Gray Wolf, but this is our field of expertise.
Now, if you'll excuse me...
I'm telling you this for your own good. A place like this draws a lot of attention. Even now, agents from many organizations are watching us.
Not many people recognize you as a threat. But if you keep asking questions like that, they'll start to take notice. You don't want that. Understand?

You may not be Blackstar's biggest fan, but not everything it does is bad. The $map:2000216$ has drawn adventurers and traders from all over Maple World. I'd say that it's single-handedly put $map:2000100$ and $map:2000135$ on the map.
The people of $map:2000100$ are thankful for what we've done for the community. So I suggest you keep your opinions about Blackstar to yourself while you're here.
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
What seems to be the problem?
If you're not here for the job, please leave.
Ugh, I'm tired of this rotting smell.
Industrialization, urban development... I don't know who'll really benefit from all that.
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
Ugh...
Ugh...
Welcome.
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$... Being with you like this...
Dad... $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is back...
After my father passed away, I found his journal among his things. My father was the guardian of the Blue Lapenta, and he wanted $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ to be his successor. So I knew.
I knew there was no way $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ did what the others said he did.
I'm glad the truth finally came out and everything is back to normal, even though $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ hasn't paid for his crimes.
Being with $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ reminds me of the gorilla pie that we used to bake together when we were young.
What could gorilla pie possibly be...?

It's one of those pies topped with walnuts, almonds, and blueberries. When $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ and I first made it, it was so bumpy and ugly that it looked like a gorilla. Why? What did you think it was?
What is it?
Another win for me.
Don't sweat it. Crime is pretty bad around here. That's just how it is.
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
I can't trust just anyone.
Once I get out of here...
I need to find a better place to hide. The Dark Wind would have no trouble finding me here.
Welcome. It's nice to meet you.
Hm...
I can't believe this happened...
$MyPCName$, I can't believe we're meeting again like this. I can see in your eyes how much you've grown since last we met. Do you remember what I told you then? That the world would need a hero?
Looking at you now, I believe that you're the one.
Ha ha ha, you look like you have many questions for me. What do you want to know?
How did you end up on Victoria Island?
Why did you save $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?
This $map:02000051$ is where I was born and raised. The last time I left, I swore I'd never return... I thought that was best for everyone here.
But something happened, and it made me wonder if I made the right decision. I came back to finish what I couldn't finish then.
What is it?
That's... I'll tell you when I'm ready.
I couldn't ignore the wish of a dying man. Even if he was a prisoner...
And when he awoke after his brush with death, I could see in his eyes that he was innocent. I didn't ask any questions, but I knew I had to help him.
Stay true to yourself, and you can overcome anything. No matter how difficult it is, you can do it.
Every age needs a hero.
Here, take this portal.
How may I help you?
What brings you here?
They're up to something.
Sly devils...
Dark Wind has changed too much. Now it's crushing the citizens under authoritarian rule instead of protecting them like they used to. I can't let this continue.
$MyPCName$, do the people in this city look happy to you?
Yep!
Beats me.
Then you're a fool. There's no point in discussing this further. Leave.
Try to see through their deceptions. It's not hard to find the rotting heart of this city.
Wait! It's going to be a long journey. Use this instead.
Can I help you?
I mostly paint portraits. Would you like to know why?
Because the most beautiful thing in the world is people! That's why I like painting them.
Would you like to know when I started painting?
Well, that's... I don't know. Do you remember when you started eating food on your own? Or when you spoke your first word?
Picking up a brush was as natural to me as picking up a spoon. I was born to paint. I don't need to know exactly when I started doing it.
When I have a brush in my hand, I feel like the world makes sense.
Whom should I paint?
How may I help you?
Kids these days... they don't even read books!
Sigh... Maybe it's time I close this bookstore once and for all.
Cough, cough... It's so dusty in here! I've had it with all these old books.
Are you really going to close your bookstore?
Well, I'm certainly thinking about it. Ha ha... My bookstore is the oldest business on $map:02000147$, you know. I'd rather keep it open, but I'm getting too old to run it on my own.
Do you like books?
Yep!
Nope!
Ha, do you? People like you amaze me. I've owned this store for over thirty years, but reading always puts me right to sleep. It's so boring.
I'm glad not everyone feels like I do. I'd have long since shut down, ha!

You don't? Ha, you're just like me. I've owned this store for over thirty years, but reading always puts me right to sleep. It's so boring. Just between you and me, I've never finished a single book in my whole life.
Can I help you?
Ah, we haven't had many guests lately. Do you know why?
Err? Err? What's this? Ouch!
What seems to be the problem?
There's another fire!

Ugh...
What brings you here?
What's wrong?

I must report this situation to my captain...

Ah, yes, as have we. A dark aura begins to spread over Maple World once more.

Please... be careful.

Let me help you get going.

I don't expect anything from the empire anymore.
The empire turned its back on these people when they needed it the most. Someone had to step in and protect them. And the empire will get what it deserves.

We can't just wait. We have to do something.
Don't compare us to the empire. They care more about their hierarchy than the safety of their charges. Their hypocrisy is disgusting.
This is troublesome...
I don't know...
Hmph, I can't believe I have to investigate this!

It's nice to be outside sometimes.
We need more people to handle the damage.
Mushrooms want wooden ladders. Just wooden ones!
Screeeeech!
Screeeeech!
Screeeeech!

Screeeeech!
Screeeeech!

Hey, you there! Keep it down!
If you cause any trouble, it's the dungeon for you!
You're touring $map:02000124$, are you? Stick to the route, then. You wouldn't want to mess with some of these prisoners.
What kinds of offenses have these prisoners committed?
Can they get their sentences reduced?
They've spoken lies or slander about certain people or places, publicly supported or attacked public groups, or used chat, displays, UGC, or character names to offend others.

Of course, one doesn't get thrown into prison for committing these offenses just once. They're given multiple chances to redeem themselves first. If they still refuse to see the error of their ways and keep making the same mistakes, then they will receive punishment from $npcTitle:11000514[gender:1]$ and Judge $npcName:11000514[gender:1]$.
$npcName:11000514[gender:1]$'s punishment can make their life in Maple World very difficult. But if they prove how sorry they are, they can have their sentence reduced.

Pulling weeds in the prison yard is one way of proving that, but so far I haven't seen any prisoner pull weeds long enough to have their sentence reduced. It just proves that some people don't change.

No way, you're in for fraud! That's the worst!
Bah, how did you know I'm in here for fraud? Did the warden tell you? If you're not going to get me out of here, then scram!
Get me out of here, would ya? I've got a stash on the outside. A million mesos for my freedom. What'cha say?

Then talk to the supervisor. He's the one in charge here.

$npcName:11000651[gender:0]$. You'll need the password, of course. We change it every three days to keep the guards off our trail.
What's the latest password?

I can't wait to get out of here. How much longer?

Get me out of here...

When can I get out of here?

The war against weeds is one that can never be won.
Huh? You don't look like an inmate.
What are you doing?
Are you blind? I'm working! I have to pull a million weeds to have my sentence reduced. Ugh, I'll grow old before I can pull that many weeds.
Huh? You don't look like an inmate.
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
How do you know that man?
I'm working with him.
Hm... Yes, there is something special about you. What brings you here, then?
I'm here on $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s behalf.
He's just as impatient as the supervisor, eh? Well, if you're here on business, you better talk to him.
Who is this supervisor?
$npcName:11000651[gender:0]$. But he doesn't talk to nobody without the password. That's the rule. And, to keep things nice and secure, we change it every three days.
What's the password?
I wrote it down somewhere. Ahem. "In the middle of the shadows..." Drat! The rest got erased.
Sorry, that's all I know. You'll have to ask someone else for the rest of the password.
When can I get out of here?

How'd it go? Um... "Enlighten the light," I think. That's all I remember, honest!
Now get outta here, before the warden notices we been talking.
Can I help you?
How may I help you?
What brings you here?
What is it?
What's wrong?
How may I help you?
What is it?

What is it?
I miss Cecilia...
Do you believe in love at first sight? I do. I fell in love with $npcName:11000151[gender:1]$...
Toot-toot-toot...
Access denied.
WHAT?!
It's really stuffy here.
Bah, it's not easy to set up a date.
Mm? What?
What are you doing?
You're a curious sort, aren't you? As the old saying goes, ignorance is bliss.
Don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong.
WHAT?!
Why are you bothering me?
Those ignorant punks...
Wait, are you going to go down to the basement?
Yep!
Ha! You're funny. I don't know how you got down here, but trust me when I say you NEVER want to go to the 2nd basement. There are some really scary guys down there.
It's just as well, I don't feel like dealing with you myself. Go on, go to the basement. And don't say I didn't warn you.
WHAT?!
Ah... Achoo!
This place is so humid.
What are you doing here? How did you even GET here?
Easily.
Kid, I'm impressed. You made it this far, but it's time for you to go. Leave before something bad happens to you.
Why?
I stay well away from the basement levels. And I live here!
I had to come down here today, but believe me... I can't WAIT to get back upstairs.
Don't try anything stupid. Just get out of here!
<font color="#909090">(One of these books seems out of place.)</font>
No, no! I don't want to go back in there!
Hey! Did you just throw me on the ground?
How did you end up on the bookshelf?
A stupid monster brought me back here. Please, you've got to take me with you!
Your bag is full! Make some room for me, will ya?
<font color="#909090">(You always remember to put books back where you found them... right?)</font>
Yes, here!
It's locked! You need a key!
Make sure to return books to where they belong!
Can I help you?

"When I discovered the secret passageway, I was excited beyond measure. I thought I could finally escape."
"But at the other end of the passageway, an endless abyss awaited me. Is it really impossible to escape from this misery?"
What brings you here?

I want to challenge you.
What's the $map:65000001$?
Heh. Interesting. You challenge the undefeated champion of $map:65000001$, the victor of 47 consecutive matches. Very well. I shall give you what you desire.
But not right now. We gladiators fight only inside the ring. That's our rule.
As you can also see, I'm quite busy. Perhaps while I attend to my business, you can start to make a name for yourself. Why not go prove your strength at the $map:65000001$?
You must not have heard about the $map:65000001$. All right, I shall do you the honor of hearing $npcName:11000675[gender:0]$'s own explanation. So listen.
The $map:65000001$ is a place of battle where up to 10 warriors can take turns battling one on one, until only one remains. The order of their fights is random.
Unlucky fighters may be eliminated in their very first match. But those who are truly strong, truly deserving, will triumph over fortune and faith.
I should know. I've done it countless times. Now... Do you still want to challenge me?
Can I help you?

Oh, thank you!
Help me...
Help! Anyone, please!

$MyPCName$, welcome.
