I really hope he's okay...
$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is the only one who stayed with me when everyone else turned their backs.
So I'm going to stand by him, no matter what happens.
L-leave me alone...
What brings you here?
I can do it!
Making potions isn't like cooking at all!
It's almost done!
Making potions is very difficult. The first priority is preparing the ingredients. You need very specific ingredients to make effective potions.
Some people compare potion brewing to cooking. They're crazy if they think potions are as easy to make as food.
Here, I'll give you an example. Say you're making fried rice. You can put in just about anything you want. Ham, peppers, carrots, anything you want.
When you're making a potion, however, you must add the ingredients in the correct order, at the correct time. You can't take your eyes off the cauldron.
How may I help you?
Ah... I can't sleep...
I keep having nightmares. They wake me up all night...
You get near me, you get hurt.
Who's there?
Mm... Who's there? I can't see you, but I can sense your burning soul.
What happened?
What's the $map:65000002$?
...Do you mean my eyes? As you can see, I'm blind. I committed a sin so grave that I gave up my eyes in penance.

I can tell you want to hear my story. I assume $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ told you about the arena. That is where you can always find a fair fight. No battles to the death, just competitions of strength.
But I killed someone there. It was an accident, and everyone who watched our fight agreed that it was unavoidable, but I couldn't forgive myself.
That's why I decided to hide in the darkness. That's all.

You must be interested in the $map:65000002$. But as its name suggests, it's a dangerous place. Everyone in there is determined to hurt each other in a contest of strength. If you want to join in, you'd better prepare well.

The $map:65000002$ is a battleground in which up to 10 warriors battle each other for points, and whoever beats more competitors than the others wins. When you beat another warrior, you get points. When you are beaten, you lose them.
Since so many warriors fight each other at the same time, sometimes things get really chaotic. The winner might not be the strongest of them all, but the smartest.
It's always good to test your strength, but be careful not to let your excitement get the best of you. That's all I have to tell you. Be on your way.
How may I help you?
We don't have time for this. I'll take $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ to HQ. $MyPCName$, please follow $npc:11000057[gender:1]$.
What brings you here?
Ugh...
No... We were so close to catching him...
Time is of the essence. We must request backup right away.
Can I help you?
Come to sample our juice? $npcName:11000445[gender:1]$ right here will set you up. Hope you're ready for a trip to flavor country!
Juice, right here! Life-changing juice!
Punch makes me happy!
What? If you have something to say, say it.
I'm busy! Oh, where is my husband when I need him most?
I'm so winded... I can't run.
What? Do you have business with me?
What is it?
Jump from one floaty to the next for a boost!
Don't fall in the pool, or you'll lose your boosts!
Jump from floaty to floaty with your friends!
Meow.
Did you call me?
I really hate high places.
Why is it that all the beautiful places are so high up?
I think I can cross this bridge if I don't look down. But... what if I lose my footing because I can't see where I'm going?
Hello.
Woo-hoo! Have a great day today!
Yoo-hoo! Yet another beautiful day has dawned. Isn't it great?
Yep!
It's not worth it.
Since I became a Bunny Gal, every day has been like a dream. I never thought my life could be this fun!
Oh, you don't think so? Why not? It's all a matter of perspective. You should try to think positive. Like me! Hee hee hee!
Hm? Where are you staring at?
I can't help it... you're so pretty!
I... wasn't staring at you!
Oh, really? Do you think I'm pretty? I wasn't always so pretty, you know. Hee hee hee! I'd like it if you'd come visit me more often. I think I like you!
Oh, y-you weren't? Hmph, for a moment I thought you had the hots for me.
But... are you SURE you weren't staring at me?
Nope!
Okay... you caught me.
No? Well... All right then. If you say you weren't, then you weren't. Oh well!
You were, right? I knew it. Hee hee! Don't be embarrassed. You aren't the only one who likes to stare at me.
Wow, $MyPCName$, don't you just love the weather today? Back when I had to stay inside, I could hardly tell what the weather was.
What happened to you back then?
Huh? W-well... I don't... I don't want to talk about my past.
Let's talk about something else, shall we? Keep your head in the present, I always say! Eyes on the prize!

Dad, play with me.
I'm bored.
Dad doesn't want to play with me. $MyPCName$, could you play with me?
How may I help you?
Ughhh...
This is because of his liver...
I have terrapin cousins living in the sea, and one of the most famous terrapins in history is called Byeljubu. Have you heard of him?
How may I help you?
Hm...
I'm itching all over.
Wah! This thing is eating me alive!
Ah, so plush and comfy!
Err? Are you a traveler? You look... cool.
I'm cooler, though. Hee hee!
What? I'm in the middle of creating music that speaks to the soul!
Shut up! Shut up!
Sigh... Do you even know the pain of creation? Bah, there's no soul in this music. If there was, I'd be able to feel it!
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
I may be old, but I'm young at heart.
Where is this smell coming from?
Don't judge a book by its cover. I may be old, but I'm still a girl on the inside.
Do you think you can beat me?
Laughable!
I doubt there's anyone worth challenging here, either.
Do you want to challenge me? You know how to play rock-paper-scissors, right? Heh, let's do it. Rock, paper, scissors!

Rock!

While I was making supplements in a corner of Goldus's drug factory, I accidentally came across a sample of $item:20000102$, a natural stimulant.

When ingested, this chemical heightens one's mood, relaxes their mind, and also gives an energy boost. The empire prohibited its use simply because it's produced in the Land of Darkness. All that did was drive the trade underground!

Welcome to Cathy Mart!

To make this work...
Do you know who $npcName:11000614[gender:0]$ is? He's a friend of mine in $map:03000135$.
We first met in Katramus. The Lumina Liberation Army sprung us while we were being transferred to another prison, and we joined up together.
We promised that we'd stick together like we did during our time in prison. That was the most difficult time of our lives.
What brings you here?
Sigh...
I should've been more careful...
But why does it have to be now? Sigh...
I think that doctor is a quack. The more he treats me, the worse I feel. Sigh...
What is it?

Where should I look first?
Ah, I don't care about justice or world peace. I just don't like it when people bully the weak. No one has the right to make others suffer, no matter how strong they are.
Oh, no...
$npcName:22400062$ must be stopped!
No... This can't be happening!
This is beyond bad! $npcName:22400062$ is trying to manipulate the timeline to his own ends! If he succeeds, the resulting temporal cascade will wipe away all of history as we know it!

This place exists upon the central axis of time for our universe. It is a road to all things. Here all possible timelines coexist simultaneously. $npcName:22400062$ plans to collapse them all into a single eventuality, one where he reigns supreme!
Can I help you?
I-I'm scared...
Sniff...
Please... help...
Help...
Dad... Sister... Sniff...
Can I help you?
We have to protect the Lapenta of Time...
I know we'll succeed... Won't we?
Can I help you?
What an interesting place.
Who would have thought something like this could ever happen?
I don't think it's coincidence that I landed here.
I believe more than one timeline exists in Ludibrium at this moment.
What is it? I'm doing something really important. Please don't distract me.
Finally, the time has come!
I can't relax.
The world keeps changing, and our technology and science leads the way. Mark my words, I'll usher in a new era with my work.
Hello.
Maybe the time machine worked too well.
I shouldn't change anything in the period I'm visiting.
It's snowing here. How amazing! You understand why, right?
I can think. I can assess.
I remember.
System error...
Robots are no longer tools. We are capable of much more than our creators.
I'm not doing this because I want to.
I'm hiding, and yet I feel like everyone can see me.
Ah... How did things go so wrong?
Please. Please, don't stare.
S-stop staring!
Ah... N-nice to meet you...
Whew... What should I do next?
I also have to fix the fence...
Our sheep must be hiding somewhere...
The w-wolves showed up again... They destroyed our fence, and some of our sheep were so scared that they ran into that thicket.
But an $npcName:24000702$ carried off $npcName:11001013[gender:1]$'s $item:30000328$ in its jaws...

Cough, cough...
Thank you so much!
Thank you so much!

Feel free to take a look around.
I've got fresh, delicious fruit.
Argh, these flies!
Sigh... I'm losing my customers to that supermarket...
Bugs love delicious fruit. Just look at all these flies in my shop! That should tell you how sweet my fruit is.
My prices are lower than any supermarket's. Here, come try some samples.
Oh?
The more I think about it, the angrier I get!
Are they doing this to me because I'm an intern? I didn't become a researcher to run errands!
How may I help you?
There's got to be a reason... What is it?
Please don't be too loud. I can't afford any distractions from my research.
I hope this portal won't disrupt local space-time.
Huh?
Time has stopped.
Isn't this incredible? Frozen in time...
Huh?
How interesting!
$MyPCName$, would you like to know what's going on here? You look a little... bewildered.
What? Do you have something to say to me?
This place is more dangerous than you think. Don't do anything stupid.
Every time I think I found a clue, it turns out to be nothing.
Don't rely on Fairy Dew too much. This place is teeming with monsters that are stronger than you.
Sigh...
The world looks more interesting when I see it through a telescope.
When I'm curious about something, I can't stop thinking about it.
I've got this awful, creeping feeling that something bad is coming. I really hope I'm wrong.
Ahem... What is it?
People try to put us down, talking about my generation...
Old man, look at my life. I'm a lot like you were...
Who's going to scratch my back later?
I think all the hair that should've gone to my head went to my chin.
Ugh, why do I feel so bloated?
I don't know if I could handle seeing something like that again. It was surreal, horrifying, futile...
What are you talking about?
Are you new to $map:02000111$? Because most people who live here know what I'm talking about. It was the $npcName:23000017$ Tsunami.
Never heard of it.

That happened way back when I still had a full head of hair. It was January 23rd, around 11 p.m. The cold, merciless wind was churning the sea when the legendary turtle king $npcName:23000017$ awoke and rose to the ocean's surface from his briny domain.
I've never seen such a massive, terrifying creature in my whole life. And it was fast. I couldn't believe it was a turtle.

Anyway, the news of the legendary turtle king surfacing quickly spread, and great warriors came from all over Maple World to battle back the deadliest turtle in history. Ahhh, just recalling that day makes my nonexistent hair stand on end.

A single strike from that turtle's leg sent dozens of warriors flying. Some of them were terrified into running. But enough brave souls stuck it out to tire the turtle out. For awhile, it looked like we might come out on top.
It must have been an hour into the battle, when suddenly a loud roar came up from the sea. The next thing I remember is someone screaming about a tsunami coming.
In an instant, a wave tall enough to block out the sun rose up. The warriors had to finish the fight and warn everyone else to escape before all was lost.
Acting as a team, the warriors came together and pressed back against $npcName:23000017$ twice as hard. It was the most intense battle I've ever seen.
I'll never forget the moment they finally flipped $npcName:23000017$ over. It was an incredible victory, cut short by the massive tsunami crashing down on us!

I don't know how long I was out. When I woke up, the sky was clear and the sea was quiet, as if the terror of the previous night was but a dream. It might as well be for those warriors... for they and $npcName:23000017$ were all swept out to sea.
What was perhaps the most frenzied battle in history was lost to the tides, with only myself and a few other survivors to retell the story.
$npcName:23000017$ has never returned to bother us since that day. I don't know if the tsunami swept it away, or if our heroes taught it a lesson.
I've been studying turtles in the hopes of finding a clue to where their king went. And now, with my bald head and hunched-up shoulders and craning neck, I almost look like a turtle myself. Heh.
I'm going to be rich soon.
I'm going to be rich!
What am I going to do when I become rich? Well... I want a nice-looking house, a nice-looking car, nice-looking clothes, nice-looking shoes... Basically, everything I have should look nice. Right?
Do you know how the fairfolk greet each other?
Mm, I love this fresh forest scent!
Forests are the cradle of life for woodland creatures like us fairfolk. If they get cut down, we'll fall with them.

I can help you become stronger more quickly than any hunting you could do. I'm not just talking about equipment, either. With my help, you can become even mightier than before.

Things aren't as good as they used to be. Ahh well. What did you want?
Hush. This way.
The Green Hoods never surrender, no matter how bad the situation is.

Here, over here!
Folks like me don't make money sitting around on our butts. We're always on the move, looking for new buyers.

Ah... I feel much better now. Thank you.
I can't remember anything. I miss my mom.
This situation is more serious than I thought, but I'm not going to back down now!
I'm not going to run!
I'll do anything for the safety and peace of $map:02000076$. I'll fight as long as I can, for the honor of the Green Hoods.
Oh, no. You aren't getting my digits. Now shoo!
Sniff... What's this smell?

Mm, mm! This smells heavenly!
It gives me tremendous pleasure to watch people enjoying my food. Ho, ho!
Unngh... Unngh... Unngh...
I hope it'll be a good harvest!
I believe if I work hard now, I'll be able to retire and spend time with my daughter someday.
Wa-tcha! Hyoo! That is the sound of a master martial artist!

Nothing is impossible for true martial artists. Do you want to become strong? It won't be easy.

Nice to meet you.

Got a spare umbrella?

I wasn't always so forgetful. On that note... where am I? I don't know what went wrong this time...
Please, please leave me alone! I can make it work this time!

That was the only way to show my gratitude... Sniff...

There are many stones yet unknown to the world. The ones that shine aren't the only beautiful ones.

You can hold onto this seagull if you want to take off.
Ah, what is it?
Mm... Something's going on...
I can't make a move just yet...
Some people say I don't look like an adventurer. They think I would look more relaxed sitting behind a desk, reading and daydreaming.
That means they don't know me. I prefer seeing things for myself rather than reading them from books. That's why I'm so happy about this job with the Adventurer's Guild.
Speak up. I can't hear you over the alarm. Cluck!
Clearing my throat... Cock-a-doodle-doo!
The sun is up! Cock-a-doodle-doo!
Someone, please turn off that alarm clock. Cluck!
Ring, ring! Out of the way!
I go to sleep to the sound of ticking clocks.
I wake up to the sound of alarm clocks.

Hello, $MyPCName$!
Good to see you, $MyPCName$!

Let me tell you about new events!

That's my twin brother and fellow event guide. Come find us anytime you want to know about current events in Maple World. That's why we're here!
Hello, $MyPCName$!
What does it take to be happy every day?
How'd you like to take part in an exciting event?
Howdy, $MyPCName$! I'm $npcName:11001003[gender:0]$. Do you want to learn more about the events we're running today?
Who's the girl in the matching outfit?

You mean $npcName:11001002[gender:1]$? That's my twin sister. She's also a dang good event guide, if you don't mind my saying. Whenever you're curious about any events in Maple World, we're the folks to talk to!
I haven't seen any strangers here for a long time.
I'm glad I can see rainbows all day.
More people would live here if it weren't for the monsters.
Most people steer clear of this place because of the monsters.
Who are you?
What do you think is on the other side of the rainbow?
I could never get tired of eating corn.
Can anyone tell me of the world beyond the rainbow?

Wah! Geez!
What's this? Where are all the treasures I heard about?
Did I climb the wrong beanstalk? Where's the beanstalk with all the treasures at the top?
Are you also here because of that beanstalk rumor?
What do I do now?
Now I'll probably get fired before my first paycheck.
I'm doomed, doomed!
Do you think the pirates will pay their tab if I ask nicely?
Well, there goes the neighborhood.
They're so loud! I can't take it anymore!
It's those rascals again!
My realtor said that I'd only hear the sound of waves. I wouldn't have come here if I knew my neighbors would be so terrible.
Hello.
At least now I don't have to worry about getting old.
This wouldn't be a bad place to live if not for those monsters.
I'm sure you heard that time stopped here in Ludibrium. Now I don't have to worry about getting old, as long as I stay here.
Ah... N-nice to meet you...
Hello.
I'm going to save the world with the power of magic!
It's difficult to procure the right materials.
Each magic-user has their own spell. I haven't chosen mine yet. Alio olio! Hoi, hoi! Chacharachat! Which one sounds the best to you?
This place belongs to me now!
Wonderful! Beautiful!
I'm the king.
Ahem, excuse me. Do you know how expensive these clothes I'm wearing are?
What is it?
Hm...
Time is...
I can feel time being restored to order. This means there isn't much of it left for us to spend together.
Did the boss send you?
Where's he hiding?
What a pain...
I don't have time for chitchat. I'm on a very important mission right now.
One, two, three! There, a temporary portal for you!
Wh-what? You again?!
How did I get myself into this?
I never should've... Bah!

Ah...
Is he okay?
He'd better be.
It's not over until we catch $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
Sigh...
I've got no one but myself to blame...
I regret everything...
I can no longer use it, but...
Everything that happened to us is my fault. I shouldn't have dragged $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ into it... I was blinded by greed and... he died because of me.
How did $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ die?
What kind of deal did you make with $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$?

Well... It's all because of that blasted caravan attack. Just before $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ became a suspect, he wanted to go over our alibis. I went to our meeting spot in the $map:02000043$ to meet him.
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s assassins were waiting for us when I got there. They thought $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ and I were loose ends, so they were going to get rid of us.
I escaped, but it was too late for $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$. I never imagined things would go so wrong.
It wasn't a deal so much as extortion. I've been stealing money from Barrota for years. Basic stuff–a redirected delivery here, an extra fee there.
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ found out somehow. If I didn't work with him, he'd have exposed me to the public.
And what did he want?

He wanted the supplies for the big court gathering in $map:02000001$. I offered to pay him off, but he said he wasn't interested in money. That's when I realized he was up to something truly dangerous... but it didn't make a difference to me.

Of course, stealing imperial supplies is a tall order. I needed a man on the inside, and I got it in $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$. He had a reputation for being a straight shooter, but everyone has a price.
$npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s mother is sick. I told him I could get her the best medicine money can buy. Better, even. That did the trick.

I promised $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ that nobody would get hurt. It was a lie, of course, but desperate men will believe anything to ease their consciences. It wasn't hard to get the caravan route and schedule out of him.

I delivered the plans to $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ personally. Met him at $map:02000117$. Him and the lady in the red cloak... I knew then that I'd never be able to live with myself after what I'd done.
But it was all over... or so I thought. The court was canceled, an earthquake tore up the royal road... All I knew was that I wanted out.
And how did that go?
You know darn well how that went. Now $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ is gone and my life is ruined...
What seems to be the problem?
Sigh...
My legs are killing me...
Criminals are held here while waiting for sentencing. Once sentenced, they're sent to $map:02000124$.
Welcome.
Mm? What went wrong this time?
If I could turn back time...
You look healthy. I wish I could be as free as you.
I wasn't always like this. I had... an accident.
Ah well, no point in regrets. I just wish there was a way to turn back time.
Eh? You've brought the $item:30000320$! With $npcName:24000615$ gone and $item:30000320$ in hand, I can finally complete my research!
Please add the $item:30000320$ back to the alpha chrono-controller over there to reactivate it.
Eh? You've brought the $item:30000321$! With $npcName:24000615$ gone and $item:30000321$ in hand, I can finally complete my research!
Please add the $item:30000321$ back to the beta chrono-controller over there to reactivate it.

Please add the $item:30000322$ back to the delta chrono-controller over there to reactivate it.
Aaahh... No...
Aaahh... No...
The temporal cascade will destroy everything!
I was in $map:02000309$ looking for Director $npcName:11000843[gender:0]$, when $npcName:24000615$ captured me and dragged me all the way here.
There's no time to chat! We have to shut down the Chronometric Computer before our timeline collapses in a temporal cascade.
If that happens, there'll be no saving $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$.
Ugh...
What is going on?
What do I do?
$npcName:11000335[gender:0]$... Sigh... I don't know what to tell you about him...
This is bad, really bad!

We need a robot control system!
I'm the head of this robot development center, and even I don't know how to get these robots under control. What should I do to contain this problem?
Cough, cough... Please be careful.
Did I fail again?
Oh, no... I did.
Ugh... I've been holed up in here so long. My head is killing me.

M-my research... journal...
Ugh...
W-what's happening to me?
I-I need water...
Ugh, my throat hurts...
The wind is so cold.
Brr.
Ahh, it's freezing.
Maritime Leaguers are atmospheric, oceanic, and geologic specialists gathered to observe and collect information about the oceans and everything in it.
How did you find this place?
Sala, ashalakum.
This is ominous...
When I close my eyes and listen carefully, I can hear everything... Everything in the entire world.
This is an emergency. Whatever business you have, it can wait.
Everything's clear!
Ah, keep an eye out.
Real pros always know what to do, no matter how dire the situation is.
I'm the messenger of hopes and dreams! Why is this happening to me?
Brrr...
Ah... Ah... Achoo!
I like being a Santa. How could I not? I'm giving people joy!
What just passed by? It was shining.
Aww, I'm so busy!
Heh. This is easy.
Experience really is the best teacher. I've worked at this research center for so long that now I know scientific terms better than slang.
I'm sensing evil energy... The kind that can never be purged...
That ominous door is the source of that terrible energy.
Life is as meaningless as those tiny sparks wafting into the air.
Do you want me to read your fortune in the lava?

I came all the way here to clear my head and focus on my training. I don't know how so many people have heard about my lava-reading skill. I would send them away, but I respect their determination to come all the way out here.
This has been a perfect misjudgment.
The impossible remains impossible.
Whew, it's hot.
Everyone at Goldus Industries is a real smooth talker. They say they care about us workers, but if they did we wouldn't be having any problems, would we?
Yawn.
It's nice and warm today.
Why should I work?
Breathing is the most strenuous thing I want to do today.
Yawn.
I'm not going to lift a finger.
I refuse to work!
Nope, nope, nope. Not going to work!
Hey, you don't have to hit me. I'm coming.
Alright, alright! I'll do it! I said I'll do it!
Wah... I messed it up!
Ugh, my head!
Oh, no! What do I do?
No one can imagine how exciting time travel is without trying it.
My emotions got the best of me.
This is karma...
What do I do?
The greatest martial artists aren't always the strongest ones. They're the ones who are humble and always put other people first.
What is it?
I'd better deliver this pizza before it gets cold... Whew...
It's about time for him to call...
People say that sometimes dreams, do come true. I hope they're right.
What's your dream?
My dream isn't much. I just want to be a successful businessman. I may be delivering pizzas now, but I know I can make it big if I work hard enough.
Welcome.
No pizza can match Maggiore pizza. Chewy dough with simple toppings, just like Mom used to make!
Oh, no...
What do I do?
Oh, no. How could this happen?
I look older than $npcName:11001028[gender:0]$. Well, thanks, I guess.
$npcName:11001028[gender:0]$ looks young because he's bald, but he's the same age I am. Maybe I should shave my head, too.
Will we ever see light again?
There's nothing but darkness here.
How can we resolve this?
Everything in this world has light within it. I can see your light. It's warm.
Gasp! Did my wife send you?
How to catch a prize fish?
Ah, I'm bored.
No one understands the burning passion of this lonely man... Sigh...
Brrr...
I've got to find a way out of here.
I didn't know being a pirate could be so scary.
Shush! Keep your voice down! I can't give my position away.
Can I help you?
This mission is not going to be easy.
The ominous energy is everywhere.
I'd better find a clue as soon as possible...
Wah! You startled me.
Hello.
Where are all the children?
I miss the days when this place was bustling with people.
Waiting for the $map:02000184$ tour train? We're sorry, but it won't be operating for a while.
Welcome.
Welcome to $map:02000184$, where hopes and dreams can persist forever.
$map:02000184$ is filled with laughter.
Laugh, if you're happy. Laugh, even if you're angry.
Now, now. We should be laughing while we're here.
Hello.
It's tough to guard all of them by myself.
I'm glad their fans haven't arrived yet.
Did you come to enjoy Oil and Water's concert? Head up to the front of the stage if you did.
Hello.
Even the sound of alarms can be music to the ears.
I want to make natural sounds into natural music.
I like groupies, so long as they don't steal my things.
Nice to meet you.
The sun on my face feels so comforting today.
I have butterflies in my stomach, now that I'm about to perform.
Do you know how rewarding it is to see the seeds you've sown grow into beautiful flowers?
Are you sure you came to see me?
I hope no one will interrupt our show.
Someone in the audience should sing along... right?
The streets here look like a jungle.
Go away.
Everyone's so weak.
Don't underestimate me. You might regret it.
You're from the outside world, aren't you? What are you going to change here this time?
Toh! Toh! Toh!
I focus my energies low in my abdomen...
Meditation is an important aspect of martial arts.
I don't talk to those who do not practice martial arts.
Hello.
Ugh, I don't know why I do this every time...
Aww, my back...
Every single picture here is drawn by a child. Amazing, right?
Wah! You startled me.
Wow, those guys are scary.
I was told I have to turn off the computer here...
Ah, I came here on a tour...
Have you been to $map:02000051$?
I miss my big brother...
What brings you to me?
One day, I'm going to become as great a weaponsmith as my big brother!
A full moon... The Kakas... Aw, please help me. Hah hah, hah hah hah!
Ah hah hah, ah hah hah hah!
Argh! Hah hah! Aww...
D-don't come near me. No! I need a friend. No, no... L-let's start again... Ha!
I'm hungry.
This place is a paradise!
I smell something delicious.
How did I never know about this place?
I came here for brawling. Hoo, hoo, woo!
I'll show you what's hot!
Three teeth in a single punch! Woo hoo!
Ugh... I know this isn't a vacation, but it's just too hot!
The desert hides many secrets, and I'm going to uncover them all!
Shadow energy? How...?
There's something fishy about these ruins, but I'll get to the bottom of it.
You can feel it, too, can't you? There's something wrong here. You have sharp senses for a human.
What is this strange energy?
I wouldn't get too curious about it if I were you. In fact, keep your distance unless you have some good info for me. I don't have time to answer questions for ignoramuses.
Ah! A human!
How wonderful, how wonderful!
I was right! I knew it! I was right!
This is great! Yippee!
We're not supposed to talk to strangers without the captain's approval.
I'm not a stranger. I'm just a friend you haven't met.
I'm not falling for that. Shoo!
Cluck, cluck!
How may I help you?
Hm... Yet another challenge...
Hm hm, of course. I knew it!
If I had to pick my most popular invention, it would be NSD 3200. It's a device that dismantles equipment and extracts onyx from it.

People think the blacksmiths of the Nerman Forge came up with it, but I was brought in to design it for them. I was compensated for my services, of course, but if I knew it'd become so popular I would've asked for more royalties!
What is it?
Err? When did it break again?
Hm? This doesn't make sense.
Hey, hey! This place is dangerous. Get out of here! We don't need you fouling up any of the valves.
Hmm...
This place is $map:52000011$. It channels the power of the Red Lapenta to maintain order among the timelines.
What brings you to me?
Soon I'll be able to return home.
What's taking Lennon so long?
Thank goodness, he's much better now!
If $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ hadn't come to Katramus to save me, I could've been here with these people for treatment.
W-what?
Ugh... I'm still in pain...
I want to go home...
I'm not completely healed, but I'm in much better shape than I was when I first arrived. I should be able to go back to my family soon.
Mm... T-that's...
Whew... I think I can get up now.
Ooh, I can move!
Mom was right. She said anything can come true if I pray hard enough. I've prayed every day to be able to go back to her. Now I can!
How did you get here?
$npcName:11000614$, you're alive!
I'm so happy!
$npcName:11000614[gender:0]$ and I met in Katramus. I can't believe we were able to meet again here. I'm also glad that his sister is safe!
Hey! Good to see you again!
Hee hee, I'm never going to leave my brother again.
I'm not afraid of anything when I'm with my brother!
Mm? You're the one who saved me from $map:03009023$, aren't you?
Why are you still in the Land of Darkness?
That's... I want to stay with $npcName:11000614[gender:0]$. I never want to be separated from him again.
What's up?
I'm seeing lots of familiar faces today.
Even this place has good days sometimes.
I knew $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ didn't betray us!
Hmm...
The soul inside this orb... If it's left alone for too long, it'll be swallowed by the enormous darkness that is the Shadow World.
Do you know me?
I... I can't go back like this... No...
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
Would you be so kind as to help me?
Oh Valle, did you even eat?
Would she know how worried her mother is?
Valle, where have you been? Ah... I don't think I know you. I'm sorry, I haven't been myself lately. I thought you were my daughter when I heard your footsteps.
What brings you to this place?
Everything... All this is my fault...
This used to be such a beautiful garden... I was such a fool...
Did Mom send you to bring me home? I feel bad saying this, but I can't leave yet. Not until the garden is back to normal.
At last, I can finally stop the cause of the contamination!
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
Lucky, lucky, Lucky Wheel!
May Lady Luck smile upon you!
How exciting!
Did you come to join the event? I'm sorry, but you forgot the most important thing. To spin this $npcName:11001120$, you need a $item:30000406$. Luckily, they're easy to get!

You'll get a free cake in the mail every 20 minutes, just for having a good time in Maple World! You can receive up to 9 a day. If you get a hold of a $item:30000406$, be sure to swing by $map:02000064$!
Oh good, you have a $item:30000406$! You can use $itemPlural:30000406$ to spin this here $npcName:11001120$ next to me for a chance to win great prizes. Come on, why not try it?
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
What kind of item would you like today?
$MyPCName$, thank you for joining our 100-day celebration!
Whoa, it's been 100 days already!
Did you come to join the event? I'm sorry, but you forgot the most important thing. To spin this $npcName:11001120$, you need a $item:30000406$. Luckily, they're easy to get!

You'll get a free cake in the mail every 20 minutes, just for having a good time in Maple World! You can receive up to 9 a day. If you get a hold of a $item:30000406$, be sure to swing by $map:02000064:$!
Oh good, you have a $item:30000406$! You can use $itemPlural:30000406$ to spin this here $npcName:11001120$ next to me for a chance to win great prizes. Come on, why not try it?
What brings you?
Good. I can continue with my research, assuming you can collect ores for me at this pace.
What was the project I was going to start next?
Those on the cutting edge of technological research often complain about lack of funds, resources, and other material things. The only thing I lack is time... Say, how old do you think I am?
You look young-ish to me.
You look like an old geezer. 50-plus, at least.
Hmph! Flattery will get you nowhere with me. Or perhaps you need to see an eye doctor.
Close enough! There's so much I want to study, but I'm past my prime. If only there were more time...! Wait... That gives me an idea...
Do you have business with me?
Wow, I can see all of $map:2000270$ from here!
It's awesome being all the way up here!

Good day. My name is $npcName:11001122[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group that supports each other as we work to climb every wall we can find. If you have a passion for climbing, we're right there with you!
You look a little different from the other Wall Climbers.
Really? How so?
Are you sure you're a Wall Climber?
...Sheesh, can't you just let it go? If you're going to keep asking stupid questions, I don't want to talk to you.
What seems to be the problem?
I'm in a hurry. I've got packages to deliver.
Argh, I'm busy, so busy!
The scientists in $map:2000270$ are known for their constant innovation. They're the reason I lug these heavy, expensive components everywhere I go.
Did you come to see me?
What do I want to study this time?
Maybe I should refine my droids...
La, la, la, la! I'm going to make even more useful machines!
I've been studying artificial intelligence. Androids in particular. Do you think that my androids are capable of thinking like we do?
I don't see why not.
I don't think so.
Haha! I wasn't expecting a real answer. After all, it's a question I struggle with myself.
Hmm? You can't just say something like that and leave it at that! Then tell me, what do you think I should do to make my androids as smart as you and me?
Data isn't enough. They have to learn through experience.
Just cram them full of as much data as you can.
(Mumble inaudibly.)
Don't you think I tried that already? Well, thanks for your input in any case. As a professional in the field of android research, I'm sure I'll come up with a solution on my own.

Yes, I've thought much the same. Perhaps if I build a database based on what my androids learn from various stimuli, much as humans learn from their own experience. Thanks for your input, in any case.
What? Hmph. I really thought you had something of value to say on the topic. Next time someone asks for your opinion, you should just be honest with them.
Entering data...
Testing visual recognition range... No errors found.
Searching object recognition database... No errors found.
Running database query on $MyPCName$... Zero entries found in $map:2000270$ personnel list... Creating new entry.
What seems to be the problem?
There's got to be a machine that can make my life easier...
Building everything by hand is just crazy.
Running Environmental Improvement System...
Beep-beep. Collecting $map:2000270$ environmental change data...
Beep-beep. Entering air contamination increase values...
Running Security System...
Beep-beep. Running $map:2000270$ Security System...
Beep-beep. Synchronizing $map:2000270$ Sector B surveillance cameras...
What? What is it?
Sigh... Sometimes it feels like this work will never end.
Being busy is better than being bored, but this is crazy!
What? Can't you see I'm working? Leave me alone.
D-do you want some herbs?
Sh-shush! D-did you hear that?
I think I might be hallucinating...
W-what's with those weird noises? You hear them too, r-right?
I didn't hear anything.
What?! D-don't look at me like that... I'm not crazy!
It was probably just a small animal.
Y-you think so? You'll protect me if it's something scary though, right? Hngg... Now my heart is p-pounding.
Hmm? What do you want?
Expeditions are so exciting! I love my job.
Every expedition is a new challenge, but I like it that way.
Hah. Cold, are we? Maybe you should've worn thicker clothes.
I'm not c-c-cold.
Are you kidding? I'm freezing.
Bahaha. A real tough cookie, aren't you? I'm a professional explorer, and even I get a little cold at times like this. Maybe you belong in my line of work.
You look like seasoned adventurer. I'm sure you've seen worse weather than this. So suck it up! Bahaha.
Look inside the shed.
Do you have business with me?
Ugh. I can't believe I came all this way.
I wonder if the everyone made it out okay...
I'm trapped here! There are monsters everywhere. I knew this place was dangerous, but...
Then why did you come here?
I have my reasons.
Wh-what is it?
When can we get out of this place?
I'm cold... and hungry...
Wh-what is it?
Home... I want to go home...
I can't lost count of how many days I've been here...
Wh-what is it?
Why didn't I listen to my mother before it was too late?
I miss her so much...
Huh? Do you need something?
I'm scared that if I leave this place, I'll die.
Monsters! This is all because of those blasted monsters!
Have you seen any monsters outside?
This situation has been hard on everyone. I wish there was more I could do to help...
<font size="20">Don't lose hope, Neroa. You have to stay strong!</font>
As long as I don't give up hope, all this will be behind me one day... I really wish I could believe that...
I'm selling these fine leather jackets.
The rarer the hide, the more beautiful the work!
Hmm... Where can I find some customers around here?
Hey, I've seen you hunting monsters around here before, haven't I?
Yep!
Nope!
Haha! I could tell just by looking at you! A great adventurer, surely in need of Lavoy's fine leather goods!
I'm not interested.
Don't be silly, I know a famous adventurer when I see one! A great adventurer deserves a great outfit. How many leather jackets can I put you down for?
Sorry, not interested.
Hahaha! You say that now, but you'll find no finer leatherwork around. Return to me once you've changed your mind.
What brings you to $map:02000110$?
I believe in always being prepared.
Hm... Let's see what the safety handbook says...
There's nothing more important than safety. Wouldn't you agree?
I guess, sure.

I know, right? But nobody else seems to get it! I see people come to work without their hard hats or work boots every day. Your goal should be to earn a living without killing yourself in the process!
Hello.
If I weren't here, who else would take care of this property?
Land needs tending, just like a delicate flower.
Hello, and welcome to the Andrea Family estate. As its caretaker I would love to give you a tour, but I'm afraid I have some eggs to collect.
Uh. Hi.
I realize that this is no longer a good place to live, but...
I'm not leaving, even if all my friends do.
First the monsters start taking over the forest, and now my friends are all leaving in droves... Hmph. What do I care? I like being alone, anyway!
Hello!
I've never seen anything more impressive than these ruins.
Preserving them is my greatest priority!
Plenty of archaeologists would kill for the chance to see Ellin Ruins with their own eyes. Are you here to see the ruins yourself?
I'm not that interested in this old junk.
Oh yeah, I'm super into this stuff.
Not really. I was just wandering aimlessly.
Really? Not interested in all this history? Oh... Then maybe you've come to hunt monsters? Just look around, this place is teeming with them.
Really? You don't look like an archaeologist. Well, it's just nice to see someone interested in history. Stay as long as you like!
Ah! A classic case of wanderlust, have we? Well, regardless, please be careful not to damage the ruins... And also, try not to get horribly mauled by monsters.
Come closer! Yes, you my child.
The all-seeing eye sees all! I can tell you your destiny!
My readings are equally accurate from one day to the next!
To picture the future clearly, I must make myself one with nature. Focus your senses. The breeze carries with it the scent of flowers. The waterfall quietly roars.
For an accurate reading, I must focus my mind and keep disruptive thoughts at bay.
I'm confused...
Mom's candy is really tasty...
Mmm... Where did she she come up with the idea for $item:30000395$?
Mmm... Do you like candy?
No. I hate candy, because I am a monster.
Whaaaat? I'm sure you'd change your mind if you tried my Mom's $item:30000395$. It's awesome!
That's nice.
(He whines pitifully) Just try a piece! I promise you'll love it. My mom also bakes cakes and pies that are crazy good. She's like a witch!
Anyone can bake.
Not like my mom! When I grow up, I'm going to be a culinary wizard, and make snacks just as good as hers.
Read $npcName:11001146$.
$item:30000395$ Recipe 1. Squeeze $item:30000390$ from $npcNamePlural:21000031$ 2. Harvest $item:30000392$ from $npcNamePlural:21000009$
3. Acquire $itemPlural:30000391$ from the Hot Cocoa Springs 4. Pick $itemPlural:30000393$ from the red trees *Note: Use only locally sourced ingredients!
$item:30000395$ Recipe 1. Squeeze $item:30000390$ from $npcNamePlural:21000031$ 2. Harvest $item:30000392$ from $npcNamePlural:21000009$
3. Acquire $itemPlural:30000391$ from the Hot Cocoa Springs 4. Pick $itemPlural:30000393$ from the red trees *Note: Use only locally sourced ingredients!
(Read it again.)
(Read the back side.)
$item:30000395$ Recipe 1. Squeeze $item:30000390$ from $npcNamePlural:21000031$ 2. Harvest $item:30000392$ from $npcNamePlural:21000009$
3. Acquire $itemPlural:30000391$ from the Hot Cocoa Springs 4. Pick $itemPlural:30000393$ from the red trees *Note: Use only locally sourced ingredients!
(Read it again.)
(Read the back side.)

Cooking the $item:30000395$ 1. While stirring, gradually add the following ingredients to the $npcName:11001147$: 8 $itemPlural:30000390$, 10 $itemPlural:30000392$, 7 $itemPlural:30000391$, and 9 $itemPlural:30000393$
2. Cook over low heat for 5 minutes, stirring until uniform in consistency. 3. Pour and let harden *Note: $npcName:11001147$ is finicky. Remove cooked candy immediately.
$item:30000395$ Recipe 1. Squeeze $item:30000390$ from $npcNamePlural:21000031$ 2. Harvest $item:30000392$ from $npcNamePlural:21000009$
3. Acquire $itemPlural:30000391$ from the Hot Cocoa Springs 4. Pick $itemPlural:30000393$ from the red trees *Note: Use only locally sourced ingredients!
(Read it again.)
(Read the back side.)
Read $npcName:11001147$.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001145[gender:0]$ brought this $npcName:11001147$ from home without telling his mom.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001145[gender:0]$ brought this $npcName:11001147$ from home without telling his mom.)</font>

(Add the first ingredient.)
(Add 10 $itemPlural:30000390$.)

What? If it's not urgent, come back later.
I go wherever quality weapons are found.
I'm a collector—not a vendor!
See the fortress over there? It's got to be full of all kinds of amazing stuff worth collecting. Say, would you be interested in checking it out?
I don't think there's much of value left in that abandoned fortress.
I'm a little more worried about the monsters guarding it.
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font> Well I do! It's gotta be chock full of treasure. I can tell, just by the look of it. I guess we'll see which of us is right.
No kidding. Why do you think I haven't gone inside? I wish someone would take care of them for me...
I have to help my friends!
What should I do?
What $npcName:11001167[gender:0]$ said was true...
Agh... I have to find my friends.
Shh! Please, keep your voice down! That mage can't know I'm here!
Where in the world is he?
$npcName:11001166[gender:0]$ is always disappearing on me.
Where is that boy? He'd better not have gotten himself in trouble.
Have you seen my brother? He must be somewhere around here.
Wanna split a nice glass of milk?
I miss my mommy...
Where am I? Who am I?
Thank you for your help.
Whew, I can finally breathe easy.
Nothing to report, $male:sir,female:ma'am$.
I've got to stay vigilant. I'm on duty right now.
I haven't seen anyone suspicious so far.

I'm fairly new to the Green Hoods, but I've been stationed here long enough to get the lay of the land. If something happens in $map:02000057$, I'll be the first to know. But, ah, let me know if you see anything suspicious anyway.
How do you like being a member of the militia?
Well, I've learned a lot of things. Like how being a guard means learning how to think on your feet. I'm not so great at that now, but I try hard.
You rotten swine, I won't let you get away with this!
I've spent my whole life tending my farm, and those pigs managed to wreck it in a single night!
Argh! Those dastardly porkers wrecked my farm!
Do you know what it's like to see your life's work destroyed in a single day? Well I do! <b>I've lost my farm<b>! Gah! I'm so mad I can't even sleep at night.
What happened?

At first I saw them in the distance, like a tidal wave. Before I knew it, my farm was blanketed by a horde of pigs! They crashed through my farm, trampling everything, leaving only ruin! I couldn't believe my eyes...
Good day!
This place is peaceful. Too peaceful. I'm getting the itch to hit something.
I wonder how dangerous the monsters here are...
<font color="#ffd200">Yalario!</font> I love talking to new people and visiting new places. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Ah, an adventurer! Know of any famous monsters around here? I may be a merchant, but I'm just as interested in fighting monsters as selling things. Hahaha!
Yala-what-io?
That doesn't sound so great for business...
Where exactly are you from?
Oh! Forgive me. Sometimes I forget that I am in a foreign land. Where I come from, 'Yalario' is the term we use when meeting someone for the first time. It means "new friend".
Hahaha! Perhaps not. Truthfully, I am interested in both. Encountering new monsters inspires me to create new products! Mine is a dangerous business, ahahaha!
I've sailed around the globe doing battle with all kinds of monsters. You'll find I am as shrewd a warrior as a merchant!
You're not afraid of monsters?

Far, far across the sea. I haven't seen a single map here which includes my homeland. I have spent half my life sailing around the world, but I had never heard of this 'Wictoria Isslind' until I set foot upon it.
Not at all. The people here make a big deal about how dangerous monsters are. But compared to back home, they are as cuddly as teddy bears. I am still hopeful that I will find a worthy challenge.
Yalario! How may I help you? If merchandise is what you seek, please browse at your leisure.
Do you know anything about Cynodia ore?
Ah, I know of Cynodia ore. It is filled with mystical power and said to be able to bring balance to unstable magic.
Do you know where I can find Cynodia ore?

Hmm... I'm sorry, but they aren't something we carry. Come to think of it, $npcName:11001180[gender:1]$ or $npcName:11001181[gender:0]$ might know where to find some. Why don't you try speaking with them?
Ah, I should update my travel journal!
This place looks so different from home.
Now where did I put that journal?

Ah, a local! <font color="#ffd200">Yalario!</font> It always been my dream to explore strange new worlds, and seek out new life and new civilizations! Traveling this land has been an awesome experience.
...Ah, but I'm sure these sights seem so plain to you. Well, I hope I'll get to keep visiting new places and writing about them in my travel journal.
Yala-what-io?
I take it you like to travel?
Where exactly are you from?

New friend! This is how we greet strangers who we want to be our friends. $npcName:11001179[gender:0]$ shouted it out when we first arrived in $map:02000064$, so I guess it can also be used for villages. Well, at least it can be by our captain.
Of course! Setting foot in a new land, leaving proof of your journey... There's nothing more exciting! I bet everyone in the Allicari Merchant Society would agree.

I'm from a place far, far away! On the other side of the sea. To get there from here you have to go north... no wait, south... Err, east? We sort of stumbled upon this land by accident. My homeland is beautiful, although it's much different than here.
Ah, yalario! What can I do for you?
I'm looking for some $item:30000421$.
Ah, those. The smuggler called $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$ sells them, but I wouldn't do business with him if I were you.
Why do you say that?
He snuck onto our vessel because he did not want to pay a simple fare. No one who does such a thing could be considered trustworthy.
Where can I find $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$ now?
Captain $npcName:11001179[gender:0]$ kicked him off the ship. Last I saw, he was running off toward $map:03000014$.
Ugh...
Urgh... I don't believe it...
Ugh...
Ugh... Th-those jerks...
Ugh...
They're... too strong...
Ugh...
Ugh... I can't move...
Ugh...
Must protect... Wei Hong...
Ugh...
I-I can't believe... we were so easily beaten...
Betrayal is the quickest path to death.
Hmpf, you riffraff are no match for me.
You'll regret messing with me.
So what, they stole one of our trains? Quit whining. I haven't survived the criminal underworld this long by panicking every time someone came after me!
What brings you here?
Y-you're not going to tell Wei Hong, are you?
<font color="#909090"> (Sighs)</font> I can only imagine how I'd be punished on my return.
Trying to steal a Blackstar train? They've got to be crazy!
I wish I could cast my worries into the wind...
I've reached my breaking point...
I don't know if I can keep going like this...
I wish it would all just be over...
What's wrong?
It's been one disaster after another, and I'm just too tired to fight anymore. Money is ruining my life. If I could live without it, I would've quit already.

I got transferred to another department because of an argument with the head of the broadcasting station over my program. Journalism used to be about integrity! It was about telling the truth, not just covering what makes money! I just can't do it anymore.

I soldier on and cover what they tell me, acting like there's nothing wrong. But every day I die a little inside. Someone's got to stand up to them, I know that! But if I do, they'll just replace me with another yes-man...
Grah! Writer's block, my mortal enemy!
My mind is a complete blank...
I deserve better than this...
<font color="#909090"> (He sighs.)</font> Am I really qualified to be a TV writer...? Hey, you there! Can I ask you a question?
Do you think people should pursue jobs they want to do, or just ones they're good at?
I'm not sure... What do you think?
Why? Do you not like your job?
What I want to do, of course! I would give anything to be good at what I want to be doing...
That's not it. This has been my dream job for as long as I can remember. It's just... not the job I expected. <font color="#909090">(He sighs.)</font>
I wish I could find a story my colleague $npcName:11001191[gender:1]$ would be excited to cover.
Maybe if I just smile long enough, I'll actually feel happy!
I should get some sun. I'm sure that will make me feel better.
Hehehe! This is so much fun! <font color="#C66455" size="22">Pfft... Are you kidding me? This is awful.</font> No, no. Don't say that. <font color="#909090">(...Is she arguing with herself?)</font>
...?! Ahh! How long have you been standing there? You didn't hear what I said, did you?
Uhh... Were you just talking to yourself?
I didn't hear a thing.
W-what? I'm not crazy, you're crazy! <font color="#C66455" size="22">I didn't say anything, got it?</font> <font color="#909090">(After an awkward silence, Illuna sighs in resignation.)</font>
Hah... Hahaha! <font color="#C66455" size="22">Good, good.</font>
Sigh... I want to go home...
I should've stayed in the News department. Why did I ever move to the team for Educational programming?
I just want to go home...
This is no good. I can't get a good shot! What should I do?
What's wrong?

It's may be bright out here, but our cameras our set up inside that cave, where it's much darker. I doubt we can get any usable footage as it stands. I should've brought $npcName:11001193[gender:1]$, my supervisor...
This place is dry, hot, and unbearably loud. It is absolutely the worst.
<font color="#909090">(He makes an exaggerated show of coughing.)</font> Gah! I can't stand this smog!
My wise little owl Joanna, I miss you...
I must've been out of my mind when I agreed to come here. Hmm? And just who are you supposed to be? Wait, did my wise little owl send here?
Your what?
I'm talking about my beautiful muse! The brains behind our Educational programming, Joanna, of course. Whooo~ else?
But what was that with the owl thing?
Owls are smart. It's just a cute nickname, honey. Get over yourself.
Let's have a look at the requisition form... Are you kidding me? I'm not dealing with this right now.
Ugh... I hate remote shoots in places like this.
The Educational programming team is so demanding.
Mm.. What? Is there something you need?
Show me what you have to sell.
All right, have a looksie in my bag...

...Wait, what am I doing? I'm not some blasted shopkeep! I support the employees of the broadcasting station. Coffee, snacks, transportation, unsolicited advice. I get them whatever they need. I'm a key member of the team, so don't you forget it!
Please help me.
I'm impressed you've made it this far!
Help...
<font color="#909090">(Sniffs)</font> I want to go home...
Please... somebody help me... <font color="#909090">(Sobs)</font>
The bridge vanished as soon as I crossed, and now I'm stuck here!
Please... Let me make it out of this place...
Guys, help me... <font color="#909090">(Sobs)</font>
How can I help you?
Shalua le mashalua.
How may I help you?
Shalua le mashalua.
Please don't interrupt me while I am praying.
Shalua le mashalua.
Shalua le mashalua... I am conducting an important rite. Please be quiet.
What's the deal with this rite?
All around the world, there exist forces of darkness which threaten the peace. Few are brave enough to confront them. And so those who do are branded heroes.

$npcName:11001201$, having attained enlightenment and seen the truth of the world, wants to help such heroes through prayer. And so, she and her successor, $npcName:11001202$, have embarked on a holy pilgrimage.

It would be naïve to think that prayer will miraculously vanquish all of the evil in the world. But there is no denying the restorative power of prayer. Such is the purpose of their pilgrimage, to empower heroes to resist evil.
I've never heard of good Inakimos.

Sadly, your prejudice is not entirely unfounded. We too have heard many stories of evil Inakimos. But me, and the rest of $npcName:11001201$'s followers are not like them. Our people follow a different faith. We have walked a different path.
We understand why the rest of the world looks at us with some suspicion, but we want nothing more than to do good for the world, and to make up for the wrongs of other Inakimos.
That's great and all, but how does that help with the bad Inakimos?

We're deeply ashamed of our malevolent kin. We wish to stop their wrongdoing as badly as you. But ever since $npcName:11001201$ was exiled from their order for confronting Myuteka Rabo, they have treated us as enemies.

Besides, we cannot raise a hand against our own kind. We must help them to understand the error of their ways and guide them to righteous path. Even if it is a hopeless endeavor, we must at least try.
Exiled? What's the deal with Inakimo Karr?
$npcName:11001201$ was once the most trusted priest of Myuteka Rabo's cult. But he was not blind. He began to question Myuteka's evil ambitions, and was summarily exiled from Myuteka's order.

With a few loyal followers in tow, he set off upon a journey to learn about the world as it really was, and not as Myuteka preached. It was a perilous journey was perilous, but <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001201$</font> persisted. In the end, he found enlightenment wrote a<font color="#ffd200">new doctrine</font> entirely of his own.

$npcName:11001201$ was devastated to learn of the evil done in the name of Myuteka Rabo's faith. And thus began our pilgrimage. We may unable to confront our kin, but we hope by atoning for their sins to one day redeem ourselves in the eyes of the world.
Ugh...
Guys, are you all right?
Hang in there.
Now I just need to save $npcName:11001172[gender:1]$...
$MyPCName$, please help!
$MyPCName$, hang in there!
Ugh...
Time to play dead.
I'm not doing anything.
How much longer do I need to lay here...?
So sleepy...
Should I take a nap?
Ugh...
Aww...
I hate this...
$npcName:11001172[gender:1]$...
$npcName:11001170[gender:1]$, please don't cry...
$MyPCName$, $npcName:11001172[gender:1]$...
Ugh...
Mom...
S-sniff...
Sniff...
I'm scared...
I want to go home…
Ugh...
It hurts...
It was fun... Then it wasn't...
Help $npcName:11001171[gender:0]$!
Are you guys all right?
We have to stay calm.
Life is a cycle.
Everything begins from nature and returns to nature.
The cycle of life goes on and on.
There is a <font color="#ffd200">lifeforce</font> all around us. It's in the leaves and the breeze, the water, and the very earth we tread. I've always wondered from where life originates.
Any thoughts on the topic?
Well, I don't know about a direct source... But there is clearly a natural order to things. A cycle of life.
What do you mean?
Flowers, monsters, and people alike. Everything is born from nature, and returns to nature when its time is at an end. There is an endless cycle of life that keeps this world balanced.
Oh, you've brought me more $item:30000419$. Allow me to extract the $item:30000420$ that lies within. Give me a moment.
(Hand over the $item:30000419$.)
Primordial Nature, Mother of Earth, I beseech thee! Make me your conduit and return this tainted spirit to the source of all life! Aniriel zu spiritalis... Ritana vitalitas!
It worked! Here, this $item:30000420$ was inside it. I hope you'll use it for good.
Give me the $item:30000419$. I'm not sure if this will work, but it's worth a shot.
(Hand over the $item:30000419$.)
Primordial Nature, Mother of Earth, I beseech thee! Make me your conduit and return this tainted spirit to the source of all life! Aniriel zu spiritalis... Ritana vitalitas!
(You wait for Lileaf to finish chanting.)
It worked! Here, this $item:30000420$ was inside it. I hope you'll use it for good.
There's one weapon I'd love to create, but I don't have the right materials.
I could forge a weapon unlike anything this world has ever seen!
With the right materials, I can make anything.

My dream is to forge a weapon unlike anything the world has ever seen. Of course, the same could be said for any other Blacksmith on $map:2000203$. But none among them have the skill to create what I have in mind.
What makes you so confident in your craft?

The quality of any weapon is determined by the materials used for its creation. But having superior materials is not enough on its own. The true test of a blacksmith is knowing how to best make use of these materials.
I happen to have mastered my family's secret technique for creating weapons of the highest caliber. I can't help but be confident! However, without the right materials, all of that is moot.
What sort of materials do you need?
I intend to imbue the weapon with magical power, such that it will never grow dull, and grant strength to its wielder. Finding a material with those kinds of properties hasn't been easy...

I've tried all kinds of crystals and objects of power, but none of them could match up to the material that I envisioned in my mind's eye. Besides, those materials had a limit to their power. They didn't last long and they were pathetically weak.
Perhaps the material I seek doesn't even exist. But it must exist somewhere... Something that generates an endless supply of power...
What brings you here, $MyPCName$?
I want a sealed Balrog's weapon.
Any news about the weapon?

Right. You're the one who wanted to take one of $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s weapons and imbue it with his power. Give me a minute. If you have the spoils of your victory, I can imbue the weapon for you.
Take your time.
It's done. There you go.
It looks like your bag is full. Make some room, if you'd be so kind.
Well, this is awkward. You do know that you need 36 $itemPlural:30000420$ and 5 $itemPlural:30000421$, don't you? Come back when you have them.

I've asked around everywhere, but I haven't heard anything. I'll find a solution, though. It's just a matter of time. Say... do you happen to know a man named $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$? I hear he deals in $itemPlural:30000421$. You might ask him to see if he knows anything.
What brings you here, $MyPCName$?
I want a sealed Balrog's weapon.
Any news about the weapon?

It looks like your bag is full. Make some room, if you'd be so kind.
Well, this is awkward. You do know that you need 36 $itemPlural:30000420$ and 5 $itemPlural:30000421$, don't you? Come back when you have them.

I've asked around everywhere, but I haven't heard anything. I'll find a solution, though. It's just a matter of time. Say... do you happen to know a man named $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$? I hear he deals in $itemPlural:30000421$. You might ask him to see if he knows anything.
Guys, over here!
Cooking requires focus. Understand?
Ugh...
What?
What brings you here?
What is it?
We've got nothing but problems here.
Why have the Baaz shoveled this ordeal on my shoulders?
Acting Elder Blade... What a hassle.
This is all that old coot Arazaad's fault. He's giving me work to do from beyond the grave!
Was there bad blood between you and Arazard?

More like resentment. He was always bossing me around. "Practice your rune magic. Practice with your blade. Behave like a leader and set an example for the other Runeblades. Blah blah blah!" Even when $npcName:11001246[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ were there, the old man always singled me out.
Sounds like you were Arazaad's most trusted student.
W-what? No way. He was just a mean old man looking for an easy mark to pick on. Trust me, his favorite student was that jerk $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$, and boy did that one come back to bite him.
There can be no progress without sacrifice.
Even with the draft in effect, we still don't have enough soldiers.
Where in the world is $npc:11001233[gender:1]$?
$npc:11001231[gender:0]$, that rat! I'll make him pay!
$MyPCName$, if I'm not mistaken? You're that reckless student of $npc:11001244[gender:0]$'s I've heard so much about.
Where did you hear that?
You'll be hard-pressed to find a Runeblade within Terrun Calibre that hasn't heard of you. Though lately, your name has been cropping up more and more.
What do you mean by that?

You don't know? Your teacher, $npc:11001246[gender:0]$, is one of the Eight Blades, the most magnificent warriors in all of Terrun Calibre. Learning from him is an honor, yet your approach to your studies have been a bit... unconventional. It's no wonder why there are many Runeblades who are jealous and resentful of you.
Ugh...
Oh, no...
We couldn't have known there'd be traps...
Ugh... I was injured by a trap, and $npc:11001244[gender:0]$ ran on ahead on his own.
What happened?
We tracked $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ and his Jibricia followers here, but they had already filled the passage with traps. I'm worried $npcName:11001244[gender:0]$ might be in danger.
Have you seen anyone out of place?
Everyone's counting on me, I can't miss even the tiniest detail.
There's something suspicious about this place...

$npc:11001231[gender:0]$ hurt dozens of us when he escaped last night. We all knew we didn't stand a chance, but what else could we do? I'm in no shape to help bring him in, but at least I can keep a lookout.
How foolish, to fear change so much.
Blast it...
What a pain!
I have to stop him.
Help!
Hm...
I have a feeling something interesting is about to happen.
More customers? Heh heh heh...
Come, come, tell me what you need. You won't be leaving empty-handed, heh heh heh...
I bet you get lots of customers.
Why the creep—er, cheery smile?
I bet you have all kinds of weird stories.
Of course, of course! I do not know why they come here, but I do so enjoy watching them skitter here and there.
Don't worry your little soul about that. You'll learn soon enough... even if you don't want to.

Enough to spend all night in the telling, and then some! So, what would you like to hear? The tale of a young monster slayer and his buxom mage companion? The story of how I've kept my youthful looks? Or... something else?
Something else! Please, something else.
Ahhh, yes... I know just the tale for a squirmy adventurer like you. Listen close, dearie...
Legend has it that when the Shadow Seed takes root, a new son will be born unto the Demon King and darkness shall swallow the world. A lovely little tale, don't you think?
You and I have different definitions of 'lovely.'
Blind little child! Lovely is in the eye of the beholder.
Even when it is too dark to see, keep your eyes wide open. You'll find your way... eventually.
Okay. Sure. That makes sense.
What I am trying to say is that you shouldn't be here right now. I will send you to where you should be.
Please send me there again.
I've created a portal for you down there. It will take you to $map:52000076$. Next time, use the portal instead of bothering me, all right?
You've come here empty-handed. What are you talking about?
Do you not realize that you should be somewhere else?
Yes. Send me to $map:63000050$.
Heh heh heh... Off with you!
Why are you still empty-handed?
Come, come, tell me what you need. You won't be leaving empty-handed, heh heh heh...
I bet you get lots of customers.
Why the creep—er, cheery smile?
I bet you have all kinds of weird stories.
Of course, of course! I do not know why they come here, but I do so enjoy watching them skitter here and there.
Don't worry your little soul about that. You'll learn soon enough... even if you don't want to.

Enough to spend all night in the telling, and then some! So, what would you like to hear? The tale of a young monster slayer and his buxom mage companion? The story of how I've kept my youthful looks? Or... something else?
Something else! Please, something else.
Ahhh, yes... I know just the tale for a squirmy adventurer like you. Listen close, dearie...
Legend has it that when the Shadow Seed takes root, a new son will be born unto the Demon King and darkness shall swallow the world. A lovely little tale, don't you think?
You and I have different definitions of 'lovely.'
Blind little child! Lovely is in the eye of the beholder.
Bah! What do I do?
What's beyond the forest?
The grownups told me not to do it...
The grownups said not to leave the forest. But why not? What's out there? I gotta know!
You should listen to the grownups, kid.
But they never let me do anything fun! I bet there's all kinds of toys and games beyond the forest, and the grownups are keeping it all to themselves!
Yeah, that's not it.
Then maybe there's... there's just groves and groves of sweet fruit! There's got to be something out there! And I wanna see it!
How may I help you?
Shalua le mashalua.
Sigh...
I have to go to $map:2000350$...
Why is this darkness so persistent?
Agh... I'm so disappointed in myself! I can barely get anywhere in the $map:2000350$... and it's all because of those stupid $item:90000014$.
Why are you so eager to be here?
Because everything is... wrong! This spreading darkness is turning our world cold and evil. So many fairies have already fallen trying to stem the tide, and I have to do my part too!
You should leave this work to someone else.
What? You think I can't do it just 'cause I'm fairfolk? What makes you so special? Typical human arrogance!

The fairies have kept the darkness from touching Maple World since before you were in diapers. We never ask for anything in return, either. And what do we get for our troubles? The disdain of humans. Pah!
Ooh, how interesting!
What is this strange energy flow?
I think I can figure it out... Just need to...
Excuse me, but I'm a bit busy. Can you come back later?
What are you doing?
I'll leave you to it, then.
What am I doing...? <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001242[gender:0]$ stares at you blankly.)</font>
I doubt you could comprehend what I'm doing. My research extends far beyond the senses of ordinary people like you.
Good. For a moment there, I thought you were going to ask me some obvious questions. Now shoo! I have work to do!
Hmph. Unless you have something interesting to show me, just leave me alone.
I need a glimmering Balrog's weapon.
How goes your research on power wavelengths?
I'm a scientist, not a magician. I can't just whisk such things out of thin air. I don't suppose you actually brought me the materials?
As it happens, I did! So, can you make it?

<font color="#909090">(He grumbles under his breath and puts together your new weapon.)</font> Here you go. I only made it because you asked so nicely. If you want it polished up, I suggest you get it to a smith right away.
What's this? Your bag's full! Why are you wasting my time when you don't even have space for a new weapon?
I need raw materials for a job like this! Say, 30 $itemPlural:30000437$ or so. And don't forget the $item:30000432$ and $item:30000433$!
It's keeping me busy. Real busy. As in, "Don't bother me if you're just want to chat" busy. So, unless you've got something real exciting for me, I don't have time for chitchat.
Hmph. Unless you have something interesting to show me, just leave me alone.

I need raw materials for a job like this! Say, 30 $itemPlural:30000437$ or so. And don't forget the $item:30000424$ and $item:30000426$!
It's keeping me busy. Real busy. As in, "Don't bother me if you're just want to chat" busy. So, unless you've got something real exciting for me, I don't have time for chitchat.
Hmph. Unless you have something interesting to show me, just leave me alone.
I need a glimmering Balrog's weapon.
How goes your research on power wavelengths?
I'm a scientist, not a magician. I can't just whisk such things out of thin air. I don't suppose you actually brought me the materials?
As it happens, I did! So, can you make it?

They may be related to the dark powers I've been studying. I'll let you know when I need $itemPlural:30000437$ to study. In the meantime, don't throw them away, okay?
How disappointing! You can leave now. I'm busy, anyway.
