It's keeping me busy. Real busy. As in, "Don't bother me if you're just want to chat" busy. So, unless you've got something real exciting for me, I don't have time for chitchat.
What is it?
This is bad.
Hm...
Now that the draft is in place, we'd better hurry back to the fortress.
There's a lingering aura of runic magic... I must be close.
Something isn't right...
I sense... murderous intent...
$MyPCName$?! What are you doing here? You were a fool to come!
What is it?
Hmm?
We must find someone who can help us.
Tria is not a welcoming place.
Ah, $MyPCName$! What a pleasant surprise.
I have a few questions to ask.
Certainly. What would you like to know?
What can you tell me about Arazaad?
What can you tell me about $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
When can we go home?
Sigh... I'd rather not talk about him, but I suppose you need all the information you can get.
But I thought you and $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ were friends.

There was a time long ago that was true, but... well, you know Terrun Calibre's history. I supposed the rift that grew between us was inevitable. The Jibricia value rune magic above all, while the Pelgia prize swordsmanship. And rather than work in harmony, they fight like children.

From an early age, $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ had shown an incredible aptitude for the three elements. It wasn't long before the Jibricia took notice of him. Nor did it take long for him to climb to the top of the sect.
But how did you and $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ become friends?

He was Jibricia and I was Pelgia. And though our sects were bitterly opposed to one another, $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ and I recognized in each other a kindred spirit. Our elders forbade us from meeting, but that didn't dissuade us. We had such big plans. You know, we truly believe we could find a way to end the conflict.
We would stay up all night, just talking. He was a talented warrior and the strongest of the Eight Blades. Together, I was sure we could really accomplish all the things we used to discuss...
Even with the passage of time, I still had hope. I dreamed of building a new future for Terrun Calibre with him...
Of course, my dream was destroyed when he killed Arazaad. He crossed a line from which he could never return. And now, I can't help but wonder if there was some sign I could have missed...

Arazaad was an admirable man. Not only was he the leader of our sect, Pelgia, but as Elder Blade he was the leader of all Terrun Calibre. This was a source of conflict on both sides. All Arazaad wanted was peace. Though the fighting between the two sects began with the elders, in the end it was Arazaad who took the blame.

Some called Arazaad a hypocrite, but the man was nothing short of an inspiration. Even though $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ was among the leader of our rival sect, the Jibricia, he still looked up to Arazaad.
Of course, $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ was not Arazaad's most trusted student.
Let me guess, it was you.
Ha! So often did I wish that I were. No, Arazaad's prized student was $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$.
$npcName:11001230[gender:0]$? Really? I would have never guessed.

I can't blame you, he certainly doesn't act the part. Initially, Arazaad tried to keep $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ on a tight leash. But the more defiant $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ became, the more attention he got from Arazaad.
And now he's the acting Elder Blade of Terrun Calibre. In any case, I've said more than I should have. It wouldn't be right to discuss such things without him here to share his side of the story.
You miss Calibre Island already? Don't fret, I'm sure we'll be able to return... someday.
Why can't we go back now?

Simply reaching the island requires massive amounts of rune mana, and there isn't much to be found in a place like this. Our only hope of returning is in finding all the pieces of the Wisdom of the Baaz.
Hm? You're awake!
How did this happen?
How did so many turn against us?
Five of the Eight Blades have betrayed us. Are we sure we can trust the remaining three?
Who are the remaining three Blades?

If you can't remember that, maybe you're in worse shape than I thought... There's $npcName:11001246[gender:0]$, your teacher, $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$, the current leader of Terrun Calibre, and Vaharin, who's been missing for a pretty long while.
And the five turncoat Blades?

Well, there's my teacher and Arazaad's murderer, $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$, and his sworn brothers Zurile, Dalt, Kirisika, and Kahm. They're all in Jibricia and have very little love for the Pelgia sect.
Is their association with Jibricia a problem?

You really are your teacher's student, aren't you? While $npcName:11001246[gender:0]$ has always argued in favor of a strong, united Terrun Calibre, it's always seemed most Runeblades disagree with him, and this recent turn of events proves it.

The man that $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ killed was both the leader of the Pelgia sect and Terrun Calibre as a whole. While not all of the Jibricia have turned against us entirely turned against us, his actions have us teetering on the edge of civil war.
Nothing's going my way.
What is it?
Ugh...
Ugh...
Ugh...
Catch the traitors!
Ugh...
Ugh...
Ugh...
What is it?
I can't believe what $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ has done...
This may be the biggest challenge Terrun Calibre has ever faced.
I'm not sure $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ has the right, uhh, "temperament" for leadership.
High alert. Jeez...
It's time Pelgia dealt once and for all with the Jibricia threat.
$npc:11001246[gender:0]$ is our only hope!
Do you need something?
I still can't beleve any of the Eight Blades would betray their own...
There hasn't been a draft in almost a hundred years.
Arazaad had so many disciples, and not one of them could stop $npc:11001231[gender:0]$.
Wonder how they'll pick the new Eight Blades.
$npc:11001231[gender:0]$... I knew the Jibricia were behind this.
When all is said and done, $npc:11001230[gender:0]$ is our only hope!
Shush! You'll scare them off.
Strength will win a fight. Information will win a war.
What do you want to know?
Information is money.
What do you wa—I mean, welcome, valued customer! What kind of information can I help you with today?
What do you do here, exactly?

This $map:52000020$ exists to provide only the most reliable information handpicked by the hundreds and thousands of members of the Barrota Trading Company, Victoria Island's largest community of traveling merchants.
Okay, you've caught my attention.

Of course! Our information is divided into five classes for your convenience: S, A, B, C, and D. The class varies with the quality and price of the information. Class D information starts from 1,000 mesos, while Class S information is a steal at 50 million mesos.
Now, what kind of information do you want?
Class D please!
Class S! Only the best for me!
Oh, I was just browsing.
I'll come back later.
What're you, a cheapskate? Look, I don't got time for... I mean, sorry, but I don't have any appointments available!
I need to ask something else.
Absolutely! May I offer you a cup of tea? Or perhaps a moist towelette?
Actually, I just remembered I've got other things to do.
This isn't an art gallery! Is wasting my time entertaining to you?
I need to ask something else.
Which class of information would you like?
Class D please!
Class S! Only the best for me!
Oh, I was just browsing.
I'll come back later.
Wait! If you'd just give me a moment... Bah!
Yes, well, please come again! <font color="#909090">(He looks a bit crestfallen.)</font>
$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ has struck again...
I-I'm not... strong enough...
Have you come to see me?
Hm...
We've made little progress...
Though I deeply wish to pursue $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$, for now I will follow $npcName:11001246[gender:0]$'s advice and bide my time.
What advice is that?
He said I'd need another ten years' training to have a hope of defeating $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$. I can't put into words how much that stings, but deep down, I know he's right.
Can I help you with something, $MyPCName$?
I'm looking for something.
No.
If you've come to me, then you must have a problem that only I can assist you with. Speak.
Do you have a spare $item:40000022$?
You're here for the $item:40000022$? Please wait a moment.
(Wait several moments.)
Is this what you're looking for? It's what was written in that copy of the Wisdom of the Baaz you showed me.
That's right.
I know we wouldn't have found it without you, but please... don't lose this again. It contains valuable information regarding our legacy as Runeblades!
Sure.
Here, take it. You're lucky I transcribed an extra copy.
Can I help you with something, $MyPCName$?
I'm looking for something.
No.
If you've come to me, then you must have a problem that only I can assist you with. Speak.
Do you have a spare $item:40000024$?
Do you have a spare $item:40000022$?
You're here for the $item:40000024$? Please wait a moment.
(Wait several moments.)
Is this what you're looking for? It's what was written in that copy of the Wisdom of the Baaz you showed me.
That's right.
I know we wouldn't have found it without you, but please... don't lose this again. It contains valuable information regarding our legacy as Runeblades!
Sure.
Here, take it. You're lucky I transcribed an extra copy.

According to the documents we've restored, it's likely that the writings in this $item:40000024$ originated from the second volume of the Wisdom of the Baaz. If you want to complete it, you need that volume.
Can I help you with something, $MyPCName$?
I'm looking for something.
No.
If you've come to me, then you must have a problem that only I can assist you with. Speak.
Do you have a spare $item:40000023$?
Do you have a spare $item:40000024$?
Do you have a spare $item:40000022$?
You're here for the $item:40000023$? Please wait a moment.
(Wait several moments.)
Is this what you're looking for? It's what was written in that copy of the Wisdom of the Baaz you showed me.
That's right.
I know we wouldn't have found it without you, but please... don't lose this again. It contains valuable information regarding our legacy as Runeblades!
Sure.
Here, take it. You're lucky I transcribed an extra copy.

According to the documents we've restored, it's likely that the writings in this $item:40000023$ originated from the third volume of the Wisdom of the Baaz. If you want to complete it, you need that volume.
I do not believe you have room in your bag for this. Why not clear some space?
Hmm? Well, come back when you need my help.
What seems to be the problem?
Hm... Wait.
What seems to be the problem?
Barabung! Chochakka!
Big badaboom!
Dum duum! Dootilydoo!
Won't do it.
What won't you do?
No talk. Stranger danger.
I'm not a stranger. I'm $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$ stranger! No talk.
The air here is cleaner than in $map:2000270$.
Is there nothing we can do for Dr. Maccan's allergies?
Why do people keep asking me stupid questions?
Yes? What do you want?
I heard you're Maccan's assistant.
Yes. What of it? If you want to ask why I'm still working as Dr. $npcName:11001276[gender:0]$'s assistant, save your breath.
Why are you sti— Oh.
I knew it! Some people just can't open their mouths without letting a stupid question slip out.
Shush! You'll scare them off.
Let's see...
Where was that hole? Was it here?
Sorry, but now isn't a good time. As you can see, I'm busy.
What are you up to?
I'm collecting special materials. I'm a specialist in restoring old documents, antiques, and what have you. The secretions of the $npcNamePlural:21000074$ are important in my line of work.
The Baaz watch over us all.
For $npcName:11001265[gender:1]$...
The Baaz watch over us all.
I have some questions.
What would you like to ask?
How did Terrun Calibre get started?
Why are there sects in Terrun Calibre?
What are the Eight Blades?

Long ago, there lived two masters: a rune mage and a swordsman. Each was convinced that their art was the greater of the two, and so they had a duel. When they proved to be evenly matched, they decided to merge their martial arts and established Terrun Calibre to teach their new fighting style.
These were the first Runeblades, Jibritta and Pelgia. Together, they created a legacy of master warrior-mages.

They realized they could never reach true mastery of the new fighting style in their lifetime, so instead they focused on recruiting and training skilled warriors. Terrun Calibre continues that tradition to this day.
I have another question.
Every Runeblade knows the names of the first masters, Jibritta and Pelgia. But before these two founded Terrun Calibre, they already had martial arts schools of their own.

Not all of their students agreed with the vision of combining rune magic and swordsmanship. Even though these schools were united under Terrun Calibre, the original students of each tradition continued to bump heads.
Today, the Runeblades have embraced the combination of magic and martial skill, but these old factions remain—and so do the old loyalties.

The members of the Jibritta Sect believe in the superiority of a learned mind, and devote themselves to mastery of the elements. Those in the Pelgia Sect, on the other hand, value physical strength, and spend countless hours honing their bodies into a tool of blade and magic.
Each sect has its own leader. Before Arazard was killed, he was the leader of both the Pelgias Sect and Terrun Calibre as a whole, which was unheard of.
When $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ was the leader of the Jibritta Sect, the tension between the two factions reached a new height.
Which sect do the scouts belong to?
$npcName:11001265[gender:1]$ was one of the sixteen disciples of Arazard, which makes her a Pelgia. But most of the scouts under her are Jibritta.
But aren't the Jibritta the ones who started this mess?

No, attitudes like that did. $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ may have led the Jibritta Sect, but not all Jibritta agree with him. I'm a Jibritta myself, and I'd like nothing more than to see him brought to justice.
I have another question.
The eight greatest Runeblades of each generation are named the Eight Blades. They represent the strength of Terrun Calibre.
So, how strong are they?
I think you know the answer to that already. Your teacher is one of them.
$npc:11001246[gender:0]$ is probably one of the five strongest Runeblades of all time. And you'd better believe that $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ is just as strong.
So, who's the very strongest?

In terms of skill alone, it would have to be $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$. He's a genius and the best of this generation's Eight Blades. But he betrayed us, and so his genius has become Terrun Calibre's greatest shame.
I have another question.
Is there anything else you want to ask?
How did Terrun Calibre get started?
Why are there sects in Terrun Calibre?
What are the Eight Blades?
I need to be going.
May the Baaz guide you.
$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ has struck again...
About what just happened...
We can discuss it later.
I-I'm not... strong enough...
Ugh...
I'm not strong enough for this...
Gah! I failed to avenge Master Arazaad. Again!
You'll get your chance.
Just wait. Perhaps I'm not strong enough now, but I'll keep training. And someday, I'll rend $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ asunder!
Hm... Wait.
Now there's no choice left...
Hm... Wait.
$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$, what are you after?
I don't understand him... I really don't...
How may I help you?
The remains of their experiments are all around us.
They can't be good experiments...
You're $npcName:11001267[gender:0]$'s student, aren't you? So the rumors were wrong...
Rumors? What rumors?
W-well... No, I shouldn't. I don't want to upset you.
Don't tell me and see how upset I get!
Fair enough. They say $npcName:11001267[gender:0]$ has one critical weakness: his student.
They say his student is stubborn, arrogant, and too reckless to be trusted with any important task.
Well, I don't care what they say!
Good. You shouldn't. You're definitely a worthy student to a man of his stature.
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
Cooking requires focus. Understand?
Order now or get a face full of burning oil. Your choice.
Cooking requires focus. Understand?
Sigh... I should have left well enough alone...
Erm... What do I do?
Wh-what do I do in this situation...?
I shouldn't have done that...
Ugh... He's the champ for a reason...
If he'd gone all-out...
What happened to you?

Vasara Chen happened... He's the champion of the underground fighting circuit, and the son of Wei Hong. You know, the mob boss of Blackstar? He promised... promised that if I beat him, Blackstar would leave me alone...
Soooooooo... the results?

It ended with my utter defeat, as you can see. He said he had fun and that the Blackstars wouldn't bother me if I stayed down. Well, all it took was a single punch and I was done. I don't deserve to be the champion of Ludari Arena.
Ugh...
Ugh...
I can't stand this...
Th-this...
This doesn't add up... Ugh...
I'll get to the bottom of this...
If nobody stands up to injustice, then we all suffer.
Just because others turn a blind eye, that doesn't mean that we should. If something is wrong, then we must work to make it right.
Otherwise, it all becomes a vicious cycle. People like us need to act or nothing will ever change.
What?
How may I help you?
Remember what the empress told you!
How may I help you?
The evil is growing...
I will lay down my life for the empress!
I command the Royal Knights of Empress $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$. Her safety is our duty.
$MyPCName$, what brings you to me?
Were it not for the lumarigons, we would not have defeated the Demon King. We must go to Drachenheim's aid.
$MyPCName$, what brings you to me?
$MyPCName$, please don't disappoint me. I know it's difficult, but keep up your efforts to save our world.
How may I help you look your best?
The empress has great faith in you, $MyPCName$. Do not disappoint her.
How may I help you?
I haven't been in $map:02000001$ for a long, long time. The air is... dustier than I remember.
$MyPCName$, what is it?
No wonder the empress was in such a hurry to see me. It's always something...
Are you here for my father?
D-dad...
This is harder on dad than it is on me...
I can get through this...
Dad's a thoughtful and affection man, if you get to know him.
There's more to him than he lets on. <font color="#909090">(There are tears in her eyes.)</font>
Are you okay?
I'll be okay...
What is it?
Hello!
All right. Let's take a look.
Is there anything good...?
Do you need something?
If I don't have it, then it probably doesn't exist. I'm also interested in buying rare and unusual pieces.
Take a look! I'm sure something will catch your fancy.
Ugh, my head...
Just one day without trouble. That's all I want.
Hoodlums... Robbers... Pickpockets...
I'm too busy to think!
I've got more cases on my plate than I could ever solve in a single lifetime.
Sure, I'm happy that $map:02010002$ is growing. But does the crime have to grow with it? Our prison is bursting at the seams!
This isn't police work. It's war! But somebody's got to protect the city, right?
How may I help you?
Glory to the empress!
All's well, $male:sir,female:ma'am$!
Never let your guard down!
I've never been this far from home before. I miss my family...
My friends envied me for getting to go on this trip. I was excited, too. But the day before I left, I was already feeling homesick.
You're amazing, you know that? You've been far from home even longer than I have, and it doesn't show. I've got to work to be as strong as you someday!
Glory to the empress!
All's well, $male:sir,female:ma'am$!
Never let your guard down!
No matter how long these missions get, the guard is impervious to fatigue! <font color="#909090">(There are deep bags under his eyes.)</font>
Okay, I admit, I'm a tiny bit tired. I just haven't gotten used to my new quarters. I miss... Well, I have my reasons for being tired, okay?
Such as...?
Please don't ask. I... I don't want to get into it.
What is it?
It's a wonderful day!
Being here by myself is weird.
I wonder what my teammates are up to now...
Yeah? You never see a meerkat before?
I don't know what you want, but I'm not telling you anything unless you speak, first!
Why does it matter who goes first?
It's one of the rules of Meerkat Patrol. So there!
I've answered plenty of your questions already.
Tsk, tsk. Hmph!
Complaints, complaints, complaints. Always complaints!
Impetuous rascals!
I'm sick of the constant questions! Even if I told them the answers, they wouldn't remember them, the dopes!
It sounds like you don't actually know the answers.
Why you! It'll take more than that to shake their faith in me. Do I look like an easy mark to you?
No.
Maybe you don't know how this works, but you're supposed to trade intel with me, not question my credibility. Well, forget you!
It's a beautiful day, isn't it?
I! Am! Happy!
I love gramps.
I love the village!
People are always asking me if I'm okay living with my gramps. Well, I am!
I don't care if you think he's a screaming old fart. If you ask me, he's a great man!
Your grandpa isn't popular, is he?
They're just jealous of how great he is! Gramps talks loud so people can hear him clearly. Isn't that nice?
What brings you to this place?
Please protect us...
Please save them...
Destiny, hear us...
I cannot see you, but I know you by voice, scent, and soul.
Your soul is pure. Maybe you can do it...
May you be blessed with good vibes.
<font color="#909090">(She's already dead.)</font>
Do you need help?
Where is he?
Our patience will be rewarded...
In times like this, we need faith...
The greatest threat is the one we do not see. We need divine guidance to find our path.
We humans are weak and hopeless, but we have a will that is stronger than steel.
The divine recognizes this and guides our hand. Remember that, and you will never know fear.
Do you need help?
<font color="#909090">(The animal moves around $npcName:11001320[gender:0]$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The animal moves around $npcName:11001322[gender:0]$.)</font>

I'll make you pay!
I'll teach you a lesson!
Just keep walking. I don't have time for wimps like you!
What seems to be the problem?
Urg... My head...
Boong boong, shong shong! Away!
Yesterday, 2895 guests passed on their way to $map:02010002$. Today, you are the 3527th guest.
Ah... Why can't I simply forget my useless memories? Being able to remember everything is a curse!
It's getting late already.
I'm full!
How much longer must we wait?
Argh! Just deliver me...
She's been shopping all day. You'd think all that running around would be decent exercise...
Oww...
Oww... What do I do?
It took me months to decide on these.
One moment, I'm shopping on cloud nine. The next moment... I don't know if I ever want to go shopping again!
Ugh...
You scoundrels!
Take this!
Those knuckleheads! Why do they have to fight in here? They'll scare away the customers!
Sigh... May I help you?
Argh! Why are you doing this?
Grr... You're so stubborn!
Judith is usually a good girl, but she can throw a tantrum like nobody's business. All because I refused to buy her a can of her favorite drink...
Sigh... May I help you?
Wuuuuuh...
Nuh-uh! Nuh-uh!
Oh, wait...
How could I forget...?
Ugh! I don't want to go back.
I forgot to return the board I rented and road it all the way home. I don't want to go all the way back to the rental place... Maybe I should just buy one for myself.
Someday we'll have a customer who returns their board...
Uh... What happened to the other half?
Would it kill our customers to return their boards on time?
Back in my day, we'd explore the whole world on our skateboards. I even shredded over the hot desert sands... Ah, those were good times.
You have something to say to me?
I better take a break.
Will I ever pull off a kickflip?
You here to talk, or you here to skate? Heh... Good luck.
And what business do you have with a pro skater like me, hm?
Nothing like skateboarding to take your mind off things.
Only a true skateboarder understands the thrill of skateboarding!
Hey, you want to take some pro skateboarding lessons? I teach... for a small fee.
Skateboarding is harder than it looks.
Argh! Why can't I do any tricks yet?
Do I have to practice?
Why is this so hard?! I can visualize myself doing these tricks, so why can't I actually do them?!
Delicious food here! Get your delicious food!
Juicy chicken skewers with sweet-and-spicy sauce!
Sweet honey buns, get your sweet honey buns here!
Steamy pork buns! Taste the delicious pork!
All my food is made with 100% love, guaranteed. You'll like 'em so much, you won't even notice if someone drops dead right next to you! They'll change your whole outlook on life!
How may I help you?
Hm... This is more serious than I thought.
I can't do this alone!
Where are all these bugs coming from? They'll take over the skate park at this rate. Then Ludari City... and then, the world!
Sigh... This is getting tiring...
They're out of control!
I'm tired...
You can't swat a bug in the water, but you can still spray it.
I'm busy! Get to the point.
Argh! What?
Hurry! Hurry!
Sigh... I can't ever let my guard down at work. Accidents happen all the time, you know.
How old are you?
Ahem! Why do you care? I'm old enough, thank you very much.
What seems to be the problem?
I have to catch this rat!
Where is he?!
The impossible happened. Some prisoners escaped! No one has ever escaped from Alikar before! If I don't catch them, I'm through as an officer!
What brings you here?
Who's this?
Don't talk to me.
Can I help you?
It's just... too hot...
Is the air conditioner even on?
I came here to expand my business, but my partner is being completely impossible. And on top of that, the weather's too hot here and the people are too stubborn. What a terrible day...
What can I do for you?
The desert... is too hot...
My eyes have dried up.
Why would Mademoiselle Rue want to go into business with Cathy Catalina? They're polar opposites of each other. There's no way this partnership will last!
Good. Right. Perfect!
Mm-hmm. Paradise on earth!
Fan faster. Faster!
Yeeees? It's rude to barge in on someone's summer home, you know. Please remove yourself from the premises.
Sigh...
Hoo-haa! Hoo-haa!
M-my arms...
What brings you here?
This place isn't too bad.
Hm. Been too long since I really took some me time. This joint doesn't seem so bad.
Heh. This place isn't as big a dump as I thought it'd be.
State your business!
This place ain't too hot... Er, you know what I mean.
The food's bad and the music's worse.
I'm bored. May as well get out and see the sights...
Who's this?
Buncha hayseeds out here in the desert... Can't say I mind it.
Heck, it beats Kerning City.
Time to let off some steam.
Ah! A human!
Oh! It's real!
I knew it! I knew it!
This is great! Yahoo!
We're not supposed to talk to strangers without the captain's approval.
I'm not a stranger. I'm just a friend you haven't met.
Beat it! I'm not gonna get in trouble again!
What's wrong?
<font color="#909090">(This is the door to Bistro Startz.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001317[gender:1]$ must have left this note.)</font>
Mph! Out of my way!
Mph! Out of my way!
Mph! Out of my way!
No one toys with my people and gets away with it.
I like it when everyone's gathered like this.
My restaurant suffered while I was taking care of my guys...
Will Mika ever learn to take care of herself?
You saved us all, but I'm not going to thank you twice.
Maybe I'll treat you to a meal.
It's been too long since we gathered like this.
You can return the necklace... later, and in person!
All of us here, together... It reminds me of the old days.
Okay, I admit it. You're a good person. I can't always be right, you know. Anyway, thank you for the help.
Sigh... I'm so glad that everyone's safe.
I hope the Blackstars leave me alone this time... I don't want a rematch with Vasara Chen...
How may I help you?
<font color="#909090">(It's a bronze slab.)</font>
What is it?
How may I help you?
Toot-toot! It's time for the train to arrive!
Hm. Did it break down?
Please check the schedule on the monorail platform.
What seems to be the problem?
What seems to be the problem?
Wah! You startled me!
Sigh...
It wasn't easy to find time for this trip.
Sigh... I haven't been back home since I moved to Minar with my husband. I was so looking forward to this trip, and now the train has broken down...
Hm...
This isn't good.
It's so loud and... dirty here.
I don't care why this place is in shambles. I care that these noisy hooligans are preventing me from doing my job!
Wah! You startled me!
A good salesman can sell sand in a desert!
What to do, what to do...
Welcome! L-look, just ignore them and keep your eyes on me, okay? Eheheh...
Eager to get out of here? Try the latest model sports car from Tuning Motors. Just start the engine and leave this dump in the dust!
You called?
This is my shot!
This is it! My big break!

Mwahaha! This scene is... perfect! The height of drama, eclipsing any movie or show I've ever seen! And I'm the guy who gets to film it. This is probably going to be the greatest film of my entire career!
Hm...
No... This can't be...
Something's going on here...
What, you think a woman can't be a fight manager? Just watch. I'm going to turn Boh and every other one of my clients into world champions.
Ugh... Who's there?
Heh heh...
I'm... dizzy...
My head is spinning like a top... Or is it the world that's spinning? I feel like... I'm gonna die...
You called?
What is going on here?!
Where did they come from?
Where in the world did they come from? Of course they chose today to cause a mess. When the dust clears, it'll be us security guards who take the fall for this.
Mm? What?
Argh! The match was almost over!
What's this?
Who are these guys? Get them out of here! The match would already be over by now if they didn't ruin everything!
Hm? What brings you here?
Hm... Something's missing.
What am I missing here...?
I'm thinking up ways to bring prosperity to $map:02010036$. If you want to chat, talk to someone else.
What brings you here?
This place could be a good investment...
A little TLC, and it'll flip for a profit.
If you're thinking of investing in $map:02010036$, you're too late... friend. I was here first.
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
Are you here to see me?
$map:02010063$ has potential.
Just need to make sure everything goes according to plan...
If the development project is a success, it'll bring wealth and fame to $map:02010063$.
I'm tired. Really tired!
My head hurts and my shoulders ache...
And... so do my knees...
And my ankles...
I've been getting terrible joint pain lately. Normally that'd mean there's a storm brewing, but it doesn't rain here. Very strange.
There's a rumor that all the ailments that have struck the town lately are from an ancient curse.
What kind of curse?
Never mind. I shouldn't have mentioned it to an outsider in the first place. If you'll excuse me, I need to gather herbs for my arthritis.
This village is good! You just got to look real close to see it.
What shall I cook today?
I could make some soup.
Haven't found any good meat in a while...
Beautiful day, isn't it? On days like this, I love to pack a lunch and go on a picnic.
Do you like rainbow trout soup? I cook it with my own blend of spices. Everyone says it's the best soup in town.
I'll be the judge of that!
Ha! All right. Come over to my house sometime, and I'll cook it for you!

Ah, $MyPCName$. I've got some good news for you. A little while back, $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ came to see me along with $npcName:11001443[gender:0]$. He asked me to gather the villagers, and then told us about what he'd learned about the people suffering in $map:02010005$. He even brought some materials for us to examine.

I couldn't understand all the words he used, but I knew what he was trying to say. What they're suffering from is neither a curse nor a disease. $MyPCName$, you were able to come and go without getting sick. So did $npcName:11001443[gender:0]$ and myself. We're the proof of his findings.
We decided the affected people shouldn't be left in that old hut, though the decision was not agreed to by all. We've moved them to some of our own houses, as well as the doctor's place.
Where are $npcName:11001391[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$?
Ha, don't worry. They're in my house. They're not in the best shape, though. So skinny... must have been tough on them. But with some good food and good sleep, they'll be as good as new in no time.
That's very kind of you.

Oh, not at all. If anyone's generous here it's you, $MyPCName$. You went out on a limb to help people that you really didn't know. Being so compassionate and talented, you're bound to be successful in whatever you do.
Why's he so worried all the time?
Enjoy life!
What I wouldn't give for a rain... of mesos!
$npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ doesn't care about money. Fool.
I have this friend named $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$. She has a house, but she practically lives out in the desert...
She had a chance to get a good job in $map:02010002$, but she let it slip through her fingers. She could've been enjoying the finer things in life by now...
She's always talking about ruins and secrets. Why does she let such silly nonsense weigh her down? She tried to tell me about it, but honestly, it's so boring I forgot it already...
Sigh...
She's gone, again.
I hope she at least remembers to feed herself.
My daughter, $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$, is always lost in thought. What could keep her so preoccupied all day long?
Tell me about her.
She used to be such a clever girl. Even the people in $map:02010002$ heard about her genius.
But instead of going out and making something of herself, she came back to this small town. I'm happy to have her here, but I can't help but feel that she's wasting her talent...
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$, are you okay?
Ugh... My skin is burning...
But I have to ignore it...
I have to protect $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$...
Our parents didn't want us, so why do you care?
They left us. Said we were cursed. I don't want to talk about it.
It's my job to keep $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$ safe now. She's all the family I've got.
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$! I'm sorry! Please... Please, say something!
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$, I'm so glad! Sniff...
Brother, you look out of it.
I think brother is sick. He tries to keep me safe, but he's...
Where are your parents?
I don't know where mom and dad are. Brother knows, but he won't tell me.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001392[gender:1]$ opens and closes her mouth slowly, a blank look in her eyes.)</font>
Thank you, $MyPCName$.
Sigh...
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What's wrong?
Am I missing something?
I'll figure it out. I'm sure I will.
The ruins... These diseases... They all broke out around... No, the timeline doesn't fit.
What are you mumbling about?
Ah, yes? Can I help you?
You look like you've got a lot on your mind.
Yes, you're right. I'm trying to figure some things out. And you're interrupting me.
Oops! I didn't mean to.
Good.
This is all my fault...
I won't be so arrogant or impatient ever again. I'll try to be careful from now on. Thank you for your help, $MyPCName$.
What brings you here?
Hm... This place is quiet, just as I thought.
Is there nothing more thrilling than the search for knowledge?
I like quiet places. Real quiet places.
Why's that?
I've got my reasons.
Such as...?
I like quiet places because then I don't have to deal with nosy people like you. But I guess it's time for me to look for a new quiet place.
Hm? Who are you?
$npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ wants this slab translated.
Oh, yes, I remember her. Clever girl. It didn't even occur to her that I might not be able to translate this.
You can't do it?
I didn't say that! Child's play, mere child's play. Now be quiet while I work...
Yes... Mm-hmm... Now, that is interesting.
What is?!
Be quiet, you! Your jabbering is distracting.
(Make an exaggerated lip-zipping motion.)
Yes, I see. This will be quite helpful... I've got something for you. Wait just a while longer.
(Wait several moments.)
If I do this, then... Is the formula off? Then I should try this, and...
It is done! I don't know who made this slab, but it contained the answer to a new formula I've been trying to perfect.
This record describes a method for stimulating the nerves and triggering a transformation in the body. I reverse-engineered the method to create a restorative tincture!
Yes, and?
So impertinent! I was just getting to the good part. In short...
I've created a potion that can alleviate the ailments that $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ told me about. Note that I am being most humble here. When I say alleviate, I mean completely cure.
Thank you.
Take this to $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$. And tell her she's welcome.
I don't think you have enough space in your bag. Lighten your load first.
Is there anything else you need?
No.
Good, good. You may leave.
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
I can see so far with my telescope!
Say... Where'd my teammates go?
After that red sandstorm, a weird ruin popped out from the dunes. I can't wait to see what kind of secrets it holds!
What brings you here? C'mon, let's hear it!
Sigh... Why did I even come here?
Is it time to change professions...?
A high salary is good, but there are other important factors when choosing a job. Comfort, for instance. And safety... I've made a terrible mistake...
What's wrong?
Where do I begin?! How about the fact that I can't get out of this death trap!
Th-this is too high up...
I hate heights...
I want down. Now!
I need to climb down sooner or later, but I'm worried that they are still down there.
Who's they?
Those robots! They were supposed to help us develop the desert, but they all went crazy!
What brings you here?
Wah! You startled me!
Another beautiful day!
Maybe I'll throw another barbecue party tonight.
Uh-oh. Sandstorm!
You've been on the road a long time. I can tell. Come in and have a glass of water. It's on the house!
Sigh...
He must be waiting for me...
Madares...
I have to go back...
P-please don't talk to me. I d-don't know anything!
You've got guts, walking around a place like this.
We're the cream of the crop!
The three of us make an amazing team!
We're the best!
Go away! We're on a mission!!
You're awfully excited for someone on a mission.
We aren't playing, if that's what you're trying to say! We don't get to play all day like you! We're on a very, very important training mission!!
Meh heh heh...
Prr!
Mee hee hee!
What's with the quiet act?
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001407[gender:0]$ stares at you without saying a word.)</font>
Welcome to our territory, human.
For the Meerkat Patrol!
We are as one!
Meerkats are strong!
We don't usually let our clients in here. Seeing us train and tend to our wounded makes them realize that we, too, are mortal. It's bad for the brand, see?
We like humans, of course, but we know better than to count them as friends. We once relied on our humans for happiness. That... didn't end well for us.
Anyway, now that you've seen our base, you have to promise never to tell anyone about it. Only you and your closest friends are welcome here.
No exceptions. Not even for humans!
One, two! One, two!
Strong body! Pree!
Strong mind! Pree pree!
You want to be strong, like the Meerkat Patrol? Then join our training!
That sounds adorable. Sign me up!
Don't underestimate us. If you cry and give up halfway through, you'll never live it down!
I can handle anything you throw at me!
Heh... I'll see to it that you run away with your tail between your legs!
You came to gawk at the Meerkat Patrols?
We've got 53 jobs today!
Team 235, go!
Team 24, stand by!
We all trust and rely on each other in the Meerkat Patrol. You could say we're a big happy family.
What's the secret to your camaraderie?
It's all thanks to our hardworking captain. We all look up to good old Captain $npcName:11001408[gender:0]$!
Since you're here, you should say hi to him. I bet he'll have some good advice for you.
What are you looking for?
So... much... pain...
Ugh... This pain...
It hurts so much...
I feel weak...
C-can't... talk... Too... busy... pain...
Where does it hurt?
Leave me alone... you dummy... I need to rest...
Hey, I'm just trying to help!
G-go away... I don't want... your help...
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
Shoo! You'll mess up my training!
Shoo! You'll mess up my training!
Shoo! You'll mess up my training!
I must train hard!
I must train hard!
I must train hard!
I must train hard!
I must train hard!
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
Many things shine, not all of them valuable.
I want to save you.
Maybe you've tamed me...
I can tell I'm becoming more sensitive.
It's so close, but I can't reach it. It comes to me in the night and vanishes at dawn.
The more I lean into the sunlight, the more I hide in the moonlight. But then, it all drifts apart. I can't continue this way...
What on earth are you talking about?
Huh...? Shoo! You wouldn't understand.
Hello.
Did you miss your best friend?
How are you doing?
The desert is always the same—beautiful and desolate. $MyPCName$, how have you been?
I came running all this way to see you.
Things have been nice and quiet without you to bother me.
Ha... I see. I thought I saw a bright light coming from afar... It lifted my spirits.
Do you miss me?
Are you feeling all right? When I mentioned a bright light from afar, I meant the moon. The moon! Not you.
I'll be sure to visit more often.
Sure, you do that. Who knows? Maybe next time I'll even be waiting for you. <font color="#909090">(In spite of his cool words, there's a warm smile on his lips.)</font>
How nice for you. Leave in peace, then. <font color="#909090">(He sighs and looks away.)</font>
My friend? Who?
Have you forgotten our friendship?
Are you feeling okay?
Ah, of course I remember! You and I are friends now. It was just a little joke.
Keep these jokes up, and I'll stop visiting.
I feel fine. Thank you for your concern, but... I was just playing a little joke on you. Maybe you're too naive for such play...
Keep these jokes up, and I'll stop visiting.
I thought this was what friends do! Now you're making me confused. If visiting me is such a bother, then you don't have to do it, you know.
I'll visit you again soon.
Sigh...
Hmm...
Strange...
I heard you talk!
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ tilts his head.)</font>
Maybe I'm hearing things...
...Heh. <font color="#909090">(Did $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ just giggle...?)</font>
What brings you here?
Is this your first time in the desert? It's beautiful...
I should look a little longer...
So many monsters...
What do I do now?
When we first came to the desert from the city, I was stunned by the beauty.
You don't miss the city?
I miss my old friends, but there's something about the desert sands under a full moon. It's terrifyingly dangerous... but undeniably beautiful.
Dangerous? How?
The sandstorms. If you aren't careful, they'll come and sweep away your loved ones.
The others say I was just dreaming, but I know it was real. One day, I'll meet them.
They have to be around here somewhere.
Holy creatures... Secretive creatures...
I must know more about them!
I know they're real. I know it!
It's peaceful out here, isn't it? Of course, it'd be more peaceful without all the monsters.
What can you tell me about the place?
Minar Desert used to be the home of the dragons, or so they say. Whether or not that's true, there are plenty of legends about this place... Such as the legend of the sacred tribe.
What sacred tribe?

Do you know about the snow leopards? There are only a few of them. The younger leopards look human, but as they grow, so does their sacred power. They grow bestial and lose the ability to speak. They're no ordinary spirits; some believe they're closer to gods.
Have you ever seen a snow leopard?
I caught a glimpse of one once. Of course, most folks think I dreamed it, but I know that's not true. I'm determined to uncover the secret of the snow leopards.
This is bad! The stream that runs through our village is drying out.
I can't help but sigh...
Our village relies on this cool ground water.
We built the village around the stream. It keeps us alive in the inhospitable desert.
I hope everything will be okay...
I just want a good night's sleep...
Everything will work itself out.
You're not from around here, are you?
What I wouldn't give for a cool glass of water...
Where can I find it?
Hello.
Those exterminators are crooks, mark my words!
These bugs are ruining my business.
There's nothing like a quick swim to beat the heat.
This is bad! The stream that runs through our village is drying out.
I hope everything will be okay...
You're not from around here, are you?
$MyPCName$, what brings you to me?
Hello.
Another lovely sunny day—just like every day!
I love being surrounded by so much natural beauty.
On $map:02010022$, hard work is considered a sin. Got nothing to do? Then soak in the majesty that surrounds us!
We just moved here.
Can you believe it? My darling child, bitten by a snake!
I thought this place would be paradise, but it's actually a den of snakes...
We haven't even finished unpacking, and my baby is already hurt. How dreadful!
Nice to meet you.
Oh! Who could have imagined I'd find a stone like this here, of all places?
I'm glad I moved here!
Coming here for my research is probably one of the best decisions I've ever made. I bet my wife and kid are happy, too.
What is it?
Grr... This can't be!
The Blackstars can't... lose...!
We aren't some fly-by-night operation. We're the Blackstars!
Ugh... It hurts...
Betrayal is the quickest path to death.
I don't even have enough energy left to talk...
Ah... Why...?
Ugh... I feel too weak...
Please put your money right here. Thank you.
No loose change. Bills only. Thank you.
Hey, this is my turf!
Don't you know who my brother is?
Let's get to work.
If I hold something in my hand, it'll look like I'm working...
Why won't that beggar get out of here?
We have a saying in the construction industry: safety first. That means that it's none of my business if you do something stupid and get hurt!
Stop bothering me.
I like the foreman's boots.
Wonder how much they cost...
You like my safety helmet? Two stripes from front to back is the latest fashion.
This must be the place.
Hm... Gulp...
I'm not afraid. I'm not afraid...
Shhh! Don't tell my mom I'm here!
Pass me by and you'll have a hundred years of bad luck.
Isn't my house grand? It protects me from the pouring rain and the beating sun!
Don't ignore me! Don't you dare ignore me!

Nice place, right? If you lived here, you'd never have to worry about getting caught out in the rain or snow. I was going to keep it for myself, but make your best offer and this house could be yours!
What is it?
What is it?
What brings you?
What on earth are you doing?
I have a bad feeling about this...
Nothing is more precious than the ruins and artifacts that our ancestors have left behind. Today, I'm especially proud to be an archaeologist!
W-what?
W-what's that?
Gulp!
M-m-must stay calm. I'm n-n-not scared...
What's wrong?
AH!! Jeez, you almost gave me a heart attack...
You aren't headed into the $dungeonTitle:20016002$, are you? I was researching the ruins there when I saw... one of "them!"
How did the temple of the divine lumarigons come to house such frightening creatures? It's enough to make a man quake in his boots.
Mwa hah hah!
Betrayal is the quickest path to death.
You'll regret messing with me.
You're better than I thought. I never forget a debt... or a grudge. $MyPCName$...
What brings you here?
What should I tell $npcName:11001460[gender:0]$?
Those weren't ordinary train robbers.
$MyPCName$, what brings you to me?
Please defend the light...
I hope the power of the Lumarigons remains...
This $map:52010007$ has opened by the power of the Lumenstone in the Sanctuary of Light, somewhere in Nazkar Temple.
What should I do now?
There's only one thing to do. You must retrieve the Lumenstone before its chaotic light is consumed by darkness.
Do you have something to say to me?
I'm glad we've retrieved the Lumenstone, but the war with the Kargons is far from over.
What?
Light and darkness... The war between the Lumarigons and the Kargons isn't over yet. All hope lies on $npcName:11001472[gender:1]$ recovering soon. She alone can save the Lumarigons.
Ugh...
When $npcName:23000068[gender:0]$ returns... Aww... $npcName:11001472[gender:1]$ has to get better soon...
Ugh...
Aww... The Lumenstone... What do we do?
Guys... I-I'm sorry...

W-what do I do now? We finally got the Lumenstone back, but I dropped it into a pool of water. $npcName:11001292[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11001218[gender:1]$ are looking for it... but I can't swim... I feel useless.
You should calm down.
If $npcName:23000068[gender:0]$ finds out we lost the Lumenstone, he'll come after us. Could you hold off $npcName:23000068[gender:0]$ until we get the Lumenstone back?
What brings you here?
I'm scared...
Ah, by the way... what is that?
Ooh... This temple creeps me out. I can't find anyone in this gloomy place...
D-do you see the door over there? I think something awful happened on the other side... I'm scared...
Did you come to see me?
Happiness is not far away.
Someday you'll have good luck, too.
Do you want to know about the events we're running right now? Feel free to ask me all about 'em!
If I have any info to share about events, I'll let you know.
So, how can I help you?
There's so much to study when it comes to demons.
Demons or humans... That's the problem.
So... what do you think about demons?
They must be vanquished!
I hadn't really thought about them.
Indeed? That's what most people think about demons. I don't believe vanquishing them is the best solution. At the very least, we should learn more about their abilities first.
What kinds of abilities do they have?

Oh, many kinds indeed. Most involve temptations used to trick mortals into doing their bidding. The problem is the way those abilities are used, not the demons themselves. There are ways to use demonic abilities for good.
How can you do that?
Well... I can't really say yet. There's so much left unexplained about demons. And even if I found ways to use their powers, I'm not sure I could use them without dire consequences.
What a shame! I can tell by your aura that you're strong enough to handle demons. But if you're not interested, it hardly matters. Remember, there are always demons around us.
Puny humans...
Puny humans...
$MyPCName$, what brings you to me?
Descendant... of Light...
It was no small task to recover the power of light. I pray it will never be overshadowed by darkness.
What... is it?
I can sense... the power in this light...
What... is it?
I can sense... the power in this light...
I think I'd like to talk today.
Why do I feel so empty inside?
Things have been... tough.
Everything happens for a reason.
Tell me about your past.
Ah, you want to know what happened back then.
I can't remember.
Everything happens for a reason.
Please, not now. I'm busy.
How many plates have you had?
Today's our first day of business, and I'm already doing badly.
Do you need more food?
We are all Dragon Knights!
I hope this feeling of pride will last.
I've got a bad feeling... like something bad's about to happen.
I'm happy to be friends with such great people.
I consider everyone a good friend.
No one knows what the future has in store for us.
I'm hoping I can relax. At least for today.
I'm happy to be friends with such great people.
I consider everyone a good friend.
No one knows what the future has in store for us.
I'm hoping I can relax. At least for today.
You know I outrank you, right? Hah hah!
Startz is the best chef I know.
I already miss Mika...
Don't just stare at your food, eat it! So rude.
Tell me about your past.
If not for him...
I'm sorry, but I just want to eat right now.
Don't just stare at your food, eat it! So rude.
Hello!
It has to be somewhere around here...
I've been wandering around for so long... I'm hungry now.
Do you happen to know where I can find $map:02010053$? It's got to be around here somewhere.
Why do you ask?
I heard they're holding a big grand opening event. Anyone who brings in this handout gets all they can eat for just 5,000 mesos.
It's right up this escalator!
Aw man, the escaltor is out. I didn't sign up for stairs...
What do I want to eat this time?
Waiting for food is so painful!
The chef here is pretty good.
Could you stop bothering me? I'm eating!
You know I outrank you, right? Hah hah!
Startz is the best chef I know.
I already miss Mika...
Don't just stare at your food, eat it! So rude.
*Sniff* I smell something delicious.
I like omelets.
Nice to meet you!
I'm honored to join the Starlight Expedition. The captain of the guard sent me to help $npc:11000076[gender:0]$. I intend to win glory for the guard!
Nice to meet you!

I didn't expect $map:02000023$ to be quite this beautiful. When the boss told me the Green Hoods were joining this mission, I didn't know what to think. I've never been so far from home before... But I promise I won't let you down!
Nice to meet you.

If it weren't for the Archmage and $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, I'd be back home working on my research. I'm still not convinced this mission is worthwhile. At least the name "Starlight Expedition" has a nice ring to it.
Faster! More energy!
How'd you like to dance with us?
Watch me dance!
I'm too busy hosting the game right now. We'll talk later, okay?
Wassup, man?
Hey yo!
This is our moment!
Everybody shout, $npcName:11001527[gender:0]$!
Wassup, man? Whatcha need?
This place is lit, man!
The boogie to the boogety beat!
Show me what you got!
Wassup! Got questions?
How do you play Dance, Dance, Stop?
I got eliminated. It's not fair!
What are you doing here?
When the numbers appear on the floor panels, hop on them! If you match the number of dancers to the number, you go on to the next round. Otherwise... you're out!
How do you win?
I don't know how to dance.
Last 5 rounds, and you win. But the longer the game goes on, the less time you have to get on a panel. If you're a quick thinker and a fast runner, you can win... even if you're a terrible dancer!
Do you have any tips?
I'll win next time!

You know I do! Dancing isn't just fun—it's a great way to get experience. Once you're on a tile for 2 or more dancers, you can block others from joining you. This is a great way to lock down a tricky number and get a fabulous bonus.

Just press the action key to block others from joining your panel. You can't leave the tile while you're doing this, so when you're done be sure to press the action key again. But the most important tip I have... is to have fun!
I'll win next time!
That's the spirit! Keep it real, my friend. Keep it real.
Don't even sweat it. Just press the yellow light on the floor, and bam! It's dance time! Press the action key to boogie down with some random dance moves.
How do you win?
I'll win next time!
Don't let it get to you, my downtrodden dancer. Even if you're eliminated, there's a special dance floor where you can strut yourself. Just go to the yellow stage and press the action key!
What's the secret to winning the game?
I'll win next time!
My soul mate, $npcName:11001527[gender:0]$, has become a DJ. I'm here to support $npcName:11001527[gender:0]$ and rock it 'til the wheels fall off! Get on this, $MyPCName$!
Whoo! This place is bumpin'!
You want to know how to play?
Move to the beat!
Show me what you got!
Whoa there! Ask me questions if you got 'em!
How do you play Dance, Dance, Stop?
I got eliminated. It's not fair!
What are you doing here?
When the numbers appear on the floor panels, hop on them! If you match the number of dancers to the number, you go on to the next round. Otherwise... you're out!
How do you win?
I don't know how to dance.
Last 5 rounds, and you win. But the longer the game goes on, the less time you have to get on a panel. If you're a quick thinker and a fast runner, you can win... even if you're a terrible dancer!
Do you have any tips?
I'll win next time!

I'll win next time!

I'll win next time!

What's the secret to winning the game?
I'll win next time!
Mushroom art isn't the only thing I love, yo. Listening to great jams and partying with my people are high on the list.
You feel that? That's music.
You want to know how to play?
Move to the beat!
Show me what you got!
You feel me? Ask questions if you got any.
How do you play Dance, Dance, Stop?
I got eliminated. It's not fair!
What are you doing here?
When the numbers appear on the floor panels, hop on them! If you match the number of dancers to the number, you go on to the next round. Otherwise... you're out!
How do you win?
I don't know how to dance.
Last 5 rounds, and you win. But the longer the game goes on, the less time you have to get on a panel. If you're a quick thinker and a fast runner, you can win... even if you're a terrible dancer!
Do you have any tips?
I'll win next time!

What's the secret to winning the game?
I'll win next time!
Making music isn't the only thing I love, yo. Listening to great jams and partying with my people are high on the list.
Dance and play! It's not hard if you're having fun.
I'll teach you how to play.
Feel the rhythm. Fantastic!
Dance on the lighted stage!
Dance and play! It's not hard if you're having fun.
How do you play Dance, Dance, Stop?
I got eliminated. It's not fair!
What are you doing here?
When the numbers appear on the floor panels, hop on them! If you match the number of dancers to the number, you go on to the next round. Otherwise... you're out!
How do you win?

Last 5 rounds, and you win. But the longer the game goes on, the less time you have to get on a panel. If you're a quick thinker and a fast runner, you can win... even if you're a terrible dancer!
Do you have any tips?
I'll win next time!

What's the secret to winning the game?
I'll win next time!
The best way to know how someone really feels is to watch him dance. I learn so much about human emotion by studying the dancers here.
Oooh ooh ooh!
Oooh ooh ooh!
A lovely day for some exercise, don't you think? One-two, one-two!
One, two, three, four! Feel that stretch in your joints! Two, two! Three, four!
My back... Maybe I should take five.
The air is so bracing out here! Care to join me?
I, um... I like your hat.
Aren't you a darling? I hear this is the hottest design in $map:02010002$ nowadays! My brother, $npcName:11000167[gender:0]$, picked it up for me.
You're lucky to have such a great brother.
Don't I know it! He always looks out for me, even when he's off in the field. But lately, he hasn't been himself. Not since he had to give up hunting.
Why did $npcName:11000167[gender:0]$ give up hunting?
His wife hates it. She got sick of him coming home with all manner of wounds. Of course I worry about him, too, but this is his calling. A man can't be happy if he can't follow his calling.

Doesn't matter what I think, of course. $npcName:11000167[gender:0]$ agreed to stop hunting and go into business in $map:02000036$. He seems awful miserable to me, but what do I know? I'm just his sister.
Sh! You'll give me away!
How did you find me...?
I didn't come all the way out here for nothing...
What do I do now?
Why can't love be simple for once?
I cannot help but sigh... <font color="#909090">She sighs.</font>
How may I help you?
Ugh. Now what?
Hey! You know why they call me $npc:11001545[gender:0]$?
No clue.

'Cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Haha! I can't believe you never heard of me. Anyway, you need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
Well what're you staring at? Did'ja have something to tell me, or do you just like the view?
What're you looking at? You got something to say?
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$ scowls at you.)</font>
Um... Can I help you?
Go back to your corner and practice. I'm busy.
What is it?
Gray Wolf...
What do you want?
I've heard stories about you.
The idiots here have big mouths. Well go on, what did they tell you?
They say you're impossibly strong.
Strength is relative. If these idiots think I'm strong, it's only because they've never faced true power.
I know a thing or two about strength.
I see. If you're that confident, maybe you'll present an actual challenge.
Not everyone is so quick to believe me.
This one time, I had a match against this bird-man who was on a journey to test his strength. He didn't look much—heck, he looked weaker than most. Nobody took him seriously.
But when he stepped into that ring, he tore through his opponents like they were made of paper. Even I couldn't do better than draw against him. He taught me not to judge a book by its cover.
You think I'm like that bird guy?
Hah! No, if anything, you're more like me. There's a certain electricity in the air around fighters like you and I. Most people can't even sense it. But the strong can always recognize each other.

Of course, you can also be strong without knowing how to fight. The only way to really know someone is to face them in the ring. I don't know about you, but I'm looking forward to our fight. (The air around him grows heavy and terrifying.)
Face me in the ring.
That's the plan... Can't wait.
What seems to be the problem?
I've got nothing to say to you.
Tee-hee!
Bow-wow!
What brings you here?
Ah! My bobber bobbed!
Just be patient, $npcName:11001554[gender:1]$...
We'll make sashimi and put the leftovers in a stew.
Are you here to fish? This place is wonderful. I came here with my sister, Bory, and we're having a blast!
What is it?
Maybe I should have used more sunscreen...
These fish better not be stealing my bait and swimming off.
$npcName:11001553[gender:0]$, I'm hungry. Can't we just buy some snacks?
I should've worn a wide-brimmed hat today. This sun is killing me.
How may I help you?
Did he just put something in his pocket? No, couldn't be...
If he wants to come back, fine. I'm not dragging him back...
He'd better study hard if he wants to pass the test.
Tsk. If people keep taking pebbles home as souvenirs, soon the beach will be completely bare.
This one time, somebody climbed the hill in the middle of the night to get up close to the whale. Or he tried to, but he lost his grip halfway up and fell. It was a total disaster.
Our minds and bodies follow each other in harmony. Consider, the truly wise speak with wisdom, and also act with wisdom.
At last... The prophecy comes to pass...
The long night descends upon us...
Finally, you have arrived.
You summoned me?
Indeed. Your training has brought you to an important crossroad. According to our traditions, it is time for you to set out on a journey to test your skills in the outside world.
However, the presence of this terrible darkness must be dealt with first. We can discuss your training later.
Have you been training? Answer carefully.
There are three secrets to unbeatable strength: training, training, and training.
Train as if there is no tomorrow. If you don't, then there may not be.
Get to the point.
I want to know the secrets of animus.
Tell me about last year's incident.
Why aren't there more students of Guidance?
Knowledge is just as important as strength. For that reason, I will answer your questions, no matter how stupid they are. Don't make me repeat myself.

Animus is both the core philosophy and the energy developed by the Lone Spirit, who founded our order long ago. When you become one with nature, you can harness this energy and turn it into martial power.
The outsiders wield a similar force that they call magic. Animus is more powerful, of course, but it takes years of dedicated training to master. <font color="#909090">(He eyes you coolly.)</font>
Let's talk about something else.
The master and I were traveling the Land of Darkness on a training journey when we heard a series of explosions. We followed the sound and found you, dying.
I didn't even realize you were alive at first, you were so close to death. The master tried to cure you, but you were too far gone.
The master refused to let you die. He channeled his animus into you so that you would live. Do you understand what that means?
No.
Yes.
If you don't understand your roots, you will never know wisdom. If you don't show gratitude, you will never know humanity. And you... You know neither. So just listen and nod.
I begged him not to, but he gave you a portion of his power. He didn't simply heal you... he transferred his animus into you. Animus developed over centuries of training.
I don't understand why the master was so determined to save you, but your life is his now. The only way to repay him is to train as hard as you can and become a great student of Guidance.
Let's talk about something else.
If you knew that, maybe you wouldn't have slacked off in your training so much! Did you really think I wouldn't notice? You need to put your all into it!
Let's talk about something else.
There is only you, myself, and $npcName:11001699[gender:1]$. Does it bother you that there are only three of us?
When I joined Guidance, there were quite a few students. In its heyday, the mountain was teeming with them.
Where did they all go?

They left for various reasons. Some thought the training was too hard. Others left to join the world of humans after their training journey. A few only wanted to learn some simple tricks, and left as soon as they'd done so.

A few of our former students created their own group in the outside world. If they couldn't make it here, I doubt they'd have much success on their own. They certainly wouldn't hold to our values of integrity and righteousness...
What did they call themselves? The Blackwinds? The Jaw Smashers? Something insane like that. Let their mistakes be a reminder to stay on the path of training.
Let's talk about something else.
Mm? Yes?
Nothing like slipping away to my room for a little rest!
If I go outside, $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ will make me train more...
What do you need? Maybe I can help.
I had a strange dream...
I want to know more about Guidance.
How long was I out?
Tell me about the master.
That would explain all the mumbling. It wasn't... the dream, was it?
No... It was different this time...
That's a relief! I think I'd go crazy if I kept having nightmares about being chased by some mysterious figure.
I dreamed about the first time I met the master and $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$.
That's the earliest memory you have, isn't it? It must have made a real impression! And why not? The first time I met you also left an impression.
Not a bad impression, I hope!

No, no, not bad, just... startling. The members of Guidance have always been animal folk, at least until you came along. I never expected to see the master and $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ return to Halo Mountain with a bloodied human in tow.
I was sure the master would boot you back out as soon as you were walking again. Instead, he took you on as his student. $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ sure wasn't happy about that...
Let's talk about something else.
For thousands of years, Guidance only ever accepted animal folk into its fold. It was specifically founded by the great Lone Spirit to help us reach enlightenment.

But that was long ago, and the Lone Spirit's philosophy has surely evolved over millenia of teaching and study. Besides, Halo Mountain is practically empty now, so I say it's time we started accepting more members... including humans like you.
Before you came along, it was just the master, $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$, and me. But with you, we're now a happy family of four.
Where did all the students go?
Some finished their training and left with the master's blessing. Some left to live with the humans. But most of them couldn't handle the training and gave up.

Regardless of the reasons, we still consider all of them members of Guidance. Well, almost all of them. Some of them started their own group devoted to money and power, not enlightenment. We're not on good terms.
Let's talk about something else.
Half a day, maybe? $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ was pretty moody about it, since it's the second time you've fainted on us. He just needs to have more patience with your human stamina, if you ask me.

I don't mind. Taking care of you gives me the chance to relax here and do my antlers. These fairy sparkles take time to get right, y'know. Hey, you want me to do yours? We've got time... if you leave now, then we both have to get back to training...
I'm ready.
Oh, all right. Guess I can't sit around here all day.
Why do you think I fainted?

It must be the animus that the master breathed into you. I've never heard of a human using animus before you, so it makes sense it would be hard on your squishy, furless body. Besides, the master's animus is potent even for us animal folk.
You have a great power inside you, but you're not strong enough to control it. I imagine that feels pretty rough now and then.
I want to know the secrets of animus.

There's nothing secret about it, really. All you have to do is reach unity with nature by disciplining your mind and body, and then harness the energy that creates. The trick is actually doing any of that.
I'm sure $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ would be happy to tell you all about it during training.
Let's talk about something else.
Master $npcName:11001556[gender:0]$ is our teacher and the leader of Guidance. He is the fifteenth master to hold the title of Munakra, which means "seeker of knowledge."
Munakra?
The Lone Spirit led Guidance for hundreds of years before he vanished. When the time came, he chose the wisest of his students and bestowed upon them the title of Munakra.

Since then, the wisest student of each generation receives the title and becomes Guidance's new leader. Our master is the fifteenth in that line. And even if we're pretty small now, we still stand thanks to his leadership.

The master makes a yearly pilgrimage to the outside world to help the needy and fight evil. He does it all in secret, too. I think he's done more to help Maple World than any of the Munakra who led Guidance before him.
Let's talk about something else.
What is it?
What brings you here?
You're here.
$MyPCName$, $npcName:11001232[gender:1]$ says she misses you.
I'm sorry I didn't stay in touch. I couldn't find the time. Still, it seems you did well enough without me.
There you are.
No matter $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s reasons or excuses, I will never forgive him for murdering Arazaad.
You're here.
Impossible...
Wake up, $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$. We still need to avenge Arazaad...
Ugh...
I'll be back on my feet... before you know it...
Don't worry about me... I'll be back on my feet in no time...
Ah, $MyPCName$!
We can't give up yet. There's still so much to do!
We can't give up yet. There's still too much to do!
Hm...
Sob...
What seems to be the problem?
You're here.
Ah, $MyPCName$!
The bond between our ancestors makes us strong. I couldn't be more grateful.
$MyPCName$, remember: no one crosses paths by accident. Be kind to everyone you meet, no matter how insignificant they may seem at the time.
The bond between our ancestors makes us strong. I couldn't be more grateful.
Good day.
I shall help you however I can.
Hello.
The life force will protect everyone.
Ugh...
I'll be back on my feet... before you know it...
Don't worry about me... I'll be back on my feet in no time...
Don't worry too much.
I think everyone... will be all right...
Welcome.
We just need to pray for a miracle...
Welcome.
If we come together...
Ah, $MyPCName$!
This is not going to be easy.
This is not going to be easy.
Welcome!
This is not going to be easy.
Hey, welcome!
Ah, what brings you here?
Do you have business with me?
...What?
What seems to be the problem?
What brings you here?
Ah, $MyPCName$!
There must be something about the power $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ seeks in our ancestors' records.
Why are you so sure?
I encountered Holstatt in the Land of Darkness once. He said that Arazaad had kept a secret from us. That the real legacy of our ancestors was elsewhere.
I don't know if he was lying or not. But if he wasn't, then the old records, which only Arazaad could read, must hold clue about the secret. Something to point us towards this so-called legacy.
Why are you staring at me?
I just wanted to see you.
I missed you so much!
Play with me.
There's something I need to tell you.
Ha... Weirdo...
Y-you did? So did I. Ahem.
Now is not the time for such things!
I'm a little busy right now.
There must be something about the power $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ seeks in our ancestors' records.

I encountered Holstatt in the Land of Darkness once. He said that Arazaad had kept a secret from us. That the real legacy of our ancestors was elsewhere.
I don't know if he was lying or not. But if he wasn't, then the old records, which only Arazaad could read, must hold some clue about the secret. Something to point us towards this so-called legacy.
I miss Calibre...
Can we ever go back to Calibre Island?
How may I help you?
We have gathered here for one cause. Together, we can do anything.
Ah, $MyPCName$!
No words can express my gratitude. I only hope that I can repay the empire one day.
Why are you staring at me?
I just wanted to see you.

There's something I need to tell you.
