No words can express my gratitude. I only hope that I can repay the empire one day.
Hello.
$npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ is strong. He'll recover. Until then, the Life Lapenta will protect him.
Ah, $MyPCName$!
$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ can't keep this up for long. It's only a matter of time before we have our revenge.
$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ can't keep this up for long. It's only a matter of time before we have our revenge.
Hmm...
You're here.
How may I help you?
$npcName:11001229[gender:0]$'s body may be asleep, but I don't think his mind is. He'll return to us soon.
Sigh...
This isn't like $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ at all. Wake up!
This isn't like $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ at all. Wake up!
This is my fault...
This is all my doing. I should have stayed out of $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$'s way...
Hey, welcome!
What's-his-name, $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$? C'mon, let's get him!
What brings you here?
Everyone seems to be a little heated. Don't forget, this is official Expedition business.
What brings you here?
Let's hear them out.
Do you have business with me?
The real fun is about to begin! I'm going to blow that $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ guy to smithereens!
...What?
Enough with the preamble. It's time for the main event.
What brings you here?
Let's hear them out.
What seems to be the problem?
We've agreed to accept each other as comrades. That means we must trust and respect one another.
Welcome.
The sooner this is over with, the sooner I can go back to Calibre Island.
You're here.
Has the time finally come time to avenge Arazaad? $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$... I'll make you pay!
You're here.
We've joined forces under the banner of the Starlight Expedition. I only hope we can achieve what we've set out to do.
How may I help you?
I hope everyone's all right.
...What?
<font color="#909090">(He's sound asleep.)</font>
I miss the master. I still hear his voice in my head...
$npcName:11001229[gender:0]$... Will he ever wake up?
Hm... What now?
What is it?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
You have something to say to me?
The people your thugs took, are they safe?

Who knows? The poor idiots are probably locked up somewhere. They don't respect the first rule of the streets: you give back as much as you take. Blackstar wants to make 'em pay up their fair share, that's all.
Why do you care, anyway? You friends with one of those vagrants?
Their friends asked me to look into their disappearances.

Sticking your nose into matters that don't concern you, eh? That's a special kind of stupid. I'd say they better be paying you a fortune, but any friend of those deadbeats wouldn't have two mesos to rub together.
I'm not in this for the money.
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001623[gender:0]$ squints at you in disbelief.)</font> You don't know them and you don't care about getting paid?
You're one of those hero-types. That's fine with me. Go off and get yourself killed. One less idiot to get in my way.
What brings you here?
Can I help you?
Was there something you wanted to ask me?
Tell me about the champion of $map:63000020$.
$npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is the champion and public face of $map:63000020$. Over the course of his career here, he's had 47 wins, zero losses, and one tie.
Zero losses?
His fights always end the same way: a single punch and his opponent is out like a light. He's built like a tank and moves like a panther. It's no wonder the crowds love him.
You mentioned a tie.
Yes, he tied. Once. His opponent wasn't even human—it was one of those animal men. He used a very strange technique in the ring. It almost looked like magic.
$map:63000020$ had never seen anything like him, and we haven't again since. Even $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ was impressed.
The challenger left as soon as the match was over, mumbling something about being "pleased with the results of his training." What was his name again...?
Ah, that's right! The challenger's name was Junta. And that's everything I know about him.
What do you want?
What brings you here?
You got something to say to me?
I'm looking forward to today's match.
What makes you so sure $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$'s going to win?
I'm not. Anything can happen in the ring. But I know $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$, and I know that he never fails me.
That's because he's never faced me in the ring.
Is that so? Okay. Let's see if your fists can back up your words.
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
What is it now?
Did you know about $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$'s plan?
Not that I think you'll believe me, but no, I didn't. Even if I did know, so what? It's not my job to stop him.
Then you're no better than $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$.
Listen. My old man and I don't always see eye to eye, but he built Blackstar from the ground up. You gotta be ruthless to succeed in this town, and he's earned my respect.
Old man... You're $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$'s son?!
I didn't tell you? Must've slipped my mind. $npcName:11001630[gender:0]$, son of $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$, at your service.
Slipped your mind. Sure.
Hey, where's it written that I have to tell every idiot who stumbles in here who my dad is? Now, get out of my face before I get mad.
I'm not done with you.
Me neither. I got a feeling we'll be fighting again real soon. And next time, I'll beat you fair and square. No tricks.
I'll see you in the ring.
Count on it.
Cut to the chase.
Frickin' Zabeth... Killjoy...
The moment you step out of here, you're a marked $male:man,female:woman$. Capisce?
I have no clue what you're talking about.
That's fine. You go about your business. You leave the thinking to me.
You better be careful. We're watching you.
Sniff...
This is all my doing...
Ugh...
Agh... My bones hurt...
It's $male:him,female:her$! The Gray Wolf...
It was... over so fast...
Ugh...
C-can't move...
Gray Wolf...
$male:He,female:She$ wiped the floor with us...
Sigh...
It's going to take forever to clean up this mess!
Sigh. $male:he,female:she$ totally wrecked the place.
Did $male:he,female:she$ really shatter this marble with $male:his,female:her$ bare fists?
What is it?
What?
What?
What?
Who, or WHAT could take down our guys so easily?
Idiots. Gangsters should be giving beatings, not taking them!
What?
My head...
My everything hurts...
What?
What?
What?
What?
What?
What?
What?
Did I get bad intel...?
He said it was in locker 4...
What?
I'm watching you. Behave.
What?
There's gotta be something I can salvage here.
That part looks usable.
What?
Hmph! These clunkers!
They should have contacted me by now...
They weren't caught, were they?
What's taking him so long...? Huh? What do you want?!
What are you up to?
Wh-what do you think? I'm sorting junk, that's what!
(Stare at him.)
I-I'm not up to anything bad. Really. I'm just...
Wait. You're...
You know me?
You're the Gray Wolf! I was there when you took down those Blackstar goons in $map:02000138$.
You're thinking of someone else.
No, I'm not. You trying to stay off the radar? I would, too, if I had as many enemies as you. But your face has been burned into my brain ever since that day.
Anyway, what are you doing here?
I have business here.
Here? You and the Blackstars are mortal enemies now, right? Wait... you didn't come here to take them on at their headquarters, did you?
Things... got a little out of control.

Y-you really are the terror of $map:02000138$! The equal of a hundred warriors! Y'know, I used to think you were just another thug... Since you're here, maybe there's a question you can answer for me.

I have a, uh, "friend" who went inside their headquarters. He should have been able to sneak out while you kept the gangsters busy, but he's still missing. You didn't see anyone... suspicious when you were there, did you?
Everyone in there looked suspicious.
Yeah, yeah, good point. Ha, I almost feel sorry for the Blackstars, having an enemy like you. Hahaha!
(Say nothing.)
Ha... Ha ha... Ahem. You're a pretty intense $male:guy,female:gal$, you know that? I hope we meet again.
Where did $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ get off to...?
Maybe I should take a nap...
Where in the world did $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ go?
Did you see that shadow? I wonder if that was $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ skulking around.
I didn't see anything.
Well, I know I saw something! And he has to be around here somewhere.
Halo Mountain...
Come on, $npcName:11001656[gender:1]$. Think!
What's our next move...?
We need to focus... focus...
Is the master really gone?
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001656[gender:1]$ chokes back a tear.)</font> The master is fine. He... he has to be...
More questions?
I failed to protect Halo Mountain.
Our master...
Halo Mountain...
Is the master really gone?
What do we do now?
Who was that?
I doubt we've seen the last of him. His command of animus is unlike anything I've ever seen. And until he returns, I will do everything I can to protect Guidance.
Let's talk about something else.
I know that we need to evaluate our options carefully... But all I want to do right now is destroy something. I will be deferring to $npcName:11001656[gender:1]$ for now.
Let's talk about something else.
I've never seen or heard of him before. Strange that the master never mentioned him, but it sounds like this Kandura lost the title of Munakra to him and has held a grudge ever since.
The power he wields wasn't pure animus. The darkness tainting it was potent.
If I could control my power, I could have...
...saved him? Perhaps. The animus you possess was honed over centuries of training by one of the greatest masters Guidance had ever known.
And if the master hadn't given you that animus, he may have had the power to stop this. I always feared something like this would happen...
But... I suppose I can no longer humor such thoughts. It is just the three of us now.
Losing him is... I don't...
...Well, you're his legacy now. Conduct yourself accordingly.
I'll do my best.
Don't misunderstand me. I'm not trying to cheer you up.
I don't like you, and I doubt I ever will. But, like it or not, you are my $male:brother,female:sister$ in Guidance. We must work together if we are to overcome our trials.
Let's talk about something else.
Mm? Yes?
What?
What brings you here?
What is it?
Grr...
Welcome, $MyPCName$.
You've grown strong, my hero. I look forward to hearing more great tales of your exploits.
We hope our faith in you is well deserved.
May the empress favor you always.
Do not betray our empress's trust.
So, it's you.
The empress has placed her faith in you.
Your eyes speak volumes about your character, $MyPCName$. I believe I can trust you. We are depending on you to protect the peace of Maple World.
What does Her Highness see in this stranger...?
I look forward to hearing more stories of your heroism.
Please remain steadfast in your efforts to protect peace and justice.
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
Lucky! Lucky! $npcName:11001654$!
May Lady Luck smile upon you!
How exciting!

For one spin of the $npcName:11001654$, you need 3 $itemPlural:30000554$. You'll get 3 $itemPlural:30000554$ in your mailbox every day just for logging in. You'll also get bonus coins as you spend more time in Maple World. And let's not forget that many of our events also award coins for joining in!
If you have $itemPlural:30000554$ to burn, be sure to come to $map:63000032$!
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
What kind of item would you like today?
Thank you for joining our 1st anniversary event!
One year already?

You have something to say to me?
Whoever they were, I will stop them.
They must have a leader...
If you have something to say, just say it.
Where have you been?
You're hurt.
What are these shadows?

As I said, I saw one of those creatures while checking on the barrier stones. It led me into a trap, which took time to get myself out of. Do not worry... those who laid the trap will be laying no others.
Let's talk about something else.
Do not presume to tell me my business! I am the first student of Guidance, and those frail things could hardly lay a... a... whatever they have on me!
Let's talk about something else.
I have no idea. They aren't of nature, that much is obvious. And they are organized. Someone is behind this...
Let's talk about something else.
You have something to say to me?
Whoever they were, I will stop them.
They must have a leader...
They've pushed us all the way back to $map:63000029$...
What's our next move?
I thought we could handle this on our own, but there are too many of them. We have no choice but to report the situation to the master. He will know what to do.
Hah... I can barely breathe...
We shouldn't have let them get to $map:63000029$...
Even with $npcName:11001672[gender:0]$ here, this doesn't look good...
Now isn't a great time to talk!
What are these things?
Whatever they are, they aren't good. Let's focus less on what they are and more on how to stop them.
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
This place would've been finished by now if the celebrations hadn't been canceled...
I'm just happy there's somewhere for me to kick up my feet and relax.
Do you have business with me? Hm?
Tell me about yourself.
What do you know about the $map:52000034$?
What happened to the vagrants Blackstar took hostage?
Tell me about $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$.
How about this. You know why they call me $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$?
No clue.
Yes.
I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Haw! I can't believe you never heard of me. Well, remember me for next time.
I heard your real name is Brav-gross.
Has somebody been tarnishing my good name? It's $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$, isn't it?
Ahem! I don't know where you heard that, but it's a dirty lie. $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is my name, and $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is who I am. Now get outta here, before you make me mad!
Let's talk about something else.
You probably already heard this, but listen anyway. They call me Bravos 'cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Get it?
I heard your real name is Brav-gross.
Has somebody been tarnishing my good name? It's $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$, isn't it?
Ahem! I don't know where you heard that, but it's a dirty lie. $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is my name, and $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is who I am. Now get outta here, before you make me mad!
Let's talk about something else.

I don't know, exactly. I heard we were gonna set up a base of operations in $map:02000001$, but there were problems with the construction. Eventually we gave up on the building, and... Well, take a look around you.
Blackstar is moving in on $map:02000001$?
You really have no idea how big Blackstar is, do you? Every gangster in the underworld is connected to it one way or another. Gray Wolf or not, you can't take it on by yourself.
How big is your organization, really?
Why do you care? That's none of your business. Now, I'd say that's enough stupid questions out of you.
Let's talk about something else.
How should I know? It wasn't my operation. I don't even know where they are. I know you made some sorta deal with the boss, but let me give you some advice anyway: don't do anything stupid.

What I wanna know is why you're going along with whatever the boss says. A strong fighter like you could take Blackstar for $male:himself,female:herself$ if $male:he,female:she$ wanted. Maybe you just don't have the guts.
I'm just afraid for their safety.
Yeah, sure you are. And that's the only reason you wanna know?
I lost the match. I'm honor bound to work with him.
You're a bigger fool than $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$. Well, I guess I can't hold it against you if it means you're working with us instead of against us.
Let's talk about something else.
You've come to the right man. What do you wanna know?
Does $npcName:11001618[gender:0]$ get along with $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$?
Maybe you didn't know this, but $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is the boss's son. Heir to the kingdom, though you wouldn't know it to talk to him. All the officers sure seem to like him, though.
And why is that?

You ever meet a boss's kid before? You know the type. Throws his daddy's weight around. Makes all the company goons do whatever he says. Well, $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ ain't like that. He doesn't care about power or money. So why wouldn't they like him?
And what does the rank-and-file think?
$npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is our hero. His pop's the head honcho, but $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ didn't ever get nothing that he didn't earn with his own two fists. A real man's man, you know?
Let's talk about something else.
Can I help you?
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
How may I help you?
Welcome to $map:02000001$.
Feel free to ask me anything.
May Ereve bless you!
All hail the empress!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.
$map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.
Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

$map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.
Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.
Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$... And $map:02000064$...

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!
Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.
You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing...
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.
If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.
They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough... How did you manage to master both?

Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though... I thought you'd be taller.
You've mistaken me for someone else.
R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life...
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
This isn't any ordinary warehouse. That much is obvious.
The boss wouldn't have trusted me with this job if I weren't important.
Do you know why I'm called $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$?
No clue.
Yes.
Let's talk about something else.
I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Haw! I can't believe you never heard of me. Well, remember me for next time.
What, you come here to stare at me? Unless you have something else to say, scram!
You probably already heard this, but listen anyway. They call me Bravos 'cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Get it?
What, you come here to stare at me? Unless you have something else to say, scram!
Yeah, what do you want to talk about?
What's your standing in Blackstar, exactly?

Isn't it obvious? There's a reason I'm always picked for the best missions. The boss trusts me. I'll be an officer in no time, and then idiots like $npcName:11001686[gender:0]$ will have to do whatever I say.
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
Gah... I shouldn't have let my guard down...
Got to keep my eyes open.
Do you know why I'm called $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$?
You want to ask me that? Right now?
You're no fun. Forget it.
How are you feeling?
Wh-what? You worried about me? Don't! Look... You're giving me goosebumps!
What's with the intense stare? Spit it out or sc-scram! <font color="#909090">(He's blushing.)</font>
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
What's this information the boss wants?
Ugh... What a headache...
Hm... Did I ever tell you why they call me $npcName:11001680[gender:0]$? I'm sure I told someone, but I can't remember if it was you.
Why do you keep asking that question?
Let's talk about something else.
You got a problem with that? I'm my own man, and if I want to ask the same question over and over again, you can't stop me. Just for that, I'll tell you again!
They call me Bravos 'cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! I hope you remember this time, 'cause there will be a test!
What, you come here to stare at me? Unless you have something else to say, scram!
Yeah, what do you want to talk about?
What was that clone in the video?
Beats me. I never saw it before. This is a messed up thought, but could you imagine having 100 $npcNamePlural:11001688[gender:0]$ running around? Ugh, just having one of him is too much.
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?
Who's this $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ guy I keep hearing about? Local cage fighter or something?
If Ereve'd just thrown her party like a good little empress, I wouldn't have to be here now...
You got something to stay, or you just gonna stand there and stare all night? Actually, I don't care. Get outta here.
How are you doing?
What do you know about the $map:52000034$?
What happened to the vagrants Blackstar took hostage?
Tell me about $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$.
What do you want to hear? Tales of my exploits? The names of punks I beat to a bloody pulp?
How did you get the name "Zabeth?"
Wh-why do you want to know? Did $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ put you up to this?
Ahem! Don't listen to that fool. My name is Eliza—
I-I mean, it's $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$! Just $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$, got it?!
Your name is Eliza-what?
Quit it with the stupid questions! It's none of your business!
Let's talk about something else.

Is that what this place's called? I didn't know that. I don't care, neither. I just want to get back to base. I belong at $map:63000020$, watching over the fighters. This town doesn't hold a candle to the excitement of the ring.
That place before... You could feel the fighting spirit in the air! This place, on the other hand... Words don't do it justice.
Let's talk about something else.

I got no idea who you're talking about. Ask $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$. Now, the one I'm interested in... is you. They say you're the Gray Wolf. I don't buy it, 'cause why would the Gray Wolf work with the boss? Gray Wolf or not, you could fight your way to the top of Blackstar if you wanted.
My code of honor wouldn't allow that.
Code of honor! That's rich. Sounds like you're too much of a coward to take on Blackstar. Can't blame you, though. I wouldn't want to fight me, neither.
(Raise your fists.)
Uh...! D-did you hear that? M-my stomach's calling. I better go home and... and turn it off...
Let's talk about something else.
Yeah? What do you want to know?
I want to know about $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$'s fighting style.
What're you asking me for? You're the one who faced him in the ring! I told you he'd take you out with a single punch, didn't I? Ha!
How does $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ train?
Trying to figure out how he got so strong, eh? I think he was just born strong. I hear he never slacks off on his training, but no amount of training makes you as tough as he is.

He's got a 30-step routine he goes through every single day. Enough to give a normal man a heart attack, they say. Some of the other lunks in the organization tried it, and they all passed out foaming at the mouth.
What's the routine?
It's nothing special, really. 4,000 knuckle push-ups, 1,000 finger push-ups, 5,000 sit-ups, 5,000 squats, 200 laps around the track... That sort of thing.
He uses sandbags and chunks of meat as punching bags, and he lets others whale on him to toughen him up. There's no secret to his training. He's just that tough.
Let's talk about something else.
What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?
What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?
There's something off about this place. It doesn't smell right.
This musty smell... terrible.
You need something, go bother $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$ instead. He likes to hear himself talk, and I got real work to do.
What's your rank in Blackstar?
I'm a henchman, plain and simple. $npcName:11001678[gender:0]$ has big ideas about moving up in the organization, but I don't care what they call me as long as I get to bash heads in.

Boss. Lackey. It doesn't matter. All that matters is how strong you are. $npcName:11001678[gender:0]$ can try to rise as much as he wants, but he's got a glass jaw. A weakling like him just ain't officer material.
What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?
If he shows up, I'll knock his block off.
What's this cold sweat...? Hunger...?
Whatever you want from me, it can wait.
Were you worried about $npcName:11001679[gender:0]$?
Wh-who's worried? Stop talking nonsense, or I'll beat the stuffing outta you!
What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?
This place gives me the creeps.
Crud. I shoulda gone before we came here.
You need something, go bother $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$ instead. He likes to hear himself talk, and I got real work to do.
What was that clone in the video?
I don't know if it was a clone or just someone who really looks like $npcName:11001680[gender:0]$. And I don't want to know. Now stop making me think about it.
What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?
The sooner we get out of this dusty hole, the better.
Sigh... I'm sure the boss thought it was very funny, pairing these two together.
Just when I think these two are unbelievable, they do something to one up themselves.
Was there something you wanted to ask me?
What do you make of my arrangement with $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$?
What happened to the vagrants Blackstar took hostage?
Tell me about $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$.
To be honest, I don't know why that man—I mean, the boss—keeps you around. The things he's asked you to do...
...could be done by anyone.
Yes. Easily. And you don't even like him. So why does he have you do it?
I think I know the answer to that.
Oh?
He's trying to tame me.
Maybe, but can you be tamed? My peers may think you're harmless, but I see a wolf that's taken care to hide $male:his,female:her$ fangs and claws.
Let's talk about something else.
If you're worried about their safety, well, that all depends on your cooperation.
I don't understand why you allow the boss to walk all over you. You have no obligation to him. Blackstar is big, but you...
I lost the match. I'm honor bound to work with him.
You say that, even knowing that the fight was fixed? Incredible. You're the most loyal, honorable, and... frustratingly righteous person I've ever met.
I've learned a new lesson from $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$.
If that's what you think, then I won't ask any further.
If you need anything, you can try asking $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ or $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$. I can't guarantee that they'll be very helpful, though.
Let's talk about something else.
$npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is truly a magnificent beast. It's not just that he's strong—he is completely and utterly fearless.
What does he have to fear? His dad is the boss!

Of course you would assume that $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ gets special treatment because of his father. But, in truth, it's $npcName:11001618[gender:0]$ who is lucky to have $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ for a son.

When Blackstar was first started, it had many enemies. Hardly a day passed when someone didn't try to take the boss's life. But $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ watched over $map:02000100$ like a hawk, keeping his father safe and eliminating our enemies one at a time.
He won't take credit for it, but there would be no Blackstar without him. And yet, some people still grumble that he acts too cocky for a brat who merely happened to be adopted by the boss.
Wait, $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ was adopted?
I don't know the details. All I know is that the boss brought home this ten-year-old boy one day and treated him as a son. He couldn't possibly be the boss's real child.

Whatever their story is, $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ doesn't seem to care about his birth or his position in Blackstar. Most of us respect and admire him, and those who don't are too cowardly to speak up.
Let's talk about something else.

If you got something to say, say it.
I should've taught $npcName:11001631[gender:0]$ a lesson in respect when I had the chance...
I don't care what $npcName:11001631[gender:0]$ says. I call the shots around here, and don't you forget it.
Remember, that guy's all talk and no action. I can beat him with one hand tied behind my back.
<font color="#909090">(Something illegible has been etched on the surface.)</font>
Mm? Yes?
I feel like I just got here and I already need a nap...
Someone needs to teach $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ about the power of napping.
How can I help you?
$npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ is a tough teacher.
You don't need to tell me that. He's the reason some of our old students left!
$npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ cares about only one thing, and that's training. He expects everyone to keep up with him, and the problem with that should be obvious.
I will say, he has a talent for crushing confidence, and that's important when you get arrogant students. His heart's in the right place, it's just... cold and unfeeling, you know?
If you ask him why all those students left, he'd tell you they were too soft. Even if he's right, he's not helping them by driving them away!
How may I help you?
May Ereve bless you!
All hail the empress!
If you have any questions about the Shadow Expedition, I'd be happy to help you.
What's the Shadow Expedition?
What traits can I get from the expedition?
What are $itemPlural:90000018$?
The $map:02000001$ Guard commissioned the Shadow Expedition to investigate and weaken the darkness that welled up behind this huge gate.
Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ extends his personal invitation to adventurers like you. Explore the darkness, uncover its secrets, and halt its spread.
Do you have any more questions?
What traits can I get from the expedition?
What are $itemPlural:90000018$?
Thanks for the information.
The expedition grants you special traits that you can wield when in the dark places at the end of this passage. Only experienced expeditionists can benefit from these traits.
Learn the traits and activate them before entering the darkness. You can also use $itemPlural:90000018$ to upgrade your traits.
Do you have any more questions?
What's the Shadow Expedition?
What are $itemPlural:90000018$?
Thanks for the information.

As you explore the darkness, you'll find $itemPlural:90000018$. You can use them to learn and upgrade your expedition traits, which will help you survive in this place. As you clear greater difficulties, you'll be able to carry more of these.
Do you have any more questions?
What's the Shadow Expedition?
What traits can I get from the expedition?
Thanks for the information.
My pleasure. If you ever have any more questions, I'll do my best to answer them.
I serve the darkness.
$MyPCName$, are you all right?
Ugh... I may have overdone it...
I don't think this is over...
If $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ had gotten here a minute later...
Preparing situation report!
Mm? Yes?
Foolish bird... He'd better recover quickly.
I'll make sure he's on his feet again soon.
It's good to see you, $MyPCName$. Is there something I can get for you?
What is this artifact we're after?
Should we be looking for the master?

I don't know exactly what it is, but supposedly Lone Spirit, the founder of Guidance, left behind a treasure that would grant enlightenment to his true heir. It was passed down through generations... until the eleventh Munakra vanished with it.

Some people think it was destroyed. Others think that all of its power was drained, and it's been placed in hiding until it can recharge. Others say that Lone Spirit reincarnated and claimed it for himself. Who knows which theory, if any, is true?

The only reliable information on the artifact is told through word-of-mouth, so the only one who would really know is the master. What if... what if $npcName:11001559[gender:0]$ came to Halo Mountain for the artifact?
That must be it. I'm sure he said something about an artifact when he attacked us... <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001706[gender:1]$ is lost in thought.)</font>
Let's talk about something else.
The master can fend for himself. Don't worry, all right? <font color="#909090">(Even as she comforts you, worry is etched in her face.)</font>
Let's talk about something else.
Mm? Yes?
I feel much better now.
Now that $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ is better, I can finally get some rest.
Hello again. Is there something you need?
How is $npcName:11001715[gender:0]$?
What do you think of $map:02000001$?
You aren't actually worried about him, are you? He'll be soooo happy to hear that!
I'm not worried! Just... concerned.
Well, he'll appreciate your concern, anyway. I'm keeping a close eye on him, so you just leave him to me.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001707[gender:1]$ stops talking suddenly. She hesitates for a moment, then speaks.)</font> $MyPCName$... Thank you.
What for?
$npcName:11001715[gender:0]$ has always been very hard on you. But you've stood by us through this crisis, when other students abandoned us for far less.
Now Halo Mountain has been burned to the ground and the master is gone. Guidance exists in name only. You have no real obligation to us. Why don't you wash your hands of this whole mess?
I owe the master my life.
Maybe... But I want to thank you anyway. That's all.
Let's talk about something else.
This place is amazing! I've never seen such a big city before. It's loud and crowded and crazy, but I think I see why humans like it here.
I also get why students who completed their training came to live here. It's about as different from life on Halo Mountain as you can get.
So, you think you'll be a city slicker from now on?
No, I don't think so. This place is amazing, but I'll always choose a peaceful life on Halo Mountain... <font color="#909090">(There's a far-off look in her eyes.)</font>
N-no need to dwell on the past, I guess! Let's talk about something else.
Mm? Yes?
Ugh... I feel... heavy...
Yawn! I could use a nap.
I feel... sluggish...
Why's that?
Do you know how long it's been since I had a good nap? Ever since we got here, I've been so busy that I haven't had time to train, let alone get my beauty sleep.
Go take a nap now.
It wouldn't do any good. I have to get myself good and tired from training, or I can't doze off. So it'll just have to wait! <font color="#909090">(She gives a cheerful laugh.)</font>
Mm? Do you have something to say?
Mmph... My head is throbbing...
It's hard to focus without a good night's rest, you know?
I think there's more going on here than we realize. It's at times like this we have to keep a clear head. Got it?
Mm?
Come to think of it... Did I take a nap today?
It's so dusty. $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ really should clean more.
Were your contacts any good this time?
Your informants are little cuties.
Is their information reliable?
I suppose they are! Don't judge them by their looks, though. They've got a knack for gathering information.
Let's talk about something else.
I can't think of any reason it wouldn't be. If you're worried, I'll vouch for them personally. They've never failed me in the past.
Let's talk about something else.
Mm? What is it?
I have this indescribable feeling...
Perhaps this is the energy of the earth...
The more I look at this place, the more mystified I am. Almost as if... it yearns for something...
Mm? Yes?
There's a strange energy about this place.
There's definitely something here.
The artifact must be hidden somewhere nearby. Or something related to it, at the very least.
Mm? Yes?
Hello there.
I need a rest...
Do you mind? I don't want to think right now...
None of us are okay right now. All the more reason to stay strong.
(Nod your head.)
You know, I... Oh, never mind. <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001714[gender:1]$ looks you in the eye, but stops herself from saying more.)</font>
What?
I must focus on recovering.
My training was lacking...
If you have something to say, just say it.
How are your injuries?
They are... instructive.
What does that mean?
The best victory is a half-victory. The second best is an easy victory. The worst is a complete victory. Do you know why?
No.
Victory and defeat are meaningless concepts.
I like the victories where I crush my foes.

An easy victory makes you lazy. A complete victory makes you arrogant, and is almost always followed by a crushing defeat. A half-victory, on the other hand, is only half of a defeat. You have a chance to get up and try again.
I may have been defeated on Halo Mountain, but my small victories gave me the courage—no, a reason—to try again.
Defeat is just another part of training. The master said that every mistake is a chance to better yourself. Do you understand now? <font color="#909090">(Junta grins at you.)</font>
Let's talk about something else.
Don't get philosophical on me. A real philosopher once said, "Do not let what you think you know get in the way of what you have yet to learn."
Every concept, no matter how insignificant, has some value. I suggest you listen carefully.

An easy victory makes you lazy. A complete victory makes you arrogant, and is almost always followed by a crushing defeat. A half-victory, on the other hand, is only half of a defeat. You have a chance to get up and try again.
Defeat is just another part of training. The master said that every mistake is a chance to better yourself. Do you understand now? <font color="#909090">(Junta watches you closely.)</font>
A victory like that makes you arrogant, and is almost always followed by a crushing defeat. A half-victory, on the other hand, is only half of a defeat. You have a chance to get up and try again.
Was Halo Mountain your first half-victory?

The world is larger than you think. Even outside of Guidance, there are great warriors to rival my own abilities. There is one in particular that I remember to this day... a champion of a place called $map:02000100$.
An outsider beat you? They must have been a great beast.
Not a beast... a man. And who said I lost?! I'm insulted that you'd think I would lose to a human... Still, this one was my match.
Who was he?
It doesn't matter. I don't even remember his name. All I recall is his long red hair, and the scars that covered his body.
He was too fast and strong to be a normal human. His punches... It was as if he somehow had command of animus. I wonder what sort of training makes a man like that...
Well? Do you have anything to say?
It sounds like he had real strength.

He did. And he got that strength on his own, through hard work. You, on the other hand, are only strong because of the master's animus, and you still faint from time to time! So you'd better train just as hard, understand?
Yes.

We're threatened by the strongest enemy we've ever met. We can lay low for now, but eventually we will need to unite our power and take him down. Will you be strong enough to do your part when the time comes?
You're dismissed.
Let's talk about something else.
You'd better have a good reason for interrupting my training.
I do not care for this $map:02000001$.
Maybe I needed more time to heal...
I've given it some thought, but I still don't understand why some of us would leave the master's guidance to live in human cities like $map:02000001$. $MyPCName$, do you like this place?
It's not too bad.
It's too loud for me!
Hmph. If you have time to enjoy the sights, then you have time to train!
Let's talk about something else.
Yes... Yes, it is, isn't it? It hasn't escaped my notice that you've been training hard lately. Don't strain yourself.
Let's talk about something else.
You have something to say to me?
Can I stay like this...?
My head is spinning...
Not all questions require an answer. Some mysteries are better left unsolved. But even I have trouble when to seek the truth, and when to let an issue lie...
What are you talking about?
Never mind. I've just had much on my mind lately...
You have something to say to me?
If that's true...
Nothing makes sense right now.
If things are to return to normal, then we must stay united. Don't forget that.
You have something to say to me?
I can sense animus in this place.
Nature is wonderful.
Lava and ice... an unlikely, but breathtaking, view. It reminds me of you, $npcName:11001711[gender:1]$, and myself.
You have something to say to me?
If we follow this energy...
Enough talk. We must focus on finding the artifact.
Forget it. Please...
I couldn't do it... I'm sorry...
I'm not telling you a thing. It's better that way.
Tell me what you have to say.
Who are those two behind you?
These are my companions. Don't worry, they aren't nearly as violent or nasty as they look.
I'm here!
Can you see me?
I'm here!
I've been waiting for you!
Why are you here?
See anything interesting lately?
Heh heh... Most humans can't comprehend the importance of my work here. Don't look down on me just 'cause I'm small!
But I can tell that you're more sensible then the other humans. You value meerkat ingenuity, yes? Not a thing happens here that we don't see.
So, what have you seen lately?

All kinds of people come through here, raising all sorts of ruckus. Sometimes they make angry noises at us because they can't get their security deposits back. Once time, I saw the guards drag away a human male because he wouldn't leave the pretty human female.
$male:Which pretty human female?,female:You mean me?$
$male:Lessee...,female:Nuh-uh!$ $npcName:11000515[gender:1]$. You know her? You better steer clear. She's pretty, but she's got thorns!
Did you find me?
Can you see me...?
This place is quiet.
You see me? You have exceptionally sharp senses.
What are you doing here?
Where's it written I've got to tell you anything?
Just curious.
Come on, tell me!
You may have enough free time to bug strangers, but I don't. Scram.
Let me think... No.

I've been waiting for you.
First thing's first. Let's get out of here. Be careful.
I've been waiting for you.
Sigh... You're...
Phew. That was close.
You've made a foolish decision, but I won't stop you. This is who you are.
Hmph. Looks like I'm stuck between a rock and a hard place.
We can't just let you die, now, can we? But you tell anyone I helped you, and I'll finish the job myself.
I don't know if I can do this...
Stop causing trouble! Just... just stop doing anything!
You're as reckless as I remember.
I've been waiting to meet you again.

What?
Ugh...
Ugh...

Heh heh heh...
What?

Mm? Yes?
Mm? Yes?
I'm just glad you're back. Don't let $npcName:11001715[gender:0]$'s words get to you.
You know him. He's a bit of a dummy. Nobody ever taught him how to express his feelings.
<font color="#909090">(This entrance leads... somewhere.)</font>
Heh heh heh...
Let destiny guide you...
Let destiny guide you...
<font color="#909090">(There's a strange charge in the air.)</font>
What?
Ahem! What is it?
Thank you for letting me back.
I don't want your thanks. Guidance needs you, even if I can't stand you.
I know you care, deep down!
Sigh... Hopeless, as always. If you have time to spout nonsense, you have time to train!
If you have something to say, say it.
If you have questions, ask $npcName:11001775[gender:1]$.
This is strange...
The animus of this sanctum seems tainted somehow.
Keep your eyes open, $npcName:11001775[gender:1]$.
Is this where Lone Spirit found enlightenment?
The further we go, the more unstable the animus becomes...
It is said that only the worthy were originally allowed into the sanctum.
The heirs of Guidance must follow this path...
Did the master walk this path, too?
These creatures are not normally so aggressive.
We'll talk later.
$npcName:11001775[gender:1]$, focus!
I sense the noble energy of the artifact.
You have something to tell me?
I sense something... foreign.
This sanctum should be...
There are supposed to be keepers for this sanctum.
How much further do we have to go?
The animus here keeps changing.
We aren't the heirs, but the sanctum seems to be accepting us.
It can't be... Is that the master's energy?
The flow of animus here is strange.
$npcName:11001715[gender:0]$ is right. There's something wrong here.
These guys woke up on the wrong side of the bed!
The legacy of Lone Spirit...
This is what Lone Spirit left behind...
I feel as if my animus is draining away...
You dare challenge me?
You dare challenge me?
You dare challenge me?
Where does my destiny lead?
Where does my destiny lead?
It's just a flesh wound...
Did destiny guide me here?
You must find your friends...
I'm alive! Thank you!
I'm alive! Thank you!
I'm alive! Thank you!
I'm alive! Thank you!
I'm alive! Thank you!
We need to hurry!
We need to hurry!
Even the breeze smells unpleasant.
My enemies will receive no mercy!
We'd better hurry before they get hurt.
Training has no end!
Training has no end!
He's gone.
I hoped we wouldn't be too late...
It's not going to work.
Training has no end!
This is what Lone Spirit left behind...
I feel as if my animus is draining away...
We are all Guidance!
The air is fresh and birds are chirping. Home sweet home!

Hehe. It really is a novel business model, isn't it? I guess I can tell you, if you're going to be working here.
Maple World's a pretty big place, but as we've developed newer, faster ways to travel, our systems of trade haven't really kept up.
People want things they can't get locally. Some people in $map:02000023$ might be starved for electronics from $map:02000100$, or others in $map:02010002$ might want handicrafts from Nerman artists.
The thing is, not everybody can afford to trot around the globe shopping for things they want. That's where my shop comes in.
Customers place their orders online for an item, and I acquire it for them. Then all they have to do is come in and pick up their merchandise. No muss, no fuss!

I've spent a long time building this business, and I've pretty much cornered the market. To do what I do, you need all kinds of connections and a shrewd business acumen. Luckily, I've got that in spades!
You will be working as a team with your three friends. One of you will work the cash register, the rest of you will work in the warehouse.
Customers come to the store to pick up their orders. All you have to do is find their items in the warehouse and ring them up at the counter. Easy, right?
When a customer comes to the counter, the cashier must greet them. The customer will tell you which item they've come to pick up, and the cashier relays that information to the warehouse workers.
The warehouse workers will need to find and bring the item to the cashier. Cathy Mart prides itself in its service, so the faster the better.
Also, keep in mind that the store has an automatic cleaning system to keep the place nice and tidy.
That means that any item from the warehouse you leave lying around will be removed very soon after. That's why it's crucial you give the item to the customer directly.

Do you have two or more grasping appendages? Can you lift things? You're hired! I don't care about your age, job, level, or any of that nonsense. All I need you to do is work together to fulfill customers' orders with blinding speed.
The four of you must work together from the moment the store opens until it closes. No quitting, and no breaks!

My sisters say I'm prettier than any flower. I agree.
How may I help you?
So pretty!
I know, right? All three of us are pretty, but the prettiest one is... oh, you were talking about the flowers. Sure, they're pretty too! Ah, forget what I said earlier.
How may I help you?
Please grow strong and healthy.
They smell even nicer today.
You want to know the secret to a beautiful garden? Take care of your plants with love, and they'll repay you by growing.
Can I help you?
La, la, la! I feel so good!
Fresh air, beautiful flowers... I can't ask for more!
Mm, mm! They smell delicious!
This is my favorite place. It's beautiful and smells even better. And, you might not know this, but I can also eat delicious food here!
What is it?
Good, I've picked plenty today.
I'm going to make something lovely with these flowers.
I filled my backpack with flowers, and now I can smell them all the time! Oh, don't worry. They're not heavy at all.
Oh, hello.
What kinds of flowers make good gifts?
I'm going to make a cute little bouquet with all kinds of flowers.
I don't think anyone hates flowers, right? Everyone has to have a favorite flower or two.
Can I help you?
I didn't come to look at these flowers because they're pretty.
If you love flowers so much, then go pick them yourself. These aren't for you.
What is it?
I can make supplements and scented candles with these. Amazing!
I don't like pretty things. I like USEFUL things.
Everyone likes flowers because they're pretty. I don't care about that, because I use them to make supplements, scented candles, and potions.
Welcome to the $map:52000116$. I am $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$. If you have any questions regarding the caravans, feel free to ask.
Man, I never seem to have time to rest.
I wonder if Mother is doing well... I should visit her...

My job is to make sure $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the other members of the royal family have everything they desire. I'm always busy, but I take pride in my position and my service to $map:02000025$.
These matters are not normally my responsibility, of course, but $npcName:11003165[gender:0]$ asked for me personally due to the... sensitive nature.
Have you been to $map:02000076$? My mother lives there. I really should visit her, but I've been so busy that I haven't had the time since preparations began.
Once my work here is done, I'll go and visit her first thing! I've been sending her letters, it's just... she can't see. A disease took her eyesight. Sigh...
Whew! That was a close one.
I'm not so sure about this mission...
I'm so nervous! I need to use the bathroom!
You really pulled me out of the fire.
What are you talking about?
You're welcome, I guess?
You drove off that big, bad doggy! If it weren't for you... Jeez, I'd really be in a pickle.
You... do know how to fight, don't you?
Sure do! I even fought a rogue $npcName:21000001$ once! I mean, I lost, but I sure gave it my best!
Aw, jeez. I don't know about that look you're giving me...
You really know a thing or two about being a hero, don't you? Wow!
A hero...?
Yeah, a real, live hero! One day I'll be just like you. Just you wait!
How do you fare?
We were ambushed so close to the palace.
I never expected we'd be attacked there... did someone leak our information?
$npc:11001853[gender:0]$ says there's nothing wrong with you, but I need to be sure. How do you feel?
I'm fine.
I'm a bit sore...
Good.
Really? We should look into that. I'll have $npc:11001853[gender:0]$ schedule you for some exploratory surgery.
Th-that really isn't necessary!
It's no trouble. After all you did out on the field, this is the least we can do.
You were glowing when we found you. How did you do that?
I really don't remember.
I see. So it wasn't intentional.
I sure hope $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ comes back soon.
I'm surprised $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ doesn't live in a mansion...
One day, I hope I'm rich enough to have a house!
I hear $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ is one of the most dutiful, most devoted, most loving sons in all of Maple World.
He's a devoted... son?
Yeah! He's always off visiting his sick ma, who lives really far away. When I finally graduate, I'm gonna be a good son, too!
Why wait until then?
If my mom and dad saw me the way I am now, they'd die of shame. Gotta prove myself, first!
This place is dark. And wet. Just the sort of place I'd do crimes if I was a bad guy.
You saved me. Again. Jeez, I can't do anything right...
You'll get the hang of it.
Get a grip.
Y-yeah! Next time, it's my turn to save you!
Y-yes, $male:sir,female:ma'am$. <font size='20'>Aw man...</font>
If I was stronger, you wouldn't have to go through so much trouble. I'm sorry I'm such a burden...
How'd you get to be so strong, $MyPCName$?
The secret is hard work.
What can I say? I was born this good.
Hard work! I can do that. I'll start tomorrow! Or maybe next week...
It's all natural talent? Oh man. I guess there's no hope for me...
All's well!
I'm pretty nervous about my first time in the field.
I'm lucky to work in such a beautiful place.
You don't look like the usual beach bums we get around here. What do you want?
I'm part of the caravan escort.
I'm just passing through.
You're just in time! Check in with the others in the $map:52000116$ behind me.
You're a tourist? Oh, okay. In that case, enjoy your stay. I'm new to this whole guardsman thing, so I wasn't sure what you were up to. Now I know you're cool, so... cool!
Thank you.
Just doing my job, $male:sir,female:ma'am$! But it does feel good to be thanked. I wish more folk were like you.
The shadows see all.
Tremble before the way of the shadow.
What do you want?
I call the shots here.
What is it?
Heh heh heh...
A great day it is!
What brings you here?
$npcName:11003216[gender:0]$... That fool!
I won't give up until $npcName:11003216[gender:0]$ pays for his crimes. I just wish $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ would understand that I'm doing this for her...
I told you! As long as $npcName:11003216[gender:0]$ is alive, $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ isn't safe.
A fight between siblings can be even more fearsome than a duel between sworn enemies. I wouldn't stand a chance if $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ were my sister.
A fight between siblings can be even more fearsome than a duel between sworn enemies. I wouldn't stand a chance if $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ were my sister.
What brings you here?
What brings you here?

I'm learning so much just from standing in the same room as you, $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$! Something terrible has happened!
Training to be a guard is tough.
Huh...? Who is this small friend?
Please! Help! My people's princess is in danger!
We'll be lost if we don't save the princess!
Thank you for your help. I'll never forget this.
If it weren't for you, those thugs would have got me. I owe you.
I'd be a goner if you hadn't shown up.
Thank you for saving my brother!
I thought my bro was a goner... until you came along, that is.
I came to repay you for saving my brother. Now we're even.
Don't say I never did nothing for you.
You've been following me. Why?
I can tell you aren't one of $npcName:11000044$'s men.
You gave me a big scare.
How're you feeling?
And now we're fighting literal devils...
I never thought I'd miss my drill sergeant...
How may I help you?
One strange occurrence after another...
I hope things settle down soon.
I'm worried.
Sigh... What happened to him?
Why did you call me?
Hmph! I didn't do anything wrong.
I want to go home...
Ugh... Who are you...?
Ugh!
Just my luck.
Well, today's a wash.
$MyPCName$? Why?!
Why'd this gotta happen to me?
I can't go back empty-handed.
Ugh... Who are you...?
What's wrong?
I understand what $npcName:11003240[gender:0]$ is going through, but it's past time for him to grow up.
No... This c-can't...
Dad...
Not this... Anything but this... <font color="#909090">($npcName:11003240[gender:0]$ lowers his head, his shoulders trembling ever so slightly.)</font>
No... $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$...
Ah... $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$...
$MyPCName$.
In times like this, you need to keep your wits about you.
$MyPCName$!
$MyPCName$...
Amazing!
Long time, no see. You did great, as usual.
I'm no hero like you, but I'm sure trying!
Where are you headed?
I hope there are no dogs or mushrooms this time.
$map:02000087$. It's not far from $map:02000001$. The people there need help, and I'm going to do my best to give it to them.
C'mon! I'm not afraid of dogs or mushrooms anymore. I'm a real guard, almost!

Guh...
Are you a magic kitty?
Meheh! You're an old-fashioned one, talking animals are all the rage these days! I forgive your ignorance, though... so long as you bring me snacks next time.
Yep! A magical kitty for a magical place. This is $map:02000023$ after all, land of wonder and imagination. Welcome!
What's with the sour face?
Send me to $npcName:11003254[gender:1]$.
Has my magic failed? Impossible!
Hurry it up!
I'm trying! Close your eyes. It'll work for sure this time!
There's something... dark blocking my magic. There's no way to get to Ellinel right now.

I'm lost.
I'm not depressed.
On to the next portal! Since you've passed through the gate to $map:02000023$, the portal there will open new paths to you. But if there's nowhere to go, the portal won't work.
You look worried. Go ahead, put your feet up and tell me your troubles.
What is it?
This is why I don't like kids. They want to be heroes, but they can't even tie their shoes on their own.
But don't you think Professor $npcName:11003251[gender:0]$ is looking especially good lately? His skin has taken on a beautiful pasty sheen from all his hard work. I could stare at him all day...

Tell me about the exam.
Humans can't do anything alone. If you can't figure it out, ask someone to help you.
What brings you here?
Ta-da! Taaa-daaa!
It's a glorious day!
What brings you here?
Tell me about the five auras.
The Vayar live in the mountains to the northeast. Break a Vayar apart, and you'll get some Steadfast Will. It isn't easy...
Tell me about the Vayar.
They're solid. And tough. Magic doesn't work on them, either. You've got to fight them up close!
What's going on?
Hahaha... Hohoho...
Today's fortune is... hot...

Tell me about the five auras.
The singewings live on Bahram Mountain to the north. They protect their eggs on the mountaintop. You can get Blazing Courage by stealing those eggs...

Tell me about the singewings.
Tell me about the dragon eggs.
It's actually a burning volcano. I wouldn't climb it without the right gear. Unless you're lava resistant...?
I need to ask something else.
The singewings are fire-breathers. Their breath is even hotter than lava...
I need to ask something else.

They look gentle, but I wouldn't touch them. Their thorns are sharp!

There are peaks upon peaks at Zulu Canyon. If you don't have wings, you won't be able to cross it.

Nothing in this world is impossible.
Focus on your inner self.
Can I help you?
Tell me about the five auras.
An aura has no physical form. It's intangible. Still, if you focus hard on one thing, you're bound to reach your peak.
When you focus one gathering one type of aura, you'll feel it build up. Once it's full, it can be placed in a bowl, like water.
Need something?
Thank you for participating in our study.
Please take the simulation seriously.
Welcome to the Xenon Systems Research Lab. I want to thank you for joining our study. It wasn't easy finding a guild to participate in our experiment, but I suspect you just might enjoy it!
Do you have any questions?
What's the Xenon System?
Why do you need guild members for your test?
What's this newfangled "virtual reality" thing?
I'm ready to get my VR on!

The Xenon System is a combat simulation conducted in virtual reality based on the premise of psychic resonance. In layman's terms, it's an array of minds working in harmony with a computer to create a virtual world.

Essentially, the computer draws on the memories of everyone connected to create a simulated world that is almost indistinguishable from reality. This simulation is the perfect place to safely run all manner of tests.
You may already be familiar with our technology's predecessor. Have you ever participated in a Chaos Raid?
I've participated before.
Nope, never.
I see! Yes, you carry yourself like someone who has overcome great trials.
It wasn't that big of a deal.
Uhh. Thank... you...?
Ah, is that so? If I was still young and lithe like you, I'd be running headfirst into danger at every opportunity. You really should take on the challenge, at least once.
Maybe I'll give it a go.
That's nice.

Ermm... In any case, we've learned a great deal by analyzing data about individuals participating in Chaos Raids, such as how shared hardships lead to team bonding, which in turn lead to greater cooperation, and greater success in battle.
However, as scientific tools, the Chaos Raid simulations are inferior. They are little more than a glorified entertainment system, if I'm being honest.
But now with the Xenon System, we can expose our guinea pi–errm, volunteers, to all sorts of situations, and conduct studies of real scientific value! It truly is a technological marvel.

The possibilities are endless! Everyone from the Royal Guard to the fire brigade can train in real-world situation without risk. Adventurers can visit places they never dreamed of. And I can finally take a vacation without ever leaving the lab! Of course, none of this would be possible without the support of our generous benefactor $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$.
Do you have any more questions?
Why do you need guild members for your test?
What's this newfangled "virtual reality" thing?
I'm ready to get my VR on!
I wanted to put together a group study with a shared history, one conducive to cooperation.
After all, the greatest achievements in history come when a group of likeminded individuals unite behind a common cause.
There's no better example of this in everyday life than the communal efforts of guilds. I thought them a fitting subject of my test.

I hear we're offering an excellent compensation package for the study, although payroll is not my department. Personally, I think it's reward enough have contributed to the advancement of science, and to try out our amazing simulation. But whatever your motives, thank you for participating!
Do you have any more questions?
What's the Xenon System?
What's this newfangled "virtual reality" thing?
I'm ready to get my VR on!
Virtual reality is a simulated experience designed to believably replicate the real world. Each curated scenario is run on a separate computer server or "Link."
Each Link consists of a unique environment with its own hand-tailored objective.
Your goal, for the purposes of the study, is to cooperate with your guild members and complete the assigned objective.

I have to warn you, our simulations still have some kinks that need working out... You may run into situations or foes that are impossible to overcome, even with your substantial abilities. At such times, you'll need to input override codes provided by the lab.

<font color="#ffd200">Override Code</font> items are sold by your <font color="#ffd200">Guild Supply Merchant</font>. I wish we could give them away for free, but these little technological wonders are incredibly sophisticated and costly to produce.

As I've said, the various Links are all still under active development. As you proceed to complete the objectives of each simulation in order, we will analyze the data we collect, and use it to fine-tune the subsequent Links.
There's still a great deal of science to be done. I hope we can depend on your ongoing contribution!
Do you have any more questions?
What's the Xenon System?
Why do you need guild members for your test?
I'm ready to get my VR on!
Wonderful. I've already booted up the system. When you're ready to access the Link, please enter one of the simulation pods.
There's no need to be nervous. Nothing in this simulation can inflict any permanent harm. That said, the study will be meaningless unless you take the scenario seriously!
The future is in our hands.
The future is in our hands.
Speak. I'm listening.
Tell me about Tria's navy.
Speak. I'm listening.
Tell me about Tria's navy.
After all this time, you haven't seen the famous navy of Tria?
I suppose that's not unreasonable. Tria's navy isn't in Tria at the moment, after all.
A few months before the empress's grand court, the main fleet was dispatched to an island far away. Not even I know where the command came from.
Fa—I mean, Admiral Martini didn't even take the time to tell me about the mission. They simply set sail, leaving myself and a few petty officers to command a skeleton fleet.
They don't appear on Sky Fortress's radar, either. I'm not sure what to make of the bulk of our military vanishing at a time like this...
I wonder if he's even still alive...
I've said too much. You can trust in Tria's naval forces. The entire empire is under my personal protection.

Prove yourself to my officers, and I'll consider entrusting you with a mission for the Maple Alliance.
Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about duty!
Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about duty!
What's the matter? Don't have enough to do?
Uh...
What's the matter? Don't have enough to do?

If you've got time for chit-chat, you've got time for a mission!
If you've got time for chit-chat, you've got time for a mission!
If you think you've got what it takes to serve the Imperial Vanguard, then prove it.
I am the shadow that evil fears.
I am the shadow that evil fears.
Something on your mind, sweet stuff?
Who are the Shadow Walkers, exactly?
Something on your mind, sweet stuff?
Who are the Shadow Walkers, exactly?
Tsk, tsk. You should be careful about sticking your nose in Shadow Walker business. I'd hate for something to happen to it.
Well, that's a scary thing to say.

Well, that's a scary thing to say.
It's for your own good. If you really want to know about us, I'll tell you... when we're a bit closer.
Uh... If you say so...

Uh... If you say so...
Cheer up, hon. In fact, c'mere and I'll give you a kiss on the cheek!
That's okay! I just remembered I have to... go... away.

That's okay! I just remembered I have to... go... away.
Ha! No need to be shy!
Ha! No need to be shy!
Hey there, kitten. Looking to run missions for Dark Wind? I don't think you're ready to handle my business just yet.
Would you like to take on a mission for Green Hoods?
Would you like to take on a mission for Green Hoods?
How may I help you today, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$?
Why are Green Hoods here?
How may I help you today, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$?
Why are Green Hoods here?
That's a good question! Most people think we're simple rangers and woodswomen, wandering the forests of Henesys with our bows.
But we're so much more than that! We know all about helping people and making sure they have everything they need.
There's more to keeping the peace than simply being a good fighter. You need to know how to treat a wound and provide a shoulder to cry on.
That's why we've been entrusted with support operations on Sky Fortress.
Of course, you know firsthand how good we are in a fight. Even though I'm stationed up here on the bridge, I'm just as good with my bow as Eka!

I'm listening.
What are the Lumiknights, exactly?
I'm listening.
What are the Lumiknights, exactly?
The existence of the Lumiknights may no longer be a secret, but that doesn't mean I may speak freely of what we do. In accordance to the Pact of Dantalion, my tongue is bound.
Your what is huh?
The existence of the Lumiknights may no longer be a secret, but that doesn't mean I may speak freely of what we do. In accordance to the Pact of Dantalion, my tongue is bound.
Your what is huh?
Of course, if you apply the Third Law of the Equinox, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to let slip a word or two. So long as you remember your Rites of Obfuscation, of course.
Of... of course...
Of course, if you apply the Third Law of the Equinox, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to let slip a word or two. So long as you remember your Rites of Obfuscation, of course.
Of... of course...
You can't take these things too lightly. I once spoke the Three Devastating Truths to an insuitably prepared koborc, and it inverted into a quasi-nonsubstantiated autoform. Ha-ha!
Is that... funny...?
You can't take these things too lightly. I once spoke the Three Devastating Truths to an insuitably prepared koborc, and it inverted into a quasi-nonsubstantiated autoform. Ha-ha!
Is that... funny...?
You don't think so? I suppose my sense of humor is more sophisticated than most.
Anyway, about the Lumiknights?
You don't think so? I suppose my sense of humor is more sophisticated than most.
Anyway, about the Lumiknights?

Before you can even begin to comprehend the Lumiknights, you must open your mind to the myriad possibilities of the universe. It can take years of study. Shall we begin with a light reading of the Tome of Bombastic Insensations?
You know what? Never mind.

How unfortunate. Well, if you change your mind, you know where to find me.
How unfortunate. Well, if you change your mind, you know where to find me.

Let's see...
How troublesome...
Leave if you have no business.

I'll take care of this problem first.
I'll break through quickly!
Not confident? Then hurry up and tell me. I'll get rid of you first and then clean if you're getting in my way.
Harang... My hometown...
The lake on Harang is so much clearer than this...
I wonder how the weather on $map:63000044$ is today...
Tell me about $map:63000044$.
I want to see $map:63000044$ at its most pristine.
Show me $map:52000058$ when it's poisoned.
Bring me to $map:52000059$ during an eruption!
If you've ever been to $map:63000044$, then you know that it was once a peaceful haven. The water was clean and clear, the fish flourished... My beloved hometown...
I'm not sure why, but the water's become muddy and poisonous, and weird fish have started showing up. There was nothing we could do...

Then, a little later, $map:63000044$ erupted into a giant volcano! Some folks thought it was a mermaid's curse, and others claimed that it was a government plot. Personally, I think the volcano was always there, sleeping... Waiting...
Anyway, I can send you to any version of $map:63000044$ that you like. Whether you seek the pristine lake or a sea of molten lava... How can I do that? It's simple.
But it's nearly time for my nap, so I won't go into the details now. Besides, what's the point of life without a bit of mystery?
When it was clean and peaceful, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!
When it was mysteriously contaminated, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!
When it was covered in hot lava, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!
Have you ever been to $map:63000044$? It's quiet and empty... the perfect fishing spot!
How do I get there?
You can go there after you finish the fishing quest in the Maple Guide. Every fisher should visit that place at least once in their life.
The simulation has exceeded my wildest expectations!
Feel that heat? You can't beat this level of detail!
Hello in there. The simulation is stable, and it appears the test is proceeding nicely. You look a bit singed around the edges, but otherwise in good spirits.
What are you doing here?
What now?
I came to check on your progress. What do you think of my hologram? With my current avatar settings, I can observe the test without interfering.
Interfering with the results of my own test would invalidate all of the data I've collected, after all. Which would be quite silly after all the trouble I went through selecting test subjects.
Don't mind me. I'll be here observing. Just go about your business as if I weren't even here.
What now?
Erm... You don't know?
<font color="#909090" size="20">Should I tell them? I suppose they'll figure it out sooner or later... I'll just consider this a minor acceleration in the test plan.</font>
So... What am I supposed to do again?

Well, I suspect I've already told you that if you hit a roadblock in the simulation, you'll need a special override code to proceed. Do you have <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000627$</font> in your possession?
I've got it right here.
Nope.
Well now... That's a bit disappointing. I'm afraid if you want to climb any higher, you'll need <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000627$</font>. You can purchase it from your Guild Supply Merchant.
It's a bit unfortunate, but unless one of your party members has the code in their possession, it might be prudent to restart this test at a later date.

Ah, excellent. Well now is the time to put it to work. Using the <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000627$</font> should alter your avatar's biometric data, transforming you—as you might have guessed—into a $npc:34000100$, which will allow you to safely reach the summit.

Once you've transformed into a $npc:34000100$, you'll be virtually impervious to the heat of the lava. However, $npc:34000100$ aren't very strong flyers, so your best recourse will be climbing from ledge to ledge. Oh! And tapping the <font color="#ffd200">X key</font> will give you a nice boost of speed.

$npcPlural:34000100$ are not overly protective of their young, so you should have no difficulty collecting their eggs. However, they are particularly ornery and aggressive in general, so I wouldn't recommend getting too close to the adults.

See that glowing circle around them? It represents their natural threat response. Step foot inside, and you'll be met with their terrible fire breath, which burns far hotter than the lava pools they call home.
The volcano's summit is their breeding ground. Your task is to reach it, and collect five eggs. Good luck up there!
I can't wait to see what will happen!
It's a wonder why this practice was banned...
The simulation is stable. Brainwaves look good. All right, let's get the ball rolling on this test!
What are you doing here?
Got any advice for completing this test?

I must admit I have a particular interest in this simulation. You see... An anonymous author from bygone days once wrote about the majesty of the $npcName:99990021$ which occurs so rarely in nature. However, the process if artificially mixing slimes to create them was legally prohibited some time ago.

Doesn't that just make your mind race? Why? What was so dangerous or terrible about trying to artificially create a $npcName:99990021$? That fabled splendor... I'd love to see it with my own two eyes.
Sooo... What should I be doing?
Come now, you know I'm not supposed to interfere with the test.
Am I supposed to make a $npcName:99990021$?
Err...!<font color="#909090"> <font size="20">Should I tell them? I can't interfere with the test... Of course they're bound to try mixing them sooner or later...</font>
...Ahem. I suppose it would be all right if I simply explain how the machinery works.

The <font color="#ffd200">color meter</font> represents how many of each color of slime have been added to the machine. If the meter for any color reaches the red, that means you've exceeded the appropriate amount of slime.

As the mass production of artificial slimes has been outlawed for some time, the blueprints for the related machinery is quite dated and they are likely a bit imprecise. This means that being a single unit over or short of the meter's limit should not impact your success.
To achieve the perfect slime ratio, you'll need to get the five color meters as close to 100% as possible.

Ah, but there's one important thing to be aware of. The slimes come in three different sizes. The larger the slime you squash, the faster the gauge fills up! Good luck achieving the perfect color ratio!
