SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010864_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010865_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010866_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010867_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010868_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010869_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010870_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010871_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010875_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010876_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010877_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010872_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010873_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0808172007010874_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0809135407010883_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0911140307011160_NAME:[F]LumiStoneJewelBox_01:[L]NA
Do you have business with me?
Haha, let's get this party started! Pew pew! That's the sound of me blowing everyone away with the power of my cannon!
If you want to be happy, there's one rule to live by: figure out what you wanna do, and do it! In my case, that's listening my cannon purr as it pumps out hundreds of rounds a minute.
Bada-dada-da-da-da!
They're so lucky I can't use my cannon in the royale.
What's up?
This world is ruled by competition. Only the best win.
If you wanna survive, you've got to win, and there's no right or wrong when it comes to winning. Somebody's got to go, you or them.
If you want to win, you've got to be ready to do ANYTHING.
Was there something you needed?
There is power in anger, but you must never lose yourself in the heat of battle. When all that's left is devastation, there are no winners.
Powerful, decisive action is the key to victory.
Can't talk. Important mission.
Sorry, I don't have time for games... I'm here on a special mission. My partner said to meet him at the tables on the dock over by the balloons, but he's nowhere in sight.
What could be keeping $npc:11004221[gender:0]$?
I can't really talk right now.
Can't talk, secret mission. I told $npc:11004220[gender:0]$ to meet right here by the balloons. Where is he? You don't think they got to him first, do you...?
Where is that $npc:11004220[gender:0]$?
Can I help you?
In my line of work, discretion and poise are vital. That makes this dapper fellow a very hot commodity...
Ohohoho!
<font color="#909090">(He glares at you, then down at the clarinet in his mouth, then back at you.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(He glares at you, then down at the clarinet in his mouth, then back at you.)</font>
Can I help you?
Hey, thanks for listening! We're Riot at the Danceclub. We all met during an audition and decided to form a band, kindred spirits and all that. We picked stage names to riff off the band name.
How may I help you?
When I think back on that audition at $map:52000061$, I can't help but smile. That day changed my life.
Meow.
Meoow!
Hello.
Sigh... I can't go in there without my squad, but my friends are all no-shows and I'm starting to get pretty bored.
Bored, bored, boooored...
Hmm...
I despise the noise and brutishness that permeates society. On this topic, it seems that I and this vision of elegance are of one mind.
Ha! Do go on.
<font color='#909090'>(The fox tilts its head inquisitively.)</font>
Hello, $MyPCName$!
You must be here about this fancy chest, yes? It's enchanted to provide you with the materials you need to upgrade your gemstones.
Go ahead and give it a try. You'll need the proper reagents to open it, of course.
What reagents do I need?
I'm curious about the science behind this.
You'll want some $itemPlural:30001187$, which you can get by hunting monsters. That's the raw material that you will turn into gemstones.
To trigger the reaction, just use some $item:30001188$, and viola!
How do I get those?
Fortunately for you, I just so happen to sell them! I should warn you, though, that my supply is pretty limited. It's not easy to make, you know.

$npc:11000601[gender:1]$ discovered this chest while taking inventory of the royal reliquary. We think it was a gift to the empress from a faraway place. Anyway, it seems to turn the energy of monsters into something useful.
The $npc:11004215$, as we've taken to calling it, can convert all kinds of energy. As soon as she found it, $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$ set herself to researching the device.

To her surprise, the chest was even able to take the $item:30001187$ taken from monsters and turn it into gem dust. We agreed that it would be in everyone's best interest to make this device freely available to adventurer's like you!
Now, you will need $item:30001188$ to stabilize the process. It's simple physics, as I'm sure you know.
What materials do I need?

The empress has declared that all experienced adventurers shall have access to this enchanted chest here! Not you, though. I'm afraid you're not quite experienced enough. Would you be so kind as to come back when you're level 50?
I knew you would succeed.
I knew you would succeed.
I know you are powerful, but you still need to look after yourself.
You've protected the lady from harm once again. I'm in your debt.
You've protected the lady from harm once again. I'm in your debt.
The lady's happiness is my happiness. Please accept my thanks on her behalf.
You're really amazing, you know that?
You're really amazing, you know that?
I hate tedious matters, but I suppose I can help if you're the one asking.
But if you happen to find anything interesting, you'd better bring it to me instead of $npcName:11004103[gender:1]$! Promise.
I cannot fathom how much more powerful you'll grow.
I cannot fathom how much more powerful you'll grow.
It's an honor to be working by your side once more, friend.
Amazing work, $MyPCName$.
Amazing work, $MyPCName$.
I wish everybody was more like you.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
Good work, $MyPCName$. I'd better head back to $map:02000001$ now.
I haven't seen his face in some time.
Hmph.
Hmph.
I'm sorry I wasn't of more help...
Is this goodbye?
Is this goodbye?
You did a great job!
I wish $npcName:11004238[gender:0]$ felt more like celebrating. I guess he's embarrassed about missing all the action.
Next time, Guidance will be there to help! Just say the word.
I still feel out of sorts.
I still feel out of sorts.
I am truly in your debt. Thank you. I'm sorry about everything.
I'm ashamed of myself.
I'm ashamed of myself.
What you saw back there, that wasn't me.
You better not tell anyone else about this! Especially not $npcName:11004054[gender:1]$!
How can I help you?
I feel like I'm still in a dream.
I'm so confused. My memories are all jumbled. I think I need some time.
I come from a long line of proud moon bunnies. I'm here to give you the blessings of the moon!
Happy anniversary!!
Let's all get together and make happy memories!
Are you enjoying the anniversary party?
I sure am!
No. It's terrible.
You know how to have fun! Did you find the special treasure chests at the top of $map:63000089$?
How do I get to them?
Climb all the way up the cliff to the north of $map:63000089$ and you'll find a whole heap of golden treasure chests!
It'll be a piece of cake for an adventurer like you. Anyway, good luck!
R-really? Maybe... maybe you just need to find something fun to do? Like... did you know about the treasure chests at the highest point in $map:63000089$?
I don't! How do you get to them?
I don't care!
Waaaaah...
Can't you... can't you just pretend to care? I worked sooo hard to put this party together... Waaah...
Oh, just tell me, already.
It's been a while since I last met a stranger. Hey, adventurer, does darkness still exist in the world?
It's been a while since I last met a stranger. Hey, adventurer, does darkness still exist in the world?
You realize this IS the land of darkness, right?
I see... I guess our efforts haven't paid off yet...
What do you mean?
After this world was created, my kind studied magic here for a long time. We sought to stand against the darkness that everyone else thought had disappeared.
What kind of magic did you study?
Powerful magic! Magic that could drive away darkness! Magic of light, hot and bright! Magic that is not easily accessible, not even to us...
Wow. You're really passionate about this, huh?
We are oathbound to banish the darkness. It is our mortal enemy, and it has tried to destroy us again and again, ever since learning of our existence.

We pushed and pushed to master ever more powerful magic as our enemy, the darkness, grew stronger. But we grew too greedy. Our effort to put the darkness to sleep before the power of the goddess of light ran out... wasted!
Though we failed, we watch over this world still, ever mindful of our pledge to drive out the darkness.
Only when the darkness disappears from this world will I be able to rest in peace...
<font color="#909090">(Something is crudely scratched here.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Something is crudely scratched here.)</font>
"That man is the root of all evil!"
"He appeared out of the blue, pale as a ghost. Even my cows were scared of him."

"But I couldn't kick him out. He seemed injured, and I was raised a gentleman. But letting him rest in my fields was a mistake. He pulled out a black bottle, grinned this sick little grin, then poured it all on the ground."
"Everything happened quickly after that. The dark shadow that blossomed out of the liquid..."
"My livestock were engulfed by darkness. They cried out as they transformed into monsters. The fields and streams turned black as ink. Even the people living on the farm became twisted."
"I tried to outrun the darkness, but I sense my time is short. I can feel the corruption of this forsaken ground crawling up my legs, slowly transforming me..."
"If you can read this, flee! Flee at once! This land is cursed. If you stay, in the end, you'll become... like me... IT IS TOO LATE!"
<font color="#909090">(Strange letters appear beneath that. You can't decipher them, but they send a chill down your spine.)</font>
Looks like another day with no luck. Hm? Who are you?
Looks like another day with no luck. Hm? Who are you?
No one important. I'm just passing through.
You're either brave or real dumb, to come all the way out here. Anyway, my name's $npcName:11004252[gender:1]$. I'm here observing.
Observing what?

Observing the movements of $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$'s army. He's one of the Seven Commanders, you know, and I have it on good authority that he often sends his troops through $map:03000115$ and $map:03000118$.
Are you sure that's wise?
Pfft, I'm not scared. I have family in Maple World, and I'll do anything I can to keep them safe, including marching right up to $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ and stopping him right here and now.
Thanks.
No need to thank me. I'm happy if my family is happy. You should keep it up, too.
Everything seems fine today, but if those monsters dare to return... I'll show them!
Everything seems fine today, but if those monsters dare to return... I'll show them!
I've never seen you around these parts before. You're not up to any funny business, are you?
Nah, just passing through. What's up with this place anyway?

This place, $map:03000165$, used to be infested with monsters. But it wasn't the castle who cleaned it up, oh no! Let me tell you, it was us folks from the Lumina Liberation Army! And to think, this place didn't even have any roads!
We keep the peace here now. Can't rely on those castle folk, you know?
...You realize this place is totally infested with violent pig-folk right?
Compared to before, this is nothing! I admit it's still a work in progress, but one day soon we'll be rid of all those monsters!
<font color="#909090">(The water in the "Demonspring", for which the surrounding area is named, is neither red nor black as one might expect, but rather a sickly translucent green.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The water in the "Demonspring", for which the surrounding area is named, is neither red nor black as one might expect, but rather a sickly translucent green.)</font>

(It's said that the spring was tainted long ago by the blood of the goddess of darkness. It is also said that this spring contains the blood of an ancient turtle. No one knows the truth of the matter.)
<font color="#909090">(Nevertheless, it's probably best not to let the liquid touch you.)</font>
Just look at that delicious candy and that sweet cream! How could anyone possibly resist? Hehe.
Just look at that delicious candy and that sweet cream! How could anyone possibly resist? Hehe.
So sweet! So very, very sweet. We're so blessed to eat such tastiness. Wouldn't you like to be blessed, too?
Aren't you worried about getting fat?
Oh, no. Oh, no, no, no, never. Doesn't it just look irresistibly scrumptious? Don't you want to just take a lick?
It can't be that great...
You see those monsters over there? They're a long way from their natural habitat. They're all here because they're in love with these sweets. Such tasty, tasty treats.
That actually sounds kind of dangerous.
Dangerous? No way! Would we lie to you? There's nothing sweeter than to live life here amongst the world's tastiest treats.
Uh, yeah. This is where I get the heck out of here.
Where are you going? Have a taste!
<font color="#909090">(Pills and liquids in an assortment of colors lay scattered about.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Pills and liquids in an assortment of colors lay scattered about.)</font>

<font color="#909090">(A brief note can be found next to each item.)</font> <font color="#ffd200">Cure-all Anesthetic Ver. 2</font> Prevents blood clots, relieves fever and pain. Effective on muscle pain. Take up to 3 pills per day. Symptoms should abate within 2 days.

<font color="#ffd200">Goldus Pharmaceutical's Digest+ Tab Ver. 5</font> Aids with indigestion, loss of appetite, and overeating. Note for next test session: must be swallowed whole. DO NOT CHEW! Consume 3 times daily, with meals. Take for 3 full days for best results.

<font color="#ffd200">Yellow Skin Goo (Name Pending)</font> Minimizes appearance of eczema. Ointment should also treat folliculitis, boils, and acne, but the tests will tell for sure. Clean affect area, apply twice a day. Or, apply on a clean gauze and staple to skin. Wait, tape might be better.
<font color="#ffd200">Ludi-solver (Experimental Solvent)</font> Slows down or reverses the ludibrification process. NOT TO BE USED ON HUMANS. For inanimate object only. Ingredients extremely toxic.
<font color="#909090">(Hot steam rises from deep underground.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Hot steam rises from deep underground.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Steam rises up from what appears to be a bottomless chasm. It's quite hot, and you think you smell sulfur.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Rumor has it that $npcNamePlural:21000053$ make their den below. The steam that rises from deep underground is said to be toxic to humans.)</font>
It's soooo hot. And I've made no progress on my research. Ugh...
It's soooo hot. And I've made no progress on my research. Ugh...
What are you researching?
Oh, not much. Just, you know, the dragon that lives here in $map:02000011$.
Maybe. That's what I'm researching. I personally believe that $npcName:23100011$, the legendary dragon, lives here, but I'm searching for proof. You've heard the legend, right?
Nope! Tell me!

Once upon a time, not too far from here, there was a place called the Forest of Wisdom. One day, the fire dragon turned the place into a sea of flame. It was the greatest loss of life in the history of the world. Supposedly, the dragon slumbers somewhere here in $map:02000011$.
This area didn't used to be so hot... Not until after the fire dragon went into hiding here.
That's my theory, at least. Anyway, if you find anything, let me know. I kind of want to go home now.
<font color="#909090">(The water seems to be flowing all right, but it also appears rather... viscous.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The water seems to be flowing all right, but it also appears rather... viscous.)</font>
Recently, this place has been transforming into ludibrium at a rapid pace. Once ludibrification starts, everything becomes mushy and then solidifies instantly.
<font color="#909090">(This ludibrification has been happening all over Maple World. There's no prevention, except to be careful.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Will everything eventually become ludibrified?)</font>
Stupid, stupid, stupid! Where is he?
Stupid, stupid, stupid! Where is he?
Where is who?
Oh. Um. Just this guy who skateboards around here sometimes. He looks sooooo cool. I've been waiting for him.
Oh, were you guys meeting up here? Is he late? Tsk, tsk.
Um... I haven't actually officially met him yet. But that's what I've been waiting around for! I want to ask him for his name and number!
Seriously, though, a girl's got limits. I've been waiting here every day for a week, and he hasn't showed up once! Now my legs hurt. Maybe I should give up.
Aww, just wait a little longer. Never give up!
Ugh, fine, I'll give him one more day. I mean, he is, like, super hot.
(There's a placard in front of the palace.) There exists on Karkar Island two grand mansions that the Aliba Foundation has invested in. $map:02010062$ is one of them.
(There's a placard in front of the palace.) There exists on Karkar Island two grand mansions that the Aliba Foundation has invested in. $map:02010062$ is one of them.
This mansion features a wondrous garden and other amenities. Only those with the express permission of the Aliba Foundation can live here, regardless of wealth or social stature.

For a time, it became a popular tourist destination, with a cafe on the first floor and the terrace opened to the public. However, due to fans swarming the building anytime $npc:11000406[gender:0]$ visited for some much-deserved rest and relaxation, the house has now been closed to the public.
<font color="#909090">(This pleasant little pond holds a prominent position in $npcName:11001350[gender:0]$'s estate.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This pleasant little pond holds a prominent position in $npcName:11001350[gender:0]$'s estate.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The fish look like golden bladefish, a species unique to the island.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Their scales shimmer beautifully in the sunlight. The interplay of light brings a sense of peace to your mind...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Maybe it's time you got some fish of your own.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You see a large ship, which looks like it drifted here long, long ago.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You see a large ship, which looks like it drifted here long, long ago.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Its name is written on the side, faded by age and the elements. "The Sea Siren," it says. Then, in smaller text, "Fairy of the seas, protect our way.")</font>
<font color="#909090">(Scattered chests litter the area, and you spy some items not native to Karkar. It must have been a merchant vessel.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Amidst the upheaval, you notice a large deformation on the side of the ship... and broken bones everywhere.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Could some terrible creature of the seas have caused all this mayhem and destruction?)</font>

(This is the directory to the $npcName:11004264$.) Welcome to $npcName:11004264$, the pride of $map:02010002$! As the biggest multiplex shopping center on Karkar Island, we have what you're looking for!

(This is the directory to the $npcName:11004264$.) Welcome to $npcName:11004264$, the pride of $map:02010002$! As the biggest multiplex shopping center on Karkar Island, we have what you're looking for!
1F Cosmetics, Accessories, General Merchandise Offering a truly premium shopping experience, with direct imports from all over Maple World.
2F Fashion, Shoes, Handbags The hottest brands from all over the world in one place.
3F Youth Fashion The latest trends, straight from the streets.
4F Sports Sportswear and supplies to help you and your family stay in shape.
5F Men's Fashion A careful curation of the best men's brands in fashion, tech, and accessories.
6F Kids, Food Court From toys to fashion, everything a kid could want. Don't forget to check out the premium restaurants, perfect for any palette.
Ugh, what a headache. My hard work! My paradise! This is a nightmare...
Ugh, what a headache. My hard work! My paradise! This is a nightmare...
Oh. Hello. Welcome to my paradise, the $map:02010058$.
What's wrong? You seem really upset.
It's not a good time to visit the $map:02010058$. We're dealing with some, ah, difficult guests at the moment.
Who are you?
Have you heard of Blackstar? The seedy group heading up all sorts of underground dealings on Maple World? Well, they arrived on Karkar not long ago, and they've taken a liking to my club...
Especially that guy with the mustache. He never told me his name, but how could I not know it's $npcName:11000251[gender:0]$?
Shouldn't loyal customers make you happy, even if they're seedy?

Sure, business is booming, but these guys are mean! One of my waiters made a tiny mistake on an order, and those thugs pulled a gun on him. Sure, they laughed and gave him a big tip in the end, but that's not the point. I still had to buy a new mop after he peed in his pants.

Listen, for me, it's about happiness, not money. I opened this joint because I was tired of being a programmer. I wanted freedom and less stress, and then this happens! I'm seriously considering closing this place and begging for my old job back.
Never give up on your dreams!
My paradise! Give me back my joy!
Breathe in. Breathe out. Stare at the sea. Yes, yes, it's coming back to me now. You've taught me a valuable lesson again today, ocean.
Breathe in. Breathe out. Stare at the sea. Yes, yes, it's coming back to me now. You've taught me a valuable lesson again today, ocean.
Yes, ocean, you're right. I must start over with a heart of gratitude. I must devote myself to my training!
Hiiiii! What are you doing?
I am gazing upon the great ocean and filling my heart with peace. I thought the spirit of rock had died within me, but after discussing it with the sea, I realize it had just gone on a little break.
What happened?

My hands still tremble when I think back upon that day... It was the Maple rock festival, and thousands watched as I made a terrible mistake in the middle of my song. Since then, I've never been able to play that part right.
And the ocean is helping you with that...
Yes! Thanks to the ocean's wise advice, I am once again filled with the spirit of rock. Can't you see it shining in my eyes?
Come to my next concert, and you'll see for yourself that I've been transformed by the sea.
Welcome to $map:02010012$! I'm $npcName:11004267[gender:1]$, the spokeswoman! Or at least, I will be, when the place finally opens...
Welcome to $map:02010012$! I'm $npcName:11004267[gender:1]$, the spokeswoman! Or at least, I will be, when the place finally opens...
When is this place gonna open?
That's what I wanna know, too! I heard there's some kinda bug problem holding up the construction...

But honestly, they tell me I have the job, so shouldn't they open so I can start working? I already spent a fortune promoting myself... Anyway, remember my name, and watch as I become the best model in all Karkar!
<font color="#909090">(This bridge connects the city to the desert of Karkar. It plays a major role in the development of the island.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This bridge connects the city to the desert of Karkar. It plays a major role in the development of the island.)</font>

<font color="#909090">(This wonderful bridge was co-designed by the genius architect brother Opath and Oparts. The younger brother, Oparts, was in charge of the western exchange. His flair for the fabulous is evident in the bridge's flashy lights.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(There are over 100 lights in use on the West Auto Bridge, and they symbolize the glamor and promise of the big city.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This bridge connects the city to the desert of Karkar. It plays a major role in the development of the island.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This bridge connects the city to the desert of Karkar. It plays a major role in the development of the island.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This wonderful bridge was designed by the genius architect brother Opath and Oparts. The older brother, Opath, was in charge of the eastern exchange.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(He added intriguing detail and a touch of mischief to the design, including hidden magic portals and shortcuts.)</font>
Stop stomping around so loudly! You're giving me away!
Sorry. What're you up to?
Isn't it obvious? I'm observing! This data is gonna be used in an amazing research paper I'm gonna write.
Sure, but what's with the disguise?
Look around! The ecosystem here is an impossible combination of nature and machine. There's so much we don't know about this place.
Now add in my disguise, and the answer to your question should be obvious, right?
I still don't get it.
Ugh, use your brain! I'm conducting monster research! I'm in costume so they don't flee or attack. Obviously.
Now that I've answered your question, can you run along? I haven't moved from this spot for a week, and the last thing I want is for you to ruin my research!
<font color="#909090">(This squat desert plant drips with a brilliant red sap.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This squat desert plant drips with a brilliant red sap.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You're pretty sure you've seen this shade of red in the clothes and makeup worn by the people of Karkar.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You've seen plants like this all over Karkar, but they're especially plentiful here.)</font>
I've been duped! Everyone said this was the best vacation spot, but no one told me about the snakes!
I've been duped! Everyone said this was the best vacation spot, but no one told me about the snakes!
I knew I should've done more research. But things were so busy at work...
Is this place really that popular?
Oh, yeah, it's all the rage. Everyone talks about the treasure chests in the water, so I had to see them for myself. But... the snakes! Why are there so many snakes?
Are they poisonous?
Everyone says they're not, but I'm not so sure. I took out a second mortgage to afford this trip. I can't believe this is happening!
Forget the treasure chests... I'll be happy to get out of here alive! My vacation is ruined!!
The moonlight is nice tonight. Very beautiful, very beautiful!
The moonlight is nice tonight. Very beautiful, very beautiful!
And what brings you here tonight, human?
I'm just passing through.
Then you must visit our camp in the $map:02010033$! I'm sure they won't mind you dropping by. Probably.
The moonlight in our city is different from the moonlight out here, but no matter what, the moonlight is always beautiful!
What a wonderful, joyous day!
What a wonderful, joyous day!
What are you so happy about?
Every day is a joy! I was sent up here because I was scared of the desert monsters, and at first, I was scared of being so high up, too... But I've adjusted!
I'm overjoyed to be in such a safe place. Now I have friends and don't need to be scared of any monsters!
Stay positive, and good fortune will follow! Never forget that, human!
Ugh, this sucks. When can I get out of here?
Ugh, this sucks. When can I get out of here?
What's wrong?
Who are you, and why is that any of your business?
C'mon. Just tell me what's bothering you.
If you must know, I'm upset because I'm trapped here. There's no way out, and...
Maybe I can help you get free!
What?
Never mind. It's not worth explaining to you. Just move along.
<font color="#909090">(Snake statues like this one can be found all over Karkar.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Snake statues like this one can be found all over Karkar.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You've noticed that these seem to be placed wherever poisonous snakes can be found. Perhaps they're a warning for the locals?)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Then again, these statues look pretty old. Wouldn't the snake habitats have moved over time? Better be careful, just in case.)</font>
I sssmell sssomething that doesssn't belong...
I sssmell sssomething that doesssn't belong...
A ssstranger? You mussst be fearlessss indeed to venture Nazkar unprepared.
Hi! Who are you?
A foolisssh quessstion. Tsssk. Then again, you are an ignorant fool, ssso it'sss to be expected. I watch over Nazkar!
I've watched thisss place through countlesss lifetimesss. A hundred birthsss and deathsss, and ssstill the sssight assstoundsss me.
Wow! Do sssnakes, I mean, snakes even live that long?
Sssimple human, you ssstill think I'm just another sssnake... I will give you one warning: beware up ahead!
<font color="#909090">(You feel an ominous chill as you gaze upon the dragon statue.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You feel an ominous chill as you gaze upon the dragon statue.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This statue was once a grand piece of architecture, proudly displaying the spirit of the dragons. However, it's been altered by darkness.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The power of the dragons of light which once protected Nazkar is completely gone. Now, all avoid this once-sacred area.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This is a statue of the guardian deity of Nazkar.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This is a statue of the guardian deity of Nazkar.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The $map:02010034$ was the holiest sanctum of the lumarigons, the great dragons of light. Only the worthiest of the worthy could set foot in these halls.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(In spite of the spreading darkness, there's still a glimmer of the light in this statue's eyes...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A bright light shines through a crack in the wall.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A bright light shines through a crack in the wall.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This passageway was blocked off long ago, but something on the other side still shines brilliantly.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You can sense a different sort of power beyond the crack in the wall.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This sarcophagus has no name engraved upon it. Does an ancient lumarigon slumber within?)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This sarcophagus has no name engraved upon it. Does an ancient lumarigon slumber within?)</font>
<font color="#909090">(It's covered in a thick layer of dust. Still, the elaborate carvings are the work of a master artisan.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(As you gaze upon the sarcophagus, you're overcome by a sudden feeling of melancholy.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A distant roar echoes through the air.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A distant roar echoes through the air.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The tile is loose, but the roar reverberates through your body. Your every instinct tells you to run.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(For a brief moment, you swear you see something moving through the crack in the floor. Surely you imagined it...)</font>
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0906125207011147_NAME:[F]Develop
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0906125207011148_NAME:[F]Develop
Welcome! This is $map:02010002$, the heart of Karkar! On behalf of meerkats everywhere, I'd just like to say... Hiya!
Welcome! This is $map:02010002$, the heart of Karkar! On behalf of meerkats everywhere, I'd just like to say... Hiya!
Karkar Island is hot and dry. Drink lots of water to stay hydrated, and don't forget to slather on that sunscreen!
Ah, doesn't that balance between the fierce desert and the cityscape here in $map:02010002$ revitalize you? Say, have you ever visited the $npcName:11004264$?
I don't believe I've had the pleasure.
I sure have!
That just won't do! The $npcName:11004264$ is the hottest shopping spot in the whole city! Go ahead, run along now!
Isn't it so cool? I was thinking of heading over there tonight and treating myself to a new hat!
For such an old hotel, I suppose this place has its charm.
My cousin certainly devoted enough time and money to this place. He passed the hotel to me when he died, but I simply have no interest in running it.
Hello. How can I help you?
Welcome to our fine hotel.
Say the word, and I'll get it done.
Shall I take your bags?
Welcome, welcome, to Mon Bloody Chouchou Hotel!
The Mon Bloody Chouchou Hotel is right up this path.
Please join in our spooooky Halloween celebrations!
Do you have a thirst for adventure? Then come to the Mon Bloody Chouchou Hotel and celebrate Halloween with us!
Sounds fun!
Please take the portal here to the $map:63000065$. And enjoy your stay... Mwahahaha!
But, you know...
H-hello?
How lovely!
I do so love to holiday.
Oh dear. This bag is much too small.
Tell me, what's the one thing you must never, ever forget when you travel?
Your wallet, of course.
You can't travel without a suitcase.
Oh! I suppose your wallet is important. But is it the most important? Think harder!
You can't travel without a suitcase.
That's right! All of your most important things go in your suitcase, after all. If you're looking for something, you should always check your suitcase first.
I said I wanted the best. The best!
Don't trust anything that hangs from a wall.
Gravity is a cruel mistress...

I told my son to book me a room in the empire's finest hotel, and he put me up in this dump. Lo and behold, a picture frame dropped on my head while I slept, and now I'm dead! The other ghosts will laugh me out of town when they hear about this...
There, there. It's okay.
Just be careful around anything that hangs on a wall, okay? You never know when it'll fall!
Clean clean clean...
Tidy, tidy, tidy.
Pardon me. I'm cleaning just now.
It's my job to keep this hotel clean, and I'm darn good at it! Except... there's this one thing I can't seem to tidy up!
What might that be?
Over there, in the sofa by the window. There are papers stuck in there that I can't seem to get loose. Did someone put those there on purpose?
Everything in its place.
Whatever became of that gentleman?
Let's not make a mess of things.
A guest came the other day, but I haven't seen him lately. I do hope he's having a nice visit.
Who are you talking about?
A gentleman with a large briefcase. None of the other ghosts recognized him, but it seems that he was an acquaintance of mademoiselle.
Mademoiselle?
Yes, the lady of the hotel. There were evil thoughts in her mind when she met the gentleman. A ghost has a sixth sense about these things, you know.
What do you want?
You lookin' at me?
What'sa matter? Never see a real man before?
I don't gotta answer to you. Now scram, before I get angry.
What brings you here?
I'm not here to fight, friend.
Blackstar goes where the money is! Here's some free advice: keep your nose outta things where it don't belong.
How'd you become a ghost?
I ain't your friend, pal! You think you can talk down to me 'cause I'm a ghost? Is that it?
How'd you become a ghost?
To tell the truth... I got no idea. Boss sent me here on a job, and next thing I know... Pow! Ghost.
There, there. It's okay.
I don't want your stinkin' pity! Anyway, this place ain't so bad. It's real cushy, and I got tons of books to read.
Come to think of it, there were some real important-looking papers in one of the books I read the other day. Weird, huh?
Ooh la la!
That's the stuff!
Ooh la la! Nice!
Beautiful. Stunning. A gift from the goddess!
What are you going on about?
I can't get the woman in purple out of my head! I love a woman with pep.
You mean $npc:11004289[gender:1]$?
That's the one! You'd be head-over-heels if you saw her, too. So lithe. And those executive management skills? Ooh la la!
The other ghosts say she's mean, but I think she's better than the empress herself! A woman like that makes a guy wish he'd died young, so he'd have a handsomer ghost.
I'mma scratch everything!
I'mma scratch over here!
I'mma scratch over there!
This floor is mine, mine, mine!
Now I'mma ghost, I can talk to people! How fun!
'Cause I'm inna good mood, I'mma tell you a secret! Watch the floors around here, or you're gonna fall!
What's that supposed to mean?
Your foot's gonna fall! Watch the floors! Got it?
This place is nice...
I wanna stay here forever.
I don't want any more bad things to happen!
This room's really comfy. That's why all us ghosts are here.
We don't wanna bug the living folks, though. We just wanna watch them live their lives.
Did you see what happened here?
I-I was scared, so I hid behind the chair! That guy was real busy. I bet he dropped a bunch of his stuff all over the place.
Can you see me?
You can't see me, right?
I wish you couldn't see me.
I guess living people really can see ghosts on Halloween.
Please don't ask me if I saw anything...
Did you see anything?
N-no! I don't want that woman coming after me, so the answer is no!
I hope I can see papa again soon...
You're here! Just like you promised.
The future is in our hands.
We're on alien soil. Don't let your guard down.
I have no missions for you right now.
Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about duty!
I'm here, but most of my men are tied up defending Victoria Island. I hate being benched!
I am the shadow that evil fears.
My agents can't get past the insane AI that's controlling most of Kritias! I feel so... frustrated.
Would you like to take on a mission for Green Hoods?
Our survey teams encountered some mechanical trees during their exploration of Kritias. Just hearing about it gives me the creeps. Who would build such a thing?
Sorry, but I don't have any missions just yet.
It is time my order stood with the rest of the empire.
A strange power hangs over this place. A dark power...
Return to me when the time is right.
I've got a bad feeling...
I sense draconic power... Did I finally find them?
I've got a bad feeling...
Oh, it's you!
It's been a while! What're you doing here?
What are you doing here?
A few days ago I sensed an unusual energy coming from this place, so I came to investigate.
Did you find anything?
Did I ever! As soon as I arrived, I felt it—that familiar aura... The traces of dragons!
There's no question about it, dragons once lived in this land! I got to thinking that maybe they were related to the dark dragons that Biset told me about.
Now I'm just waiting for my next big clue.
Well, good luck!
Thank you!
This place is super weird...
I don't like this place... It's new and scary...
This place is super weird...
Ahh! You scared me!
What's gotten into you?
Oh... It's only you. Phew.
This place has me on edge. Everything's so different.

It seems like I'm the only one having any trouble fitting in. $npcName:11004322[gender:0]$ is so absorbed in his search for new ingredients. And it seems like $npcName:11004321[gender:1]$ has run out of all patience for me... Sniff.
I want to be of help tracking down traces of the dragons, but I'm just so anxious. I should've just stayed home.
That's crazy! I'm sure your friends are glad to have you here.
You really think so? Thanks... That means a lot. I'm sure I can muster up the courage to keep going.
This won't do...
It's hard to get my bearings in a weird place like this.
This won't do...
Huh?
Ah! It's you! How have you been?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks.
That's good to hear. So what brings you here?
I came here on an investigation.
I see, you too... Sigh.
We're here researching the dark dragons that Biset used to talk about.
How did you get here?
$npcName:11004319[gender:1]$ brought us here with her dragon power. It seems she's come a long way.

So far this new land seems like an amazing place, but some of us are having a harder time adjusting than others. $npcName:11004320[gender:0]$'s not acting like himself. Do you think you could offer him some words of encouragement?
I'll see what I can do.
Thanks! I'm counting on you!
Hm...
That might look good on my menu...
Hm...
Hmm?
Good to see you! It's been a while.
Yeah, whatever.
What are you doing here?
$npcName:11004319[gender:1]$ dragged us here to search for dark dragons.
Really? Have you found anything?
I have actually. New ingredients.
This place is littered with ingredients Maple World has never seen before!
When I integrate them into my menu, it'll blow people's minds. You should stop by my restaurant some time.
I'll definitely pay you a visit.
Cool.
You...
What are you doing here? Have you come to try and convince me to go home too?
Nothing like that.
...Really?
You don't look well. Are you feeling all right?
You're not the first person to say that.
Something $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ said was bothering me. I came here hoping to find answers.
Somehow $npcName:11004324[gender:0]$ figured out where I was going and came after me.
All he's done since is nag, sigh.
I'm not going to let anyone stop me from finding out what $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ told me was true.
Good for you!
Thanks! I appreciate your support.
Sigh...
$npcName:11004324[gender:0]$ is sweet, but sometimes I just need to be by myself.
What is she thinking?!
Sigh. Once $npcName:11004323[gender:1]$ sets her mind to something, there's little hope of changing it.
What's the matter?
Oh, $MyPCName$. Fancy meeting you here.
After not seeing $npcName:11004323[gender:1]$ for a few days I got worried. I asked around and found out she came here all alone. So, I dropped everything and followed her here.
I asked her what's going on, but she won't tell me anything. Maybe she doesn't think she can depend on me...
In any case, this is no place for her to be running off to alone! She needs to go home.
That seems like a conversation you should have with her.
I've tried! Maybe you can talk some sense into her?
I'm worried...
How can I get $npcName:11004323[gender:1]$ to change her mind? We should be in Victoria Island, not here!
Breathtaking!
Ahh... It's too beautiful.
Can't you feel it? The stunning aurora in the sky... The alien wildlife... This place is filling me with creative energy!
I feel it brewing inside. I'm ready to write a smash hit song!
Since when do you write your own songs?
Forget the $npcName:11004325[gender:0]$ you used to know. From this day on, I'm reborn as a guy who totally writes his own songs!
You just wait. The new and improved $npcName:11004325[gender:0]$ is going to take the world by storm!
Never thought I'd wind up in a place like this...
Keep your distance, chump!
Hold on. You're one of those Sky Fortress people. Sorry, I thought you were another stalker.
Why is $npcName:11004325[gender:0]$ here, anyway?
About that... Come closer, okay? I don't want to exactly shout this out.
$npcName:11004325[gender:0]$ isn't so popular these days. He's getting a little old for the gig, and there's lots of hot young talent in the idol game.
Some stars are able to keep working into their old age. But these stars can compose and write their own songs. $npcName:11004325[gender:0]$ can't do neither.
But my boy here heard about this strange new land and thought he might take a vacation to find his muse.
He wouldn't take no for an answer. Lucky for us, the president of his fan club has an in with Sky Fortress and we were able to hitch a ride.
Who's this fan club president?
I can't exactly say. Confidentiality, you see. But between you and me, she's pretty high up in the Sky Fortress food chain, if you catch my drift.
Hm...
This place is... strange.
I didn't expect to see you here.
Hey! Didn't see you there. I'm here to represent $map:02000051$.
Couldn't you have sent a diplomat?
...There were things I had to see for myself.
My father appeared to me in a dream. He said that $map:02000051$ would soon face a grave danger...
And then this place showed up. It couldn't be a coincidence, right?
More importantly, $npcName:11004328[gender:1]$ has a bad feeling about all this, and I trust her instincts.
I've never heard such a call...
I've never heard such a call...
Hey! Fancy meeting you there.
Quick question. You hear that noise?
What noise?
So, you can't hear it, either. That figures.
I keep hearing this crying sound. It's like a hurt animal... but it's no animal I've ever seen.
$npcName:11004327[gender:0]$ and I are new to this land, but I'm sure the crying isn't from a monster.
What could it be? There are so many secrets here.
I see... What a novel approach.
I see... What a novel approach.
I see... What a novel approach.
I see... What a novel approach.
What are you working on there?
Hm? Oh, I'm doing research on the magic of this continent!
The rumors have already spread as far as $map:02000023$ that the people of this continent practice a form of magic we've never seen.
There's no way that I would miss such a tantalizing opportunity for self-edification.
Just you wait! I'm on the verge of a groundbreaking discovery, one for the history books!
I look forward to hearing all about it.
Indeed!
Sigh...
Will he be okay without me? Maybe I should go back...
Sigh...
Sigh...
Why the long face?
$MyPCName$? It seems like I can't go anywhere without bumping into you.
When I heard about the discovery of a new continent from somewhere else, I rushed over in order to study their unique magical practices. But I'm afraid I haven't learned much.
It seems $npcName:11004329[gender:0]$ is, to the contrary, already deep into his research.
I was hoping to find something that would improve Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s condition.
I believe in you.
Ahem! W-well I'm not going to make any progress sitting around talking to you! Excuse me.
Those four... It can't be...
Children of the dragon... here? Am I dreaming?
Those four... It can't be...
Children of the dragon... here? Am I dreaming?
(Tap her gently on the shoulder.)
Ahh! Don't sneak up on a girl like that!
Oh, it's you. I didn't expect to run into you here.
I'm busy right now. Can we talk later?
What are you doing?
It's top-secret!
Actually, you'll never believe it. Those kids raised by the last dragon master? They're here!
I heard the rumors. That's the only reason I was willing to come schlep all the way here with $npcName:11004332[gender:1]$. But it turns out they were true!
See that girl with the blonde hair, way over there? I can smell her dragon juju from here. Unless I'm imagining things...
What I would give for an interview with them! Just to hear them talk about the lumarigons...
Same old Orde.
Hey, you know them don't you? Do you think you could introduce me? Please? Hey, where are you going?!
Hm...
I sense something powerful. Something... wrong.
Mm?
Hey, you!
Long time no see.
I wasn't expecting to run into you here.
What brings you here?
Well, that geezer—erm, Mr. $npcName:11004233[gender:0]$ sent me here.
The Frontier Foundation caught wind of something quite unexpected here on this continent that warranted investigation.
Traces of lapenta energy!
But I suppose you already knew that.
You should be careful. There's no telling what kinds of dangers lurk in this land.
You too. Take care of yourself.
Oh, you don't have to worry about me.
Hello.
Hello.
My friend. It is pleasant to see your face.
This place is beautiful, is it not?
I have never before walked such a land, under such a sky... and yet it strikes me as familiar, all the same.
Perhaps I am drawing nearer to the answers I seek.
I'm sure you are!
Thank you. Your enthusiasm always lifts my spirits.
Is $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ with you?
I asked him to accompany me, but I fear our vulpine friend declined my invitation. Oh, what I might have learned if he was here to aid me...
A lack his cutting insight...
Wow...
This place has exceeded my every expectation.
To think, we're standing in a land where magic has been made to serve technology. It's almost too good to be true!
See how these magic stones have been reduced to mere tools, like the cogwheel and the level?
I must learn everything about this place...
Soon, the Resistance will dominate Maple World using the technology of Kritias!
Now, isn't this something?
I've gotta admit, I'm impressed.
This whole place is, like, the opposite of Maple World. No wonder the boss was so eager to check it out.
I didn't believe a word of it, of course. But $npcName:11004334[gender:1]$ insisted, and... Wow. Just wow.
$npcName:11003191[gender:0]$ doesn't know what he's missing!
These readings are off the chart!
Is this for real?!
Huh? What happened?
Nothing happened. It's just... this place! I've never seen magic and science mashed together like this!
I need to get my hands on some of this aetherine stuff. If my calculations are right, the energy content of each of these little stones is... Well, it's explosive!
This could totally change how we think about energy!
A bit of an energy nut, aren't you?
Why wouldn't I be? This gives me an idea for a new reactor design...
You—?!
$npcName:11004336[gender:1]$?!
Boss! I was starting to think you didn't see me. Heh!
Keep your voice down, Boss! $npcName:11004334[gender:1]$ is right around the corner.
Is that why you're here? To spy on the Resistance?
No way! I'm here for critical research. At least, that's what I told $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$...
Boss, there's something you need to know. I've spotted the Resistance going in and out of $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$'s office.
They're up to something. Since I didn't know when you'd come visit me again, I decided I'd check it out for myself!
This place is way too dangerous for you. Let's get you ba—
Uh, heck no! Even if I lied to my fake boss, there really is a ton of stuff for me to research here.
Anyway, you're too busy to save the world and spy on the Resistance. You need my help!
$npcName:11004336[gender:1]$... By any chance, do you... have a huge travel budget?
Say something, $npcName:11004336[gender:1]$.
Why can't we just have a normal celebration? This is ridiculous!
What's going on? Where is everyone?
Come back... I'm lonely.
Have you seen my family? I... really miss them right now.
Why must the holidays always be so stressful...
Why must the holidays always be so stressful...
I must remain calm... I can resolve this... All things in their proper place...
If there's a problem, solve it! Blaming and complaining won't fix anything!
Things aren't looking so good right now... are you okay?
Yes, of course! Obviously we just need to remain calm and composed. CALM AND COMPOSED!
I hope this hasn't been too hard on poor $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$...
Is my family safe? What a stressful season this has been.
Ha, you like Bobo's red nose? Remind you of someone?
Ha, you like Bobo's red nose? Remind you of someone?
