SCRIPTNPCNAM_1109213607011764_NAME:[F]Develop
Why can't we just have a normal celebration? This is ridiculous!
This isn't... It's not at all what I wanted...
What a relief.
Thank you very much for helping us, $MyPCName$.
And... forgive $npcName:11004349[gender:0]$. I was the one who messed up, venting my anger in my diary...
Oh look, $MyPCName$. Snow!
I always love snow for the holidays.
Is it so much to ask that we have a normal celebration this year?
I've got a reputation as a know-it-all, but I can't imagine why anyone would do this to our family...
I rely on science to explain things... but how can it explain this...
You should focus on helping $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$ out here.
I'm not so sure about that, honestly.
I never would have imagined that thing was real...
Life is full of surprises. Case in point, that creature in our living room, celebrating with us...
...I guess I could get used to this.
So much commotion here... What's the big deal about a tree and some presents? Chill already!
What's so exciting about snow? It's just ice crystals. Nobody gets excited about an ice machine.
...Though I admit, it's kinda pretty out here.
I doubt you understand the joys of a freshly-baked cake. And the holidays are the perfect time for perfect cakes!
I do love baking, you know. It's one of my little personal joys. And there's nothing like baking for your family over the holidays.
Do you like cake?
What a ridiculous question. I love cake. And I love it so much that I cannot tolerate cakes that disappoint me.
You know how hard I work, but even I need a break.
Working is intensely satisfying. And it also makes my rest hours that much sweeter.
$MyPCName$, take care of yourself this season. Happy holidays!
I grow my own trees to decorate, you know. My commitment to the holidays cannot be questioned.
My favorite memory from my childhood is decorating our tree every year. Now that I tend the garden myself, it can be even grander.
If you're looking for a classic holiday tree, go evergreen or go home.
If you're looking for a classic holiday tree, go evergreen or go home.
Ooh, an evergreen?
There's nothing quite like it! Tall, bushy, and wonderfully scented... And if you're looking for the most beautiful tree, you'd need to get a Korean fir tree.
The Korean fir tree, you say? Hmm...
It grows on Mount Halla, and it's simply divine. A shame they're becoming harder to find these days. Climate change, you know.
You want presents? Hee hee.
You want presents? Hee hee.
Never mind, I don't want it.
I want it.
$npcName:11004349[gender:0]$ do better now. $npcName:11004349[gender:0]$ is sad.
What want? $npcName:11004349[gender:0]$ do best!
$npcName:11004349[gender:0]$'s big heart is enough.
How about a million mesos?
$MyPCName$... better than Santa! $npcName:11004349[gender:0]$ happy!
Sorry... $npcName:11004349[gender:0]$ no money. Sniff... Sorry. Very sorry.
$npcName:11004349[gender:0]$'s big heart is enough.
Did you know? The fairfolk love sweet things. LOVE them.
Did you know? The fairfolk love sweet things. LOVE them.
Wouldn't it be something if pure white snow tasted like candy?
Wouldn't it be something if pure white snow tasted like candy?
Happy holidays!
Happy holidays!
I'll be honest, I didn't think this place was so merry until you showed up.
I'll be honest, I didn't think this place was so merry until you showed up.
I'll be honest, I didn't think this place was so merry until you showed up.
Did you see $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$'s family?
$npcName:11004345[gender:1]$? That's $npcName:11004347[gender:1]$'s daughter. She's my boss, but she's off today. You sure she's not at home?
You won't know love if you don't express it. Confess your love to your crush for the holidays! It's the perfect gift!
The holidays are all about looooove.
I have a pair of skates I really love... so much so that I don't want to take them out of the box.
You skate with them still inside the box? Sounds kind of dangerous.
No way! I've never even worn them! I wonder what it'd be like to skate with them... Maybe that's what love is, taking risks.
The holidays are all about looooove.
Did you see $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$'s family?

I know $npcName:11004348[gender:0]$, he's $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$'s father. I saw him last night at the gardening club meeting. But I didn't see him today. I bet he's just at home... He mentioned wanting to decorate his holiday tree.
Why does everyone have to get all lovey-dovey for the holidays? It's gross for the rest of us.
Why does everyone have to get all lovey-dovey for the holidays? It's gross for the rest of us.
Why does everyone have to get all lovey-dovey for the holidays? It's gross for the rest of us.
Did you see $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$'s family?

I saw $npcName:11004346[gender:0]$ heading for $map:63000073$ early this morning. He goes there every day, you know. He's always got his face stuffed in a book, ignoring his adorable little sister $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$. I'd never let her get bored... So what's his problem?
I will find love this winter!
I confessed my love to someone during the holidays last year...
What happened?
The very next day, he gave it away. This year, I'll give it to someone special...
Well, happy holidays!
You listen to me, find your true love before the year ends!
What kinda presents do you think Santa is bringing this year?
What kinda presents do you think Santa is bringing this year?
Do you think Santa is... real?
Seriously? You're gonna come to a festive place like this and ask THAT?
I... well...
Hey, I know the truth, but if I admit it I might get fewer presents. So yeah, go Santa!
The kids sure do love the holidays...
The kids really love the holidays...
Not just kids though. Adults love the holidays, too, don't they?
Ehh, it depends. Easier for adults to lose the spirit of the season, I think.
Well, happy holidays!
Agreed! Happy holidays! Remind everyone that this is a season for joy!
We stand for peace in Kritias.
We stand for peace in Kritias.
I can't give you the mission yet... you're not ready.
Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:1]$ told me she was sending reinforcements. I didn't realize she had meant you.
How are you? Things are going smoothly, I trust?
Not exactly, but I'm getting by. There's a lot that needs doing these days.
Ah... Well, I'm afraid that my request isn't going to make things any easier...
What is it?

There are resources nearby—resources Humanitas desperately needs. We'd been battling the Tairen for control of the area and making good ground, but then they received reinforcements from the capital...
Were there many casualties?
We've only had some injuries, thank goodness. I'm more concerned about the ground we've lost; We need those supplies. Your mission is to secure $map:02020004$. Can I count on you?
Oh, you're back.
$MyPCName$, we are relieved that you have become a strength for Humanitas.
We will never forget this favor. I promise you as the head of Humanitas.
(Say that she doesn't need to go that far.)
No, you are our savior.
Please don't refuse when we return the favor later.
Welcome.
You have my full support.
Well met.
Keep your guard up.
How can I help you?
I pray this is a good omen.
How may I help you?
Worry not. The Green Hoods watch over this place.
Oh. It's you.
This whole situation is unreal.
What is it?
This turn of events bodes ill. I think it's time my cadets redoubled their training.
What is it?
The alliance needs Dark Wind now more than ever.
The future is in our hands.
Especially at times like these, we must maintain our composure.
Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about duty!
Flying continents appearing from nowhere? Ha! This is nothing. You should've seen the crazy things that happened back in my day!
I am the shadow that evil fears.
I get the feeling things are gonna get worse before they get better.
Would you like to take on a mission for Green Hoods?
A brand new world, chock full of new data to analyze!
It is time my order stood with the rest of the empire.
Whatever challenges this new land has in store for us, let them come. I will show them my true power.
Come visit $map:63000072$!
The express train to $map:63000072$ is free!
Come visit $map:63000072$!
$map:63000072$ is bursting with joyous holiday cheer! People are happy! Fairfolk are happy! And it's SNOWING!!
Board this toy train if you want to go to $map:63000072$! Toot, toot!
The toy train is completely free because it's run by the fairfolk! We barely even know what money is! Come along to $map:63000072$!
Don't you want to taste a fairfolk cake?
You want to try this cake, right?
It's delicious! Thrilling! Mind-blowing, even!
There are many people who hunger for the fairfolk's cake. But it seems no two people have the same reaction to it! Isn't that interesting?
Some say it has no taste, others claim it's the most flavorful food they've ever eaten. Maybe it simply causes madness?
In any event, try some! Go on, eat it up!
The fairfolk's cake is so, so sweet!
No matter how much you eat, more appears!
It tastes even better the closer you get to the holidays!
The fairfolk's cake is so, so sweet!
Eat all you want, and it never never runs out! It's magic cake. That's the best part! Hee hee!
Let's tour the neighborhood together!
Rock! Paper! Scissors!
Hey, why didn't you put out anything?
Let's tour the neighborhood together!
Rock! Paper! Scissors!
It's snowing! Wow!
The future is in our hands.
Stay alert. We're in uncharted territory.
Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about duty!
Don't look so glum, Cadet. We're in a new land full of new and exciting things to eat!
I am the shadow that evil fears.
Hey there, $male:handsome,female:gorgeous$. After I've racked up some shore leave, what say we take a tour of Kritias's inns and test out their bed springs?
Would you like to take on a mission for Green Hoods?
Where should I start? Local ecology? Demographics? There's so much data to collate!
It is time my order stood with the rest of the empire.
So many fantastic riddles await us in Kritias... It's exhilarating.
How may I help you?
Artifacts from the past are so fascinating, aren't they?
Absolutely! Hand it over, and I'll take a look at your $item:30001025$! Since you're paying, you can rest assured that the key will be useful.
Sure! I provide 10 free analyses per day, out of the goodness of my heart. Even if the key is too old to be useful, you'll still get a little something.
I get excited thinking about the story behind all these old objects.
How can I help you?
Analyze my $item:30001025$, please.
There's something I need to tell you.
Hello, $MyPCName$!
You must be here about this fancy chest, yes? It's enchanted to provide you with the materials you need to upgrade your gemstones.
Go ahead and give it a try. You'll need the proper reagents to open it, of course.
What reagents do I need?
I'm curious about the science behind this.
You'll want some $itemPlural:30001187$, which you can get by hunting monsters. That's the raw material that you will turn into gemstones.
To trigger the reaction, just use some $item:30001188$, and viola!
How do I get those?
Fortunately for you, I just so happen to sell them! I should warn you, though, that my supply is pretty limited. It's not easy to make, you know.

$npc:11000601[gender:1]$ discovered this chest while taking inventory of the royal reliquary. We think it was a gift to the empress from a faraway place. Anyway, it seems to turn the energy of monsters into something useful.
The $npc:11004215$, as we've taken to calling it, can convert all kinds of energy. As soon as she found it, $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$ set herself to researching the device.

To her surprise, the chest was even able to take the $item:30001187$ taken from monsters and turn it into gem dust. We agreed that it would be in everyone's best interest to make this device freely available to adventurer's like you!
Now, you will need $item:30001188$ to stabilize the process. It's simple physics, as I'm sure you know.
What materials do I need?

The empress has declared that all experienced adventurers shall have access to this enchanted chest here! Not you, though. I'm afraid you're not quite experienced enough. Would you be so kind as to come back when you're level 50?
Our first steps in a new world. I should be excited, but all I feel is nervous...
I don't know about this...
Our first steps in a new world. I should be excited, but all I feel is nervous...
Hey there! I'm investigating rumors of a ghost dressed in black.
There's nothing here.
I don't see any ghosts.
Hey there! I'm investigating rumors of a ghost dressed in black.
Did you say gh-gh-gh-ghost?!
Yes! There have been lots of sightings of this so-called black-garbed ghost around here.
Apparently it wanders around, mumbling something about sacrificing a soul to obtain great power...
It's right around this time that most of the witnesses run for their lives, so that's all I have to go on. Well, that, and...
There's something else?
Yes! I think there was something about... summoning a many-armed god?
It can't be...
You know what that means?
I'm sure it's nothing.
I'll let you know if I learn anything else. This investigation is just getting started!
Hm...
Where oh where could it be?
Was I misled?
$male:Sir,female:Ma'am$! I'm $npcName:11004459[gender:0]$, in charge of logistics!
$male:Sir,female:Ma'am$! I'm $npcName:11004459[gender:0]$, in charge of logistics!
We could never have put a base like this together so quickly without Sky Fortress.
How did you manage this, anyway?
As soon as this mission began, Cat Sith started sending me data on the base's construction plans and materials.
I'm happy to report that not a single brick went to waste in constructing this place!
What's Cat Sith?
What does Cat Sith mean?
I'm surprised you haven't been briefed. It's the new shipboard AI. It's able to scour data from the Sky Fortress's memory banks and learn on its own.
The captain came up with the AI design and the tactical officer did all of the programming. I admit, I'm a little intimidated by their genius.
Amazing.
You'd have to ask the captain, since she's the one who named it. I imagine it has something to do with cats. Just a hunch.
Of course it is. Why, it's astonishing, even!
All clear!
All clear!
I'm a little nervous about this place, but this is a chance to set myself apart from the other guards!
All's well!
All's well!
Two months out from retirement, and I get assigned here. Just my luck.
Forget justice and duty! I want to go home!
Stick with it, soldier!
No way. I don't have what it takes to be a hero! I just want to go hide under my bunk!
Don't tell Condor about this, by the way. If he hears I've been talking like this, I'm done for!
All clear!
All clear!
We're doing our best to keep $map:02020041$ safe!
All... is... well!
All... is... well!
I've been trying to get in this platoon for ages. They finally give me the transfer, and the whole platoon is shipped out to this crazy place. Man...
Chin up, sad guard.
Hearing those words from your mouth fills me with hope. Thank you, $MyPCName$! I'll fight my hardest!
Huh? You don't look like a refugee.
These enemies won't quit...
Wave after wave. It's too much!
Huh? You don't look like a refugee.
I have come from the distant land of Maple World.
Never heard of it. Look, just keep your head down and try not to get caught in the crossfire.
Who goes there? Enemy?!
Don't they know when to quit?
I'm sick of this never-ending battle...
Who goes there? Enemy?!
Hey, I'm on your side.
Hm? Your clothes are strange, but you look like you can hold your own. You ever consider a career in freedom fighting?
Sorry, but I've got other obligations.
Tch... What a waste of talent. Well, if you change your mind, it's not like we can afford to be picky...
All's we—Huh?! You're an outlander!
I'm so hungry...
Our rations are late...
All's we—Huh?! You're an outlander!
I'm worried about $npcName:11004472[gender:0]$. He's got his heart set on joining the rebellion...
I'm worried about $npcName:11004472[gender:0]$. He's got his heart set on joining the rebellion...
What's his story?
$npcName:11004472[gender:0]$'s family was expelled from Tairen during one of the purges, so they signed on with the freedom fighters. Then... they went missing.
Ever since then, he spends all his time exercising so that he can join the fight and save his family.
That's so sad!
I hope he never has to see the battlefield. We told him he could be a freedom fighter if he trained hard enough, but it was really to keep him from running off and getting himself killed.
And now I have to spend my free time babysitting him... Hey, you look free. Mind watching him for an hour or two?
I'm actually really busy!
Hmph. You don't look like it. Oh well! I'd probably get in trouble if I left him with a stranger, anyway.
This is a placeholder line.
This is a placeholder line.
This is a placeholder line.
This is a placeholder line.
That little cretin wants to go out and play...
Who would want to play in this chaos?
This disaster has to end sometime.
That little cretin wants to go out and play...
I was playing hide-and-seek with my friends, but I just can't find them!
Where are you hiding?
I can't find you! I give up!
I was playing hide-and-seek with my friends, but I just can't find them!
Where did you go?! I give up! Please come out!
That snot-nosed brat went out to play and still hasn't come back.
Where did that troublemaker get off to...?
It's past dinnertime...
That snot-nosed brat went out to play and still hasn't come back.
This is no time to play. There's a war going on out there! Ugh, what would our parents say?
Huh? Who're you?
Huff, huff!
Gotta get in shape if I'm gonna fight bad guys!
Huh? Who're you?
Why're you dressed like that? You look like a big dummy with a side of dummy sauce.
You practicing for a marathon, kid?
This is cutting-edge fashion where I'm from!
I'm training so I can join the resistance! I'm gonna beat up those Tairen doody-heads good.
But Humanitas only lets the strongest people ever join them. That's why I gotta run so much.
You look pretty strong, though. How do you do it?
Just keep training.
I was afraid you were gonna say that. Hey... If you see my ma and pa, could you rescue them from the bad guys?
Absolutely.
Wow, really? Okay! Then I gotta keep training so I can help you!
And where are you from? A butt?
Huh? Who're you?
Lalala!
Huh? Who're you?
Wait, aren't you $MyPCName$? Wow! It really is you, in the flesh!
Stop. You're making me blush.
What, afraid of a little fame? How lame. This must be why they say you should never meet your heroes.
Hey, do you see that huge ship? I'm not imagining it, am I?
No way something that big can fly...
Hey, do you see that huge ship? I'm not imagining it, am I?
It's so big... How can something that big float up in the sky like that?
Didn't you ride Sky Fortress to get here?
Sure, but I couldn't exactly tell how big it is from the inside. Seeing it now, away from the buildings in Tria... It's unreal!
Do you know? How does it fly like that?
$npcName:24100101$ would tell you it's the power of science.
$npcName:24100101$? Is that the name of one of the Sky Fortress big wigs? She sounds intimidating...
You here for the big land grab?
So this is Kritias, the land of opportunity.
Here's my chance to get a mansion of my own...
You here for the big land grab?
$map:02020041$ is the first city in the new world. This place is gonna be a hotbed of development once we kick the other riffraff off this continent!
Sure, it seems like a shaky investment now, but just you wait! Any land you buy here today will be worth ten times as much a year from now!
Sigh... I'm sick of these ration packs they have us all eating. I miss the gourmet restaurants of Tria!
I'll die if I have to eat one more ration pack!
I just want to taste something good for once...
They didn't warn us that Kritias doesn't have any proper eateries. What's a foodie supposed to do in a place like this?
I would kill for a bowl of blue mushroom slime soup in cornelian cherry sauce...
Ugh, talking about it just makes it worse! I'm going to be too hungry to sleep tonight...
Eee! It's him! It's really him!
Eee! Blake!
Blake's so handsome!
Eee! It's him! It's really him!
Ugh! What are you?
Don't jump out at me like that. When I saw your ugly mug, I thought you were some kind of freaky monster.
Rude!
Don't take it personally, uggo. Everyone is hideous compared to Blake!
You need to get your eyes checked.
A normie like you will never understand! Blake is beauty. Blake is the future!
Just wait. Soon, everyone in Kritias will bow before Blake's handsomeness!
Blake is so... bedazzling! Don't you think so, too?
Blake's so handsome!
Look here!
Blake is so... bedazzling! Don't you think so, too?
Bedazzling. Sure. Let's say yes.
It's like we're witnessing history. The day Blake set foot in the new world!
Wanna join the new Blake Fan Club—Kritias Branch? I've got the paperwork right here!
Oh no, something urgent just came up. Bye.
Really? Shoot... Well, come back soon, before we fill up!
Oh! You startled me.
But how do they make it float?
This could change energy production throughout Maple World.
Oh! You startled me.
I'm here to study aetherine. We're really just scratching the surface when it comes to possible applications!
What have you learned so far?
Well, aetherine can make objects spontaneously levitate for almost no energy expenditure. I've measured the amount of aetherine in the floating buildings here, and there's very, very little.
Our own levitation technology requires massive amounts of energy to work. If we can switch to aetherine, it will be a technological revolution!
Of course, I don't know how any of it works. But I will. Oh yes, I will...
Yikes! You startled me. I... I didn't really expect another person to just walk up to me in a place like this.
Is this really alive?
I've never seen anything like this before.
Yikes! You startled me. I... I didn't really expect another person to just walk up to me in a place like this.
See this tree? I thought it was some kind of mechane at first. But all of my tests show that this is, in fact, a living plant.
Those cogwheels are actually leaves. Eventually they'll fall off and the tree will grow new ones. I'm still trying to wrap my head around the ecosystem here...
If my report is convincing enough, maybe Dr. $npcName:11004492[gender:0]$ will authorize a permanent research camp here.
I'm sure it'll happen.
I just want to lose myself in my research!
Hm? I didn't expect to see anyone outside the safety of the outpost.
What an amazing facility...
How was this made?
Hm? I didn't expect to see anyone outside the safety of the outpost.
What are you doing here?
Oh, well I was sent out to look for aetherine samples, but I found this weird machine. I'm pretty sure it's related to aetherine somehow, but I haven't quite worked it out.
It's weak, but that ring is drawing aetherine power into its center. I took some initial scans, and I think it's actually capable of storing vast amounts of the stuff.
That's strange.
Isn't it? But I have theories!
Based on the data I've collected so far, I have two ideas. Either this device is gathering aetherine and transporting it somewhere...
Or it's a dimensional portal that's connected to a place far, far away.
What kind of people live here, that they can make all this wild technology?
I've never seen such a place... Huh? Where'd you come from?
Amazing...
Is Kritias inhabited solely by monsters?
I've never seen such a place... Huh? Where'd you come from?
Who are you?
Oh, you kidder. You know me. We boarded Sky Fortress together!
I'm pretty sure I've never met you before.
Of course! I'd never forget a face like yours.
You scatterbrain! I was the facility manager at the $map:52010059$. I can't believe you forgot about me...
Anyway, Bastet picked up this structure during a routine scan. I thought I'd check it out, but this place is thick with monsters...
Who's Bastet?
Why are you here, anyway?
Of course you didn't forget me! I'm unforgettable, as my mother always said.
Anyway, Bastet picked up this structure during a routine scan. I thought I'd check it out, but this place is thick with monsters...
I've never seen such a building. The architecture is breathtaking...
Oh... Maybe this isn't the time for such chatter. I'd better get out of here while I still can.
Not who, but what. Bastet is our cutting-edge surveillance satellite! There's nothing she can't spot. I think.
She's technically still a prototype. When Kritias showed up from out of nowhere, it seemed like a good chance to put her through her paces.
She can count your nose hairs from orbit!
Impressive! Who came up with that?
Who do you think? $npcName:11004437[gender:0]$, of course! At Captain $npcName:11004434[gender:0]$ command, of course.
The captain even came up with the name "Bastet," you see. I wonder what it means...?
Beats me.
I'm here to research structures and facilities here on Kritias, of course. Unfortunately, the going hasn't exactly been easy.
But it's definitely worth it! Look at this beauty of a building right here.
Oh... Maybe this isn't the time for such chatter. I'd better get out of here while I still can.
I'm sure it means something. The captain isn't the sort to name things all willy-nilly.
Hello! I'll be helping you explore Kritias. Nice to meet you.
I'm not ready for this...
Exploring a new continent...
Hello! I'll be helping you explore Kritias. Nice to meet you.
When do you start?
St-st-st-start? Soon! Really soon! Yeah...
There's lots and lots of preparation to do. So that's what I'm doing... Preparing! Yep. Gotta prepare before you can go out into the wilderness...
It's okay to be scared.
I'm not scared! I'm c-cautious, okay? This is an important j-j-j-job. I'm definitely not stalling!
Keep quiet! Stay down! It's over if the enemy spots us!
Must keep exploring...
Just need to find my opening...
Keep quiet! Stay down! It's over if the enemy spots us!
Something wrong?
Something wrong? Is something wrong?! Look at the chaos out here! I came here to discover new lands, not risk my life!
That so-called Daemon Army ambushed me, so I ran away... only to find myself in the middle of a Tairen raid!
At this rate, I'll get tombstoned before I discovery anything worthwhile. If you really want to help, then get rid of those bad guys for me!
Okay.
I leave it to you!
Those clothes... You're from Maple World, like me! You must be the first friendly face I've seen in days.
It's definitely worth looking into...
Such a unique shape...
Those clothes... You're from Maple World, like me! You must be the first friendly face I've seen in days.
How's the research going?
It's going... slowly. I can't stop thinking about this machine here...
In design, it resembles the noblest of tools, the humble drill. You can see why I've become obsessed with it.
But this is no ordinary drill, if it even is a drill at all. It seems like it can absorb energy of a certain wavelength. The same wavelength that aetherine resonates at, in fact.
Perhaps it is used to mine for aetherine, then transmit the energy somehow? That's my hypothesis, at any rate.
Amazing!
Hm...
Yes, yes. I'm sure I've seen your face somewhere before. I'm really much too busy just now, though, so...
What are you up to?
An amateur academic. Of course. I suppose I can spare a minute of my time to explain.
I am one of the premier mechanical engineers of Victoria Island! I snuck aboard—I mean, I legitimately boarded Sky Fortress in order to study the machines of Kritias.
And look! I have discovered the most wonderful drills!
At least, it looks like a drill. Technically speaking, that's not quite right.
The structure of this drill defies all known convention—it's no twist drill, nor straight shank drill, nor step drill, and so forth.
And this material! They've somehow found something better than cemented carbide. I can't even— I mean, it's just not—
GASP! Sorry... I got so excited, I forgot to breathe.
Anyway, it's all clear now, is it not?
Not in the slightest.
You jest. I explained it clearly enough for a five-year-old to understand.
Then I must be four.
You tire me. Shoo.
But what is this drill for...?
There's no shortage of amazing things in Kritias. That's why I'm so busy with research!
Hey, you're from Maple World, right?
I want to go back to Tria...
How long must I stay here?
Hey, you're from Maple World, right?
Is something wrong?
Everything's wrong! I loathe field work. Everything around here wants to tombstone me. And it's been days since I had a proper bath! This assignment must be a sick joke on the part of my boss.
I miss my lab in Tria. I hope this mission ends soon...
Cheer up!
I hadn't thought of it that way. Thank you. You cheer up, too!
Ah, the hero of Sky Fortress! You have many fans, you know.
Look at the size of it...
Where is all of this aetherine is going?
Ah, the hero of Sky Fortress! You have many fans, you know.
Stop. You're making me blush.
Don't let it get to your head. You'll get sloppy.
Anyway, this looks to be some kind of aetherine mine. There must be a huge deposit of the stuff under here.
That would explain why there are so many enemy forces marshaled here. They want the aetherine.
I think we ought to put our hat in the ring, so I sent a request for reinforcements. I'm trying to estimate the size of the aetherine deposit before they get here...
I'm so glad your here! I needed to share this with someone.
Such scope...
This is beyond imagination.
I'm so glad your here! I needed to share this with someone.
Oh? What is it?
Look at that structure up ahead. Really look at it. You can use my telescope if you like.
Yeah, that's... um... something.
The whole thing is made of some kind of porous material, and it's soaked in aetherine like a sponge!
The cylinder at the center looks like it draws aetherine directly from the ground. I think. I'm not exactly sure how it works...
I think this terminal is connected somehow. I haven't managed to get it to do anything yet, though.
Oh, hello. You must be here for my report. I'm afraid it's not very good...
The signs are clear...
I'm certain of it...
Oh, hello. You must be here for my report. I'm afraid it's not very good...
Something wrong?
I'm looking into the soil contamination that started spreading around here not too long ago.
What do you know about the mechanical monster that roams this area?
I know all about it!
Not a whole lot.
Then you're aware of how big a problem Gigantica is for us.
Wherever Gigantica appears, the soil becomes tainted. We've actually had to abandoned a camp because the toxins got so bad!
That's why I'm needed. If I can analyze the contamination, we may be able to counteract it—or, at the very least, predict where Gigantica will go next.
Really? You must not read the crew newsletter. Our efforts to explore Kritias have been hindered by this giant robotic worm. We call it Gigantica.
Wherever Gigantica appears, the soil becomes tainted. We've actually had to abandon a camp because the toxins got so bad!
That's why I'm needed. If I can analyze the contamination, we may be able to counteract it—or, at the very least, predict where Gigantica will go next.
Hm? Oh, you're that $male:fellow,female:lady$ from Sky Fortress!
Astonishing!
To think that such technology exists...
Hm? Oh, you're that $male:fellow,female:lady$ from Sky Fortress!
Here to admire the architecture? It's breathtaking, isn't it?
Not really.
Balderdash! Surely even a hardened adventurer like you is moved by such grandeur. There's nothing like this in all of Maple World!
Why, this building is a testament to the power of science. Even though I'm standing here, I feel as if I'm witnessing some impossible dream.
Dr. $npcName:11004499[gender:0]$ will be over the moon when he sees this!
Good luck with that.
Thank you!
Shh! Quiet! They'll hear us!
Such grand scale...
I never imagined such a place...
Shh! Quiet! They'll hear us!
I stumbled upon this place quite by accident. I never imagined there might be a large robot factory here.
See there? The robots are made without any intervention from human factory workers. And with such speed, no less! This explains the endless forces that the Tairen army has managed to field.
Should I blow this place up, then?
I'm afraid this is but one small corner of the whole facility. What's more, if any part of the factory is destroyed, it's repaired automatically within minutes.

Any attempt to destroy this place would fail to put any sizable dent in their production capabilities. It would, however, mark our presence on Kritias as a clear threat. A threat that they would feel compelled to wipe out.
Instead of striking out blindly, we need to understand the full scope of this facility... and what it will take to destroy it once and for all.
Okay.
I need to learn more about this facility.
Ah, $MyPCName$! I'm here researching the plants of Kritias.
Do you hear that?
It's almost like a chorus...
Ah, $MyPCName$! I'm here researching the plants of Kritias.
What have you learned?
So much! All of the plants in Kritias have at least a little bit of aetherine in them.
And the plants react to each other's aetherine. It seems like they use the aetherine to communicate with each other!
So what... talking plants?
Not precisely, but the idea of plants being able to communicate with each other isn't exactly new. The ecosystem in Kritias may be the most concrete evidence we've ever seen.
The plants are all giving off the same aetherine wavelength. It's almost as if they're singing a chorus!
Incredible!
Astonishing, too!
I'm here researching the fish of Kritias.
Hm... Aetherine in living creatures...
What, exactly, IS this aetherine?
I'm here researching the fish of Kritias.
What have you learned?
Every fish I've caught has had trace amounts of aetherine in their systems. The amount might be related to their place in the food chain...
If I were to cook and eat one of these fish, would the aetherine stay in my system? Until I figure this out, we're going to be reliant on food rations delivered from the mainland.
I hope you figure it out.
So do I, my friend. So do I.
This place was a dense forest when we first got here...
Terrible...
How can this be?
This place was a dense forest when we first got here...
What happened?
We set up camp just a day after the Daemon Army arrived. This is all that's left of the forest. The stream is totally dead now, too.
We've seen this kind of rapid transformation before. In the Land of Darkness...
As the Daemon Army expands, this massive die-off of nature will follow.
That's bad news.
We need to stop them before they spread any further.
The gravity, erm, situation in this place is fascinating. Why, these huge structures look as though they might simply float away.
Is this the power of aetherine?
Even gravity is nothing to it...
The gravity, erm, situation in this place is fascinating. Why, these huge structures look as though they might simply float away.
How's the research going?
It's early to say, but I think this could lead to a second energy revolution.
Think about it. The vast majority of Sky Fortress's power generation goes into keeping it in the air. How might we use that power if we had aetherine to lift the ship aloft, instead?
That would be incredible.
And that's why we've got to learn everything we can about aetherine.
Ah! You're that $male:fellow,female:lady$, from Sky Fortress. Are you here to ask about my research?
Aetherine's all over the place...
I suppose it isn't toxic, after all.
Ah! You're that $male:fellow,female:lady$, from Sky Fortress. Are you here to ask about my research?
Sure. Tell me about it.
Since we arrived in Kritias, I've been looking into the connection between the local wildlife and this miraculous "aetherine" substance.
No matter how big or small, every creature I've sampled has some amount of aetherine in it.
Ah, yes. Fascinating.
Is there some connection between aetherine and life energy? I'll have to do more science to know for sure.
I'm part of the team researching the fish of Kritias.
Hm. Amazing...
For life to survive here...
I'm part of the team researching the fish of Kritias.
The water here is highly toxic. Just a sip would tombstone an ordinary person. But see in there? Fish.
How is that possible?
I can't say anything conclusively just yet, but I think the aetherine in their bodies somehow protects them from the poison.
Did the fish here evolve to use the aetherine to neutralize the poison?
That's pretty handy.
Well, it's just a theory.
Who's there? Oh, you're that... that $MyPCName$ hero!
Interesting...
Are our cultures connected somehow...?
Who's there? Oh, you're that... that $MyPCName$ hero!
What are you doing here?
I'm the foremost cultural anthropologist of Sky Fortress, here to study the cultures of Kritias. And I feel I've already made a great discovery!
I've uncovered some ancient writings here, and the motifs and archetypes on display are similar to those in ancient Victoria Island literature. Uncannily so.
That seems a little unlikely.
It begs the question: do our cultures share the same root? Of course, the higher-ups will only accept evidence that our culture came first, and that Kritias copied us...
Hmm...? Have we met?
How elaborate!
Incredible...
Hmm...? Have we met?
I came here on Sky Fortress.
Oh, you're that famous hero! An honor to meet you.
I'm part of the architectural research team. Take a look at this structure here! Incredible, isn't it? I've never seen such an elaborate design.
Each brick and pillar fits perfectly. I've never seen something like this before.
All of the buildings I've examined since we got here has been like this. I only wish I could see how they pulled this off!
I'm a bit curious, too.
It's worth researching. This could revolutionize building techniques all over the empire.
You here to enlist? Fall in line, Recruit!
I can't hear you! Louder!
You! Stand up straight!
You here to enlist? Fall in line, Recruit!
I'm not your recruit.
Is that so? Hmph. You have the look of a washed-up loser. Join my troop and I'll have you back on your feet in no time!
We need all the help we can get to fight Tairen. We'll even take folks wearing... whatever that's supposed to be. You sure you don't want to sign on with us?
I'll think about it...
Whenever and wherever, we're ready!
Identify yourself!
All clear!
Identify yourself!
Whoa, there. I'm a friend!
Hey, you're that outlander. I read a report on you.
Sorry if I seem on edge. Not all of the outlanders have been as... helpful as you.
I know your face. Road in on that primitive flying boat, didn't you?
We! Will! Win!
Give me victory, or give me tombstone!
I know your face. Road in on that primitive flying boat, didn't you?
That's right.
Hmph. You did good work in Richmonde, I'll give you that.
I haven't seen you before. You that outlander everyone's talking about?
All clear.
I haven't seen you before. You that outlander everyone's talking about?
Anyway, watch yourself out there. Our enemy won't hesitate to shoot you down.
Zzz... N-no... I can't eat another bite...
Zzz... Zzz...
Zzz... Zzz...
Zzz... N-no... I can't eat another bite...
Hello there!
Aaaah! Don't hurt me! I-I mean... I'm awake. I'm awake!
Look what we have here. It's about time they sent us some reinforcements.
When will this battle end?
Look what we have here. It's about time they sent us some reinforcements.
I'm not your reinforcements.
Tch... Figures. We don't have the numbers to hold this position for right now. Y'know, give a leshy a gun and I'd let it stand guard. That's how desperate we are!
What're you, a tourist? You wanna get tombstoned? This is a warzone! Not that $map:02020030$ is any better...
They have to let up some time...
I'm getting sick of this.
What're you, a tourist? You wanna get tombstoned? This is a warzone! Not that $map:02020030$ is any better...
Ugh... I'm ready to pass out on my feet...
When's my relief coming?
I need to get off my feet...
Ugh... I'm ready to pass out on my feet...
AAAAH! Ugh, you startled me.
Hey, you're that outlander!
Waiting for orders...
Hey, you're that outlander!
This is the hub of all of our mobile forces, by land and air. But ever since the enemy pushed to our doorstep, we haven't been able to secure a supply line for the life of us.
My bullets always hit their mark!
One shot, one KO!
My bullets always hit their mark!
We'll be eating shoe leather at this rate...
This is bad...
We'll be eating shoe leather at this rate...

With all the land routes cut off, we've been relying on air drops for supplies. We don't have the spare planes to keep that up forever, though. If something doesn't happen soon, the fortress will fall.
We don't have enough fuel for our cars. We don't have enough ammo for our weapons. We just don't have enough...
We don't have enough fuel for our cars. We don't have enough ammo for our weapons. We just don't have enough...
Hey, you aren't carrying any aetherine on you, are you? Ugh, as if it'd just fall into our laps like that...
Beeep... Beeep...
Initiating greeting protocol! The weather is nice today, is it not?
How's your work coming?
Initiating reassurance protocol! We soldierettos are doing our best. You can count upon us.
Initiating gratitude protocol! We are grateful to the humans who gave us new purpose.
Initiating brusque farewell protocol! This time has been very pleasant, but I have over one hundred tasks remaining for today. Please excuse me.
I'll leave you to it, then.
Scanning records on aetherine air brake experiment... Scan complete.
Beeep... Beeep...
Initiating excitement protocols! Oh, I have uncovered records about Vanheim. Archiving now.
Initiating industriousness protocol! Whistle while you work.
Initiating procrastination protocol! Must this task be done today?
Initiating glib observation protocol! Even machines need time to be oiled.
Beeep... Beeep...
Mathematical query: why was six afraid of seven?
Answer: because seven ate nine. Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha!
Five out of four humans admit that they're bad at fractions!
I am a library knight, and this is my page!
I may be made of metal, but I never steel.
Have you tried the sobfish? They're salty.
My chassis may be bronze, but I'm actually well-read!
Beeep... Beeep...
You appear malnourished.
Feel free to refuel at our aetherine station.
Initiating shushing protocol! Please be quiet.
Beeep... Beeep...
Beep... Beep... Beep...
Beep... Beep... Beeep! Bee...
Bee bee beeeep...
Beep. Beep. B-beep? Beep...
Beeep... Beeep...
Oh?!
Ah... Hello there.
How's the research going?
V-very well. As you can see, I'm burning the midnight oil. Eheheh...
If you could see our results, why, they'd knock your socks off!
S-so you go and tell $npcName:11004438[gender:0]$ that we're working hard, okay?
It doesn't look like you're working that hard.
I-I am, and I have the overtime sheets to show it! L-later. I'll have them later. You'll see...
Aaaah.
Isn't this place lovely? I get to enjoy this wonderful nature while I work.
I see the "enjoy" part, but what about the "work" part?
I can't help it if I have resting "relaxed" face. Trust me when I say that we're working hard over here.
This is the life!
Working with $npcName:11004527[gender:0]$ is the best.
I see you there.
Can I help you?
I'm just checking in on things.
$npcName:11004437[gender:0]$ sent you, then. As you can see, nothing's changed.
We're still getting shot at by wild robots. We're still dealing with these ridiculous dust clouds. And we're still getting motion sickness when that machine over there sends out tremors...
I miss the forest.
When you get back to the outpost, let them know we need reinforcements to help with the killer machines here.
Will do.
Thanks. You're a life saver!
I can't stand the noise here...
The dust here is unreal... I should have brought a face mask.
I'm going to get a lung disease from my time in this place. Hopefully it's all just in my head...
Ouch...
That's gonna leave a scar. I just know it...
Ugh...
I think I'm gonna be sick.
I'm sick of fighting! Is there no end to them?! Oh...! Hello, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$! I didn't see you there!
Would it kill them to let up...?
I'm sick of fighting! Is there no end to them?! Oh...! Hello, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$! I didn't see you there!
This is the biggest road to and from $map:02020041$. Maybe that's why the enemy keeps hammering us here.
Don't worry. I've got my eye on the enemy movements.
Ahh, I want to go home.
Don't worry. I've got my eye on the enemy movements.
There are no signs of an enemy attack, but that can change in an instant. That's why we can't slack off on our patrols!
We're doing our best to defend $map:02020041$!
All's well!
We're doing our best to defend $map:02020041$!
Send me to where the fighting's thickest! I'll crush any enemy in my path!
Umm... Would you mind taking a few of them out while you're here? N-not that I can't take them myself, of course!
Zzz zzz...
Yawn! I need a nap!
Zzz zzz...
Wha? Huh? I'm defendin'... I'm defendin' the base!

Here I figured I'd spend my last years of my service in the capital, then retire and spend the rest of my days on a little farm out by Evansville. But nooo, they had to ship me out to this light-forsaken place...
Ah! You startled me!
Who goes there? A bad guy?!
Ah! You startled me!
You better watch out who you sneak up on. I was two seconds away from tombstoning you!
If you have time to chat, you have time to fight!
Ugh... I hate deadlines...
Ugh... I hate deadlines...
Here to gawk at the soldierettos? Get a good look and then be on your way. I can't concentrate with all you... all you tourists hanging about!
I can't believe my luck...
I can't believe my luck...
This place is amazing! Just this morning alone, I discovered three new molecules and a new kind of superconductor!
Can't you see I'm on edge? Leave me alone!
This is the soldieretto lab. Are you a robot researcher?
This is the soldieretto lab. Are you a robot researcher?
If you do not have any particular business with us, leave. Humans who come here tend to give us more work.
I am giving it my all today. As always.
The life of a soldieretto is not easy.

This is $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$'s office. I don't know what your business is, but you watch yourself around $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$.
My relief should be here soon...
This is $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$'s office. I don't know what your business is, but you watch yourself around $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$.
You! Outlander! You better not be here to bother $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$.
Ah, I need to get off my feet...
You! Outlander! You better not be here to bother $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$.
Hey, do you need a Valentine chocolate box and some sprinkles? I've got some that I can give you. If you keep making chocolate every day, you'll get a special gift!
Hey, do you need a Valentine chocolate box and some sprinkles? I've got some that I can give you. If you keep making chocolate every day, you'll get a special gift!
Give me a $item:30001287$ and $item:30001288$!
Here you go! I hope you save some chocolate for me!
Oh! Your bag is full. Try again after you make some space in your bag.

The best chocolate tastes like a little nugget of love! You've still got some ingredients, so you're good to make more on your own for now. I'll give you more if you need them, of course, but keep in mind that you can only make 3 chocolates a day.
$MyPCName$! Do you feel it? Love is in the air!
Anything might happen now...
I finally see this to its end.
Anything might happen now...
The guild could use your help. You will be compensated!
My tasks are perfectly reasonable, I assure you.
No matter how hard, you can overcome any challenge with teamwork!

Complete this simple task, and you will get guild experience, funds, and some experience for yourself, too! Note that you can't start daily quests until you've been in the guild for a day, and you can't start weekly quests until you've been in the guild for a week.

Welcome to the rumble! You look like you're ready to get wild.
Let's start the match!
I'm ready.
So, what are we doing today?
Start Over

Taking it from the top, eh? Exciting! Now, let's get to it!
You already beat everyone, ya goof! Why don't we start over, instead?
Great! Keep up that fighting spirit! Now start!
Here's your first challenge. Good luck!
Welcome to the Queen Bean Rumble!
Talk to me again once the tournament is over.
Aaaah.
Aaaah.
Oh, hello! I remember you.
Yeah, and I've seen you around.
I suppose it would be weird if you didn't know who I am.
So, you're here for the Queen Bean Rumble, right? Are you sure you're up to fighting me?
I was about to ask you the same.
Oh, you think you can take me on just because I dance all day? Well, I have news for you, $male:buddy,female:lady$. Dancing is fantastic exercise. I'm going to crush you like a teeny tiny bug!
I may look cute, but I'm a killer! Tee-hee!
Hm.
And who might you be?
I haven't seen you before, but you seem like a formidable opponent.
And you are?
Ahem! I am Rovey, drillmaster for the Royal Knights.
I've trained many knights around your age. In fact, you remind me of one particular fool whom I once taught...
Well, I shan't waste any more words on you. I will see you in the rumble.
You...
$npcName:11004560[gender:0]$?!

I'm here to fight.
It's been some time since we last sparred. I'm curious to see how you've grown.
Hey.
Hey.
Didn't think I'd see you here.
Same.
The Pink Beans dragged me out here to fight in their idiotic rumble.
I don't know how they found out that I'm a decent fighter. What a hassle...
If we end up facing off in the ring, I'll have to show you a thing or two.
Hey!
Ha! I should've known you'd be here. Someone like you can't resist a good rumble.
You've got me there.
That's the $MyPCName$ I remember! Hold on... This means we might have to fight each other.
Well, well. Now I've got some real competition! Let's do our best, okay?
For the honor of $map:02000051$!
Hm?
Hm?
I had a feeling I'd see you here.
I didn't think you were into this kind of thing.

I look forward to our match.
Hm...
Sigh...

What are you doing here?! Oh, no. Don't tell me we're fighting, too...
Listen up. The Pink Beans told me something. They said... they said if I win...
...then I'll get to interview $npcName:11004568[gender:1]$ herself! Could you imagine? That girl is practically a dragon, thanks to her adopted father!
So if you get matched against me, throw the fight, okay?
Well...
Fine, don't throw the fight. But I warn you, I'll give it everything I've got!
Hm.
No offense, but I'm not here on business, okay? You're gonna have to find someone else to enchant your gear.
Relax. I'm just here to say hi.
Huh? You mean... You're not just talking to me because I'm a genius blacksmith?
There's more to you than that.
L-like what?
Well, for example, your... Never mind.
I know you're trying to cheer me up, but I feel oddly insulted...
I'm gonna break you like a +14 legendary!
Ah...
Huh?
I have nothing to say to you. We can work out our differences in the ring.
Really?
Hm?
You look strong. Almost as strong as someone I know...
You're one to talk.
Hey, you ever hear of the Gray Wolf?
I may have heard the name.
I have a feeling the Gray Wolf will be here. We've got unfinished business...
Hey, Gray Wolf.
Vasara Chen?
I knew you'd be here. A fighter like you can't resist the ring for long.
That's why I signed up. Figured it's a good chance for us to duke it out.
This is getting interesting.
I hope you haven't slacked off in your training. I haven't.
Aaaah.
Hmm hm hummm!
Huh? Did you say something?
Take off your headphones!
Good idea! There we go. You're here for the Queen Bean Rumble?
Me too! I bet you didn't know I could fight.
I haven't thought about it.
Well, I can, and I'm really good at it, too.
In fact, I'm the very first fighter the Pink Beans invited. It wasn't easy for them, either. Karkar isn't exactly in their backyard.
Anyway, I'll see you in the fight!
Nice to meet you.
You just might be up to the Queen Bean Rumble.
I do think you shall be an amusement for Her Highness.
Entertain the queen!
For Queen Bean!
Sigh, I can't put up with this.
I'm busy. Hurry if you have something to ask.
(Ask how she became a leader.)
(Ask how long they will stay here.)
People were in an uproar when they found out they couldn't leave this place. There were people denying reality and people just crying... There was no one who was willing to do something.
And I took over temporarily because I felt everyone was going to die. I repeat, this is temporary.
It's only until everyone safely reaches $map:02020030$. Then I can finally leave this loathsome place.
You came... young adventurer...
You came... young adventurer...
Heh... You have a nice aura.
You have a heart that's clean and honest.
We need someone like you. A person with a clean heart.
I believe you can help your children that changed. Heh...
Our Guardian will help you as well.
Let me out! Let me out!
I miss Vanheim... It was good when he was here...
I want to eat tasty almonds and uncontaminated larvae.
(It can talk?!)
Claudia! Vanheim's daughter!
(My name... Who are you?)
Jessica! Jessica! Let me out!
Jessica! Jessica! ...
(Hey!)
Let me out! Jessica! Jessica!
(...It looks like a common mynah.)
Let me out!
AIDDF-98
AIDDF-98... MEODRAD-12F3...
DIHERL-00001 failed.
(What are these codes? A password?)
MEODRED-12F3 is better than AIDDF-98.
MEODRED-12F3 is high quality oil. It's excellent as a lubricant and the best for artificial bodies.
(...It doesn't look that important.)
Costs 49,900 aetherine.
A plain shelf.
Emilia was from Maple World. She was a strong woman with beautiful, silver hair.
It's not known how she met Vanheim. However, it was love at first sight for Vanheim.
(Discovered records on her mother.)
There isn't much detail about her.
(It looks like someone tore out the portrait.)
Her sole flesh and blood is Claudia.
Vanheim...
About Vanheim... Sage... Maple World's...
...the incident... for... because of...
(It's hard to read as much of it is damaged.)
...Died in Maple World.
(It looks like records on her father when he was a sage.)
I have a variety of supplies!
Hmm? You look familiar...
Uhh...
(Ask if he remembers.)
Ah! Now I remember. We met in $map:02020029$, right?
Wow! Didn't think I'll see you here. Good to see you.
(Ask what he's doing here.)
Ahem. What do you mean? I'm working hard.
I finally have a place in Humanitas. There's no duty as comfortable as this.
I'm enjoying myself these days. Ah! The air of peaceful Bavini.
(Say that you're glad.)
You're still kind. Why don't you take a look at the supplies?
Are you here for the No Cost Shop event? Let me be your guide!
Ask me anything!
Mmm! I feel great!
This is a great place. The people are kind and fun!
It's merrier with Laurie!
(Ask who is Laurie.)
This cutie next to me!
(Ask about their relationship.)
Are you asking about our fated encounter? Then I have to tell you!
It was a certain day 3 years ago... we met as I walked along a path!
Poor Laurie was collapsed on top of a flower!
(Say that you will be leaving.)
?! Hey! Hey! I'm not done yet!
Come back!
What do you want?
(Ask what an information dealer does.)
How could you not know that? How frustrating. Listen up since I'll explain. An information dealer knows everything.
(Ask how they can know everything.)

Next to me is the lovely... I mean, that's a trade secret. Anyways! The information gathered with this trade secret is provided to people that need it. Of course, you need to give me something for it.
(You can feel warmth.)
...Flinch
Who are you?
Who are you? This isn't a place that anyone can enter!
Leave now!
(Say you have to go in.)
State your reason. If there's no reason, you can't go in.
(Say that you're an aquaintance of the chief.)
?! Ch-chief?!
G-go in. Don't tell him I got mad!
Hm?
Hm?
You... How do you get in here?
My sibling $npcName:11004646$ doesn't let anyone in...
(Say that you're an aquaintance of the chief.)
N-nice person! Hurry and go in!
Mo... Mo... Mo...
I'm... hungry...
I want... to eat... tasty fruit...
Other... Leshies are... very hungry too...
If you're hungry... go west. There might be food...
Heh heh heh!
Puhahahaha!
Whoare you?! You don't have a flower on your head. You look interesting!
(...Say that it looks more interesting.)
Look in the mirror! How can you say that after looking at my beautiful bud?
Do you even have eyes?!
(You reluctantly say it's beautiful.)
Hmph! Of course. Be careful what you say from now on!
What?
What?
Hello? You... look cute...
And... you look nice... hehe.
(...Why is it blushing?)
Let's be friends! I will greet you from now on!
I have something to day.
Come here for a moment!
Did you... talk with $npcName:11004650$?
It's good if you didn't talk, but if you did! Don't fall for it!
(Ask what's it about.)
$npcName:11004650$ is a known Casanova of this place! Many Leshies have already been played!
He's handsome and dependable... But don't get deceived by that!
$npcName:11004650$ is nice to everyone! Mark my words!
Sob... sob...
Sob... sob...
What should I do?
What is it?
You see there? My friend is there...
My friend is nice... but changed like that. It's sad to lose a friend...
Why did this happen? I want my friend back!
Mm?
Mm?
Ahhh! What are you?
How did you get up here?! Go back down now!
(Say that you want to view the scenery too.)
I'm not viewing the scenery... Ahh! Don't move so hard!
Are you going to be responsible if I fall?!
Okay.
...Sigh. And I'm not viewing the scenery.
I'm watching whether the hideout is in danger! Leave now that you know!
Sigh...
Hm? Who are you?
Hm? Gregor is my twin brother but... your outfit tells me you're not a refugee.
I need to search for new food as the wilderness mushroom is dried up and gone...
I can't go forward because of the monsters. What should I do?
Sigh...
This place is a wasteland with nothing clean.
It's dry, desolate, and hopeless.
If you want to live, go southeast to the Leshy Forest.
It's a perilous place, but there's plenty of food and water.
Get away!
?! Who are you? Leave this instant!
This isn't a place for kids.
(Ask what it's doing.)
Huh? You want to know what am I doing here?
I haven't seen anyone as fearless as you. You... don't have friends, right?
Stop messing around and scram!
Hm...
Oh? You are!
Didn't imagine I'd see you here!
(Ask if she knows you.)
Of course! You're the hero who saved Maple World many times!
It's an honor to meet you! I'm going to boast to my friends!
(Ask what she's doing here.)
Ah. I'm researching the ecology. I'm trying to find the reason why this forest got polluted when it used to be clean and abundant in the past.
It's really unfortunate. It became polluted like this because of the Daemon Army... sigh.
Argh...
Argh...
Sigh... What should I do?
What is it?
Ahhhh?! You scared me!
...Sigh. It's you. You scared me by appearing out of nowhere.
(Say it looks like he has a worry.)
Yes, I have a worry. Sigh... I can't talk about it.
But I have no choice if you really want to hear it. Actually... it's because of $npcName:11004572[gender:1]$.
Very...
Very beautiful?! Right?!
I remember when I first saw $npcName:11004572[gender:1]$... She was like an angel that came down from heaven!
(...I'll be on my way.)
I will definitely confess to her. Just you watch!
Your face tells me you have a question. Ask me anything.
(Ask how it's like living here.)
(Ask about the refugee leader.)
Here? Can't be compared to when I used to live in Tairen. Food tastes bad, house is uncomfortable, and I'm exhausted.
If I have to choose a merit, that would be freedom. There's no need to tremble in fear anymore that we might fall out with $npcName:11004575[gender:1]$.

$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$... I always feel sorry towards $npcName:11004574[gender:1]$. We forced her to become leader when she didn't want to. But if it wasn't for her, we won't be alive right now.
Hm...
Hm...
Oh, hello. This is my first time greeting you.
There's too much dust here. Are you hurt anywhere?
(She looks like a kind person.)
If no, that's a relief. My daughter $npcName:11004573[gender:1]$'s coughing got worse and I'm worried.
She's young but pensive... I just want her to be bright and run around.
Please adore my daughter $npcName:11004573[gender:1]$ if you see her. She has to be happy.
Lalala!
Lalala!
Hm? Who are you?
You don't look like you live here... Are you from outside?
I'm jealous... I want to leave this place.
(Ask her why.)
It's because I want to see my mom laugh! She looks really exhausted.
I want to be of help too but... $npcName:11004574[gender:1]$ always treats me as a kid...
I've been waiting.
I've been waiting.
It's uncertain what will happen in the future.
$MyPCName$, always be on your toes.
The mood is dreary. Oh, you look scared.
The mood is dreary. Oh, you look scared.
(Say you're not.)
Yes you are. Hahaha! Just trust in me!
We're finally here! Good job, kitten. Once this is over, are we going on a date in Kritias?
We're finally here! Good job, kitten. Once this is over, are we going on a date in Kritias?
I was just joking because you looked really nervous. Are you fine now?
Everything is ready. Let me know if you need anything in particular.
Everything is ready. Let me know if you need anything in particular.
I have a bad feeling. You should be careful too.
I have a bad feeling. You should be careful too.
We finally arrived.
We will definitely win.
Humanitas forces have been deployed.
Humanitas forces have been deployed.
Don't get in my way, rookie.
Don't get in my way, rookie.
Leave the guiding to me.
Leave the guiding to me.
I almost went out to get you since you're late.
Come quickly.
Everyone, at your position.
Thank you for allowing everyone to arrive here safely.
Hey, you're not hurt, right? If you push yourself because you're young, you're going to suffer later on.
Hey, you're not hurt, right? If you push yourself because you're young, you're going to suffer later on.
The atmosphere here is different. I feel somewhat anxious.
The atmosphere here is different. I feel somewhat anxious.
I can feel that everyone is nervous. I will do my best to help everyone!
I can feel that everyone is nervous. I will do my best to help everyone!
It looks like no one can see these ominous things.
It looks like no one can see these ominous things.
(Ask what he's talking about.)
Even you? Sigh, I guess it's better that you're ignorant about it seeing your peaceful face.
When I think of the sacrifices we made so far, I now understand why you won't step back.
When I think of the sacrifices we made so far, I now understand why you won't step back.
This is a frightful place. I'm a little scared to be honest.
This is a frightful place. I'm a little scared to be honest.
I can finally defeat him.
I can finally defeat him.
Is everyone safe?!
Is everyone safe?!
What did I see just now? Is my vision really getting worse?
What did I see just now? Is my vision really getting worse?
(Say that you saw the same thing.)
Unbelievable. Robot? A robot?!
This... Never expected such a development.
This... Never expected such a development.
(Ask if they really didn't know.)

I've been collecting information in Maple World and Kritias but... there was nothing. Looks like I need to turn in my position as the best agent in Shadow Walkers. I'm disappointed in myself for not bringing information helpful to my allies.
I think I'm going to faint from shock.
I think I'm going to faint from shock.
No... this can't be... Then what was it that we just saw?
No... this can't be... Then what was it that we just saw?
I'm confused. What was it that we just saw?
I'm confused. What was it that we just saw?
I finally had my revenge, but it feels awkward.
I finally had my revenge, but it feels awkward.
Are you hurt? Let's leave this place for now.
Are you hurt? Let's leave this place for now.
We need to change our strategy to match the sudden turn of the situation.
It's time to report to the Empress.
This is a temporary barrack, but the inside looks like this? Is there no way to take this to Maple World?
This is a temporary barrack, but the inside looks like this? Is there no way to take this to Maple World?
The technology of Kritias is truly amazing. Is there a way to figure this out?
The technology of Kritias is truly amazing. Is there a way to figure this out?
I was surprised by the shocking truth, but I can't be here doing nothing. The Green Hoods are on standby. Let me know if you need us for anything.
I was surprised by the shocking truth, but I can't be here doing nothing. The Green Hoods are on standby. Let me know if you need us for anything.
I'm already worried on how to report on what happened here.
I'm already worried on how to report on what happened here.
Humanitas will not miss an opportunity that is given.
We will drive out the Daemon Army from Kritias this time.
It was a long journey. Thank you very much for the support until now.
It was a long journey. Thank you very much for the support until now.
I don't feel refreshed.
I don't feel refreshed.
You don't seem that hurt. That's a relief.
You don't seem that hurt. That's a relief.
$npcName:25022900$... How could you to me...
An envoy from Humanitas? They sent a young person...
Seems like I was expecting something big while hiding in a humble place like this.
Your face is full of questions.
What happened?
$npcName:25022900$ betrayed me. I cherished him like my child... The day that I went on an expedition with a small force, he lied in ambush and attacked.
$npcName:11004619[gender:0]$ and I barely survived, but $npcName:25022900$ already seized Kharon when we returned.
He announced that I betrayed the group and fled. When he said that he will increase the loot given to everyone, they all went over to his side.
I worked my entire life for this and it all came crashing down for a few more loot.
(Say that you won't listen to more nonsense and ask what he wants.)
In return for giving you inside information on Kharon, guarantee protection for me and $npcName:11004619[gender:0]$. $npcName:25022900$'s troops are still tracking me.
It seems he wants to erase me from this world. Can you do it?
(Say that you loathe $npcName:11004618[gender:0]$, but will decide based on the value of the information for the future of the exiles.)
Good. I'll take it that you agree. The first information is the location of Kharon's base.
It's at $map:52100114$ in $map:02020067$. I'll send the coordinates by HUD.
If the information is useful, guarantee protection for me and $npcName:11004619[gender:0]$. $npcName:11004619[gender:0]$ will inform you of the next rendezvous.
Now get out of my sight, rookie.
$npcName:11004618[gender:0]$, my life is yours.
Are you the envoy sent by Humanitas?
You're late. Are you looking down on the worth of Kharon's leader?
(Say that someone like Kharon's leader who kidnaps exiles is beneath your notice.)
Impudent... How dare you insult $npcName:11004618[gender:0]$...
(Tell him to give you the leader's location before you change your mind.)
We have only one request. In return for providing Humanitas with information, guarantee protection of $npcName:11004618[gender:0]$.
Can you promise that protection will be guaranteed for $npcName:11004618[gender:0]$ if we give you inside information on Kharon?
(Ask why Kharon's leader is under threat.)
I asked if you can guarantee it.
(Say that it depends on the value of the information provided by $npcName:11004618[gender:0]$.)
...$npcName:11004618[gender:0]$ is at $map:52100118$ in $map:02020051$. Contact secretly without getting caught by other Kharon forces.
I'm... a bit flustered. I need some time to collect my thoughts.
I'm... a bit flustered. I need some time to collect my thoughts.

SCRIPTNPCNAM_1108204107015705_NAME:[F]Wedding
I'm sorry, but you need to move alone from here. Please defeat $npcName:11004684$.
I'm sorry, but you need to move alone from here. Please defeat $npcName:11004684$.
Oh oh, what have I gotten myself into in my old age?
Boil, bubble, simmer and... glubble!
Urgh! I'll get burned to cinders before I ever graduate to full witch!
Guard the cauldron. Deal with customers. Deal with customers. Guard the cauldron...
$npcName:11000304[gender:1]$, that dratted old bat! Well, at least I don't have to worry about getting lonely...
Who's $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$?
What's with the cauldron?

She's only her exalted fancy-warts, the grand bossy-britches of all the witches! Oh, we were friends once, back in the day. But I wasted my time when she was mastering her grimoires, and... Well, no point regretting it now!
What happened?

This old thing? You see, once a year, a deep shadow covers the world, and all the demons and spirits rise from the netherworld to cavort and caper in the mortal realm. I think you humans call it Halloween.

Anyway, this is the one time of the year when we can get all the ingredients for witch stew! And we witches, we've got to have our witch stew. It gives our magic that extra little OOMPH that makes us so wonderful.
It's a long story. And an ugly one! Instead of nosing into my painful memories, why don't you help me with this cauldron?
